Yabaye mu gihe u Rwanda rugihanganye n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus ndetse abayitabiriye bakurikije amabwiriza yo kwirinda nko kwambara agapfukamunwa no guhana intera hagati yabo.

Perezida Kagame yavuze ko muri ibi bihe u Rwanda rurimo byatewe n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus, amahirwe ari uko atari umwihariko warwo gusa nubwo rwo rugerwaho n’ingaruka zitandukanye bitewe n’uko igihugu giteye.

Umukuru w’Igihugu yavuze ko iyi nama yayitumije kugira ngo haganirwe uko u Rwanda rwitwaye n’uko ruzakomeza kwitwara kuko bisa n’aho icyorezo ntaho kirajya ndetse abenshi bakibona nk’aho aribwo kigitangira.
Ati “Ni ukuvuga ngo ibyo dukora kugira ngo tucyirinde, byo bizakomeza cyangwa se bikwiye no gukomeza kurushaho.
Ni ingamba nyinshi zigenda zifatwa zizwi ntabwo ari ibintu byo gukinisha [.
] buri munsi ababikurikiranira hafi, abashakashatsi, abahanga muri siyansi, abahanga mu buzima, nabo ntabwo baramenya byose bijyanye n’iyi Coronavirus.
Baracyashakisha kuyimenya neza noneho bikaganisha ko hazaboneka uburyo bayirinda ku buryo bw’urukingo cyangwa se bw’umuti.

Yavuze ko igihe ibyo bigitegerejwe, urugamba rugomba gukomeza gushingirwa ku buryo abantu bitwara mu kwirinda aho bigomba gushingira ku buryo bubiri, aribwo kwirinda umuntu ku giti cye no kurinda abandi.
Perezida Kagame yavuze ko abantu bakwiriye kwipimisha, usanze yaranduye agaharanira ko nta wundi yakwanduza.
Ibi bikajyana no kwambara agapfukamunwa kuko bifasha ko umuntu atirinda we ubwe ahubwo akarinda n’abandi.
Ati “Uburyo bwa gatatu, ni ukudakomeza umuco wacu wo guhoberana cyane ku buryo twegerana.
Guhana intera, kugira ngo nabyo bifashe kutegerana cyane tugahana umwanya [.
] ibindi birimo isuku, gukaraba kenshi cyangwa se igihe cyose bibaye ngombwa, nabwo birafasha.
Ibyo byose bivamo ko twirinda ariko cyane ndetse turinda abandi.
Umukuru w’Igihugu yavuze ko ubu ari uburyo bizwi ko bufasha, kandi ko bwuzuzanya, bityo ntawe ukwiriye kubirengaho ahubwo bigomba kubahirizwa mu kwirinda.

Yavuze ko u Rwanda rwabaye mu bihugu bya mbere muri Afurika mu kubahiriza izi ngamba, biza no kugeza ku gusaba abantu kuguma mu ngo nubwo byari bifite ingaruka zatumye bamwe ibyo bakoraga bihagaragara, abandi bagasonza, ariko byakozwe kugira ngo “dushobore kubaho tunyure muri iki gihe hanyuma tuzagere no ku bindi".

Ati “Ndetse cyane cyane n’ibyo abantu binubira ukabikora kuko uzi ngo birakurinda, ukabikora ugononwa, winuba ariko uba uzi ngo urabikorera kugira ngo ubeho noneho ikindi gihe uzashobore gukora ibyo wifuzaga [.
] inzira iracyari ndende ntabwo umuntu yabinyura iruhande ngo avuge ko turi hafi kubirangiza.

Minisanté yasobanuye uko Coronavirus yageze muri kasho, yongera imbaraga mu gupima
Minisiteri y’Ubuzima yaraye itangaje ko mu Rwanda hagaragaye abantu 101 banduye Coronavirus, umubare munini w’abarwayi wabonetse mu munsi umwe kuva iki cyorezo cyagera mu Rwanda muri Werurwe.
Minisiteri y’Ubuzima yaraye itangaje ko mu Rwanda hagaragaye abantu 101 banduye Coronavirus, umubare munini w’abarwayi wabonetse mu munsi umwe kuva iki cyorezo cyagera mu Rwanda muri Werurwe.
Abarwayi 72 ni abafungwa bo muri kasho ya polisi
Abarwayi 10 babonetse mu midugudu iri muri Guma mu Rugo i Kigali
Uburyo bwo gupima ibindi byiciro bwakajijwe

Umuyobozi Mukuru w’Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’Ubuzima, RBC, Dr Nsanzimana Sabin, yavugiye kuri radiyo y’igihugu ko mu barwayi bose muri rusange, hejuru ya 70% babonetse muri kasho mu Karere ka Ngoma, hamwe hashyirwa imfungwa mu gihe zigikorerwa dosiye n’Urwego rw’Ubugenzacyaha, ahabonetse abarwayi 72.

Yagize ati “Iri tsinda rero ryagaragaye ku munsi w’ejo turacyari kurikoraho ubusesenguzi bwimbitse ngo turebe aho ubu burwayi bwaba bwaraturutse, ariko iby’ibanze twamaze kubona ni uko bifitanye isano ya hafi na ruriya rujya n’uruza rw’ingendo zambukiranya imipaka ndetse na bariya batwara imodoka baca muri ziriya nzira ko hari uburyo bahuye, ubwo amakuru arambuye aragenda akomeza [kugaragara] uko abaganga babishinzwe babikurikirana.

Yavuze ko mu gushakisha aho ubwo burwayi bwakomotse, bigendana no gushakisha abahuye n’aba bafungwa ngo nabo bapimwe, ndetse n’ahandi hacumbikiwe ahantu henshi muri za kasho hakorwe igikorwa nk’icyo cyo gupima.

Dr Nsanzimana yakomeje ati "Uretse aho ngaho, n’ibindi byiciro mu Ntara y’Iburasirazuba byegereye uriya muhanda wambukiranya umupaka tubona ko ubwo burwayi bushobora kuba bugenda buva kuri ibyo byiciro twabonye mbere bugakwira ku bandi, hose tukabashyira ibipimo tukavura ndetse n’abagaragayeho ubwo burwayi.
Yavuze ko hakomeza gupimwa n’ahandi hacumbikiwe abafungwa hose, ndetse no muri za gereza.
Muri Kigali ubwandu bwabonetse ahari Guma mu Rugo

Dr Nsanzimana yavuze ko abarwayi 22 baraye bagaragaye mu Umujyi wa Kigali, benshi babonetse mu Turere twa Kicukiro na Nyarugenge, ahari imidugudu yashyizwe muri gahunda ya Guma mu Rugo nyuma yo kugaragarwamo icyorezo.

Yakomeje ati "Muri abo rero kimwe cya kabiri n’ubundi bagaragaye muri iyo mirenge, abandi ni abari bahuye n’abo twari twabonye muri Kigali n’ubundi, aho usanga nk’umuntu umwe yaranduje undi babana cyangwa bakorana, ni abo 22 twabonye muri Kigali.
Yavuze ko imidugudu yashyizwe muri Guma mu Rugo ikomeje gufatwamo ibipimo byinshi, ashimira abahatuye uburyo borohereza inzego z’ubuzima.

Yakomeje ati "Kugeza ubu tumaze gufata ibipimo by’abarenga 2000 batuye hariya, akaba ari naho hagaragayemo abagera ku 10 ku munsi w’ejo, ndetse hari n’ibipimo biri bukomeze gufatwa kugeza igihe turangiriza kubona ko nta burwayi bukomeza gukwirakwira mu baturage ba hariya cyangwa se buhava bujya n’ahandi.
Dr Nsanzimana yavuze ko ibipimo bimaze gufatwa muri Kigali bigaragaza ko nta burwayi burimo gukwirakwira ahandi mu baturage, ubu ingufu nyinshi zashyizwe ahamaze kugaragara abarwayi.
Ariko gupima birakomeza n’ahandi kubera ko ingendo mu gihugu zifunguye, abantu bava mu Ntara imwe bajya mu yindi.
Yakomeje ati "Turaza gukomeza gupima mu bindi byiciro mu tundi duce dutandukanye haba mu mujyi wa Kigali no mu Rwanda [muri rusange], kuko ubu burwayi bushobora guhindura isura umunsi uwo ariwo wose.

Yasabye abaturarwanda gukomeza kubahiriza ingamba zo kwirinda Coronavirus zirimo kwambara neza agapfukamunwa igihe umuntu agiye aho ahurira n’abandi, guhana intera hagati y’umuntu n’undi no gukara intoki neza kandi kenshi.
Yakomeje ati “Ibyo bitatu bishobora gutuma ubwandu aho bwagaragara hose butadukwirakwiramo.

N’abantu baba bafite nk’ibimenyetso bisa n’ibicurane, bashobora guhamagara wa murongo 114, urakora neza, kuko hari igihe dushobora kuba tutagupimye kandi warahuye n’ubwo burwayi.
Mu barwayi babonetse kuri uyu wa Mbere harimo 22 b’i Kigali, batatu b’i Rusizi, babiri b’i Rubavu, umwe w’i Kayonza, umwe w’i Kirehe n’itsinda ry’abantu 72 bahuye n’abanduriye i Rusumo.
Mu Rwanda hamaze kuboneka abarwayi 1001 banduye mu bipimo 140 249 bimaze gufatwa, 443 barayikize mu gihe 556 bakiri mu bitaro, naho babiri bitabye Imana.

Ni ku nshuro ya gatatu muri iki gihe cy’iminsi 100 yo kwibuka Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu Karere ka Gatsibo hahohoterwa uwayirokotse.

Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa w’Umurenge wa Kiramuruzi, Yankurije Vestine, yabwiye IGIHE ko abantu bakekwaho gukubita umuturage warokotse Jenoside batawe muri yombi.
Yankurije yavuze ko mbere yuko habaho ibikorwa by’urugomo ngo usanga hari amagambo mabi n’ibindi bimenyetso biba byarabanje kugaragara bishobora guhuzwa no kuba bigamije kwibasira abarokotse Jenoside.
Ati “Ntabwo nabyemeza neza ariko hari ibimenyetso bimwe na bimwe ubona byisanisha nabyo, nka mbere yuko umusaza Gasangwa akubitwa hari amagambo yabanje kuvugwa wabihuza nuko uyu ari se wabo ugasanga birahura.
Byose bigaruka ku buhamya batanga bw’umuntu wafunguwe nyamara yari yarakatiwe burundu.
Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa wa Ibuka, Ahishakiye Naphtal, yabwiye IGIHE ko bibabaje kuba hakiri abarokotse Jenoside bagihohoterwa.
Ati “Ku wa 17 Kamena hahohotewe Gasangwa hanyuma ku wa 23 bakubita Sakindi kandi bariya bantu bose ni abo mu muryango umwe, ni abantu barokotse Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Iyo ugiye kureba usanga ihohoterwa bakorewe rishingiye ku ngengabitekerezo ya Jenoside kuko ryashingiye ku makuru bagiye batanga kuva mu gihe cy’Inkiko Gacaca.
Yakomeje avuga ko hari umugabo witwa Gatete Deo wari warakatiwe n’Inkiko Gacaca igihano cya burundu ariko ngo akagira n’ahandi yari yarakatiwe gufungwa imyaka 16 aza kugisoza arasohoka.
Ahishakiye Naphtal yakomeje avuga ko muri uyu mwaka bamaze kubarura ibikorwa birenga 70 byibasira abarokotse Jenoside.
Ati “Hari ibikorwa birenga 75 tumaze kwakira akenshi ni amagambo akomeretsa, atoneka, apfobya, ahakana Jenoside yabwirwaga abarokotse Jenoside ariko hakaba hari n’ingengabitekerezo yo mu nyandiko zandikwaga no ku mbuga nkoranyambaga zagiye zandikwa.
Hanagaragaye ingengabitekerezo mu bikorwa byo kwica no gukomeretsa amatungo, kurandura imyaka n’ibi byo gukomeretsa abantu.
Yakomeje avuga ko iyo ukurikiranye buri kibazo usanga hahanwa uwakoze icyaha nyamara hanagahanwe n’ababafashije mu kugikora.
Ahishakiye yasabye leta kujya inahana uba yahishiriye uwakoze icyaha ndetse n’abagaragara mu bufatanyacyaha.

Abarokotse Jenoside b’i Nduba bagenewe inkunga ifite agaciro ka miliyoni 16 Frw
Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’Imisoro n’Amahoro, RRA, ku bufatanye n’Urwego rw’Umugenzuzi Mukuru w’Imari ya Leta na Komisiyo y’Igihugu y’Amatora basuye imiryango y’abarokotse Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994 ituye mu Murenge wa Nduba mu Karere ka Gasabo babagenera inkunga y’ibikoresho byose hamwe bifite agaciro ka miliyoni 16 Frw.
Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’Imisoro n’Amahoro, RRA, ku bufatanye n’Urwego rw’Umugenzuzi Mukuru w’Imari ya Leta na Komisiyo y’Igihugu y’Amatora basuye imiryango y’abarokotse Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994 ituye mu Murenge wa Nduba mu Karere ka Gasabo babagenera inkunga y’ibikoresho byose hamwe bifite agaciro ka miliyoni 16 Frw.
Iyi nkunga igizwe na matelas, ibitenge, ibyo kurya n’ibikoresho by’isuku yahawe imiryango 143 irimo abaturage bagera kuri 699.
Abakozi b’ibi bigo bari bahagarariye abandi bavuze ko iki gikorwa kigamije kwereka abarokotse Jenoside ko bari kumwe ari nako bakomeza kubihanganisha muri iki gihe cy’iminsi 100 yo kwibuka.
Umuyobozi wungirije Umugenzuzi Mukuru w’Imari ya Leta, Habimana Patrick, yavuze ko ibigo bakorera byumva ko gufasha abarokotse Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994 ari inshingano zabyo kimwe n’abandi Banyarwanda.
Yavuze ko uyu mwaka bahisemo gusura abarokotse Jenoside b’i Nduba kugira ngo babahumurize banabashyire ibishobora kubafasha muri ibi bihe imirimo myinshi itagikorwa uko bikwiye.
Yagize ati “Twabasuye ngo tubereke ko batari bonyine, ko bakwiye kugira icyizere.
Kuba twatekereje ibyo kurya bijyanye n’igihe turimo mwatangiye kubyumva harafunze abantu ntabwo bakigenda nk’uko bagendaga kera ariko no muri za gahunda za leta hari uburyo ibafasha natwe twongereye ku cyo yafashaga.
Uretse kubagenera inkunga iri tsinda ryagize umwanya wo kuganira n’abarokotse Jenoside maze nabo babasangiza amateka yaranze Nduba mu 1994.
Umuyobozi wa Ibuka mu Murenge wa Nduba, Ndagijimana Théoneste, yashimye inkunga bakiriye avuga ko yerekana ko ubuyobozi buriho bwita ku baturage.
Yagize ati “Mbere abantu bumvaga ko kugira ngo umuntu abone umwanya wo kuyobora ibigo nka biriya agomba kuba yaragaragaje uruhare rukomeye mu bwicanyi.
Ubu birashimishije kumva ko ibigo nk’ibi, ubu noneho byumva ko bifite inshingano zo gufata mu mugongo no gutanga umwanya wo kwibuka Abazize Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Yavuze ko ibikorwa nk’ibi bibakura mu kwiheba batewe n’ibihe bikomeye banyuzemo.
Ati “Iyo wagize ibyago nk’uko bisanzwe ugahura n’umuntu uza kugufata mu mugongo wongera kumva ko uri uw’agaciro ukumva ko utari wenyine kandi ko utibagiranye

Ibi byishimo Ndagijimana abisangiye na mugenzi we Mukakagina Marguerite uvuga ko igikorwa cyakozwe n’ibi bigo cyamusannye umutima kandi kikamuhamiriza koko ko ubuyobozi buriho bukunda abaturage babwo.
Uretse iyi nkunga y’ibiribwa aba barokotse Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994 bo muri Nduba kandi bashyikirijwe amafaranga ibihumbi 500 azifashishwa mu kwishyurira mituweli abagera ku 166.
Ku ruhande rw’ubuyobozi bw’Umurenge wa Nduba bwavuze ko iyi nkunga yahawe aba baturage yunganira Leta mu bikorwa bitandukanye isanzwe ibafashamo.

Umurenge wa Nduba wasuwe n’ibigo bya Leta, mu gihe cya jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994 wapfushije abagera kuri 375 ndetse ukaba ufite n’umwihariko wo kuba wariciwemo n’abari baturutse mu bindi bice batazwi umubare cyane ko hari n’abajugunywe mu cyobo gihari cya Rwabayanga kugeza uyu munsi batarabasha gukuramo.

Sena ya Gabon kuri uyu wa Mbere yatoye ivana ubutinganyi mu byaha bihanwa n’amategeko y’icyo gihugu, nyuma y’icyumweru abadepite nabo batoye bashyigikira uwo mwanzuro.
Sena ya Gabon kuri uyu wa Mbere yatoye ivana ubutinganyi mu byaha bihanwa n’amategeko y’icyo gihugu, nyuma y’icyumweru abadepite nabo batoye bashyigikira uwo mwanzuro.
Iryo tegeko niriramuka risinywe na Perezida, Gabon izaba ibaye igihugu cya mbere muri Afurika cyemera abaryamana bahuje ibitsina mu mategeko yacyo.
Abanyamadini bagaragaje uburakari kuri iryo tegeko bavuga ko rigamije gushimisha abaterankunga b’abanyamahanga kurusha akamaro rifitiye abaturage ba Gabon.
Umwaka ushize nibwo muri Gabon hari hashyizweho igihano gihana ubutinganyi, aho ubufatiwemo yashoboraga gufungwa amezi atandatu cyangwa arenga.
Abaryamana bahuje ibitsina bararyamaganye bavuga ko rigamije gutuma bibasirwa.
Haracyari ibihugu byinshi muri Afurika aho ubutinganyi ari icyaha gikomeye ndetse gishobora no guhanishwa igihano cy’urupfu.

Ubushakashatsi bwasohowe mu kinyamakuru cyandika kuri siyansi, PNAS bugaragaza ko ibyo bicurane byo mu bwoko bwa G4, bifitanye isano n’ubundi bwoko bw’ibicurane by’ingurube byadutse mu 2009 bikaba icyorezo.
Abashakashatsi bo muri Kaminuza zo mu Bushinwa no mu kigo cy’u Bushinwa gishinzwe kugenzura ibyorezo, bagaragaje ko icyo cyorezo gifite ubushobozi buhambaye bwo kwanduza ikiremwamuntu.

Hagati ya 2011 na 2018, abashakashatsi bafashe ibizamini mu ngurube 30 000 mu mabagiro icumi atandukanye mu Bushinwa no mu nzu zivura inyamaswa, bituma babasha kuvumbura ubwoko 179 bwa virus zitera ibicurane by’ingurube.
Inyinshi muri izo ngurube bazisanzemo ubwoko bushya bwa virusi y’ibicurane bwatangiye kwigaragaza guhera mu 2016.
Ubwoko bushya bw’ibicurane by’ingurube buzwi nka G4 nibwo basanze bukomeye cyane ndetse bufite ubushobozi bwo kwanduza cyane ikiremwamuntu.
Ubushakashatsi kandi bwagaragaje ko ubudahangarwa umubiri uvana mu bicurane bisanzwe budashobora guhangara ubwoko bushya bwa G4.
Mu bakozi bashinzwe iby’ibicurane by’ingurube bafashwe ibizamini nyuma yo gushyirwa hafi y’aho izo virusi zavumburiwe, byagaragaye ko umwe mu icumi yanduye.
Ibizamini byafashwe kandi byagaragaje ko hafi 4.
4 % by’abaturage bose bahuye n’iyo virusi banduye.
Inzobere zivuga ko iyo virusi ishobora kwandura iva mu nyamaswa ijya mu bantu ariko ntibaramenya niba ishobora kuva ku muntu umwe ijya ku wundi, ari nazo mpungenge bafite.
Abakoze ubushakashatsi basabye ko habaho uburyo buhamye bwo gukurikirana abantu bakora ahororerwa cyangwa ahicirwa ingurube.
Umwami w’u Bubiligi yicujije ku byo igihugu cye cyakoze muri RDC mu gihe cy’Ubukoloni
Umwami w’u Bubiligi Philippe yagaragaje ukwicuza gukomeye ku byo igihugu cye cyakoze muri Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo (RDC) mu gihe cy’Ubukoloni.
Umwami w’u Bubiligi Philippe yagaragaje ukwicuza gukomeye ku byo igihugu cye cyakoze muri Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo (RDC) mu gihe cy’Ubukoloni.
Uku kwicuza Umwami Philippe yakugaragaje mu ibaruwa yandikiye Perezida, Félix Tshisekedi, ku wa Kabiri ubwo muri RDC hizihizwaga isabukuru y’imyaka 60 igihugu kimaze kibonye ubwigenge.
Yagize ati “Ndashaka kwerekana ko nicujije cyane kubera ibikomere byasize ububabare bwongeye kubyuka uyu munsi kubera ivangura rikiriho muri sosiyete zacu.
Kuvuga ko ububabare bwongeye kubyutswa n’ivangura ririho yavugaga urupfu rw’Umunyamerika George Floyd, rwatumye havuka imyigaragambyo mu bice bitandukanye by’Isi.
George Perry Floyd Jr.

yapfuye ku wa 25 Gicurasi 2020 nyuma yo kunigwa n’umupolisi witwa Derek Chauvin washinze ivi rye ku ijosi rya Floyd mu gihe kingana n’iminota umunani n’amasegonda 46, ndetse ko muri iki gihe cyose “iminota ibiri n’amasegonda 53" Floyd yayimaze yataye ubwenge.
Uyu mwirabura yaguye mu Mujyi wa Minneapolis muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika aho yafatiwe n’abapolisi, umwe muri bo akamunigisha ivi ku ijosi kugeza aheze umwuka.

Abahanga mu by’amateka bavuga ko miliyoni z’Abanyafurika baturutse mu duce twahoze ari Congo Belge bishwe, batemagurwa cyangwa bapfa bazize indwara igihe bakoraga imirimo y’agahato mu mirima y’Umwami w’u Bubiligi Leopold II.
Yirinda kuvuga izina ry’Umwami Leopold II, Philippe yagize ati “Hakozwe ibikorwa by’ubugome bituremerera mu kwibuka kwacu.
Philippe yavuze ko azarwanya ivanguramoko iryo ariryo ryose.
Mu byumweru bishize, amashusho menshi y’Umwami Leopold II wategetse hagati ya 1865-1909, yangijwe n’abigaragambyaga mu Bubiligi, maze hatangizwa gahunda yo kuyakuraho.
Kugeza ubu ibigo bitandukanye byakuyeho amashusho n’ibishushanyo bimugaragaza kugira ngo bigabanye uburakari bw’abigaragambya.
Nibwo bwa mbere mu mateka y’u Bubiligi Umwami uyoboye asabye imbabazi ku byabaye mu bukoloni muri RDC.

U Bubiligi bwakolonije RDC mu cyiswe Congo Belge, hagati ya 1908 na 1960, amateka avuga ko muri icyo gihe abaturage b’icyahoze ari Zaïre babarirwa mu miliyoni bapfuye, bazira indwara, iyicarubozo n’imirimo y’agahato.
U Rwanda rwasabye u Burundi ibisobanuro ku gitero cyagabwe n’abantu bitwaje intwaro i Nyaruguru

U Rwanda rwasabye u Burundi ibisobanuro nyuma y’igitero giheruka kugabwa mu Karere ka Nyaruguru n’abantu bitwaje intwaro, kikagwamo bane mu bakigabye ndetse abasirikare batatu b’u Rwanda bagakomereka byoroheje.

U Rwanda rwasabye u Burundi ibisobanuro nyuma y’igitero giheruka kugabwa mu Karere ka Nyaruguru n’abantu bitwaje intwaro, kikagwamo bane mu bakigabye ndetse abasirikare batatu b’u Rwanda bagakomereka byoroheje.

Ni igitero cyagabwe ku wa Gatandatu tariki 27 Kamena 2020, n’abantu bitwaje intwaro bagera mu 100, bitwaje imbunda zirimo mashinigani (machine guns) n’izirasa za rockettes, bafite umugambi wo kugirira nabi abatuye mu Mudugudu w’icyitegererezo wa Yanze, uri mu kilometero kimwe gusa uvuye ku mupaka w’u Burundi.
RDF yatangaje ko baturutse mu Burundi ari na ho basubiye nyuma yo kuraswa berekeza mu birindiro by’Ingabo z’u Burundi biherereye ahitwa mu Gihisi ho muri Komini Bukinanyana, mu Ntara ya Cibitoke.

Basize inyuma abarwanyi babo bane bapfuye, ibikoresho bya gisirikare birimo imbunda na radiyo za gisirikari n’ibikombe by’ibiribwa byanditseho "Force de Defense Nationale du Burundi", batatu mu bakigabye bafatwa mpiri.

Minisiteri y’Ububanyi n’Amahanga y’u Rwanda yandikiye Guverinoma y’u Burundi binyuze mu nzira za dipolomasi, isaba ibisobanuro kuri icyo gitero no kuba abakigabye bagahungira mu Burundi, batabwa muri yombi.

Yemereye IGIHE ko yandikiye Minisiteri y’Ububanyi n’amahanga y’u Burundi, "isaba ibisobanuro ku gitero cyagabwe n’abantu bataramenyekana baturutse mu Burundi, inasaba Guverinoma y’u Burundi gufata ingamba zose zishoboka kugira ngo abagize uruhare muri ibyo byaha bahungiye mu Burundi, bafatwe mu maguru mashya bagezwe imbere y’ubutabera, cyangwa boherezwe mu Rwanda kugira ngo babazwe ibyo bakoze.
Ni ibaruwa yohererejwe u Burundi ku munsi icyo gitero cyagabweho, gusa ntabwo u Burundi burasubiza.
Nyuma y’icyo gitero, Umuvugizi w’Ingabo z’u Rwanda, Lt Col Innocent Munyangango yagize ati "Turizeza Abanyarwanda ko abakoze ibi bakurikiranwa bakamenyekana.
Turimo gushakisha, binyuze mu nzira za dipolomasi, amakuru yizewe kuri ibi bitero bihora bigaruka.

Ingabo z’u Burundi zahakanye uruhare muri icyo gitero, nyamara mu itangazo ryazo ntizihakana cyangwa ngo zemeze ko cyabayeho, ahubwo zigifata nk’ibyatangajwe ku mbuga nkoranyambaga hirengagijwe gihamya zose zagaragajwe.

Itangazo ryasohowe na Colonel Biyereke Floribert, rigira riti “Ingabo z’Igihugu z’u Burundi ziramenyesha Abarundi n’amahanga ko ubutaka bw’u Burundi budashobora kuba indiri y’imitwe yitwaje intwaro igamije guhungabanya umutekano mu bihugu by’Abaturanyi.
Ahubwo abasirikare b’Abarundi basabwa gucunga neza umutekano ku mbibi u Burundi busangira n’ibihugu by’abaturanyi.
Amakuru yatangajwe mu Burundi avuga ko abagabye icyo gitero bafite ibirindiro mu ishyamba rya Kibira muri komini za Bukinanyana na Mabayi.
Ni ishyamba ry’inzitane rifatanye na Pariki y’Igihugu ya Nyungwe ku ruhande rw’u Rwanda.

Bajya kugaba igitero ngo babanje guhurira ku Gihisi, ndetse ubwo bari basubijwe inyuma niho bongeye guhurira, barimo abarwanyi babiri bakomeretse cyane bajya kuvurwa bari mu modoka y’igisirikare cy’u Burundi,"bafata umuhanda wa Ndora- Bubanza mu Burundi.

Mu karere ka Nyaruguru cyane cyane mu nkengero z’ishyamba rya Nyungwe, kuva mu myaka ishize hakunze kugabwa ibitero n’abantu bitwaje intwaro, Ingabo z’u Rwanda zabasubiza inyuma bagahungira mu Burundi.
Rumwe mu ngero za vuba ni ubwo mu ijoro ryo ku wa 1 Nyakanga 2018 ahagana 23:30’ abagizi ba nabi bitwaje intwaro bateye mu Karere ka Nyaruguru, Umurenge wa Nyabimata.
Bibye ibintu by’abaturage birimo amatungo n’ibiribwa, banarasa hejuru bagamije gutera ubwoba abaturage.
Icyo gihe Polisi y’u Rwanda yagize iti "Abo bagizi ba nabi bateye baturutse mu gihugu cy’u Burundi banyuze mu ishyamba rya Nyungwe, ari nayo nzira banyuze basubirayo.
Ibi bikaba bibaye nta n’ibyumweru bibiri bishize mu karere kamwe habaye igitero nk’iki.
Uretse ibyo, hari ibindi bitero byagiye bigabwa muri Nyaruguru mu murenge wa Nyabimata, byishe abaturage ndetse bitwika imodoka, binasahura abaturage.
Ni ibitero birimo ibyagabwe n’umutwe witwara gisirikare wa FLN, wari ufite Nsabimana Callixte “Sankara" nk’umuvugizi.

Ibyo byose byuzuza amakuru ahamya ko mu Burundi hari ibikorwa bikomeye by’imitwe ya FDLR, FLN na RNC, aho nko mu bantu 33 bari kuburana imbere y’Urukiko Rukuru rwa Gusirikare ku byaha birimo kurema imitwe y’ingabo itemewe no kugirana umubano na leta y’amahanga bigiriwe gushoza intambara, hafi ya bose binjiye mu mitwe yitwaje intwaro banyuze mu Burundi, kandi bahabwa ubufasha n’abarimo abayobozi bakuru ba girisikare, barimo Colonel Ignace Sibomana, Chief J2 (ushinzwe ubutasi mu ngabo) mu Burundi.

Mu buhamya bwakomeje gutangwa n’abafatiwe muri iyo mitwe, ni uko Uganda yakomeje kuba nk’icyicaro cyinjirizwamo abashaka kujya muri iyo mitwe igamije gutera u Rwanda, mu gihe u Burundi bwabaye irembo ribageza mu mashyamba ya Congo, n’ahantu ho kunogereza imigambi cyangwa kwinyagamburira igihe mu mashyamba byanze, icyo bite "withdraw route" mu Cyongereza.

Guverinoma y’u Rwanda n’iy’u Bufaransa binyuze mu kigo cyabwo gishinzwe iterambere (AFD), zashyize umukono ku masezerano afite agaciro ka miliyoni 49.
5 z’amayero (asaga miliyari 53 Frw), yo kwifashisha mu guhangana n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus no guteza imbere imyigishirize y’imyuga n’ubumenyingiro.

5 z’amayero (asaga miliyari 53 Frw), yo kwifashisha mu guhangana n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus no guteza imbere imyigishirize y’imyuga n’ubumenyingiro.

Ayo masezerano yashyizweho umukono kuri uyu wa Kabiri na Minisitiri w’Imari n’Igenamigambi, Dr Uzziel Ndagijimana, Umuyobozi Mukuru wa AFD (Agence Française de Développement) Rémy Rioux na Chargé d’affaires w’u Bufaransa mu Rwanda, Jérémie Blin.
Ni amasezerano yiyongereye mu bindi bikorwa byo kuzahura umubano w’u Rwanda n’u Bufaransa, nk’uko biheruka gushimangirwa na Perezida Paul Kagame na mugenzi we Emmanuel Macron.

Harimo amasezerano y’inguznayo y’igihe kirekire ya miliyoni 40 z’amayero (asaga miliyari 43 Frw) azanyuzwa mu ngengo y’imari, agenewe ibikorwa byo guhangana n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus no guhangana n’ingaruka zayo ku bikorwa bitandukanye n’imibereho y’abaturage.

Zizifashishwa mu kubaka ubushobozi bwo gupima COVID-19 haba mu kugura ibipimo cyangwa kongera ubushobozi bwa za laboratwari, gushyiraho ibigo bishyirwamo abanduye cyangwa bakekwaho iburwayi, no kongera ubushobozi bwo kwita ku banduye barimo kuvurwa.
Mu buryo bw’igihe kirekire kandi zizafasha mu gukomeza urwego rw’ubuzima mu gihugu no kubaka ubushobozi bw’abazahajwe n’ingaruka za COVID-19.
Ku bijyanye n’ubuvuzi, ni gahunda izashyirwa mu bikorwa n’Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’Ubuzima, RBC.
Ku ruhande rw’imibereho y’abaturage by’umwihariko, uyu mushinga uzagira uruhare mu gufasha mu buryo bw’inkunga izahabwa imiryango igera ku 150.
000; imiryango 190.
000 ihabwe imirimo rusange ariko ibyara inyugu; hanatangwe ibiribwa ku ngo 75.

000 irimo abagore batwite n’abana bari munsi y’imyaka ibiri; hatangwe ibiribwa n’inkunga ku ngo 212,000 zaakoraga imirimo iciriritse ubu yahungabanye batafashijwe muri gahunda zisanzwe za leta; inunganire abantu miliyoni 1.
9 mu misanzu y’ubwisungane mu kwivuza, itangwa muri RSSB.
Iyi gahunda y’imibereho myiza yo izakurikiranwa n’Ikigo Gishinzwe Kongerera Ubushobozi Inzego z’Ibanze, LODA.

Uretse izo miliyoni 40 z’amayero zizatangwa nk’inguzanyo, AFD hari na miliyoni 2 z’amayero izatanga nk’impano muri Croix Rouge, azakoreshwa mu gufasha ingo zibikeneye, ku bufatanye n’ubuyobozi bw’igihugu,

Kassim Majaliwa witabiriye umuhango wo gusezera kuri Nkurunziza kuri uyu wa Gatanu ari kumwe na Jakaya Kikwete wigeze kuyobora Tanzania, yavuze ko ku buyobozi bwa Nkurunziza, Tanzania n’u Burundi byari nk’abavandimwe.
Yavuze ko kimwe mu byifuzo Nkurunziza yari afite ari uko igihugu cye cyinjira muri SADC.

Yagize ati “Tubabajwe no kuba agiye mbere y’uko icyo cyifuzo gishyirwa mu bikorwa.

Kenya Airways imaze guhomba miliyoni 100$ kubera Coronavirus
Sosiyete ikora ubwikorezi bwo mu Kirere, Kenya Airways, yatangaje ko imaze guhomba miliyoni 100 z’amadolari ya Amerika, kubera icyorezo cya Coronavirus ndetse n’ingaruka zigishamikiyeho.
Sosiyete ikora ubwikorezi bwo mu Kirere, Kenya Airways, yatangaje ko imaze guhomba miliyoni 100 z’amadolari ya Amerika, kubera icyorezo cya Coronavirus ndetse n’ingaruka zigishamikiyeho.
Umuyobozi Mukuru wa Kenya Airways, Allan Kilavuka, kuri uyu wa Gatanu yabwiye itangazamakuru ko bateganya ko mu mpera z’uyu mwaka iyi sosiyete izahomba hagati ya miliyoni 400 na 500 z’amadolari.
Yagize ati “Ikigereranyo cyacu kuva muri Mutarama kugeza ubu ni uko dushobora kuba twarahombye miliyoni 100 z’amadolari".
Mbere ya Coronavirus, Kenya Airways, yarwanaga n’ibihombo aho mu 2019 yahombye miliyari zibarirwa muri 13 z’amashilingi ya Kenya, ni ukuvuga miliyoni 122 z’amadolari, ugereranyije na miliyari 7.
56 z’amashilingi ya Kenya yari yahombye mu mwaka wa 2018.
Guverinoma ya Kenya irimo gutegura uko yakwigarurira iyi sosiyete kugira ngo harebwe uko yava mu bihombo.
Gusa iyi gahunda yakererejwe na Coronavirus.
Kenya Airways iteganya gusubukura ingendo muri Nyakanga ubwo Kenya izaba yemeye ko ingendo z’indege zisubukura.
Icyakora ngo izasubukurana n’ingendo nkeya zizagenda ziyongera kubera ubusabe bw’abakiriya.
Kenya Airways isanzwe ikoreshwa indege 42 mu byerekezo 56 muri Afurika, u Burasirazuba bwo Hagati, Aziya, u Burayi na Amerika ya Ruguru.
Icyorezo cya Coronavirus kizagira ingaruka zikomeye ku bwikorezi bwo mu kirere muri Afurika, aho biteganyijwe ko buzahomba miliyari 6$.
Tanzania yashyizeho amabwiriza y’ikoreshwa ry’udupfukamunwa ku bigo by’amashuri
Guverinoma ya Tanzania, yashyizeho amabwiriza mashya agomba gukurikizwa n’ibigo by’amashuri makuru byose guhera kuri uyu wa Mbere ubwo yongerega kuyafungurira imiryango ngo asubukure ibikorwa.

Amwe muri ayo mabwiriza harimo ko abanyeshuri bari munsi y’imyaka umunani bafite ibibazo by’ubuhumekero nk’uburwayi bwa asthma, umutima n’ubundi nk’ubwo batagomba kwambara udupfukamunwa.

Minisitiri w’Ubuzima, Ummy Mwalimu, yatangaje ko mu gihe umunyeshuri arwaye cyangwa agize ibibazo by’ubuhumekero, agomba kwirinda kujya ahantu hari abantu benshi, ndetse n’uwambaye agapfukamunwa akagakuramo kugira ngo abone umwuka umufasha guhumeka neza, kandi akihutira gusaba ubufasha.
Yavuze kandi ko abanyeshuri batagomba kwambara udupfukamunwa mu gihe bari mu bikorwa bisaba ingufu nko kwiruka n’indi mikino.
Yategetse ko amashuri asukurwa mu buryo bufatika, ndetse hagashyirwaho ahantu ho gukarabira intoki.
Umunyeshuri wese ugaragaje ibimenyetso bya Coronavirus, ababyeyi n’abarezi basabwe guhita babimenyesha inzego zibishinzwe agahita apimwa.
Iyi minisiteri yashimangiye kandi ko izajya ikora igenzura rihoraho mu kureba ko ibi byose byubahirizwa.

Tanzania ni kimwe mu bihugu byagenze biguru ntege mu ngamba zo kurwanya icyorezo cya Coronavirus ugereranyije n’ibindi, aho cyageze n’aho gihagarika ibikorwa byo gupima nyuma y’aho Perezida Magufuli anengeye ibikoresho byifashishwa.
Ubu habarurwa abantu 509 banduye Coronavirus barimo 21 bitabye Imana.

Ibyihariye kuri Liban Soleman wayoboye ibiro bya Perezida wa Gabon uri mu bagize Inama y’Ubutegetsi ya RDB

Liban Soleman wahoze ari Umuyobozi w’Ibiro bya Perezida wa Gabon, Ali Bongo Ondimba, ni umwe mu bantu icyenda Inama y’Abaminisitiri yashyize mu Nama y’Ubutegetsi y’Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’Iterambere, RDB.

Liban Soleman wahoze ari Umuyobozi w’Ibiro bya Perezida wa Gabon, Ali Bongo Ondimba, ni umwe mu bantu icyenda Inama y’Abaminisitiri yashyize mu Nama y’Ubutegetsi y’Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’Iterambere, RDB.
Uyu mugabo afite ubunararibonye mu mirimo ijyanye no gucunga imari, nka rwiyemezamirimo n’ubujyanama muri leta mu gihe cy’imyaka 13.
Yabaye umuyobozi w’Ibiro bya Perezida muri Gabon, aba n’Umuyobozi Mukuru w’Ikigo cy’ishoramari cya Gabon aba n’ushinzwe ubucuruzi mu gihe yakoreraga igihugu cye muri Israel.
Liban afite impamyabumenyi ihanitse mu icungamutungo no kwamamaza ibikorwa by’ubucuruzi yakuye muri Kaminuza ya George Mason n’impamyabumenyi yakuye muri HEC i Paris mu by’ubucuruzi.

Hagati ya 2011 na 2016 nibwo yari Umuyobozi w’Ibiro bya Perezida Bongo, ni we wayoboye gahunda yo gushyiraho Ikigo cy’Igihugu muri Gabon gishinzwe guteza imbere ishoramari, ANPI, mu 2014 yanabereye Umuyobozi w’Inama y’Ubutegetsi mu 2018.
Ni umwe mu bagize uruhare kandi mu gushyiraho gahunda y’iterambere muri Gabon mu cyerekezo cya 2025.
Mu mpera za 2018 yoherejwe kuba Ambasaderi wa Gabon muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe z’Abarabu na Arabie Saoudite gusa ntabwo yigeze afata uyu mwanya.

Jeune Afrique yatangaje ko yabonye amakuru avuga ko mbere yo gushyirwa muri uwo mwanya, Arabie Saoudite itari yamenyeshejwe ndetse ko Gabon itigeze imuha impapuro zimwemerera guhagararira igihugu nka Ambasaderi.
Mu gihe hari hakiri uru rujijo hagati y’igihugu cye n’ibi bihugu, Soleman yahisemo kujya kwiga muri Kaminuza ya Harvard yiga amasomo ajyanye n’imiyoborere mu by’imari.
Icyo gihe yabaga mu Mujyi wa Miami, atangira kujya yitabira inama zikomeye zitandukanye zivuga ku iterambere rya Afurika.

Mu 2019 yatangiye kujya cyane mu rwego rw’abikorera, nyuma y’aho ubuyobozi bw’igihugu cye bwari bumuhaye uburenganzira dore ko yari yaraboshywe n’ibya politiki kubera umwanya yari agiye gushyirwamo wo kuba Ambasaderi ariko bikanga dore ko na Ismaël Gnamale Ngoungou Oligui yagombaga gusimbura yari yaramaze kuwisubiza.
Yatangiye imikoranire n’ikigega kibarizwa i Dubai kigamije ibikorwa by’iterambere muri Afurika.
Binyuze muri icyo kigega, mu minsi mike ishize yatangiye kuza mu Rwanda cyane ndetse bivugwa ko izina rye mu Rwanda ryabyibushye kubera ibikorwa yagizemo uruhare.
Soleman kandi yakunze guhura na Perezida Kagame inshuro nyinshi mu gihe cyose yabaga aje mu Rwanda ku busabe bwa Ali Bongo bwo kwigira k’u Rwanda ku buryo rwateje imbere ishoramari.
Ikindi kandi ni uko ngo ari umuntu wa hafi wa Ivan Kagame, umuhungu wa Perezida Kagame bazaba bari kumwe muri iyi nama y’Ubutegetsi ya RDB.
Yari mu Rwanda kandi yitabiriye ibirori byo gusaba no gukwa bya Ange Kagame aho yanagaragaye yifotoranyije na Perezida Kagame na Madamu.
Urugendo rutangaje rwa Dr Charles Murigande winjiye mu kiruhuko cy’izabukuru

Dr Charles Murigande, umwe mu bahanga u Rwanda rufite, wari Umuyobozi wungirije wa Kaminuza y’u Rwanda ushinzwe iterambere, yatangiye ikiruhuko cy’izabukuru nyuma y’urugendo rurerure mu myanya y’ubuyobozi itandukanye mu gihugu.

Dr Charles Murigande, umwe mu bahanga u Rwanda rufite, wari Umuyobozi wungirije wa Kaminuza y’u Rwanda ushinzwe iterambere, yatangiye ikiruhuko cy’izabukuru nyuma y’urugendo rurerure mu myanya y’ubuyobozi itandukanye mu gihugu.

Ni umwe mu bantu b’inararibonye, bacisha make, kandi b’abahanga u Rwanda rufite, wakoze imirimo ye mu nzego za politiki n’uburezi; kuri uyu wa Mbere Kamena 2020 yatangiye ikiruhuko cye cy’izabukuru ku myaka 61 y’amavuko.
Yabwiye IGIHE ati “Ni ukuri [kujya mu kiruhuko] kandi gitangira uyu munsi, gusa ndi kwandika raporo yo guhererekanya ububasha igomba gutangwa ejo.

Ni umuhanga mu mibare ubifitiye impamyabumenyi y’ikirenga, yakunze kuvuga ko mu mashuri ye hafi ya yose yakundaga “kuzuza imibare" ku buryo ari nabyo yakomeje nubwo yifuzaga kuba umuganga ngo azajye yita ku barwayi.

Yavukiye mu Rwanda ku wa 15 Kanama 1958 ariko kimwe n’abandi benshi yahungiye mu Burundi yiga muri College St Albert kuko yari yatsinze amasomo neza, aza kuhava binyuze muri buruse HCR yari yatanze zo gutanga mu mpunzi muri Afurika, ayibona ariwe wenyine ku mugabane wose.

Yarangije icyiciro cya kabiri cya Kaminuza mu Bubiligi afite “grande distinction", asaba guhabwa buruse yo kwiga icyiciro cya gatatu cya Kaminuza ayibona bitagoranye kuko abarimu bose bamuvuganiye nk’umuntu wari umuhanga mu ishuri, abona “doctorat" [1982-1986] mu mibare yo gushyira mu ngiro ibintu “Mathématiques appliquées".

Icyo gihe yakoraga ubushakashatsi bugamije gukoresha satellite mu kwerekana aho buri kintu cyose kiri ku Isi giherereye [GPS], ikoranabuhanga rya GPS icyo gihe ryakoreshwaga n’abasirikare ba Amerika gusa n’amakuru amwe n’amwe yifashishije nibo bayamuhaga.

Nyuma yaje kwinjira muri politiki, mu gihe cy’urugamba rwo kubohoza igihugu ubwo we yari muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, yakundaga kuvugira kuri radiyo mpuzamahanga zitandukanye asobanurira amahanga impamvu y’urugamba rwa FPR Inkotanyi rwo kubohora igihugu.

Iyo asobanura urugendo rwe, avuga ko yinjiye muri Politiki yaramaze “kwakira Umwami Yesu nk’umucunguzi" we, ku buryo byatumaga yirinda ikintu kibi cyose yakora; agakora igishoboka mu gushaka ibisubizo by’ibibazo byugarije umuryango nyarwanda binyuze “mu kuri", agirira neza abantu bamugana kandi akirinda “amanyanga" kuko ibyo akora byose aba ashaka kwisanisha na Daniel uvugwa muri Bibiliya yumva ko abantu nibasubira mu buzima bwe bareba ibyo yakoze “bazabure ibyo bandega" bikamutera umwete wo gukora buri gihe ikintu kigororotse.

Mu rugendo rwe rwa Politiki, yibukwa cyane ku kiganiro yagiranye na BBC mu 2003 abazwa niba Ingabo z’u Rwanda zaba ziri muri RDC zirwanira muri Ituri, asubiza ko ari ikinyoma, umunyamakuru amubaza niba uko ari ukuri kw’Imana, maze mu kumusubira amubwira ko ukuri kw’Imana kuba muri Bibiliya, we ibyo ari kuvuga ari “ukuri kw’impamo".

Kuko Ingabo z’u Rwanda zitari zikiri muri Congo, yakunze gusobanura ko iyo aza kubazwa icyo kibazo zikiriyo, igisubizo yari gutanga yari kuba agihawe na “mwuka wera" cyane ko mbere yo kujya mu kiganiro abanza gusenga ngo Imana “inyobore mu byo ndi bukore n’ibyo ndi buvuge".

Nubwo yari yarize imibare, ayihuza na politiki yakoze kuko ngo mu ishuri yize isomo ryitwa “logique" risaba gutekereza ku cyo ugiye gukora mbere yo kugishyira mu bikorwa, bityo nawe atekerezaga buri cyose mbere yo kugikora.
Yatahutse mu Rwanda muri Kanama 1994 avuye muri Kaminuza ya Howard muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika aho yakoraga aza mu Rwanda kugira ngo agire icyo amarira igihugu.
Iyo atari mu kazi akunda kugenda n’amaguru nibura iminota 30 ku munsi mbere yo kujya mu mirimo, cyangwa akanyonga igare rya siporo ku buryo umubiri we uhora umeze neza.
Akunda gusengana n’abandi no kumva indirimbo zihimbaza Imana zo mu gitabo cy’agakiza.
Incamake ku mateka y’urugendo rwa Dr Murigande

Mbere y’uko agirwa Umuyobozi wungirije ushinzwe iterambere muri Kaminuza y’u Rwanda muri Kanama 2016, Dr Charles Murigande yabaye Ambasaderi w’u Rwanda mu bihugu bitandukanye birimo u Buyapani, Australie, Nouvelle-Zélande, Thailand na Philippines kuva mu 2011 kugera mu 2015.

Yakoze no mu yindi myanya itandukanye muri Guverinoma irimo nk’aho yabaye Minisitiri w’Uburezi (2009-2011), Minisitiri ushinzwe Imirimo y’Inama y’Abaminisitiri (2008-2009), Minisitiri w’Ububanyi n’Amahanga n’Ubutwererane (2002-2008) na Minisitiri wo gutwara abantu n’itumanaho (1995-1997).

Yabaye kandi Umujyanama wa Perezida w’u Rwanda (1994-1995) nyuma aza gutorerwa kuba Umunyamabanga Mukuru w’Umuryango wa FPR Inkotanyi muri Gashyantare 1998 aza kongererwa gutorwa bwa kabiri kuri uwo mwanya mu Ukuboza 2001.

Dr Murigande afite impamyabumenyi y’Ikirenga mu Mibare yakuye muri Kaminuza ya Namur mu Bubiligi mu 1986 ni nyuma y’uko ari naho yari arangirije amasomo y’icyiciro cya Gatatu cya Kaminuza aho yabonye n’amanota y’ikirenga (grande distinction).

Amaze gusoza amasomo, yerekeje mu Burundi aho yari yarigiye amashuri yisumbuye kubera ubuhunzi, maze akorera Institut Géographique du Burundi (1986-1988) nk’umujyanama mu bya siyansi ndetse yanabaye Umushakashatsi muri Kaminuza ya Howard i Washington D.
C (1989-1994) aho yari afite umwanya w’Umuyobozi w’agashami gashinzwe ikoreshwa ry’imibare mu bijyanye n’ibinyabuzima (Biostatistique) mu Kigo cy’iyo kaminuza cyigisha ibijyanye na kanseri.
Muri icyo gihe yari n’umwarimu wungirije mu ishami ry’imibare mu isomo ryitwa “probabilité".
Kuva mu 1997 kugera mu 1998 yabaye Umuyobozi w’iyahoze ari Kaminuza Nkuru y’u Rwanda.
Yakoze ubushakashatsi butandukanye butangazwa mu binyamakuru mpuzamahanga byandika ubushakashatsi.
Ibirori biratashye! Ahazaza h’imihango y’ubukwe mu bihe bidasanzwe

Icyorezo cya Coronavirus kimaze guhindura uburyo abantu babaho, uko bakoraga n’uko bitwaraga, kuko mu rwego rwo gukumira iki cyorezo, bakangurirwa kwirinda kwegerana, bakagendera kure igikorwa cyatuma bahurira ahantu hamwe ari benshi.

Icyorezo cya Coronavirus kimaze guhindura uburyo abantu babaho, uko bakoraga n’uko bitwaraga, kuko mu rwego rwo gukumira iki cyorezo, bakangurirwa kwirinda kwegerana, bakagendera kure igikorwa cyatuma bahurira ahantu hamwe ari benshi.

Ubwo icyorezo cya Coronavirus cyari kimaze kugera mu Rwanda, mu ngamba Guverinoma yatangaje ku wa 14 Werurwe 2020, harimo gufunga amashuri n’insengero, bitangazwa ko “amahuriro y’abantu benshi nk’imikino ndetse n’ubukwe bibaye bisubitswe.
Ni icyemezo gikomeye kuko abaturarwanda baha agaciro gakomeye insengero n’ubukwe.
Mu bindi bihugu aho abantu bagiye basanga batategereza ko Coronavirus iva mu nzira, aho amategeko yabo abyemera bagenda basezerana mu buryo bw’ikoranabuhanga.

Nko muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe z’Abarabu, Minisiteri y’Ubutabera yemeje ko ababishaka bashobora kugena itariki y’ubukwe, bagatanga ibyangombwa byabo mu ikoranabuhanga, umukuru w’idini akabasezeranya bidasabye ngo bamusange aho ari, abagomba kwitabira ubukwe bagahabwa ihuzanzira (link) banyuraho, nabo bakagaragara ku mashusho, ubukwe bugataha buri muntu atavuye aho ari.
Umukwe n’umugeni bo baba bari kumwe, abandi bose bari iwabo, kandi ntibibuze ko basangira icyo kunywa, umuziki, ibyishimo byose muri rusange.
Iki cyemezo muri UAE cyafashwe ubwo Dubai yari imaze gutangaza ko ihagaritse kugeza mu gihe kitazwi, ibikorwa binyuranye birimo ubukwe cyangwa gatanya.

Mu bindi bihugu nka Korea y’Epfo, mbere y’uko ibikorwa bifungwa kubera Coronavirus, abantu basezeranye mu kivunge bambaye udupfukamunwa, baba abasezeranye bwa mbere cyangwa abifuza gusubiramo isezerano ryabo.
Ni icyemezo gishoboka?

Kugira ngo ubu buryo bushoboke, bivuze ko umukwe n’umugeni baba bari ukwabo bakereye ubukwe, Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa w’Umurenge cyangwa Pasiteri, Padiri se, nabo bari ukwabo, imbere ya camera n’aho barebera ku mashusho.
Buri wese watumiwe mu bukwe yaba ari iwe, bakarebana mu buryo bw’amashusho bumva n’ubutumwa butangwa, nka kumwe abantu bakorana inama hifashishijwe uburyo bw’amashusho.

Minisitiri w’Ubutabera akaba n’Intumwa Nkuru ya Leta, Busingye Johnston, aheruka kubwira itangazamakuru ko ikoranabuhanga rimaze kugaragaza ko hari ibintu byinshi bishoboka, uhereye ku buryo imanza zatangiye kuburanishwa ndetse zigasomwa mu buryo bw’ikoranabuhanga, ababuranyi batavuye aho bari.

Yagize ati “Icyo ni igitekerezo cyiza […], Mineduc yatangiye gahunda yo kwigisha abana mu rugo, indege zatangiye gutwara ibintu atari abantu, natwe twatangiye kuburanisha dukoresheje iyakure, inama ya Guverinoma imaze guterana rimwe, ndakeka ko n’ubwa kabiri n’ubwa gatatu izaterana [mu ikoranabuhanga], turandika urwandiko tugasinya ntumenye ko nticaye ku meza ngo ndusinye, ubu twarabikoze.

Minisiteri y’Ubutegetsi bw’Igihugu (Minaloc) ari nayo ishinzwe ibijyanye n’irangamimerere, ivuga ko kugira ngo ubu buryo bwo gusezeranya abantu mu iyakure bushoboke, hari amategeko byaba ngombwa ko ahinduka.

Umuyobozi Mukuru muri Minaloc Ushinzwe imiyoborere y’Inzego z’ibanze, Gakire Bob, yabwiye IGIHE ko ikoranabuhanga ryifashishwa n’abashaka gushyingiranwa mu bijyanye n’ibyemezo nkenerwa banyuze ku Irembo, ridakoreshwa ku munsi nyirizina wo gusezerana.

Ibyo ngo bigaterwa n’uko itegeko rigenderwaho uyu munsi rigenga abantu n’umuryango, rivuga ko "ugushyingiranwa k’umugabo umwe n’umugore umwe gukorewe mu butegetsi bwa leta ku bushake bwabo ni ko kwemewe", kandi gukorerwa "ku mugaragaro, imbere y’umwanditsi w’irangamimerere.
Ngo byasaba ko rihindurwa, ku buryo gusezerana mu buryo bw’ikoranabuhanga nabyo byakwinjizwa mu itegeko.

Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa w’Umurenge wa Gitega mu Karere ka Nyarugenge, Innocent Nyamutera, avuga ko abasezerana mu mategeko hari indahiro basoma bafashe ku ibendera ry’igihugu, abitabira uyu muhango bagahabwa umwanya mu kugaragaza niba hari impamvu zatuma batemererwa gushakana.
Ibyo ngo bikiyongeraho ko hari igihe nk’abantu basezeranye hambere mu kivunge, hari ubwo usanga batagaragara mu bitabo by’irangamimerere nk’abashyingiranwe, ku buryo hari ushobora kubikora kabiri.
Ati "Nk’indahiro wenda mu ikoranabuhanga bayisoma, ariko ku gufata ibendera sinzi uko byagenda.

Ikindi hari nk’uwaba yarabyaye umwana hanze ataramwandikisha, hari uwaba yarasezeranye akihisha mu gihe yabikoze ntibimenyekane, ashobora kuba yarabeshye nk’umukobwa akamwubakira inzu azi ko bazabana hari n’ibimenyetso bifatika, cyangwa umuhungu hari umukobwa bafitanye amakimbirane.
“Ibyo byose rero iyo baje urimo kubasezeranya, ubaza niba nta muntu ufite ikibazo kuri abo bagiye gushyingiranwa.
Nk’aho rero bishobora kuzagorana kuko ni ibintu bizaba bibereye mu ibanga.
Gusa nta we uhakana ko bitazashoboka bijyanye n’aho ibihe bigana, n’uburyo ikoranabuhanga rigenda ritera imbere.
Nyamutera yakomeje ati “Ikindi ni uko ubwo buryo bwaba bukoreshwa hifashishijwe ibikoresho by’ikoranabuhanga, ariko hari imiryango ushobora gusanga itabifite.
Gusezerana mu itorero cyangwa idini
Uretse mu bijyanye no mu nzego za Leta, gusezerana mu buryo bw’idini ni ikindi kirebwaho, kuko abantu basezeranira mu rusengero baravuye mu Umurenge.

Umuvugizi wa ADEPR, Rev Ephrem Karuranga, avuga ko muri ibi bihe nk’uko Leta yabisabye, abakirisitu basabwa kuba bitonze kuko ubukwe butemewe, gusa ngo mu buryo bw’igihe kirekire, gusezeranya abantu hakoreshejwe ikoranabunahanga ni ibintu byasuzumwa n’abakirisitu ubwabo bakabifataho icyemezo.
Ikindi ngo mu nyigisho bahabwa ni uko kugira ngo abantu babiri bashyingiranwe, hagomba kuha hari umukozi w’Imana ubaramburiraho ibiganza.
Yakomeje ati “Ikindi Bibiliya ivuga ko mu gusezeranya abantu bagomba kurambikwaho ibiganza, ubwo rero twareba icyo Bibiliya ivuga n’icyo ibihe bidusaba.
Kugeza ubu abaturarwanda bakomeje gusabwa kuguma mu rugo, ingamba zirimo gushyirwa mu bikorwa kugeza ku itariki 30 Mata 2020.
Kugeza ubu abamaze kwandura Coronavirus mu Rwanda ni abantu 154 mu gihe 87 bamaze gukira, bivuze ko abakirwaye aria bantu 67.

Ba Aurore bakunze kurangwa n’umutima witangira abandi ku buryo ashobora no kwigomwa icyo yashakaga ngo abandi bakibone.
Abantu bafite iri zina bakunze kurangwa n’umuco wo guhanga udushya ndetse n’ishyaka ryo gufata ibyemezo bigamije kubaganisha ku ntego zabo z’ubuzima.

Abantu bakunze kubona ba Aurore nk’abantu bagisha inama kuko barangwa n’umuco wo kumva ibibazo by’abandi, cyane ko icyifuzo gihora ku mutima wa Aurore ari ugufasha no kwita kubo bakunda kandi bakabikora bagendera no ku ndangagaciro z’umuryango n’umuco.
Umuntu ufite iri zina akunze kurangwa no gukunda kwigenga kandi bakagira ubushobozi mu bijyanye n’ubuyobozi kuko bakunda gufata inshingano.
Bigendanye n’imico n’imyitwarire ya ba Aurore, bakunze kuba Abarimu, abanditsi, ndetse bakaba bakora no mu zindi nzego zitanga amabwiriza.
Ibara ry’amahirwe kuri bo ni ubururu n’andi ayashamikiyeho uretse ubururu bwerurutse gusa naho umunsi w’amahirwe kuri bo ukaba ku Cyumweru, ku wa Mbere no ku wa Gatanu.
Imibereho yo mu Rwanda mu gihe cya Covid-19; gushyingura, gusura abarwayi.
byahinduye isura
Tariki 29 Werurwe 2020, umwarimu wigishaga kuri Lycée Saint Alexandre Sauli de Muhura, yitabye Imana azize uburwayi.
Imana ikomeze kumuha iruhuko ridashira.
Tariki 29 Werurwe 2020, umwarimu wigishaga kuri Lycée Saint Alexandre Sauli de Muhura, yitabye Imana azize uburwayi.
Imana ikomeze kumuha iruhuko ridashira.

Uyu muvandimwe yapfuye hashize icyumweru, hasohotse itangazo rya Minisitiri w’Intebe rivuga ko abantu bose bagomba kuguma mu rugo, ingendo n’utubari bigafungwa mu gukumira ikwirakwira rya Coronavirus, kuri uyu wa 17 Mata imaze kwandura abagera ku 2208373, ikica 148730 naho 558715 bakayikira.

Ni ingamba ziyongereye ku zindi zo gusubika amahuriro y’abantu benshi nk’imikino, ubukwe ndetse abitabira imihango yo gushyingura nabo basabwa kujyayo ari bake kandi hakubahirizwa nibura intera ya metero imwe hagati y’abantu.

Mu kubahiriza aya mabwiriza, abayobozi, abarimu n’abanyeshuri ba Lycée de Muhura, ntibabashije kujya guherekeza mugenzi wabo waguye mu rugo rwe i Nyamata mu Karere ka Bugesera, kuko ingendo hagati y’imijyi n’uturere tw’igihugu zitemewe.
Umwe mu nshuti z’uyu mwarimu, avuga ko “Abo bakoranaga ntabwo babashije kujya kumuherekeza kubera ingamba ziriho.
Mu bantu barenga 30 bakoranaga nta n’umwe wamushyinguye.
Barabiretse bafata icyemezo cy’uko bazasura abasigaye".

Ubusanzwe bimenyerewe ko mu Banyarwanda iyo hari uwagize ibyago cyangwa ibirori bamushyigikira, bakifatanya na we ku buryo n’uri i Nyagatare adakangwa n’urugendo rujya i Rusizi, gutabara cyangwa gushyigikira umuvandimwe n’inshuti.
Nanone ariko umunyarwanda yaravuze ngo ‘amagara araseseka ntayorwa’.
Abanyarwanda bazi agaciro k’ubuzima ari yo mpamvu muri iki gihe cy’icyago Coronavirus, bemera bakazasura abasigaye, Nyakwigendera agaherekezwa na bake.
Mu gihe cyo gushyingura nabwo amabwiriza yo kwirinda amahuriro y’abantu benshi yitabwaho cyane kandi yaba abagize ibyago, ubuyobozi n’inzego z’umutekano zikabibafashamo.
Urugero nko kujya gushyingura mu irimbi rya Rusororo, abantu ntabwo bagomba kurenga 10.
Imihango itandukanye yaberaga mu nsengero ntikibaho ndetse no gusezera ku wigendeye mu rugo ntibirenza abantu nka 20, kandi gukaraba intoki no gusiga metero hagati y’abantu bikubahirizwa.

Mbere ya byose ariko, ubuyobozi bwihanganisha abagize ibyago, bukabasobanurira ko ibihe igihugu byo kwirinda icyorezo cya Coronavirus bidasanzwe, bukamenyesha umuryango wagize ibyago ko ‘utemerewe kurenza abantu 10 bajya gushyingura, mu kwirinda ko abantu benshi bahura hakagira uhandurira’.
Umuryango kandi ubwirwa ko no mu rugo abantu batagomba kuba benshi, ku buryo usanga atari nka kwa kundi buri wese wasangaga yicaye mu rugo rwagize ibyago yatabaye.
Muri iki gihe rero niho ikoranabuhanga ryerekanira ingufu zaryo kuko uri i Burayi, Amerika, Rwamashyongoshyo, i Nzega n’ahandi yifatanya n’abandi mu bikorwa bitandukanye byo gushyingura.
Mu babashije guherekeza uwapfuye, hari abafata amaforo, amashusho (videos) bakoherereza abandi mu matsinda bahuriyemo cyangwa mu gikari (inbox).
Urugero rwa hafi ni igihe Karuranga Virgile wamenyekanye nka Dj Miller yashyingurwaga mu irimbi rya Rusororo riherereye mu Karere ka Gasabo.
Buri wese yabashije gukurikira uyu muhango umunota ku wundi kuri sheni ya Youtube.

Kuri Whatsapp, Facebook, Twitter n’izindi mbuga nkoranyambaga, amafoto ya Dj Miller, n’umuhango wo kumuherekeza yaracicikanye cyane ku buryo uwavuga ko benshi bifatanyije n’umuryango we ataba akabije.
Kuba abantu bariyemeje kunywana n’amabwiriza yo kwirinda ikwirakwira rya Coronavirus, nta wakwirengagiza uruhare inzego z’umutekano n’ubuyobozi zibigiramo.
Nk’iyo ugeze i Rusororo ubona uburyo inzego z’umutekano zifasha abantu mu kubahiriza amabwiriza.
Mu muhanda hirya no hino naho ni uko.
Abadashaka kubahiriza amabwiriza nabo inzego z’umutekano ntiziborohera.
Urugero ni abafashwe basenga bari hamwe ari benshi.
Muri Karongi mu Murenge wa Rubengera ahari abantu 65 bitwa aba Tempérants batawe muri yombi barimo gusenga n’abandi bigometse ku mabwiriza babwiwe ko bidakwiye.
Gusura abarwayi byahawe umurongo
Mu muco nyarwanda iyo umuturanyi arwaye ntumusure wumva umufitiye umwenda, yabyara ntumushyire igikoma ukibaza aho uzaca ujya guterura umwana ukahabura.

Muri iki gihe cyo kwirinda ikwirakwira rya Coronavirus, imvugo y’uko ifuni ibagara ubucuti ari akarenge, yabaye yirengagijweho gato kuko ako karenge gashobora gukurura kabutindi kuri nyirako, abo yasuye n’abo babana bose.
Mu bitaro gusura abarwayi byabaye bihagaritswe.
Nko mu bitaro bya Kaminuza bya Kigali (CHUK), abantu bagemuriraga ibiryo abarwariye muri ibi bitaro, babigeza aho abantu binjirira, umuntu umwe urwaje wa murwayi akaba ari we ujya kubyakira.
Uyu mwanzuro ugamije ko abantu bajyaga gusura abarwayi mu bitaro bagabanya urwo rujya n’uruza, mu rwego rwo gukumira ko icyorezo cya Coronavirus cyakomeza gukwirakwiza.
Kugeza ubu umurwayi agomba kuba afite umurwaza umwe gusa, niyo yagira umusimbura ariko na we agomba kuba ari umwe kandi urujya n’uruza mu bitaro rwaragabanutse.
Ibi byose bigamije kugabanya ubucucike mu bitaro.
Buri munsi usanga muri CHUK hari abarwayi bari hagati ya 400-500 baba baharwariye.
Kubera kandi serivisi nyinshi zitangirwamo, bituma mu gihe gisanzwe buri munsi hari abantu bari hagati ya 1000-1500 basura ibi bitaro.

Ufite uwe urwaye kandi ashobora no kwifashisha uburyo bw’ikoranabuhanga akamwoherereza amafaranga kuri telefoni akamufasha kubona ibyo yari kumushyira, na we agakomeza kuguma mu rugo, bityo twese tukazaririmba intsinzi twishimira ko twatsinze Coronavirus.
Yabonesheje urupfu n’amaso ye! Ubuhamya bwa Ntazinda Marcel warokokeye Jenoside i Rwamagana
Ntazinda Marcel yavutse mu muryango w’abana 11.
Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994 yiciwemo benshi muri bo, arokokana n’abavandimwe be batatu.
Ntazinda Marcel yavutse mu muryango w’abana 11.
Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994 yiciwemo benshi muri bo, arokokana n’abavandimwe be batatu.
Kimwe n’abandi Batutsi, Ntazinda yanyuze mu buzima bugoye bwo kwihisha ijoro n’amanywa, ahigwa bukware kandi adafite umurengera.
Ntazinda Marcel yavukiye ku musozi mwiza wa Mwulire mu Karere ka Rwamagana.
Yakuze ari wa mwana utuje, ubuzima bwe bwari ubw’ishuri no gusabana n’abana bagenzi be cyane ko bari batuye nk’umuryango, bakinira ku mbuga imwe aho i Mwulire.
Mu kiganiro yahaye IGIHE yavuze ko Jenoside yabaye ari muto ariko yibuka neza ibihe yanyuzemo.
Ati “Nari muto utari uzi amateka yabanje, ariko twahunze nigenza ku buryo n’ibyo nabonaga ndabyibuka.
Twabonaga abantu bava Murambi, ubona banakomeretse, bikoreye ibintu.
Bahunga bavuga ko bari kwicwa.
Jenoside yabaye Ntazinda afite imyaka icyenda.
Indege ya Habyarimana ikimara guhanurwa, Jenoside igahita itangira, we n’umuryango we babanje kwihisha mu bihuru ariko baza guhunga nka nyuma y’iminsi itatu.
Mu buhamya bwe, Ntazinda avuga ko ubwo ubwicanyi bwageraga i Mwulire aho bari batuye nyuma y’urupfu rw’umusaza witwaga Kalori na bo bahise bahunga.
Ati “Twaragiye turatatana.
Wa muryango waraburanye.
Nagiye mu gikundi cyarimo abantu nka barindwi harimo abavandimwe babiri tuvukana.
Twagiye i Rwamagana ku Babikira dusanga huzuye, banga kutwakira.
Twakomeje tujya i Nyarusange, hariyo umuryango wacu, turarayo amajoro abiri ariko ku munsi wakurikiyeho Interahamwe naho zirahagera zikomeza kwica.
Uko ubwicanyi bwakomezaga gufata indi ntera ni ko Ntazinda na bagenzi be bakomeza gushaka inzira zo gukiza amagara yabo, bahunga Interahamwe.
Yabonesheje urupfu n’amaso ye
Ntazinda avuga ko ubwo bari ku musozi wa Nyarusange aho bari barahungiye, batewe n’Interahamwe, zibarasaho bamwe mu bo bari kumwe barapfa.
Ati “Ndibuka twari mu rugo rw’uwitwa Kananga [yaje kujya mu Gisirikare], yaje yiruka atubwira ati ‘za Nterahamwe ziraje’.
Twavuye mu rugo turiruka.
Twaramanutse tujya mu kibaya ahantu ntari nzi hitwa Mburabuturo maze za Nterahamwe zikajya zirasa aho twari mu kibaya, amasasu menshi.
Ni ubwa mbere nari numvise amasasu avugira hafi yanjye, rikarasa umuntu uri hirya yawe, ukabona ukuboko kuracitse, ukuguru kurasandaye.
Ni ubwa mbere nari mbonye ibyo bintu, mbonye umuntu wapfuye.
Icyo gihe nibwo umwe mu bantu bahagurukanye mu rugo baburaniye, na n’ubu ntaramenya niba ariho yaguye.
Nyuma yo kuraswaho amasasu menshi, imvura yaje kugwa bituma Interahamwe zijya kugama.

Ati ‘‘ [Interahamwe] zagiye kugama mu gasantere kari ruguru bafata Umututsi wahungaga; twarazamutse natwe, tugeze hejuru dutunguka aho bari, wa muntu bari bafashe, abona ko natwe turi bagenzi be duhunga.
Yashatse kuza yiruka adusanga, umwe muri ba bantu amutera icumu mu mugongo, agwa hasi agaramye, duhita twiruka.
Ni inkuru yavuze ko buri gihe iyo ayitekerejeho yumva ‘narahuye n’urupfu tukabisikana’.
Mu gihe ubwicanyi bwari butangiye gucogora, Ntazinda n’abandi batatu bari basigaranye basubiye mu matongo y’iwabo kureba niba nta wasigaye.
Ati ‘‘Twahageze nijoro kuko yari amasaha meza yo kugenda no gushaka icyo kurya.
Nageze ahantu tujya mu nzu, agatotsi karantwara, nakanguwe n’induru, ariko nza gusanga ari iya ba bantu babiri twari twasigaranye, bari bavumbuye bajya kubica.
Abantu barindwi bahagurukanye bose barapfuye hasigara we, kuko ubwo bari mu Nkambi ya Rwamagana Inkotanyi zimaze kubarokora yisanze ari wenyine.
Ati “Mu rugo mvukamo abagera ku icyenda na bo barapfuye, yari amateka agoye.
Ni ubuzima nk’umwana wabyirutse, icyo ukora ari ukuvoma, ukarya ukanywa, nari ntarabona umuntu wapfuye.
Kubona umuntu wishwe ku myaka yanjye cyari igihu kijeho, ukumva uri mu bundi buzima bumeze nk’inzozi.
Mu mitekerereze ye yumvaga ko ibyabaye muri Rwamagana bitarageze ahandi, ariko ku ishuri yasanze hari abo bahuje inkuru.
Ati “Wasangaga abo mubana na bo bababaye.
Numvaga ari ibintu byabaye mu gace k’iwacu ka Rwamagana gusa.
Sinari nzi ko n’i Kigali byahageze, twageze ku ishuri numva buri wese arabara inkuru nk’iy’iwacu.

Jenoside yabaye Ntazinda yiga mu Mwaka wa Gatatu, imaze guhagarikwa n’Inkotanyi yasubiye mu Ishuri, yiga aamashuri abanza aratsinda, ajya muri Saint André aho yize ibijyanye n’Ibinyabuzima n’Ubutabire (Biochimie) akomeza mu Icungamutungo muri Kaminuza y’Abalayiki b’Abadiventisiti (UNILAK).
Ntazinda kuri ubu usengera muri Evangelical Restoration Church ya Apôtre Joshua Masasu, avuga ko itorero ryamwubatsemo imbaraga zo kubabarira binyuze mu nyigisho z’isanamitima.
Ati “Numvaga amagambo bavuga arimo ukuri.
Uko imyaka yicuma, nkabona ibyo Apôtre [Masasu] yigisha bihura n’ubuzima bwanjye.
Sindajya ku musozi wa Mwulire ngo mpamagare abatwiciye ngo bansabe imbabazi, nababariye mu mutima.
Ndamutse mpuye n’umwana wabo twakorana, sinamwishisha, nta n’icyo namwima kuko ariho yavutse.
Ni ibintu twigiye ku gihugu no mu itorero.
Yavuze ko Inkotanyi zabaye icyitegererezo cyo kubanisha neza Abanyarwanda ndetse akaba yishimira ko uyu munsi nta Muhutu, Umututsi, Umutwa barurimo
Ntazinda Marcel asanzwe ari umukozi mu kigo gishinzwe guhererakanya amakuru ku myenda (Transunion Rwanda) yahoze yitwa CRB Credit Reference Bureau.
Ubuhamya bw’Umunyakenyakazi wavutse atagira imyanya myibarukiro
Umunyakenyakazi Julian Peter yasangije abandi ubuzima bugoranye yanyuzemo nyuma yo kuvuka agasanga atagira imyanya myibarukiro, agira n’icyo asaba ababyeyi b’abana bafite ikibazo nk’icye.
Umunyakenyakazi Julian Peter yasangije abandi ubuzima bugoranye yanyuzemo nyuma yo kuvuka agasanga atagira imyanya myibarukiro, agira n’icyo asaba ababyeyi b’abana bafite ikibazo nk’icye.
Julian Peter yavutse mu 1991, avukira muri Kenya mu gace kari mu majyepfo ashyira uburasirazuba bwa Nairobi kazwi nka Ukambani.
Mu kuvuka kwe umurebye yari umwana nk’abandi bose, ndetse imyaka ntiyatinze atangira amashuri abanza ayihutamo agera mu yisumbuye.
Ubwo yari afite imyaka 17 yiga mu mashuli yisumbuye yaje kugira ikibazo cy’ukuguru ajya kwa muganga kwivuza.
Nyuma yo kugera kwa muganga, ikibazo cya mbere muganga yamubajije ni igihe cya nyuma aheruka kugira mu mihango, Julian amusubiza ko atarayijyamo na rimwe.
Kubona umukobwa w’imyaka 17 utarajya mu mihango na rimwe ni ikintu kidasazwe.
Ibi byatumye muganga afata icyemezo cyo kumunyuza mu cyuma ngo arebe ikibazo afite, amafoto y’iki cyuma yaje yerekana ko imyanya myibarukiro ya Julian ifunze uhereye inyuma.
Nyuma yo kugerageza kumubaga bikanga yaje guca mu cyuma bwa kabiri abaganga basanga nta na nyababyeyi agira ari nabwo bavumbuye ko afite ikibazo cya Mayer-Rokitansky-Küster-Hauser syndrome (MRKH).

MRKH syndrome ni ikibazo umwana w’umukobwa agira akaba yavuka adafite bimwe mu bice bigize imyanya myibarukiro ye birimo nyababyeyi, udusabo tw’intanga ngore, ndetse n’umwanya uhuza nyababyeyi n’igice cy’inyuma uzwi nka Cervix ukaba ufunze.
Ibi bishobora kujyana n’ibindi bibazo birimo kugira impyiko zikoze nabi cyangwa umuntu akaba yagira n’imwe.
Akimara kumva iyi nkuru y’uko afite MRKH byari amarira menshi kuri we “nararize umunsi wa mbere, uwa kabiri n’uwa gatatu, nari mfite imyaka 17 kandi ndi gato"
Julian avuga ko yatangiye kwiyakira ubwo yari afite imyaka 24 kuko ari nabwo yatangiye gufunguka akavuga ikibazo afite.

Julian aganira na BBC yavuze ko yagowe no gukura yumva abantu bamubwira ko iki kibazo cye gifite aho gihuriye n’amarozi akunze kurangwa mu gace akomokamo ka Ukambani ndetse bamwe bakongeraho ko nyirakuru abifitemo uruhare.

N’ubwo yabwirwaga aya magambo yose Julian, avuga ko yageragezaga kuyirengagiza “bavuga ibyo bashaka kuvuga, igifite agaciro ni uko mbifata, iyo nza kubyumva byari gutangira kungiraho ingaruka kandi nashoboraga gutangira kumva ko ibyo bavuga ari ukuri".
Nyuma y’imyaka 10 ubwo Julian yari afite imyaka 27 yaje kongera kubagwa kugira ngo muganga afungure umwanya uzajya umufasha gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina uzwi nka Cervix.
Agorwa no kurambana n’abakunzi be
Julian avuga ko agorwa no kugira umusore bakundana “nabaye mu rukundo, gusa sinjya ndeka ngo ibintu bigere kure mbere y’uko nicarana nabo ngo mbabwire ikibazo cyanjye".

Yakomeje agira ati “niba bashaka kubyakira bazabyakira, ariko urabizi uko abantu ari bantu, ijanisha rinini ry’abantu nagiye mbibwira barampuze abandi bakanshinja kubeshya kuko bumva ko nabivugaga mu rwego rwo kubihunza".

Julian avuga ko kuva yabagwa mu 2018 ubu ashobora kuba yakora imibonano mpuzabitsina ariko akaba yumva n’ubundi nta mpamvu yo kuyikora cyane ko atiteguye no gushinga urugo, kuko kuri we yumva azashaka umwana arera.
Julian agira inama ababyeyi bafite abana bahuje ikibazo na we kubaba hafi bakabereka ko atari ryo herezo ry’ubuzima kandi bakabatera n’ingabo mu bitugu kuko kwiyakira bitoroha mu gihe ufite MRKH.

Icyo wamenya ni uko atari wowe wenyine ibi byabayeho.
Ni agahinda gashobora kumara iminota iri hagati y’itanu n’amasaha abiri.
Abahanga mu mibereho ya muntu basobanura ko agahinda ka nyuma yo gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina gasanzwe ku bantu benshi, kitwa mu Cyongereza Post-coital Dysphoria (PCD).
Ni ibyiyumviro umuntu agira amaze gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina aho aganzwa n’agahinda, umujinya cyangwa se kumva acitse intege atari ukubera umunaniro.
Abaganga bazobereye ibijyanye n’ubujyanama mu by’imibonano mpuzabitsina basobanura ko ako gahinda katabaho nyuma y’imibonano mpuzabitsina gusa ahubwo ko gashobora no kubaho nyuma yo kwikinisha.
Kugeza ubu, nta bushakashatsi buhambaye buragaragaza imvano y’aka gahinda, ariko hari iby’ibanze abahanga babashije kubona.

Basobanura ko aka gahinda kaza nubwo igikorwa nyir’izina waba wakigiranye n’umuntu ukunda, wihebeye mu buzima bwawe bwose, ndetse nubwo cyaba cyakunyuze bitagira urugero wagabye Isi n’ijuru, ariko bikarangira ubabaye.
Hari ubwo ngo usanga niba umugore ari kurira nyuma y’imibonano mpuzabitsina, umugabo aba ari kwicira imanza mu mutima yibwira ko ariwe watumye agira agahinda.
Mu 2015, hari ubushakashatsi bwakorewe ku itsinda ry’abagore 230 b’abanyeshuri muri Australie bari hagati y’imyaka 18 na 55, ariko ikigereranyo cy’imyaka yabo bose cyari 26.
Muribo 46% bavuze ko mu bihe byari byaratambutse bahuye n’aya marangamutima y’agahinda nyuma y’imibonano mpuzabitsina ariko 5% bo bavuze ko mu mezi make yari ashize aribwo bakagize.
Abagera kuri 2% bavuze ko nibura buri gihe bagira agahinda iyo bamaze gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina.
Abashakashatsi bagaragaje ko ibyo babonye bidakwiriye kwitirirwa abagore bose cyane ko ababajijwe bari abanyeshuri.
Mu 2018, ikinyamakuru cyandika inkuru zijyanye n’imibonano mpuzabitsina n’inama ku mibereho ya muntu, cyatangaje ubushakashatsi kuri aka gahinda ariko by’umwihariko ku bagabo.
Mu bagabo 1208 babajijwe, 41% basubije ko bagize aka gahinda inshuro zitari nke mu buzima bwabo.
20% bo bavuze ko mu byumweru bine byari bishize bakagize, naho hagati ya 3% na 4% bo bavuze ko bakagira buri gihe.
Ntabwo abahanga muri siyansi kugera n’ubu baremeza inkomoko y’aka gahinda, gusa hari bimwe bagiye bahurizaho.
Birimo ko ibyiyumviro by’abantu bari gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina biba bikomeye cyane, ku buryo umwe aba yiyumvamo mugenzi we ku rugero ruhambaye, basoza icyo gikorwa agahinda kakabarenga.

Ikindi bahurizaho ni uko ibibazo umuntu yagize bijyanye n’ihohoterwa rishingiye ku gitsina mu bihe byahise nko mu bwana, bishobora gutuma agira agahinda mu gihe arangije gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina.
Ikindi kigaragazwa ni amakimbirane mu mibanire ashobora kuba imbata y’ibibazo byatera agahinda umuntu mu gihe arangije gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina.

Abakundana bakunze guhura n’iki kibazo bagirwa inama yo guhora baganira mu gihe bibayeho, umwe agahumuriza mugenzi we cyangwa byaba na ngombwa bakajya kwa muganga bagahura n’umujyanama mu by’imibonano mpuzabitsina wabafasha gukira iryo hungabana.

Twihuse muri Gashyantare 2020.
Tuombe warangije mu bijyanye na Mines, yageze i Washington D.

C kwakira igihembo nk’umwe mu barimo kuzana impinduka [Game Changer] muri Amerika, ni mu nama ya ba rwiyemezamirimo n’abahanga ibishya yabereye muri Perezidansi ya Amerika, White House, mu Ukwakira [ukwezi kwitwa Black History Month].

Tuombe uvuga indimi esheshatu, yakuriye mu Rwanda, ahamya uburyo nyuma ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994, u Rwanda rwahanganye no kongera kwiyubaka mu nguni zose yaba mu mbamutima no ku isura yarwo kuko rwari rwasenyutse burundu.
Tuombe yafashe icyemezo akiri muto ko azaba Enjeniyeri.
Ntiyitaye aho yari ari kuko yari afite ku mutima kugira impinduka nziza akora muri sosiyete ye.
Yaje guhabwa buruse ajya kwiga mu yahoze ari Kaminuza Nkuru y’u Rwanda, mu Ishami rya Engeneering.
Ubwo yari umunyeshuri, yabaye n’umukorerabushake mu mushinga w’amazi ari naho yaje guhurira n’umwarimu muri South Dakota Mines civil and environmental engineering, Dr.
James Stone.
Uyu Stone avuga ko Tuombe yari umuntu ugira amatsiko cyane akaba umunyeshuri w’umuhanga wabazaga ibibazo nka miliyoni.
Yakoze ku mutima cyane uyu mwarimu uwo mushinga urangiye, Stone, amugira umwungiriza mu bushakashatsi, nk’uwarangije muri civil and environmental engineering muri Mines.
Tuombe yageze muri Mines mu 2006, agujije amafaranga kugira ngo abashe kugenda.
Muri iyi kaminuza, yasibaga kurya ndetse ntasesagure kugira ngo inzozi ze zo kubona impamyabumenyi z’icyiciro cya gatatu cya Kaminuza azigereho.
Ati “Nari umwarimu wungirije ariko nagombaga gucunga neza buri faranga mfite.
Uba uri mu bihe byo gukotana.
Naribwiye nti ngiye kuba igihe kinini muri iri shuri.
Nari mfite intego".
Yabaye kandi mu muryango w’abanyeshuri b’abanyamahanga ndetse no mu kigo Ivanhoe Center cy’aho yigaga.
Yaganiraga n’abarimu ndetse n’abayobozi b’amatorero.
Stones yibuka Tuombe akora ku mushinga w’ingaruka z’ubucukuzi bwa Uranium ahitwa Harding County, SD, nk’ubushakashatsi bwe asoza amasomo.
Ati “Ndibuka ubwa mbere Emmanuel ajya gukora ubushakashatsi mu gace ka Cave Hills.
Yatangajwe n’uko ari ahantu hadakomye ariko hadatuwe n’abantu.
Iwabo hari ubutaka bumeze nk’ubwo, icyakora ubucucike bw’abaturage buri hejuru ugereranyije n’aho yarebaga muri Harding County.
Yakomezaga avuga ngo ‘abantu bose bari hehe?
Tuombe yarangije kwiga muri Civil Engineering mu 2007, abona akazi mu kigo kiri i Colorado.
Yahavuye ajya gukorera i Memphis, Tenn akomereza Virginia.
Mu 2015, yasubiye muri Memphis, aho yatangirije ikigo cye cyitwa ABES Engineering, Inc.
Ati “Nari mbizi ko bitazoroha.
Ariko nabonye ibibi birenze mu buzima.
nari mfite ibyiringiro ko buri cyose gishoboka".
Tuombe akomeza agira ati “Kandi byarakunze.
Kuva mu ntangiriro, ABES yarakuze kandi itera imbere, ikorana n’Umujyi wa Memphis mu mishinga myinshi.
Ndabizi ko ibikorwa byanjye bikeneye gukomeza gukura.
Niteguye gufatanya n’ibigo bikomeye kugira dushobore gukora ikinyuranyo kinini mu buzima bw’abaturage".
Urugendo rwo muri White House
Kuri ubu ntabwo Tuombe azi neza uwatanze izina rye ngo ahembwe nk’umuntu urimo kuzana impinduka [Game Changer].
Ubwo yakiraga ubutumire bwo muri White House, kwakira igihembo, yaratangaye yibaza niba ari ukuri, ndetse abanza gushidikanya kubibwira abantu benshi.
Ati “Natangiye kwemera ko byari ukuri ubwo nahageraga, ubwo nahuraga n’umuntu wo muri Minisiteri y’Ingufu.
Undi muntu yari umuvumbuzi.
Perezida yaraje avuga uburyo ba rwiyemezamirimo ari urutirigongo rw’iki gihugu.
Cyari ikintu kidasanzwe cyane".
Tuombe avuga ko yahise abona ko ahagararariye benshi barimo abantu nka we, abimukira n’abanyeshuri bagiye kwiga muri Amerika kugira ngo biteze imbere ndetse n’abandi babegereye.

Tuombe, yigeze kuba umuyobozi w’abenjeniyeri batagira umupaka igice cy’u Rwanda, ubu aherutse gutangiza ikindi gice muri Gabon, ashaka ko abanyeshuri n’abimukira bafite ibigo by’ubucuruzi bumva ko buri kimwe gishoboka.
Nyuma yo kwakira igihembo, Tuombe, agira ati “Nahuye n’abantu bakomeye ntatekerezaga ko nzahura nabo".
Yicaranye ku meza n’abaherwe batunze za miliyari z’amadolari, ahura n’abahanze udushya ndetse amenyana n’abayobora ibigo by’ubucuruzi hirya no hino ku Isi.
Uku guhura kwaganiriwemo byinshi ku bufatanye bw’ahazaza.
Ntiyarekeye aho.
Tuombe afite inzozi kandi yizeye ko umunsi umwe azahura n’abahanze udushya nka Bill Gates na Warren Buffet.
Ati “Ndashaka kuzicarana mu cyumba n’abantu bakomeye, tugasangira ibitekerezo kandi tukagira impinduka.
Birashoboka.
Bishobora gutwara indi myaka 13 ariko ni cyo ndangamiye.
Ndarota ibihambaye".
Tuombe asaba abandi kugira inzozi zihambaye nka we kandi bakajya barebera ku nkuru y’urugendo rwe.
Avuga ko inkuru ye ishobora kuba umusemburo w’ibyiringiro n’inzozi byabo.
‘Kwigirira icyizere, kugira ishema no kurota ibihambaye’.

Amafoto agaragaza uburanga bw’umugore wa kabiri wa Haruna Niyonzima

Ku wa Kabiri tariki ya 28 Mata nibwo hagiye hanze amakuru y’uko kapiteni w’Amavubi, Niyonzima Haruna, aherutse gukora ubukwe n’umugore wa kabiri, Niyitegeka Consolée ’Cassa Rayaan’, bwabaye mu ibanga muri Tanzania.

Ku wa Kabiri tariki ya 28 Mata nibwo hagiye hanze amakuru y’uko kapiteni w’Amavubi, Niyonzima Haruna, aherutse gukora ubukwe n’umugore wa kabiri, Niyitegeka Consolée ’Cassa Rayaan’, bwabaye mu ibanga muri Tanzania.
Haruna Niyonzima yari amaze imyaka ibiri akundana n’uyu mukobwa ndetse kuri ubu babana muri Tanzania kuva asubiyeyo mu ntangiriro z’uyu mwaka, aho yasubiye muri Yanga SC.

Inshuti za hafi z’aba bombi, zatangarije IGIHE ko mbere yuko Igisibo cy’idini ya Islam gitangira aribwo Haruna na Niyitegeka biyemeje kurushinga kugira ngo binjire muri iki gihe biyejeje imbere y’Imana.
Andi makuru agera kuri IGIHE ahamya ko ubwo Haruna Niyonzima yakiniraga AS Kigali, yabanaga na Niyitegeka Consolée mu Karere ka Kicukiro, rimwe akajya ku mugore we mukuru i Nyamata.
Icyakora nubwo impande zombi bitaradukundira ko tuzivugisha ngo hari igihe umugore mukuru yababazwaga no kuba Haruna Niyonzima acuditse n’iyi nkumi ndetse byagiye bibyara intonganya hagati yabo.
Ubwo Haruna Niyonzima yagurwaga na Yanga SC, agomba kwerekeza muri Tanzania, byabaye ngombwa ko ajyana n’iyi nkumi bari bacuditse asiga umugore wa mbere.

Hari kandi amakuru avuga ko uyu mugore mukuru yagiye Dar Es Salam mu minsi ishize, ariko ntibiramenyekana ko yaba yari agiye kugirana ibiganiro n’umugabo we nubwo na none aribyo bikekwa, gusa byarangiye umugore mukuru wa Haruna Niyonzima agarutse mu Rwanda ubu akaba atuye i Nyamata mu karere ka Bugesera.
Niyitegeka Consolée wasezeranye na kapiteni w’Amavubi, azwi nka Cassa Rayaan, amazina akoresha ku mbuga nkoranyambaga ze zirimo Instagram.

Azwi cyane nk’umwe mu bakobwa b’abanyamujyi w’umushabitsi cyane ko yigeze gushinga iduka ry’inkweto mu Biryogo h’i Nyamirambo mu Mujyi wa Kigali mu minsi yashize, ariko amakuru agera kuri IGIHE ni uko ubu yamaze kubivamo.
Cassa wanashyize hanze amafoto y’ubukwe, kuri Instagram ye yashyizeho ko yashyingiranywe na Niyonzima Haruna akoresheje ijambo NH.
Mu Ukwakira 2015 nibwo Niyonzima Haruna yasezeranye mu mategeko n’umugore we mukuru, Uwineza Consolée, nyuma y’imyaka 12 babana ndetse kuri ubu bakaba bafitanye abana.
Niyonzima Haruna w’imyaka 30 (nk’uko ibyangombwa akiniraho bibigaragaza), yamenyekanye akinira Etincelles mu 2004, ari nabwo yatangiye guhamagarwa mu Ikipe y’Igihugu y’Abato.
Mu 2006 yerekeje muri Rayon Sports, gusa ntiyayitinzemo kuko yahise yerekeza muri APR FC mu 2007, ahava ajya muri Yanga SC mu 2011, iyi yavuyemo mu 2017 yerekeza muri mukeba Simba SC.
Mu mpeshyi ya 2019 nibwo yatandukanye na Simba SC, agaruka mu Rwanda, nyuma y’amezi atandatu akinira AS Kigali, yongera kugurwa na Yanga SC.

Ibiba ku mubiri w’umuntu igihe adafite akazi
Abahanga mu buzima bwo mu mutwe berekana ko kubura akazi ari kimwe mu bitera guhangayika, cyane iyo umuntu akabuze bitunguranye nkuko byabaye kuri bamwe muri ibi bihe bya Coronavirus.
Abahanga mu buzima bwo mu mutwe berekana ko kubura akazi ari kimwe mu bitera guhangayika, cyane iyo umuntu akabuze bitunguranye nkuko byabaye kuri bamwe muri ibi bihe bya Coronavirus.
Iyo umuntu atakaje akazi ntabwo aba abuze icyo yinjiza mu buryo bw’ubukungu gusa.
Abahanga berekana ko umuntu ashobora no gutakaza intego ku byo yari agamije kugeraho ndetse ko bishobora no kugira ingaruka ku mubiri we.
Umuhanga ku buzima bwo mu mutwe, Lisa Orbé-Austin, yabwiye Huffpost ko abantu baba batekereza ibitandukanye igihe babuze akazi.
Iyo umuntu abuze akazi ibyiyumviro agira bigira ingaruka ku buzima bwe muri rusange.
Abahanga bagaragaza ingaruka zitandukanye umuntu ashobora kugira mu buzima bwe.
Kubura ibitotsi cyangwa gusinzira cyane
Ibibazo mu gusinzira ni kimwe mu byerekana ko kubura akazi biri kugira ingaruka ku buzima bw’umuntu.

Umuhanga mu buzima bwo mu mutwe wo muri leta ya Maryland muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Kristin Bianchi, avuga ko "ushobora kugira ibibazo byo kubura ibitotsi, gusinzira igihe kirekire cyangwa ugasanga uri kubyuka kare kurusha uko biteganyijwe.
Mu busanzwe kuba wabura ibitotsi umunsi umwe cyangwa ibiri ngo ntacyo bitwaye ariko iyo bikomeje biba ikibazo.
Ku rundi ruhande, Umwarimu muri Kaminuza ya Arizona mu ishami ry’ubuzima, Patricia Haynes, avuga ko imihangayiko umuntu yagiraga mu kazi ishobora gukomeza nyuma yo kukabura.
Mu bushakashatsi yakoze, we na bagenzi berekanye ko umuntu wari ufite ibibazo by’umutekano mu kazi abangamiwe na politiki y’ikigo akoramo agira ibibazo byo kubura ibitotsi nyuma yo kukabura.
Ati “Imbogamizi nyinshi, zirimo iza politiki cyangwa izerekeye kuzamurwa mu kazi, ibintu bituma abantu badakora neza.
Twabonye ko bituma abahuye nabyo bakomeza kubura ibitotsi nyuma yo kubura akazi.

Galileo watsembeye Kiliziya akemeza ko Isi izenguruka Izuba kugeza abizize yari muntu ki?
Galileo Galilei, ni umuhanga wamenyekanye cyane mu mpaka za muhanganishije na Kiliziya yavugaga ko Izuba rizenguruka Isi nyamara we akiyemeza kubihinyuza kugeza yitabye Imana.
Galileo Galilei, ni umuhanga wamenyekanye cyane mu mpaka za muhanganishije na Kiliziya yavugaga ko Izuba rizenguruka Isi nyamara we akiyemeza kubihinyuza kugeza yitabye Imana.
Galileo Galilei ni Umutaliyani wamenyekanye cyane kubera ubuvumbuzi yagiye ageraho mu bijyanye n’Ubugenge ndetse n’ubumenyi bw’ikirere.
Galileo yabonye izuba ku wa 15 Gashyantare 1564, Se Vicenzo yari umunyamuziki ukomeye ariko utarifuzaga ko umuhungu we agera ikirenge muke ahubwo agashaka ko aba inzobere mu buvuzi.

Ubwo yari afite imyaka 17 yoherejwe kwiga ibijyanye n’ubuganga muri Kaminuza ya Pisa, mu gihe yari akiri umunyeshuri muri iyi kaminuza nibwo yaje kuvumbura ko afite impano mu bijyanye n’imibare maze asaba se ko amasomo y’ubuganga yayahagarikira aho akajya kuba umwarimu w’imibare.
Vicenzo yaje kumva iki cyifuzo cy’umuhungu we maze birangira yibereye umwarimu w’imibare.
Mu 1609, Galileo yumvise inkuru z’ivumburwa ry’igikoresho cyitwa ‘ spyglass’ cyakoreshwaga mu gukurura ibintu biri kure bikagaragara nk’ibiri hafi.
Galileo yakoresheje ubumenyi yari afite mu mibare maze avugurura iyi ‘spyglass’ akora igikoresho gikoreshwa mu kwitegereza ibiri mu isanzure kizwi nka ‘Telescope’.

Mu mpera z’uwo mwaka, Galileo akoresheje ‘telescope’ yabaye umuntu wa mbere urebye ku kwezi maze abasha kuvumbura ko ukwezi kudafite ubuso bunogereje ko ahubwo kimwe n’isi ubuso bwako bugizwe n’imisozi n’ibibaya.
Iyi ‘telescope’ kandi yayikoresheje mu kuvumbura umubumbe wa Saturne no kuvumbura ibyiciro bya Venus ndetse no kwiga byinshi ku izuba.
Uku kuvumbura no kurushaho kwitegereza isanzure yifashishije ‘telescope’ byatumye Galileo arushaho kwemera iby’ihame rya Copenicus rivuga ko Isi n’indi mibumbe bizenguruka izuba.
Iyi myemerere yari mishya cyane ko mu gihe cya Galileo abantu bemeraga ko Isi ariyo iri hagati mu isanzure izuba n’indi mibumbe bikaba biyizenguruka, inyigisho yari yarakwirakwijwe na Kiliziya cyane.
Kiliziya yananiwe kwakira ubuvumbuzi bwa Galileo
Nyuma y’uko Galileo atangiye gusohora inyandiko zirimo ubu buvumbuzi bwe ko Isi izenguruka izuba, Kiliziya Gatolika yamuhamagaje i Roma.
Iki gihe yahamagajwe kugira ngo yisobanure kuko ubu buvumbuzi bwe bwafatwaga nk’ubunyuranya n’inyigisho za Kiliziya kandi ubuhakanyi cyari icyaha gishobora guhanishwa igihano cy’urupfu.
Mu 1616 Galileo yakuriweho ibi byaha by’ubuhakanyi ariko ategekwa kutazongera gusohora inyandiko zirimo iyi myemerere ye ko Isi izenguruka izuba.

Nyuma yo gukomeza gukora ubushakashatsi bwimbitse Galileo yakomeje kubona ibimenyetso bimuhamiriza ko koko ibyo yavugaga ari byo, maze mu 1632 ashyira ku mugaragaro igitabo yise ‘Dialogue Concerning the Two Chief World Systems’ aho yongeye guhamya ko ibyo avuga ari ukuri.
Ibi byatumye Kiliziya Gatolika yongera guhamagaza Galileo maze ahamywa ubuhakanyi akatirwa gufungwa ubuzima bwe bwose.
Mu 1633 kubera imyaka ye n’ibibazo by’ubuzima yemerewe gukorera igifungo cye mu rugo maze aza kwitaba Imana mu 1642.
Byafashe imyaka irenga 300 kugira ngo kiliziya yivuguruze ndetse yemeze ko Galileo yari mu kuri, ndetse izina rye riza gukurwaho icyasha cy’ubuhakanyi.

Miliyari 15 Frw zo zagenwe nk’igishoro ku bigo bito n’ibiciriritse mu gihe miliyari eshatu yo yagenwe nk’ingwate yo kwishingira ibyo bigo.
Hari miliyari imwe yagenwe nk’amafaranga y’igishoro ku bigo by’imari na miliyari ebyiri y’igishoro cyagenewe za Sacco.
Umuntu ufashe iyi nguzanyo azajya yishyura inyungu bitewe n’icyiciro abarizwamo.
Urugero nko ku mahoteli, umuntu azajya yishyura amafaranga yahawe ku nyungu ya 5% ariko mu gihe cy’imyaka 15, utabariyemo imyaka itatu ya mbere azajya asonerwa kwishyura.
Ku bandi bashaka igishoro cyo kuzahura ibikorwa, bo inyungu ni 8% ariko bishyure ideni mu gihe cy’imyaka itanu utabariyemo umwaka umwe basonerwa.

Mu bizibandwaho kugira ngo izi nguzanyo zitangwe, harimo kugenzura ingaruka COVID-19 yagize ku bikorwa byabo ku buryo nibura inyungu yabo yaba yaragabanutse ku kigero cya 50% hashingiwe ku musoro ku nyungu bagaragaje mu Kigo cy’Igihugu cy’Imisoro n’Amahoro.
Abasaba inguzanyo kandi berekana icyo izabafasha mu kuzahura ubucuruzi bwabo nibura bukagera ku kigero cya 75% ugereranyije n’uko bwari bumeze mbere y’uko COVID-19 ibugiraho ingaruka.
Abasaba inguzanyo kandi bagomba kugaragaza icyo izabafasha mu gutanga akazi no guhanga imirimpo mishya.
Basabwa kwerekana neza imibare y’abakozi bari bafite mbere ya COVID-19, igihamya kikaba abatangirwaga ubwishingizi muri RSSB.
Niba kandi usaba inguzanyo yari asanganywe indi muri banki, asabwa kugaragaza mu buryo butomoye ko yishyuraga neza nibura kugera mu mpera za Gashyantare.
Usaba kugurizwa muri iki kigega kandi yerekana icyangombwa cya RRA cy’uko yishyura imisoro nibura cyo muri Gashyantare 2020.

Minisitiri w’Imari n’Igenamigambi, Dr Uzziel Ndagijimana, atangaza ko sosiyete isaba ubufasha muri iki kigega, igomba kuba yari ihagaze neza mbere y’iki cyorezo kuko amafaranga azatangwa ari ayo gukemura ibibazo byatewe n’icyorezo, aho gukemura ibibazo yari isanganywe.

Ati “Igomba kugaragaza ko mu gihe gito yaba imaze kugera kuri 75% by’ubucuruzi yari ifite mbere y’icyorezo, ni amafaranga yo kugira ngo uve mu kibazo watewe n’icyorezo ugaruke ku gipimo cyiza wari uriho ndetse no kurenzaho.
Banki n’Ibigo by’imari bishinzwe kugenzura ubusabe bw’abashaka amafaranga, bikareba ko bujuje ibisabwa, gahunda bafite yo kuzahura umusaruro n’ubukungu bw’ikigo n’igihugu muri rusange.
Iyo Banki zimaze gusuzuma, raporo ishyikirizwa Banki Nkuru y’Igihugu akaba ariyo itanga amafaranga.
BNR ni yo ibitse aya mafaranga, ni yo yemeza ko atangwa.
Ku rwego rw’igihugu hari amatsinda yashyizweho azakurikirana iki gikorwa, akareba ko ibikorwa byagenewe gufashwa biyabona ndetse ko nta biyabona bitayakwiye.
Urwego rw’ibigo bito n’ibiciriritse byahawe umwihariko muri iki kigega, bishyirirwaho ubufasha mu buryo bubiri: harimo guhabwa inguzanyo iciriritse ndetse n’ingwate.

Minisitiri Dr Ndagijimana, asobanura ko “Iki kigega cyafashe ibikorwa by’ubucuruzi ku nzego zose, kuva kuri bya bindi bito bifite ubucuruzi ku mwaka buri munsi ya miliyoni 20 Frw kuzamuka kugera masosiyete manini.
By’umwihariko, hari amafaranga azava muri BNR akanyura muri BDF kugira ngo agere kuri bya bikorwa bito cyane.
Ikindi ni uko bo bazabona imfashanyo y’ubwoko bubiri, harimo inguzanyo n’ingwate.
Kuri ibi bigo, BDF izishingira inguzanyo yabyo mu mabanki ku kigero cya 75% aho komisiyo izajya ikura ku mukiliya itagomba kurenga 0.
Raporo y’Ishami ry’Ubukerarugendo mu Rugaga rw’Abikorera, PSF, iherutse kugaragaza ko muri Werurwe bwagize igihombo cya Miliyari 34.
9 Frw, bitewe n’inama zasubitswe n’ibindi bikorwa by’ubukerarugendo byahagaritswe.
Ibi bihombo byaje bisanga urwego rw’ubukerarugendo mu Rwanda rufite inguzanyo za miliyari 87.
7 Frw, aho urwego rw’amahoteli arirwo rwihariye inguzanyo nini kuko rufite izingana na miliyari 83.

Minisitiri Dr Ndagijimana aherutse gutangaza ko ko ubu igipimo cy’ubukungu bw’u Rwanda kigaragaza ko butazazamuka ku kigero cya 8% nk’uko byari byitezwe, aho ubu imibare yagiye ivugururwa ikava kuri 5.
1%, nyuma biramanuka bigera kuri 3.
5% “ubu turi hafi kuri 2% nubwo bitari byarangira neza".
Ibicuruzwa bya CIMERWA byahawe isura nshya mu kongera amahitamo y’abaguzi
Sima za CIMERWA zimenyerewe ku izina rya Sima Nyarwanda 32.
5 N; zahinduriwe amazina zihinduka SURECEM, SUREROAD na SUREBUILD, ndetse zigiye kwiyongeraho indi sima ya 22.
