Umwaka ushize muri Werurwe nibwo u Rwanda na Tanzania byemeranyije ubufatanye mu kugeza ibicuruzwa ku masoko akomeye, arimo ayo muri Tanzania ndetse no ku mugabane w’u Burayi.
Ibihugu byombi byemeranyije ishyirwaho ry’ndege z’imizigo zizajya ziva ku kibuga cy’Indege cya Mwanza zijya ku masoko y’i Burayi, bikaba byaragombaga gutangira kuwa 1 Nyakanga 2019.

Gutwara amafi yo muri Tanzania akagezwa mu Burayi, ni amahirwe ku barobyi n’abacuruzi b’amafi bo muri icyo gihugu bari bamaze igihe bifuza uburyo buborohereye bwo kugeza umusaruro wabo ku masoko yo mu mahanga, bakagorwa n’igiciro cy’urugendo.

Ubusanzwe abacuruzi b’amafi bajyaga babanza kugeza umusaruro wabo ku bibuga by’indege bya Entebbe muri Uganda na Nairobi muri Kenya, kugira ngo indege ziwugeze ku masoko yo hanze, ibintu bavuga ko byabahendaga.
Ihuriro ry’abarobyi muri Tanzania ritangaza ko hari umusaruro w’amafi wangirikaga kubera kubura uko bawugeza ku isoko mpuzamahanga.

Nko muri Werurwe umwaka ushize, hari umusaruro w’amafi ufite agaciro gasaga miliyari eshanu z’amashilingi ya Tanzania bagombaga kugeza ku masoko ya Israel no mu Buyapani, babuze uko bagezayo kubera guhenda k’urugendo.
Uko umusaruro mbumbe w’u Rwanda wiyongereyeho miliyari zirenga 3000Frw mu myaka itanu

Nubwo u Rwanda kimwe n’Isi yose bihanganye n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus, mbere yacyo ubukungu bwarwo bwakomeje kwiyongera mu nkingi zose bwubakiyeho, aho ubuhinzi, inganda, serivisi n’ibindi bitahwemye kuzamuka umwaka ku wundi kandi uruhare rwabyo mu musaruro mbumbe w’igihugu rukigaragaza.

Nubwo u Rwanda kimwe n’Isi yose bihanganye n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus, mbere yacyo ubukungu bwarwo bwakomeje kwiyongera mu nkingi zose bwubakiyeho, aho ubuhinzi, inganda, serivisi n’ibindi bitahwemye kuzamuka umwaka ku wundi kandi uruhare rwabyo mu musaruro mbumbe w’igihugu rukigaragaza.
Imibare Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’Ibarurishamibare (NISR), cyatangaje kuwa 24 Werurwe 2020, igaragaza ko mu 2019, umusaruro mbumbe w’u Rwanda (GDP), wiyongereye ku rugero rwa 9.
4 %, ugera kuri miliyari 9105 Frw uvuye kuri miliyari 8189 Frw wariho mu 2018.
Muri uyu musaruro mbumbe, ubuhinzi bwagize uruhare rwa 24% inganda zigira uruhare rwa 18%, Serivisi zingana 49% mu gihe ibindi bisigaye byagize uruhare ku kigero cya 9%.
Iri zamuka ry’ubukungu riratanga icyizere ko nta gihindutse ibyo u Rwanda ruteganya ko nibura mu 2035 ruzaba rufite ubukungu buciriritse bishoboka.
Icyo gihe birasaba ko ubukungu bwaba bwihuta ku 10%, bigatuma umunyarwanda yazaba yinjiza asaga miliyoni 10 Frw ku mwaka.
Rirashimangira kandi imbaraga leta y’u Rwanda ikomeje gushyira mu guteza imbere ubukungu.
Mu 1994, izamuka ry’ubukungu bw’u Rwanda, ryasubiye inyuma kuri -41.
9%, umusaruro mbumbe w’umuturage wari amadolari 146 ku mwaka.

Nubwo inzira ikiri ndende, aho iterambere ry’ubukungu bw’u Rwanda rigeze harivugira kuko nko mu myaka itanu ishize umusaruro mbumbe wavuye kuri miliyari miliyari 5 956 Frw mu 2015, ugera kuri miliyari 9105 Frw.
Usubije amaso inyuma, usanga umusaruro mbumbe w’u Rwanda mu myaka itanu ishize (2015-2019), wariyongereyeho miliyari 3149 Frw.
Iri zamuka rishingiye ahanini kuri gahunda yo guteza imbere ubuhinzi, ishoramari muri serivisi zitandukanye, ubucuruzi, inganda n’ibindi bicumbi by’ubukungu.
Izamuka ry’umusaruro mbumbe mu myaka itanu
Mu 2015 umusaruro mbumbe w’u Rwanda wazamutseho 6.
9%, aho wanganaga na miliyari 5 956 Frw zikaba zari zivuye kuri miliyari 4 915Frw mu 2014.
Mu 2016 umusaruro mbumbe wageze kuri miliyari 6, 618 Frw, aho wazamutse ku kigero cya 5.
9% ugereranyije n’umwaka wabanje.
Mu 2017 umusaruro mbumbe wageze kuri miliyari 7 597 ukaba warazamutse 6.
1%, mu 2018 wageze kuri miliyari 8189 Frw uzamutse ku kigero cya 8.
6% ugereranyije n’umwaka wabanje wa 2017.

Ubwo hatangazwa umusaruro mbumbe wa 2018, Minisitiri w’Imari n’Igenamigambi, Dr Uzziel Ndagijimana, yavuze ko iterambere ry’ubuhinzi, inganda, ibikorerwa mu Rwanda na serivisi byazamuye ubukungu cyane.
Yagize ati “Ngira ngo muzi gahunda ya Made in Rwanda no korohereza ibikorwa bikorerwa mu Rwanda, biragenda rero bitanga umusaruro, umusaruro w’inganda urazamuka cyane".
Minisitiri Ndagijimana yavuze ko mu bitanga umusaruro harimo ibikorwa by’ubwubatsi byaba imihanda n’inganda.

Icyo gihe ibikorwa by’ubwubatsi byazamutseho 20%, mu nganda zitunganya ibintu bitandukanye cyazamutseho kuri 13%, umusaruro w’inganda zitunganya ibiryo ni 10%, izitunganya imyenda ni 26% na 38% ku musaruro w’inganda zikora ibikoresho bikoze mu byuma.
Mu 2019, umusaruro mbumbe wageze kuri miliyari 9105 Frw uvuye kuri miliyari 8189 Frw wariho mu 2018.
Bisobanuye ko hiyongereyeho miliyoni 916Frw mu mwaka umwe.
Urwego rwa serivisi rwashinze imizi
Mu 2015, urwego rwa serivisi rwazamutse ku kigero cya 7% rugira uruhare mu musaruro mbumbe wose rwa 47%.
Mu 2016 serivisi zazamutse ku kigero cya 6%.
Muri uwo mwaka serivisi zishingiye kuri hoteli na restaurant zazamutse ku rugero rwa 11% bitewe na gahunda yo kwakira inama n’ibikorwa bitandukanye.
Imirimo y’ubwikorezi yazamutse ku rugero rwa 8% ahanini bitewe n’ubwikorezi bwo mu kirere bwazamutse ku rugero rwa 15%.
Mu 2017, serivisi zazamutse ku kigero cya 8% naho uruhare rwazo mu musaruro mbumbe rugera kuri 46%.
Mu 2018 umusaruro wa serivisi wazamutse ku rugero rwa 9% naho mu 2019 uzamuka ku rugero rwa 8% ndetse zigira uruhare rwa 49% muri GDP.

Mu 2016, uwari Minisitiri w’imari n’igenamigambi, Claver Gatete yavuze ko gahunda ya leta ijyanye no kwakira inama mpuzamahanga yagize uruhare runini mu kuzamura umusaruro mbumbe w’igihugu nk’aho ibijyanye na hotel na restaurant zabigizemo uruhare runini.
Guhera muri Nyakanga 2018 kugeza Gashyantare 2019, u Rwanda rwari rumaze kwinjiza miliyoni 52 z’amadolari (asaga miliyari 46 Frw) avuye mu gutegura no kwakira inama mpuzamahanga.

Mu mwaka w’ingengo y’imari ushize (2018/2019) igihugu cyari cyihaye intego yo kwinjiza miliyoni 74 z’amadolari mu bikorwa byo gutegura no kwakira inama mpuzamahanga, avuye kuri miliyoni 42 zinjijwe mu 2017.

Kugeza ubu muri Kigali hari ibyumba bya hoteli z’inyenyeri ebyiri kugeza kuri eshanu bisaga 5000, washyiramo ibindi byumba by’inzu zigezweho zishobora gucumbikira abantu Kigali ifite bikagera ku 10 000.
Ubucuruzi budandaza n’ubugurisha ibintu icyarimwe bw’ibyakorewe mu Rwanda bukomeje kongera umusaruro wa serivisi, aho mu 2019 bwiyongereye ku kigero cya 16%.
Ubwikorezi bwazamutse ku kigero cya 12% ahanini bitewe n’ubwikorezi bwo mu kirere bwazamutse ku kigero cya 17%.
Serivisi z’imari zazamutse ku kigero cya 8% naho serivisi za hoteli na za restaurant zizamuka ku gipimo cya 10%.
Inganda zifatiye runini ubukungu
Kuva mu 2015, urwego rw’inganda rwagize ingufu nyinshi cyane mu bukungu bw’igihugu kuko ari bwo gahunda ya Made in Rwanda, yatangiraga gushyirwa mu bikorwa mu buryo buhamye.
Icyo gihe umusaruro w’inganda wazamutse ku kigero cya 7%.
Muri buri turere kandi hashyizweho ibyanya byihariye by’inganda, ndetse no mu Mujyi wa Kigali, iki cyanya gishyirwa i Masoro mu Karere ka Gasabo.

Mu 2016 inganda zazamutse ku kigero cya 7%, gahunda ya Made in Rwanda igira uruhare rukomeye cyane kuko inganda zikora imyenda, inkweto n’ibindi bituruka ku ruhu byiyongereye ku rugero rwa 10%, izikora ibyo kurya ziyongera ku rugero rwa 8%, naho inganda zikora ibikoresho by’ubwubatsi harimo isima ziyongeraho 21%.
Mu 2017 inganda zazamutse ku kigero cya 4%, mu 2018 zizamuka ku 10% naho mu 2019 umusaruro uzamuka kuri 16%.
Mu 2019, izamuka ry’umusaruro w’inganda ryatewe ahanini n’ibikorwa by’ubwubatsi, inganda zitunganya ibintu bitandukanye n’ubucukuzi bw’amabuye y’agaciro.
Kuri ubu mu Rwanda habarirwa inganda nto n’iziciriritse zirenga 800 zirimo inganda zitari zisanzwe mu Rwanda nk’izikora telefoni, iziteranya imodoka, izikora ibiribwa n’izindi.
Ubuhinzi bukomeje gutera imbere
Imibare ya NISR, yerekana ko mu 2015, ubuhinzi bwazamutseho 5%, ndetse bugira uruhare rwa 33% mu musaruro mbumbe.
Mu 2018, umusaruro w’ubuhinzi wazamutse ku rugero rwa 6%, mu 2019, wazamutse ku kigero cya 5%, naho umusaruro wabwo ugira uruhare rwa 24% mu musaruro mbumbe.
Ubuhinzi nka kimwe mu bitunze abanyarwanda benshi, bwakunze guhura n’imbogamizi zirimo kuba bushingiye ku mvura, yaboneka bukagenda neza yabura bukagenda nabi.
Ibi byatumye leta ishyira imbaraga muri gahunda yo kuhira aho kugeza ubu hegitari zirenga ibihumbi 68 zuhirwa.
Gukoresha inyongeramusaruro, guhuza ubutaka no guhinga igihingwa cyatoranyijwe byitaweho cyane.
Leta y’u Rwanda kandi yashyize imbere no gushyiraho inganda zongerera agaciro umusaruro ukomoka ku buhinzi n’ubworozi.
Umuyobozi wa NISR, Yusuf Murangwa avuga ko ‘uyu mwaka wagenze neza kuruta uko byari byitezwe’.
Ati “Ubuhinzi nabwo ntabwo bwakoze nabi 5% nubwo haba hifuzwa ko biba byiza kurushaho".
Mu 2019, ibihingwa ngandurarugo byiyongereye ku kigero cya 4%, ibihingwa byoherezwa mu mahanga byiyongera 5% bitewe n’ikawa yiyongereye ku kigero cya 7% n’icyayi cyiyongereye ku kigero cya 3%.
Kubera icyorezo cya Coronavirus, ubukungu ku Isi hose buzagabanuka, ubw’u Rwanda byitezwe ko buzazamuka ku gipimo cya 2% mu mwaka wa 2020 buvuye kuri 9.
4 % bwazamutseho umwaka ushize.
Icyakora kubera ingamba zafashwe mu kuzahura ubukungu, biteganyijwe ko ubukungu bw’u Rwanda mu mwaka wa 2021 buzazamuka ku gipimo cya 6.
Amazon igiye kugura imigabane ya miliyari ebyiri z’amadorali muri Airtel

Ikigo gikomeye mu bucuruzi bukorerwa ku Ikoranabuhanga cyo muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Amazon cyatangiye urugendo rukiganisha ku isoko ryagutse ry’u Buhinde, kinyuze mu kugura imigabane y’Ikigo cy’Itumanaho cya Bharti Airtel, kinafite ishami rikorera mu Rwanda.

Ikigo gikomeye mu bucuruzi bukorerwa ku Ikoranabuhanga cyo muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Amazon cyatangiye urugendo rukiganisha ku isoko ryagutse ry’u Buhinde, kinyuze mu kugura imigabane y’Ikigo cy’Itumanaho cya Bharti Airtel, kinafite ishami rikorera mu Rwanda.
Ibiganiro byo kugura imigabane ya Bharti Airtel ntibiragera kure, ariko abasesenguzi bavuga ko bigenze uko impande zombi zibyifuza, byazamura cyane ubukungu bw’ikoranabuhanga ry’u Buhinde.
Biteganyijwe ko ubwumvikane bw’ibi bigo bushobora gutuma imigabane ingana na 5% ya Bharti Airtel ijya mu maboko ya Amazon Inc.
hashingiwe ku buryo isoko rihagaze muri iyi minsi.
Bharti Airtel iri ku mwanya wa gatatu mu bigo bitanga serivisi z’itumanaho mu Buhinde igaragaza guhangana gukomeye hagati yayo n’ikigo cya mbere cya Reliance Jio.
Abantu batifuje ko imyirondoro yabo ijya ahagaragara babwiye Reuters ko uburyo Reliance Jio yakoresheje kugira ngo ibe iyoboye ibindi bigo by’itumanaho mu Buhinde na Bharti Airtel yabushobora.
Ku ikubitiro Amazon yari yifuje kugura imigabane iri hagati ya 8-10% ya Bharti Airtel.
Gusa ngo kuko ibiganiro bikiri mu itangira […] bishoboka ko n’amasezerano yahinduka cyangwa agaseswa.
Amazon iteganya ko yahita ireba ubundi buryo bujyanye no guhererekanya amafaranga bwazajya bufasha abakiliya ba Bharti Airtel kubona ibicuruzwa byayo bibahendukiye.
Umuvugizi wa Amazon yanze kugira icyo avuga kuri aya makuru, kuko ikigo ahagarariye kitatangaza amakuru ajyanye n’ibyo bazakora cyangwa batazakora mu gihe kiri imbere.
Gusa itangazo ryasohowe na Bharti Airtel rivuga ko isanzwe ikorana n’ibigo by’ikoranabuhanga bitandukanye bishaka kugeza ibicuruzwa byabyo na serivisi bitanga ku bakiliya.
Imigabane ya Bharti Airtel ku isoko ry’imari n’imigabane, kuri uyu wa Kane, tariki ya 4 Kamena 2020 yazamutseho 6% nyuma yo gutangazwa kw’amakuru y’ibiganiro hagati yayo na Amazon.
Mu byumweru bitandatu bishize ikigo cya Jio gihanganye na Bharti cyabonye miliyari 10 z’amadorali kiyakuye mu bashoramari barimo na Facebook.
Alphabet Inc ya Google na yo iri gushaka uburyo bwo gushora imari muri Vodafone Idea ya kabiri mu Buhinde mu gutanga serivisi z’itumanaho.
Amazon iri kwirukira ku isoko ry’ikoranabuhanga mu Buhinde bitewe no kuba riri kwaguka cyane kuko umubare w’abatuye iki gihugu uri kwiyongera, ukaba ugeze kuri miliyari 1,3.

Amazon iteganya gushora miliyari 6,5 z’amadorali mu bikorwa byo gucururiza kuri internet, ndetse ngo ikaba izoroherwa no gukoresha internet ya Bharti ku giciro gito mu gihe ibigo byombi bizaba byemeranyije amasezerano byifuza.
Mu Ukuboza 2017 nibwo Bharti Airtel ibarizwamo Airtel Rwanda yaguze imigabane yose ya Sosiyete y’Itumanaho ya Tigo Rwanda ibarizwa muri Millicom International Cellular SA.
Amasezerano y’ubugure yasinyiwe i New Delhi mu Buhinde, yahaye Airtel Rwanda kwegukana 100% by’imigabane yose ya Tigo Rwanda.
Bharti Airtel ni ikigo gikomeye ku Isi mu bijyanye n’itumanaho gifite abakiliya barenga miliyoni 403 mu bihugu 18 bya Afurika na Aziya gikoreramo.
Icyayi cy’u Rwanda cyinjije asaga miliyari 25 Frw mu mezi atatu ya 2020
Mu mezi atatu abanza ya 2020, u Rwanda rwohereje mu mahanga icyayi kingana na toni 9.
3 zifite agaciro k’amafaranga asaga miliyari 25 Frw, yiyongereye ku kigero cya 27% ugereranyije n’ayinjiye mu gihe nk’iki mu mwaka wari wabanje, naho ingano y’ibyoherejwe yo yiyongera kuri 15%.
Mu mezi atatu abanza ya 2020, u Rwanda rwohereje mu mahanga icyayi kingana na toni 9.
3 zifite agaciro k’amafaranga asaga miliyari 25 Frw, yiyongereye ku kigero cya 27% ugereranyije n’ayinjiye mu gihe nk’iki mu mwaka wari wabanje, naho ingano y’ibyoherejwe yo yiyongera kuri 15%.

Imibare itangazwa n’Ikigo cy’Igihugu gishinzwe guteza Imbere Ibyoherezwa mu Mahanga bikomoka ku Buhinzi, NAEB, igaragaza ko hagati ya Mutarama na Werurwe 2020, icyayi cyoherejwe mu mahanga ari ibiro 9.
436 bifite agaciro k’amadolari 27.
861 ni ukuvuga asaga miliyari zisaga 25.
Imibare yo mu 2019 igaragaza ko mu mezi atanu ya mbere y’uyu mwaka w’ingengo y’imari watangiye muri Nyakanga 2019, inyungu yavuye mu buhinzi bw’icyayi yari yazamutseho 8% igera kuri miliyoni $ 36.
08, ni ukuvuga asaga miliyari 33.
Kuva muri Nyakanga kugeza mu Ugushyingo 2019, umusaruro w’icyayi cy’u Rwanda wazamutseho 12% naho icyoherejwe mu mahanga cyiyongereyeho 4%, ugereranyije n’igihe nk’icyo mu mwaka wa 2018.
Hagati ya Nyakanga na Ugushyingo 2019 habonetse umusaruro wa toni 12.
017 z’icyayi, ziruta toni 10.
769 zabonetse mu gihe nk’icyo mu mwaka wa 2018.
Icyo gihe byagaragazwaga kandi ko icyayi cy’u Rwanda cyatunganyijwe cyiyongereyeho 4%, kiva kuri toni 12.
180 zabonetse mu 2018 zigera kuri toni 12.
Mu gihe nk’icyo kandi mu 2019, icyayi cyoherejwe mu mahanga cyinjije $36,088,761, bingana n’izamuka rya 8%, zivuye kuri $ 33,562,294 mu mwaka wabanje.
Imibare ya NAEB igaragaza ko intego ari uko mu mwaka wa 2024, icyayi cy’u Rwanda kizaba cyinjiriza igihugu miliyoni 209 z’amadolari.

Minisitiri w’Imari n’Igenamigambi, Dr Uzziel Ndagijimana, aherutse gutangaza ko kubera Coronavirus, muri iki gihe ibyoherezwa mu mahanga bishobora kuzagabanuka, ariko ko mu gihe iki cyorezo kizaba cyarangiye, ibintu bishobora kujya mu buryo.
Yavuze ko ku isoko muri iki gihe ibiciro by’ikawa bihagaze neza nubwo ubu atari igihe cy’umusaruro, gusa iby’icyayi byo biri kugenda bigabanuka ku isoko.

Mu kugabanya icyuho kiri hagati y’ibyoherezwa mu mahanga n’ibitumizwayo, u Rwanda rurateganya gukomeza guteza imbere ibikorerwa mu Rwanda, Abanyarwanda bagakangukira kubigura kugira ngo bisimbure ibyo hanze.
Minisitiri Dr Ndagijimana yavuze ko ubu igipimo cy’ubukungu bw’u Rwanda kigaragaza ko butazazamuka ku kigero cya 8% nk’uko byari byitezwe, aho ubu imibare yagiye ivugururwa ikava kuri 5.
1%, nyuma biramanuka bigera kuri 3.
5% “ubu turi hafi kuri 2% nubwo bitari byarangira neza".
Umwuka w’intambara ukomeje gututumba hagati ya Amerika na Iran

Nyuma y’igitero cyagabwe na Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika mu rukerera rwo kuri uyu wa Gatanu, kigahitana Gen Qasem Soleimani, wari usanzwe ayobora umutwe udasanzwe w’ingabo zirinda abategetsi bakomeye muri Iran; impungenge n’ubwoba bw’intambara bikomeje kwiyongera ku batari bake bakurikiranira hafi politiki ya Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, ndetse n’abatuye mu burasirazuba bwo hagati.

Nyuma y’igitero cyagabwe na Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika mu rukerera rwo kuri uyu wa Gatanu, kigahitana Gen Qasem Soleimani, wari usanzwe ayobora umutwe udasanzwe w’ingabo zirinda abategetsi bakomeye muri Iran; impungenge n’ubwoba bw’intambara bikomeje kwiyongera ku batari bake bakurikiranira hafi politiki ya Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, ndetse n’abatuye mu burasirazuba bwo hagati.

Iki gitero cyategetswe na Perezida wa Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Donald Trump, cyanahitanye Abu Mahdi al-Muhandis, wari umuyobozi wungirije w’umutwe bivugwa ko ufashwa na Iran witwa (Popular Mobilization Forces), ibiro by’ubutasi bya Amerika (CIA) byemeje ko ariwo wateguye ukanagaba igitero kuri Ambasade ya Amerika mu mujyi wa Bagdad mu minsi ishize.
Gen Qasem Soleimani na Abu Mahdi al-Muhandis barasiwe ku kibuga cy’indege cya Iraq i Bagdad, bari mu modoka hamwe n’abandi bantu batanu.
Umuyobozi w’ikirenga muri Iran, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, wahise ategeka iminsi itatu y’icyunamo mu gihugu hose, yavuze ko hateganyijwe kwihorera gukomeye ku bishe Gen Qasem Soleimani.

Perezida wa Iran, Hassan Rouhani, na we yashimangiye ko igihugu cye kizakora ibishoboka byose kikihorera, aho yunganiwe na minisitiri w’ububanyi n’amahanga muri Iran, Javad Zarif, wavuze ko igitero cya Amerika ari icy’iterabwoba.
Ati “Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zizirengera ingaruka z’ubujiji bwazo.

Abarwanashyaka ba Parti Socialiste bakomeje gucikamo ibice bapfa uruhare rw’u Bufaransa muri Jenoside

Mu ntangiriro za Gicurasi uyu mwaka, abarwanashyaka 23 ba Parti socialiste (PS) mu Bufaransa bahoze muri Guverinoma ya François Mitterand, bandikiye umunyamabanga wa mbere w’iryo shyaka Olivier Faure, bamusaba kwihaniza umukandida wabo mu matora y’abadepite b’u Burayi, washinje Mitterand n’ubutegetsi bwe uruhare muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994.

Mu ntangiriro za Gicurasi uyu mwaka, abarwanashyaka 23 ba Parti socialiste (PS) mu Bufaransa bahoze muri Guverinoma ya François Mitterand, bandikiye umunyamabanga wa mbere w’iryo shyaka Olivier Faure, bamusaba kwihaniza umukandida wabo mu matora y’abadepite b’u Burayi, washinje Mitterand n’ubutegetsi bwe uruhare muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994.
Abo bari abaminisitiri bikomaga Raphaël Glucksmann wavuze ko Mitterand yagize uruhare muri Jenoside yabaye mu Rwanda mu 1994.
Ni amagambo yavuze amaze kwiyamamaza muri Toulouse ku wa 6 Mata.

Hubert Védrine wabaye Umunyamabanga Mukuru w’Ibiro bya Mitterand, aba Minisitiri w’Ububanyi n’amahanga w’u Bufaransa ndetse ubu uyobora Institut François Mitterrand, na we aheruka kwikoma abashinja Sebuja uruhare muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.

Nyuma y’imyaka 25 Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi ihagaritswe, umwuka mubi ugenda ugaruka mu ishyaka ry’aba-socialistes, ushingiye ku ruhare rutaremerwa u Bufaransa bwagize mu itegurwa ry’umugambi wa Jenoside n’ishyirwa mu bikorwa ryawo.
Icyo gihe iri shyaka rikomokamo Mitterand ni ryo ryari riyoboye igihugu.

Nk’uko Jeune Afrique yabitangaje, uwahoze ari umunyamabanga wa PS ashinzwe ibibazo mpuzamahanga, Maurice Braud, aheruka kuvuga ko ibyabaye mu 1994 bitatinzweho cyane na PS, kubera ko ryari rifite ibindi birihangayikishije nk’ingaruka zo gutsindwa amatora y’abadepite mu 1993.
Ibiro byari bishinzwe ububanyi n’amahanga muri PS bisa n’aho ari byo byonyine byemeye kuvuga ku kibazo cya Jenoside yakorewe abatutsi.
Uwari ubibereye umunyamabanga mukuru, Pervenche Berès, yagaragaje ukutemeranya na gahunda za Elysée na Operation Turquoise yatangiye ku wa 22 Kamena 1994.

Mu itangazo uru rwego rw’ishyaka PS rwasohoye ku wa 16 Kamena, rwavuze ko politiki y’amacakubiri yo mu Bufaransa [guhera mu 1990] yabwamburaga uburenganzira bwo kugira uruhare mu gikorwa cya gisirikare.
Biragoye kuganira kuri iyi ngingo mu ba socialistes

Ubwo hibukwaga ku nshuro ya 20 Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi ihagaritswe, iki kibazo cyazamuye umwuka mubi hagati y’abantu ba hafi ba François Mitterrand n’ishami ry’urubyiruko muri PS, Mouvement des jeunes socialistes (MJS).

Mbere y’iminsi mike ngo ajye i Kigali, uwari kuba ahagarariye guverinoma y’u Bufaransa mu Rwanda, Minisitiri w’ubutabera Christiane Taubira, yasubitse urugendo nyuma y’amagambo Perezida Paul Kagame yavugiye mu kiganiro na Jeune Afrique.
Yagarutse ku ruhare rutaziguye rw’u Bubiligi n’u Bufaransa muri politiki yagejeje kuri Jenoside yakorewe abatutsi ndetse icyo gihugu kindi kiza kugira uruhare mu kuyishyira mu bikorwa.
Ku wa 5 Mata MJS yasohoye itangazo yamagana uko kwisubiraho kwabaye ku munota wa nyuma.
Riti “U Bufaransa bugomba kwemera uruhare rwose bwagize mu gushyigikira ubutegetsi bwateguye jenoside kuva mu 1990 kugeza mu 1994".
Ni ubutumwa ariko bwanenzwe n’abantu ba hafi na Mitterrand.

Paul Quilès wayoboye komisiyo y’Inteko Ishinga amategeko y’u Bufaransa mu isesengura ryo mu 1998 ku ruhare rwabwo mu Rwanda, yavuze ko habayeho ibiganiro hamwe na MJS ku cyicaro cy’ishyaka, hasobanurwa izo ngingo.

Uwari Perezida w’itsinda ry’ubucuti bw’u Rwanda n’u Bufaransa mu Nteko Ishinga amategeko y’icyo gihugu hagati ya 2007-2012, Marylise Lebranchu, ahamya ko atari ubwa mbere umubano w’u Rwanda n’u Bufaransa uteje umwiryane hagati y’abantu bakabaye bashyigikirana.

Mu 2010 mu gihe umubano w’u Rwanda n’u Bufaransa wari uhagaze neza ku butegetsi bwa Nicolas Sarkozy wanagiriye uruzinduko i Kigali muri Gashyantare uwo mwaka, Marylise wari umudepite w’umu socialiste yagombaga kujya mu Rwanda ayoboye rya tsinda ry’ubucuti kuva ku wa 7 kugeza ku wa 10 Kamena.
Ati "Mbere yo kugenda, nakiriye telefoni ya Hubert Védrine [wabaye Umunyamabanga Mukuru wa Elysée], wakuraga icyasha cyose ku Bufaransa, hamwe n’indi ya Paul Quilès.
Twashyizweho igitutu,"
Mu mvugo za MJS cyangwa Raphaël Glucksmann ndetse n’abahoze ari abantu ba hafi ba Mitterrand, bisa n’aho icyuho kirimo hagati aho bigoye kuzikiba.

Jean-Christophe Cambadélis wigeze kuba umunyamabanga wa mbere muri iri shyaka (2014- 2017), aheruka kugira ati “Hari byinshi boshobora kuvugwa ku bikorwa by’u Bufaransa mu Rwanda, ariko ntabwo twabyita kugira uruhare muri Jenoside.
Olivier Faure uri muri uyu mwanya na we asa n’uwamaze kwerekana aho ahagaze.
Muri Mata 2019 yanze gushyira umukono ku nyandiko yasinyweho n’andi mashyaka, yasabaga Perezida Emmanuel Macron kujya mu Rwanda “kuvugisha ukuri" kuri Jenoside.

Mu ibaruwa yo ku wa 15 Werurwe Olivier Faure yandikiye Benjamin Abtan uyobora umuryango wo mu Burayi urwanya ivangura, EGAM, ari na wo watangije icyo gitekerezo, yitandukanyije n’icyo gikorwa avuga ko “cyaha agaciro gahunda z’ubutegetsi bw’igitugu, bwica bukanafunga abatavuga rumwe nabwo.

Ku wa 20 Gicurasi, Olivier Faure yakiriye Hubert Védrine na Paul Quilès, aho abo batatu bemeranyije ku mwanzuro ko “nyuma y’amatora y’u Burayi, ishyaka PS rizatangiza ibiganiro ku bagize uruhare muri Jenoside mu Rwanda.
Tuzasaba ifungurwa ry’ishyinguranyandiko z’ibihugu byose n’inzego zagize ruhare muri ayo makimbirane, kuva ku ntangiroro yayo kugeza ku iherezo.
Kugeza ubu ayo madosiye ntiyafunguwe.
Muri Nyakanga hagati ariko Olivier yagize ati “Ntabwo uyu mushinga utatangira ariko nshyigikiye icyo gitekerezo.
Paul Quilès we yavuze ko yifuza biganiro, ariko binafite imirongo bigenderaho.
Ati “Nifuza ibiganiro aho ibintu byose tuzabishyira ku meza, ariko byibanda mbere na mbere, ku mateka bigendana n’igihe.

Bitari ibiganiro bishingiye kuri raporo ya Mucyo [yasohotse mu 2008 yakozwe na komisiyo yigenga yashyiriweho gushaka ibimenyetso ku ruhare rw’u Bufaransa mu gutegura no gushyira mu bikorwa umugambi wa Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994], ivuga ko u Bufaransa hari amakosa bwakoze.

Muri uyu mwaka, ibihugu bine byo muri Afurika y’Iburasirazuba birateganya kuzagira amatora.

Mu gihe hitegurwa amatora rusange azaba mu Ukwakira 2020, abatavuga rumwe na Leta n’imiryango itegamiye kuri Leta bafite impungenge ko Guverinoma ya Perezida John Pombe Magufuli ishobora kubangamira ubwisanzure bwo gutanga ibitekerezo.
The East African yatangaje ko kuri ubu Guverinoma yakuyeho ibikorwa by’abatavuga rumwe na Leta, bivuze ko nta bikorwa byo gukoresha inama bishoboka mu mashyaka atavuga rumwe na Leta.
Hari abantu bafunzwe, abanyamakuru bamwe baburirwa irengero abandi barafungwa nk’urugero rw’umunyamakuru Eric Kabendera cyangwa Paul Magotti wari impirimbanyi y’uburenganzira bwa muntu.

Uko kubangamira abatavuga rumwe na Leta kwatumye amashyaka atavuga rumwe na Leta yanga kwitabira amatora y’inzego z’ibanze yabaye mu Ugushyingo umwaka ushize, bituma ishyaka CCM riyatsinda ku kigero cya 99%.
Umunyapolitiki utavuga rumwe na Leta, Tundu Lissu aherutse kuvuga ko guhagarika ibikorwa y’abatavuga rumwe na Leta, ari ikimenyetso ko amatora ya 2020 atazaba mu mucyo.
Perezida Magufuli yatowe mu 2015 afite intego yo kurwanya ruswa.
Nubwo yatangije intambara ku baryi ba ruswa, ashinjwa kubangamira demokarasi mu gihugu, gupfukirana amajwi y’abamunenga no kubibasira.
Amatora atenganyijwe muri Gicurasi uyu mwaka, mu gihe hakiri urujijo niba Perezida Pierre Nkurunziza azongera kwiyamamaza nyuma ya manda ya gatatu yafashe mu 2015 igateza imvururu.

Ikindi gihangayikishije ni ukumenya niba Guverinoma ye ifite ubushobozi bwo gutegura amatora anyuze mu mucyo, kuko imiryango n’ibihugu byinshi byateraga inkunga icyo gihugu, byarayihagaritse bishinja Nkurunziza guteza akaduruvayo mu gihugu.
Nubwo Nkurunziza yatangaje ko atazongera kwiyamamaza, ababirebera hafi bavuga ko ashobora kwisubiraho cyangwa agashyiraho umuntu azajya atagekeramo.
Nta kimenyetso cyerekana ko Nkurunziza agiye kuva muri politiki y’u Burundi mu gihe muri Gashyantare umwaka ushize, yimuye ibiro bya Perezida akabijyana mu Mujyi wa Gitega ari naho avuka.
Raporo y’Umuryango w’Abibumbye yo muri Nzeri 2019, igaragaza ko nta cyizere cy’imigendekere myiza y’amatora mu Burundi mu 2020, mu gihe hakiri Perezida wigaragaza nk’igitangaza’.

Loni ivuga ko ari Perezida wigwijeho ububasha bwose we n’ishyaka rye CNDD FDD, n’ibyaha bishinjwa urubyiruko rw’ishyaka rye ruzwi nk’Imbonerakure rushinjwa guhutaza uburenganzira bw’abaturage n’abatavuga rumwe na Leta.
Icyakora Minisitiri w’Ububanyi n’Amahanga w’u Burundi, Ezechiel Nibigira, aherutse kubwira Inteko rusange ya Loni, ko mu gihugu hari umwuka mwiza uzatuma amatora agenda neza.
Amatora yo muri Somalia ni ingenzi cyane ku mutekano w’akarere.
Iki ni igihugu kimaze igihe mu mvururu.
Hashize imyaka 50 Perezida atorwa n’itsinda ry’abantu bake baba batoranyijwe, kubera ubwoba bw’uko hateguwe amatora rusange abaturage bakitabira, bishobora guteza imvururu n’umutekano muke.
Mu matora ya 2009, aya 2012 na 2017 hose abagize Inteko Ishinga Amategeko na Perezida bagiye batorwa n’abantu 14 000 babaga batoranyijwe ngo bahagararire ubwoko buba muri icyo gihugu.
N’uyu munsi haracyari impungenge niba amatora yo muri Somalia koko azaba dore ko aya Perezida aherutse yabereye muri parikingi y’ikibuga cy’indege.

Ikibazo cy’umutwe w’iterabwoba wa al Shabaab ndetse no kuba abatavuga rumwe na Leta baherutse gushinja Perezida Mohamed Abdullahi Farmaajo gushaka kuguma ku butegetsi biteye impungenge ku mutekano w’amatora ateganyijwe.
Guverinoma yatangaje ko yiteguye gukoresha amatora agaca mu mucyo kandi buri muturage wemerewe gutora agatora.
Guverinoma yanavuze ko vuba aha izageza ku Nteko Ishinga Amatora umushinga w’amatora kugira ngo wemezwe.
Icyakora, iki gihugu cyiracyafite ikibazo cyo kuvugurura Itegeko Nshinga.
Nubwo itsinda ryahawe kurivugurura ryagejeje ku Nteko umushinga w’itegeko, haracyari imbogamizi.
Iya mbere ni uko nta matora ya kamarampaka ashobora kuba hatarakemuka ikibazo cy’agace ka Somaliland kifata nk’igihugu ukwacyo mu gihe Somalia igafata nk’agace kayo.
Mu bindi kandi ivugurura ry’itegeko Nshinga rigomba kureba harimo aho umurwa mukuru ukwiriye kuba, uburyo ubuyobozi bwa za Leta zigize icyo gihugu bukorana na Leta nkuru n’ibindi.

Mu gihe ivugurura ry’itegeko Nshinga ritaraba, n’tegeko rigenga amatora ntirizashoboka kuko abantu ntibashobora gutangira kwiyandikisha hataraboneka itegeko rigenga amatora kandi naryo rigomba kugenwa n’Itegeko Nshinga.
Indi mbogamizi ni umutekano muke.
Igice kinini cy’igihugu kiracyari mu maboko y’umutwe wa al Shabaab, bivuze ko aho hantu al shabaab ifite amatora atazashoboka.
No mu murwa mukuru Mogadishu naho umutekano waho ntiwizewe.
Ibyo bigaragazwa n’uko tariki 28 Ukuboza 2019, imodoka itezemo igisasu yaturikiye aho abantu basakirwa mu murwa mukuru kigahitana abantu 78.

Perezida Farmaajo yavuze ko icyo gitero ari icy’iterabwoba kandi kitazihanganirwa, icyakora abatavuga rumwe na we bamushinja kubembekereza al shabaab kuko uduce Leta yigaruriye guhera mu 2017 ubwo Farmaajo yajyaga ku butegetsi ari duke.
Amatora ateganyijwe muri Gicurasi 2020, ni aya mbere azaba abaye guhera Minisitiri w’Intebe wahawe n’igihembo cyitiriwe Nobel, Dr Abiy Ahmed agiye ku butegetsi.

Umwanzuro aherutse gufata wo gusesa amashyaka yose yari agize Ihuriro EPRDF (Ethiopian People’s Revolutionary Democratic Front), agashinga ishyaka rya PP watumye havuka impungenge n’umwuka mubi mu gihugu.
Hari abadashyigikiye iryo shyaka PP kuko risa nk’irije guhanagura umuco n’umuhate bashyizeho bubaka amashyaka yabo mu myaka 30 ishize.

Abatabyumva cyane ni abo mu mashyaka nka Tigray Peoples Liberation Front (TPLF), n’igice cy’ishyaka Oromo Peoples Democratic Organisation (OPDO) ari naryo Abiy aturukamo, rishobora no kumurwanya agatsindwa.

Amavugurura yakozwe na Dr Abiy yazanye umucyo muri Ethiopia yahoze ifatwa nk’igihugu kibangamira uburenganzira bwa muntu ariko byanateje imvururu zishingiye ku turere zitewe n’abandi bantu bakomeye bafite inyota y’ubutegetsi.
Guhera mu 1995, Ethiopia yagiye ikora amatora mu gihe cyagenwe.
Icyakora, uretse mu 2005, nta na rimwe higeze habaho amatora arimo guhangana kugaragara nkuko The East African yabitangaje.

Byagarutsweho mu kiganiro cya mbere Minisitiri w’Ububanyi n’Amahanga, Dr Vincent Biruta, yagiranye n’itangazamakuru kuva mu Ugushyingo 2019 ubwo yajyaga kuri uyu mwanya.
Ni ikiganiro cyagarutse ku ngingo zitandukanye zigaruka ku mubano w’u Rwanda n’ibihugu byo mu karere ndetse hagaragazwa n’ibyakozwe mu mwaka ushize.
Minisitiri Biruta yabajijwe ku mvugo y’abanyapolitiki bo muri RDC ko igihugu cyabo kidashobora kubona amahoro “tudateye u Rwanda, byaba ngombwa tukarufata.

Byavuzwe na Adolphe Muzito wigeze kuba Minisitiri w’Intebe wa Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo (RDC) ubu akaba ari Umuhuzabikorwa w’Impuzamashyaka itavuga rumwe na Leta muri icyo gihugu yitwa Lamuka.

Ati “Ni ibintu bibabaje, wakwiteguye ko ibyo bavuga biba bifite icyo bafite gifatika ariko nta gihari.
Ntabwo ari ubwa mbere bene ibi bibazo bibaho, hashize igihe hari abanyapolitiki bo muri RDC bumva ko kugira ngo abaturage babo babemere ari uko bavuga nabi u Rwanda.
Biruta yavuze ko ibyavuzwe n’aba banyapolitiki ndetse na bamwe mu bo muri Kiliziya Gatolika bidashobora guhungabanya umutekano w’u Rwanda na RDC.

Minisitiri Dr Biruta yashimye uruhare rw’ubuyobozi bwa RDC mu guhashya imitwe yitwaje intwaro ibarizwa mu Burasirazuba bwa RDC irimo na bamwe mu bagize uruhare muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Yavuze ko u Rwanda rumaze kwakira abantu 1919 bari mu mashyamba ya Congo aho ingabo za RDC zagabye ibitero ku mitwe yitwaje intwaro.

2019: Umwaka w’amarira n’imiborogo mu birindiro by’abarwanya u Rwanda

Umwaka wa 2019 usa n’utazasibangana mu mitwe yitwa ko irwanya Guverinoma y’u Rwanda, kuko usize abo udahitanye imigambi yabo iri mu kangaratete ndetse abandi bari mu mazi abira, kuko isaha iyo ari yo yose ibintu byabahindukiraho.

Umwaka wa 2019 usa n’utazasibangana mu mitwe yitwa ko irwanya Guverinoma y’u Rwanda, kuko usize abo udahitanye imigambi yabo iri mu kangaratete ndetse abandi bari mu mazi abira, kuko isaha iyo ari yo yose ibintu byabahindukiraho.
Kuva mu myaka ishize, umutwe wavugwaga cyane wari FDLR kuva mu myaka ya 2000, aho yashinzwe n’abagize uruhare muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994.
Habanje gushingwa RDR, haza ALIR 1 na ALIR 2, nyuma yo kuba FDLR baza gutandukana havuka CNRD na RUD-Urunana.
Magingo aya FDLR na RUD Urunana ni imitwe ikomeje kubangamira umutekano w’u Rwanda, nubwo nayo itorohewe muri uyu mwaka urimo kugana ku musozo.
Umuyobozi wa FDLR yaguye muri gereza abandi bagwa mu bihuru
Muri Mata 2006 nibwo Dr Ignace Murwanashyaka wayoboraga FDLR yafatiwe mu Majyepfo y’u Budage avuye gusura abarwanyi muri RDC.
Mu 2015 urukiko rwa Stuttgart rwamuhamije ibyaha hamwe na Straton Musoni wari umwungirije.
Muri Mata 2019 nibwo inkuru yabaye kimomo ko Murwanashyaka yaguye muri gereza atarangije igifungo cy’imyaka 13 yakatiwe, maze urwamutwaye rutangira kototera abamukoreye mu ngata.
Bidateye kabiri, muri uko kwezi kwa Mata nibwo Nsekanabo Jean Pierre uzwi nka Lt.

Col Abega Kamara wari ushinzwe iperereza muri FDLR na Nkaka Ignace uzwi nka La Forge Fils Bazeye wari umuvugizi wayo, bagejejwe imbere y’urukiko kugira ngo baburane ku ifungwa n’ifungurwa ry’agateganyo.

Abo bombi inkuru y’ifatwa ryabo yabaye kimomo mu Ukuboza 2018, ko bafatiwe ku mupaka wa Bunagana bavuye muri Uganda mu nama yabaye hagati ya tariki 15-16 Ukuboza, yahuje abahagarariye RNC ya Kayumba Nyamwasa na FDLR.

Bivugwa ko byari ku butumire bw’ubuyobozi bwa Uganda, hagamijwe kunoza umubano hagati y’iyo mitwe y’iterabwoba n’inzego za gisirikare za Uganda no kunoza imikoranire mu migambi yo guhungabanya umutekano w’u Rwanda.

Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri Uganda ushinzwe ubutwererane bw’akarere, Philemon Mateke, byatangajwe ko ari we wari umuhuza wabo, na we uyu mwaka umusize atorohewe kuko nubwo Perezida Yoweri Museveni akomeje kumuryamaho, amakuru y’iperereza akomeje kumushyira hanze ko yari n’inyuma y’igitero abarwanyi ba RUD Urunana bagabye i Musanze ahazwi nko mu Kinigi mu ijoro ryo ku wa 4 Ukwakira, kigahitana abaturage 14.
Ibya FLN byasubiwemo
Umwaka ushize waranzwe n’ibitero binyuranye byagiye byigambwa n’umutwe wa FLN, wari ufite Nsabimana Callixte wiyise Sankara, nk’umuvugizi wawo.
Muri Nyakanga 2018 abantu bitwaje intwaro zirimo n’imbunda bateye abaturage mu Murenge wa Nyabimata babasahura amatungo, ibiribwa, imyenda n’amafaranga.

Mu ijoro ryo ku wa 19 Kamena 2018 nabwo abantu bitwaje imbunda, bishe barashe abantu babiri muri Nyaruguru, bakomeretsa batandatu barimo n’Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa w’Umurenge wa Nyabimata, Nsengiyumva Vincent, batwika n’imodoka ye na moto y’umuturage.

Mbere yaho tariki ya 10 Kamena 2018, amabandi yitwaje intwaro gakondo hamwe n’imbunda, yateye abaturage bo mu Murenge wa Ngera mu Karere ka Nyaruguru arabakomeretsa abatwara n’imitungo irimo amafaranga, televiziyo, inkweto n’ibindi.
Ibyo bitero byatangiye kujya byigambwa n’umutwe wa FLN, mu ijwi rya Nsabimana Callixte nk’umuvugizi.
Muri Mata 2019 nibwo inkuru yabaye kimomo ko Nsabimana yafatiwe muri Comores.

Ubwo yagezwaga imbere y’urukiko ku wa 23 Gicurasi 2019, Nsabimana yabwiye urukiko ko nta byinshi afite byo kwireguza kuko ibyaha 16 akurikiranyweho bimwe yabikoze ku giti cye ibindi bigakorwa n’umutwe yari abereye umuvugizi.

Ubu afunzwe by’agateganyo mbere yo gutangira kuburana mu mizi, aregwa ibyaha birimo iremwa ry’umutwe w’ingabo ritemewe, Icyaha cy’iterabobwoba ku nyungu za politiki, gukora no kugira uruhare mu bikorwa by’iterabwoba, gutanga amabwiriza mu gikorwa cy’iterabwoba, kuba mu mutwe w’iterabwoba, icyaha cyo kugambana no gushishikariza abandi gukora iterabwoba n’ibyaha by’ubwicanyi n’ubwinjiracyaha bw’ubwicanyi.

Aregwa kandi gufata bugwate, gukwiza amakuru atariyo cyangwa icengezamatwara rigamije kwangisha leta y’u Rwand amu bihugu by’amahanga, guhakana Jenoside, kwiba yitwaje intwaro, gutwika, kugirana umubano na leta y’amahanga hagamijwe gushoza intambara, gukora cyangwa gukoresha impapuro mpimbano, gukubita no gukomeretsa ku bushake no gutanga, kwakira no gushishikariza kwakira ibikomoka ku iterabwoba.
Amakuru ataremezwa ahamya ko Herman Nsengimana wasimbuye Nsabimana muri FLN, na we mu minsi ishize yacakiriwe mu mashyamba ya RDC hamwe n’abandi barwanyi benshi.
Abakuru ba FDLR bishwe umusubizo

Muri Nzeri 2019 nibwo Ingabo za Repubulika ya Demokarasi ya Congo, FARDC, zemeje ko zishe Lieutenant General Sylvestre Mudacumura wayoboraga umutwe wa FDLR, yicirwa mu gace ka Bwito mu Ntara ya Kivu y’Amajyaruguru.
Nyuma y’iminsi mike, nibwo FARDC, binyuze mu bikorwa byiswe ‘Sokola 2’ yeretse itangazamakuru bane mu barwanyi ba FDLR, bahoze ari abarinzi ba Gen Mudacumura.
Mudacumura yahoze mu Ngabo z’u Rwanda mbere ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994, yabaye mu mutwe w’abarindaga Perezida Juvenal Habyarimana ndetse yari umuyobozi wungirije wawo.
Nyuma yo gutsinda urugamba rwo kubohora igihugu n’ingabo zari iza RPA, Gen Mudacumura na bagenzi be bafashe iy’ishyamba, aho bakoreye ibyaha ndengakamere ku baturage bo mu Burasirazuba bwa RDC.
Mbere yo kwicwa, Mudacumura yashakishwaga n’urukiko mpuzamahanga mpanabyaha akekwaho ibyaha icyenda byiganjemo iby’intambara n’iyicarubozo yakoze hagati y’umwaka wa 2009 na 2010.
Yagizwe Umugaba Mukuru w’Ingabo za FDLR nyuma y’itahuka rya rya General Paul Rwarakabije wawuyoboraga mbere ye.
Urukiko Mpuzamahanga mpanabyaha rw’i La Haye mu Buholandi rwamushyiriyeho impapuro zisaba ko atabwa muri yombi 13 Nyakanga 2012.
Gusa yari atarafatwa.
Isasu ryavuze mu birindiro bya P5

Umutwe wa P5 umaze igihe ufite ibirindiro mu mashyamba ya RDC, ni umwe mu itarahiriwe n’imigambi yo gutera u Rwanda, nyuma yo gushingwa n’ihuriro ry’amashyaka atanu ariyo Amahoro People’s Congress, Forces Démocratiques Unifieés – Inkingi (FDU-Inkingi); People’s Defence Pact-Imanzi (PDP-Imanzi), Rwanda National Congress (RNC) na PS Imberakuri ya Bernard Ntaganda, maze uragizwa Kayumba Nyamwasa.

Uyu mutwe Kayumba aheruka kuwusaba kuvana abarwanyi bawo muri Kivu y’Amajyepfo ngo wegere umupaka wa Uganda aho bivugwa ko wari wizeye guhabwa inkunga ifatika kurusha izo wahabwaga uri hafi y’u Burundi, ariko inzira ntiyabwira umugenzi.
Ku wa 19 Mata ngo nibwo bimutse, bageze Kalehe bahura n’umutwe wa MRCD uyoborwa na Gen Irategeka, bababwira ko ngo bo batangiye akazi muri Nyungwe.
Bamaze kuruhuka ngo bakomeje urugendo "rutabahiriye na gatoya," kuko bageze muri Gatoyi i Masisi, bahuye n’ibico byinshi bya FARDC, bararaswa, bamwe bafatwa mpiri abandi bishyikiriza Monusco.

Ubwo bari imbere y’urukiko i Kigali, abenshi bahurizaga ku kuvuga ko bashyikirijwe u Rwanda ku wa 18 Kamena 2019, nubwo hari abo byamenyekanye ko batashye bucece bakanagera mu kigo kinyuzwamo abavuye ku rugerero i Mutobo, ariko mu iperereza bikaza gutahurwa ko urugendo rwabo rutacukirizwa aho, berekezwa mu nkiko.

Ubu abarwanyi 25 bayobowe na Rtd Major Mudathiru Habib bari kuburanira mu rukiko rwa gisirikare mu Rwanda, ndetse uyu we yarashwe ukuguru ku buryo kwangiritse bikomeye, ariko ntabura kurandatwa n’ingabo z’u Rwanda yiteguraga kugabaho igitero.
Gen Musabyimana wa RUD Urunana yarishwe

Mu ijoro ryo ku wa 4 Ukwakira rishyira ku wa 5 Ukwakira 2019, abagizi ba nabi biganjemo abitwaje intwaro gakondo bateye mu Murenge wa Kinigi mu Karere ka Musanze bica abaturage 14 abandi barakomereka.
Ku wa 6 Ukwakira nibwo Polisi y’u Rwanda yatangaje ko inzego z’umutekano zishe abagizi ba nabi 19 ndetse abandi batanu mu bagabye icyo gitero, bafatwa mpiri.
Nyuma y’urupfu rw’abambari be, ku wa 10 Ugushyingo 2019 Gen Musabyimana Juvenal uzwi nka Jean Michel Africa wayoboraga RUD Urunana, yishwe na FARDC.
Uyu yaguye mu gitero gikomeye FARDC yagabye mu gace ka Binza hafi y’umupaka w’iki gihugu na Uganda.
Uyu mugabo wabaye mu ngabo za ex-FAR, yari umwe mu barwanyi b’umutwe wa FDLR/FOCA mbere y’uko ucikamo ibice akajya muri RUD-Urunana.
Vuruguvurugu muri RNC
Mu gihe abiyemeje gufata intwaro ngo barwanye u Rwanda bakomeje gutikira umunsi ku munsi, abibumbiye mu mutwe w’iterabwoba wa RNC nabo umwaka wa 2019 ubasize ahabi.

Uyu mwaka usize mu rungabangabo umuryango wa Benjamin Rutabana, wabuze kuva muri Nzeri ubwo yajyaga mu bikorwa by’uwo mutwe muri Uganda, ugashinja Kayumba Nyamwasa n’abandi bayobozi ba RNC kuba inyuma y’ibura rye.
Rutabana ngo yahagurutse i Bruxelles ku wa Gatatu tariki 4 Nzeri 2019 agana Entebbe muri Uganda.
Yabanje guhagarara i Dubai mbere yo kugera ku kibuga cy’indege cya Entebbe ku wa 5 Nzeri saa 13:50.
Yakomeje kuvugana kuri telefoni n’umugore we Diane Rutabana, ku wa 8 Nzeri ntiyongera kumva ijwi rye.

Amakuru ahamya ko Rutabana yagiranye ubwumvikane buke na bagenzi be b’abayobozi muri RNC kuko yarakajwe n’uko abarwanyi ba P5 bari mu nkiko i Kigali, mu gihe ubwo bajyaga gutabwa muri yombi, Kayumba yahaye itegeko Major Habib Mudathiru wari ubayoboye kubavana muri Kivu y’Amajyepfo bakajya ku mupaka wa Uganda, aho bazahabwa inkunga zihagije kurusha izo bahabwaga hafi y’u Burundi.
Icyo gihe ngo Kayumba yarenze ku nama zatanzwe na Rutabana, nyamara abo barwanyi bajya kwimuka, barakoresheje $12000 yoherejwe na Ben Rutabana kuri Western Union i Bujumbura.

Uburakari bwa Rutabana agashaka kwaka ibisobanuro Kayumba wagushije ingabo zabo mu biganza by’uwo bahanganye, ngo byaba impamvu yatumye ashaka ‘kumwumvisha’, kuko umusirikare muto yari ashatse kubaza byinshi ‘Jenerali’, ndetse bikekwa ko ubwo Rutabana yajyaga muri Uganda yari agiye mu bikorwa bya gisirikare, arenze ku gushaka kwa Kayumba.
Hejuru y’ibyo, bamwe mu bayobozi ba RNC muri Canada baheruka guhambirizwa bashinjwa gusuzugura ubuyobozi bukuru bw’ishyaka.

Mu birukanwe muri RNC harimo Simeon Ndwaniye wari Umuhuzabikorwa w’akarere ka Windsor na Jean Paul Ntagara wari Umuhuzabikorwa wungirije w’Intara ya Canada akaba n’umubitsi wayo, wari uherutse guhagarikwa ashinjwa gufatira umutungo w’ihuriro.

Harimo kandi Achille Kamana wari komiseri ushinzwe ubukangurambaga mu ntara ya Canada akaba n’umuhuzabikorwa w’akarere ka Ottawa-Gatineau, na Tabitha Gwiza wari komiseri ushinzwe abari n’abategarugori mu ntara ya Canada n’umubitsi mu karere ka Windsor.
Uyu Gwiza ni mushiki wa Ben Rutabana waburiwe irengero wari na komiseri ushinzwe kongera ubushobozi muri RNC, bakaba abavandimwe ba Adeline Rwigara.
Gwiza avuga ko kugeza ubu ikibazo cy’ibura rya Rutabana ahinduka umwanzi muri RNC, ku buryo urebye uko abakuru muri RNC babyitwaramo, ubona ko ari bo bari hejuru y’ibura rya Ben Rutabana.

Kugeza ubu amakuru anakomeje kuvugwa ko Kayumba Nyamwasa na we yaba atorohewe ku buyobozi bwa RNC, ku buryo isaha n’isaha ashobora kwirukanwa ku buyobozi bw’uyu mutwe mu bijyanye n’igisirikare, kimwe n’abandi bafatanya kuyobora.
Ntabwo ikibazo kirarangira
Nubwo hari abagerageje guhungabanya umutekano bakabyishyurira ikiguzi kiri hejuru, bigaragaza ko urugendo rukiri rurerure, ku buryo inzego zishinzwe umutekano ari ngombwa kugarira zigakomeza.
Umutwe wa FDLR uheruka kwimika Pacifique Ntawunguka "Omega".

Mu kiganiro yahaye urubyiruko rugera kuri 200 rubarizwa mu muryango w’abanyeshuri barokotse Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994, mu 2016, Umujyanama wa Perezida wa Repubulika mu by’umutekano, Gen James Kabarebe, yahishuye uburyo Gen Ntawunguka wamubwiye ko azagaruka mu Rwanda ari uko nta mututsi ukirurimo.
Hari kandi n’umuyobozi mukuru wa FDLR, Gen Byiringiro Victor Rumuli bakunze kwita Victor Rumuri cyangwa Michel Byiringiro.

Uretse abo, mu minsi ishize nibwo Faustin Twagiramungu uba mu Bubiligi, yumvikanye ashishikariza abantu batandukanye kwinjira mu mitwe irwanya Leta y’u Rwanda, aho ubu ari umwe mu bayobozi b’ihuriro MRCD rifite umutwe wa FLN.
Ni umutwe ahuriramo na Paul Rusesabagina wamenyekanye kubera Hotel Rwanda.

Ku wa Gatanu nibwo Perezida wa Repubulika ya Demokarasi ya Congo, aho iyi mitwe yose yabonye urubuga rwo gucura imigambi yayo, Felix Tshisekedi, yatangarije Inteko Ishinga amategeko ko mu bikorwa byo kurwanya imitwe yitwaje intwaro ikorera muri icyo gihugu, ingabo z’igihugu zimaze gufata abarwanyi 1712 b’umutwe wa CNRD.

Yavuze ko ubwo yageraga ku butegetsi, ibice bitandukanye by’igihugu byari byugarijwe n’ibikorwa by’imitwe yitwaje intwaro, ariko uyu munsi, kubera guhamagararira iyi mitwe gushyira intwaro hasi n’ibikorwa bya FARDC, amahoro amaze kugaruka muri Kasai, ndetse no muri Tanganyika ni mu gihe cya vuba.
Gusa ngo ikibazo gikomeye gisigaye mu majyaruguru mu bice bya Beni na Butembo, muri Ituri, mu bice bya Minembwe, Uvira, Baraka na Fizi, Shabunda na Kalehe.

Yakomeje ati “Ku baturuka Kalehe, ndashaka gushimira ingabo zacu zimaze gusenya 95% by’ibirindiro by’umutwe witwaje intwaro wa CNRD, aho abarenga 1712 bafashwe, barimo 245 bitwaje intwaro n’abayobozi 10 mu bya politiki b’uwo mutwe w’abagizi ba nabi.
Yashimangiye ko ibikorwa Guverinoma ye yatangije byo gutsinsura imitwe yitwaje intwaro bidateze guhagarara, kugeza igihe iyi mitwe izavira burundu ku butaka bw’igihugu.
Ingabo z’Abafaransa zavuze imyato Opération Turquoise yakingiye ikibaba abajenosideri

Mu gihe u Bufaransa n’u Rwanda biri mu bikorwa byo kuzahura umubano umaze imyaka urimo agatotsi, Ingabo z’Abafaransa zari muri Opération Turquoise mu 1994, zashimwe mu gihe iki gikorwa zajemo kinengwa ko cyakingiye ikibaba abari bamaze gukora Jenoside.

Mu gihe u Bufaransa n’u Rwanda biri mu bikorwa byo kuzahura umubano umaze imyaka urimo agatotsi, Ingabo z’Abafaransa zari muri Opération Turquoise mu 1994, zashimwe mu gihe iki gikorwa zajemo kinengwa ko cyakingiye ikibaba abari bamaze gukora Jenoside.

Ku wa 22 Kamena mu 1994, Loni ibisabwe n’u Bufaransa yafashe umwanzuro No 929 ubwemerera kohereza ingabo zabwo mu Rwanda mu cyiswe “Opération Turquoise", yafatwaga nk’igamije ibikorwa by’ubutabazi ku bari mu kaga.

Izi ngabo zagiye muri “Zone Turquoise" yari igice kigizwe n’ahahoze Perefegitura za Cyangugu, Gikongoro na Kibuye ari naho hiciwe Abatutsi benshi nyuma yo gutabwa n’ingabo z’Abafaransa mu maboko y’Interahamwe.
Abafaransa baje mu Rwanda bitwaje intwaro za karahabutaka bisa naho biteguye kurwana inkundura.

Bari bitwaje indege z’intambara zirenga 30 abasirikare 2500, kandi byari bizwi ko icyo gihugu cyari gifitanye umubano mwiza na leta yari iriho yaba iy’abatazi n’iyari yarayibanjirije zarimo zica Abatutsi uruhondogo.
Ku wa 14 Kamena 2019, i Paris habereye umuhango wakoze mu buryo bwa rwihishwa wo gushimira abasirikare bari muri iki gikorwa mu Rwanda.
Mu kiganiro cyahejwemo itangazamakuru, Minisitiri w’Ingabo w’u Bufaransa, Florence Parly, yavuze ijambo ashima abahoze muri Opération Turquoise.
Jeune Afrique yatangaje ko inyandiko yashyizeho umukono kuri uwo munsi igaragaza amakuru yatanze.
Igira iti “Ku wa 7 Mata, Perezida wa Repubulika yatangaje ko iyo tariki izaba umunsi wo kwibuka Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu Bufaransa.
Hari n’ubushake bwo guha ijambo abagabo n’abagore bari aho icyo kibi cyabereye.
Yananditse ko hakwiye gushimwa no guha icyubahiro abanyuze muri Opération Turquoise.

Ni ubutumwa bwakiriwe neza n’abarimo abari ku rutonde rw’abasirikare 22, amateka agaragaza uruhare rwabo muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, haba mu kuyitegura, kuyikora cyangwa mu kugambana ariko babyihunza.
Muri bo ni Général Erik de Stabenrath, wayoboye Opération Turquoise ku Gikongoro kuva tariki ya 16 Nyakanga kugeza 22 Kanama 1994.
Yagize ati “Nishimiye cyane kuko bwa mbere numvise umunyapolitiki ashyigikira Opération Turquoise.

Bamwe mu basirikare bari muri Opération Turquoise bemeye kuvugisha ukuri, bagaragaza ko icyari cyabazanye mu Rwanda atari ibikorwa by’ubutabazi ndetse ko nta n’icyo bakoze ngo abatutsi badakomeza kwicwa.

Lieutenant Colonel Guillaume Ancel na we wari mu Rwanda mu gihe cya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994, yakunze guhamya ko intego nyamukuru ya ‘Opération Turquoise’, atari ukurokora ubuzima bw’inzirakarengane zicwaga ahubwo yari ugushyigikira Guverinoma yakoze Jenoside.

Ancel yanagaragaje ko ingabo z’u Bufaransa zahaye intwaro Leta yakoze Jenoside, ikaza no kuzihungana mu nkambi zo muri Zaïre, aho yisuganyirizaga ishaka kugaruka gutera igihugu cyari cyafashwe na FPR Inkotanyi.

Ubuhamya bw’abarokokeye mu Bisesero aho Ingabo z’Abafaransa zari bugaragaza ko Abafaransa bari bafite umugambi wo gufasha Guverinoma yakoze Jenoside gutsemba Abatutsi no kuyiharurira inzira ngo ibashe guhunga ingabo za FPR-Inkotanyi zahagarikaga Jenoside.

Bavuga ko batakambiye Ingabo z’u Bufaransa ngo zibakure mu maboko y’Interahamwe n’abasirikare bari bamaze kubicamo abarenga ibihumbi 40, ziterera agati mu ryinyo kugeza ubwo abandi barenga 4000 bishwe mu minsi itatu gusa.
Ishimwe ryaturiwe ku ngabo zahoze muri ‘Opération Turquoise’ ryanakiriwe neza n’Umugaba Mukuru w’Ingabo, Général François Gérard Marie Lecointre.
Uyu yari capitaine mu ngabo zirwanira mu mazi, akaba mu gihe cya Jenoside yari ashinzwe Segiteri ya Gisovu, imwe mu zari zigize iyahoze ari Perefegitura ya Kibuye.
Yagize ati “Ni ubwa mbere umuyobozi mu gisirikare turi ku rwego rumwe, afashe ijambo mu kiganiro nk’iki.
Abasirikare bakuru bayoboye Turquoise i Cyangugu, Kibuye na Gikongoro bashinjwa ibyaha bikomeye byakozwe muri icyo gihe.
Nka Jean-Claude Lafourcade yari Umuyobozi w’Ikirenga w’Ingabo z’Abafaransa zari muri Turquoise kuva tariki 22 Kamena kugeza 22 Kanama 1994.
Inyandiko ya CNLG ku ruhare rw’Abasirikare b’u Bufaransa muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, igaragaza ko muri Turquoise, iyo hataba ubufatanye bw’abasirikare b’Abafaransa bari bayobowe na Gen.
Lafourcade, ibyaha byakorewe ahahoze ari Cyangugu, Kibuye no ku Gikongoro bitari kuba.
Ivuga ko ibyo byaha byashyigikiwe mu buryo bw’ibikoresho nk’intwaro, imodoka zitwara abantu n’ibintu ndetse n’amavuta (carburant) yazo byose bitangwa n’abasirikare b’Abafaransa.
Nyamara, inshingano Loni yari yahaye Turquoise yashimangiraga ko “ari ubufasha buhabwa abantu kandi nta kurobanura".
Nko mu nkambi ya Murambi, abasirikare b’Abafaransa bayicungaga, babazaga ubwoko buri wese uyinjiyemo.
Imbere mu nkambi, CNLG yavuze ko bashyiraga hamwe abarokotse jenoside, abasirikare ba FAR ndetse n’Interahamwe zari zimaze gukora jenoside.
Ibi byahaye Interahamwe umwanya wo gukomeza ubwicanyi nyamara byaravugwaga ko ari ahantu hagenewe kugoboka abantu.
Abanyamakuru b’abanyamahanga bahigereye kuva muri Nyakanga kugeza muri Kanama 1994 bavuze ukuntu abarokotse bageramiwe n’ubwicanyi bwakorwaga n’Interahamwe.
Ubwicanyi, gusambanya ku ngufu byakorerwaga aho Lieutenant-Colonel Eric De Stabenrath wayoboraga aka gace yari atuye.
Iby’ingenzi ku rugendo rwo kweguza Perezida Donald Trump rugeze mu mahina
Kuri uyu wa Gatatu nibwo abagize inteko ishinga amategeko ya Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika batoye ku bwiganze, icyemezo cyo gutakariza icyizere Perezida Donald J.
Trump akaba ashobora kubura amahirwe yo kurangiza manda ye isigaje umwaka umwe.
Kuri uyu wa Gatatu nibwo abagize inteko ishinga amategeko ya Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika batoye ku bwiganze, icyemezo cyo gutakariza icyizere Perezida Donald J.
Trump akaba ashobora kubura amahirwe yo kurangiza manda ye isigaje umwaka umwe.

Gutora ingingo ya mbere yo gukoresha nabi ububasha Trump ahabwa n’itegeko, byatowe n’abadepite 230 kuri 427 bari bari mu nteko; mu gihe iyo kubangamira imirimo y’inteko ishinga amategeko yatowe n’abadepite 229.

Aya matora asobanuye ku buryo butaziguye ko perezida Trump atakarijwe icyizere n’intumwa za rubanda cyo gukomeza kuyobora Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, nubwo urubanza rwa nyuma ruzacibwa na Sena, aho ishyaka ry’aba-Républicains rifite ubwiganze.
Umuyobozi w’aba -Républicains muri Sena ya Amerika, Mitch McConnell, yavuze ko yifuza ko ibiganiro kuri uyu mwanzuro ukomeye byazaba bigufi.
Gusa nta kigaragaza ko Sena izahitamo gukura ku buyobozi Perezida Trump kuko abasenateri benshi ari abo mu ishyaka rye.
Gukuraho Perezida Trump bisa n’ibirimo amacenga menshi.
Umunsi ku wundi amakuru agenda yisukiranya, agaragaza ko hari abantu benshi babyihishe inyuma, ndetse n’inzira z’ubwiru zinyurwamo ngo iki cyemezo gifatwe.
Ese byatangiye bite?

Muri Nzeri uyu mwaka, nibwo hamenyekanye amakuru avuga ko umwe mu bakozi bashinzwe ubutasi, wahoze anakorera ikigo cy’ubutasi cya CIA, yagejeje ikirego ku mugenzuzi mukuru w’ubutasi, arega Perezida Trump gukora ibikorwa atemererwa n’amategeko.

Mu kirego cye, avuga ko umwe mu bayobozi bo mu biro bya perezida [White House] wamuhaye amakuru; yari atewe impungenge n’ibyavugiwe mu kiganiro kuri telefone cyo muri Nyakanga 2019, hagati ya Perezida Donald Trump na Perezida wa Ukraine, Volodymyr Zelensky.
Muri iki kiganiro, Perezida Trump yasabye icyo gihugu cy’amahanga kwivanga mu matora ateganyijwe mu mwaka utaha wa 2020, muri Amerika.

Yanashyize igitutu ku gihugu cy’amahanga, agisaba gukora iperereza kuri umwe mu bazahangana nawe mu matora yo muri 2020; byose bigakubirwa mu cyaha cyo gukoresha nabi ububasha ahabwa n’itegeko nk’umukuru w’igihugu.

Umwunganizi mu mategeko wa Trump, Rudolph Giuliani n’intumwa nkuru ya leta, William Barr, bashyirwa mu majwi ko bafite uruhare rutaziguye muri ibi bikorwa; ndetse ko n’abayobozi bakuru mu biro by’umukuru w’igihugu bashatse gukingira ikibaba Trump kuko bazi neza uburemere bw’ibyavuzwe na Trump.
Inzira iteganywa n’amategeko kugira ngo umukozi wo mu biro bishinzwe iperereza atange ikirego cy’ibikorwa biri gukorwa, kandi bitandukanye n’amategeko yarakurikijwe.
Uwatanze iki kirego yakigejeje ku mugenzuzi mukuru w’ubutasi, uyu nawe wagombaga kukigeza ku muyobozi mukuru ushinzwe ubutasi ku rwego rw’igihugu, nyuma yo gusuzuma uburemere bwacyo.

Gusa umuyobozi mukuru ushinzwe ubutasi ku rwego rw’igihugu, Joseph Maguire, ntiyigeze ashyikiriza iki kirego inteko ishinga amategeko, nkuko yabisabwaga n’amategeko; ahubwo yahisemo kugisha inama ibiro bishinzwe ubujyanama muri minisiteri y’ubutabera; ibi nabyo byanzura ko icyo atari ikibazo cyihutirwa nyamara izi mpande zombi nta na rumwe rufite ububasha bwo gufata uwo mwanzuro.

Kuwa 19 Nzeri, nibwo hamenyekanye ko kudashyirwa ahagaragara kw’iki kirego, byagizwemo uruhare na perezida Trump wifuzaga ko Ukraine itangira iperereza kuri Hunter Biden, umuhungu wa Joe Biden, wo mu ishyaka ry’abademokarate, wahoze ari Visi Perezida.

Kutavuga rumwe kuri iki kibazo byakomeje kwiyongera, kugera ubwo kuwa 25 Nzeri, 2019, ibiro by’umukuru w’igihugu [White House] byemeye ko raporo ikubiyemo ibiregwa Trump n’amajwi y’ikiganiro kuri telefone hagati ya Trump na Zelensky bishyirwa ahagaragara.
Kuva icyo gihe Trump n’abamushyigikiye batangiye kwamagana ibikubiye muri icyo kirego, bavuga ko bidafite agaciro kandi uwabitangaje nta bumenyi buhagije afite kubyo yaregeye.
Ni iki mu by’ukuri Trump yaganiriye na Zelensky?

Ibiro by’umukuru w’igihugu [White house] byashize hanze ikiganiro Trump yagira na perezida wa Ukraine, byibwira ko bishobora kuzagaragaza neza Trump, ndetse bigahosha umwuka mubi wari utangiye kuzamuka, gusa ibi si ko byagenze.
Ibyo biganiro bigaragaza ko Trump yashatse guhuza inkunga Amerika iha Ukraine, no gusaba Ukraine gukora iperereza kuri Hunter Biden; ndetse n’ubugambanyi bwabaye mu matora yo muri 2016.
Zelensky wagaraje gushaka kumvikana, ahanini bitewe nuko yifuzaga ko Amerika imugurisha ibisasu bya “Javelin anti-tank missiles", Trump yamubwiye ko Rudy Giuliani ari we muntu yizeye babiganiraho.
Ni iki abagize inteko ishinga amategeko bibanzeho mu gusesengura impamvu batakariza icyizere Trump?

Amakuru avuga ko Nancy Pelosi, uyobora inteko ishinga amategeko yifuzaga kumva ibirego byose bishinja Trump gukoresha nabi ububasha ahabwa nka perezida; gusa abademokarate bibanze ku ngingo yo gutakariza icyizere Trump bareba cyane ku kibazo cya Ukraine, aho kureba ibibazo byose bigaragaza imyitwarire idahwitse ye.
Adam Schiff, uyobora akanama karebana n’ubutasi mu nteko ishinga amategeko, yagaragaje ibibazo bine bifuzaga gukoraho iperereza.
Icya mbere bifuzaga kumenya niba Trump yarongeye gusaba ubufasha igihugu cy’amahanga mu kwivanga mu matora.
Icya kabiri bashakaga kumenya niba ibiro by’umukuru w’igihugu [White House] byaremeye ko bigirana inama na Ukraine, ari uko Ukraine yemeye gutangiza iperereza mu cyimbo cya Trump.
Icya gatatu, bifuzaga kumenya niba Ukraine yari ifite impamvu yo kwizera ko itazahabwa inkunga ya gisirikare, kugeza igihe itangirije iperereza rya Trump.
Icya kane, bifuzaga kumenya niba hari impamvu zifatika zateye Trump kwitwara atyo.
Trump yisobanura ate?
Perezida Trump n’abamushyigikiye bemeza ko nta kidasanzwe yakoze.
Bemeza ko nta nta gitutu bashyizeho Ukraine ngo ibakorere ibitemewe n’amategeko.
Ni iki Joe Biden ahuriyeho na Ukraine?
Dusubije amaso inyuma ubwo Joe Biden yari Visi Perezida wa Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, ubutegetsi bwa Obama bwagerageje gutera inkunga Ukraine mu makirimbirane ifitanye n’u Burusiya.

Abanyaburayi na Amerika bahisemo gushaka uburyo bakuraho Viktor Shokin, wari umushinjacyaha mukuru wa Ukraine, kuko basangaga ruswa yibasiye abayobozi bakuru muri iki gihugu, ari imbogamizi mu gukomeza imbaraga za Ukraine.

Viktor Shokin yafatwaga nk’ufite uruhare runini muri icyo kibazo; yakuwe ku mwanya we, mu mavugurura yakozwe bitegetswe na Amerika n’abanyaburayi; aho Joe Biden yivugiye ko ariwe wategetse ko hafatirwa inkunga ya miliyari imwe y’amadorari kugeza igihe Ukraine ishyize mu bikorwa icyifuzo cyabo.
Hunter Biden ahurira he n’iki kibazo?
Hunter yamaze igihe kinini cy’ubuzima bwe akora ubucuruzi mu izina rya se (Joe Biden).
Yagiraga uruhare rutaziguye mu biganiro byari bigamije kwinjiriza inyungu ubucuruzi bwa se, ndetse akaba n’umuyobozi muri banki yaterwaga inkunga na se.
Hunter Biden yahawe umwanya mu nama y’ubuyobozi y’ikigo cya Amtrak, mu buryo atari akwiye na gato; ndetse anashyirwa mu nama y’ubuyobozi y’ikigo cy’ingufu cya Ukraine [Burisma].
Ibikorwa bya Hunter byaramenyekanye cyane muri politiki y’abademokarate.

Igihe yari mu Bushinwa ari kumwe na se mu ruzinduko rw’akazi; yagiranye ibiganiro n’umuyobozi wa banki ya Private Equity, aho bamwe mu bayobozi bakuru mu biro bya perezida batangiye gukeka ko ari gushaka uburyo bwo kwishakira inyungu ze bwite; ibintu bitari byarigeze bikorwa mu biro by’umukuru w’igihugu.
Hunter kandi ngo yari azi neza ko imyitwarire ye irebwa nk’ikibazo mu myaka yabanje, mu gihe cy’amatora.
Kwinjirira amatora ya Amerika

Trump akeka ko ikigo cyitwa ‘Crowdstrike’ gifitanye umubano na Ukraine kandi ko cyahishe ububiko bw’amabanga ya komite nyobozi mu ishyaka ry’abademokarate, bibye hakoreshejwe ikoranabuhanga mu gihe cy’amatora ya 2016.
Trump yifuzaga ko Ukraine iha Amerika ubwo bubiko bw’amabanga.
‘Crowdstrike’ ni ikigo cyo muri Amerika, cyashinzwe ku bufatanye n’umurusiya wahungiye muri Amerika akiri umwana.
Iki kigo cyahawe akazi na komite nyobozi y’ishyaka ry’abademokarate kugira ngo kibafashe kumenya uburyo ubutumwa bwa bamwe mu bayobozi b’abademokarate bwinjiwemo mu gihe cy’amatora ya 2016.

Trump ahangayikishijwe nuko iki kigo kitigeze giha ububiko bw’amabanga cyasesenguye FBI cyangwa undi uwo ariwe wese, nyamara muri Ukraine nta hantu ho guhisha ubwo bubiko bw’amabanga hahari, kandi nta n’impamvu ifatika yatuma babuhisha.

Trump atsimbarara ku ngingo ivuga ko u Burusiya butigeze bwinjira mu mabanga y’abademokarate; ahubwo ari ibinyoma byahimbwe n’ikigo ‘Crowdstrike’ kuko aricyo cyahishe ibimenyetso mu rwego rwo guhimbira ibyaha ubutegetsi bwe n’u Burusiya.
Gutakariza icyizere Perezida bikorwa bite?
Hifashishijwe ingero kuri Nixon na Clinton baheruka kweguzwa, komite ishinzwe iyubahirizwa ry’amategeko mu nteko nshingamategeko niyo igira uruhare runini muri iki gikorwa.

Iyi komite yumva abatangabuhamya, igategura ibirego irega perezida mu buryo bwemewe n’amategeko, n’ingingo zijyana nabyo, igakora amatora, byakwemezwa bikoherezwa mu nteko rusange y’abagize inteko nshingamategeko bagakora amatora nabo, ingingo imwe cyangwa zose zatorwa ku bwiganze, Perezida agatakarizwa ikizere.

Kuri perezida Trump we, ikibazo cye cyanyuze mu nzira ebyiri mu gihe kimwe, aho urwego rw’ubutasi rwakoze iby’ibanze, rukora raporo ruyoherereza komite ishinzwe iyubahirizwa ry’amategeko, ari nayo yateguye ibirego bishinjwa Trump.
Nyuma y’ibyemejwe n’abagize inteko nshingamategeko umutwe w’abadepite, umutwe wa Sena niwo uzaca urubanza rwa nyuma rwemeza niba Trump yeguzwa cyangwa agakomeza kuyobora Amerika.
Mu rubanza rwa Sena, uhagarariye perezida mu mategeko niwe uburana kuko perezida ubwe ntagomba kuba ari muri icyo cyumba cy’iburanisha.
Perezida w’urukiko rw’ikirenga niwe ugena uburyo icyemezo cya Sena gishyirwa mu bikorwa, ariko Sena nayo ishobora gutora ivuguruza icyemezo cye.
Kugira ngo kandi icyemezo cya Sena gitorwe, bisaba ko 2/3 by’abasenateri bacyemeza (aba-senateri 67 ku 100).
Sena ya Amerika irimo aba-senateri 53 bo mu ishyaka ry’aba-Repubulikani, bisobanuye ko kugira ngo Trump akurwe ku buyobozi, 20 muri bo basabwa gutora bihuje n’abademokarate.
Trump akuwe ku buyobozi byagenda bite?
Itegeko rivuga ko perezida wa Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika akuweho, asimburwa na visi perezida; Ubu Mike Pence niwe wasimbura Trump.
Igihe baba baviriyeho rimwe, umukuru w’inteko nshingamategeko Nancy Pelosi niwe wayobora; gusa bisa n’ibidashoboka kuko aba-republicains ntibiteguye gukora icyatuma Pelosi ahabwa umwanya wa perezida.
Uza ku mwanya wa kane mu rukurikirane rw’abasimbura Trump ni Mike Pompeo, umunyabanga wa leta; gusa uyu nawe afite aho ahuriye n’ibibazo bya Ukraine.
Uwa gatanu ni ushinzwe imari ya leta Steven Mnuchin, ari nawe udafite imbogamizi n’imwe yamubuza kuba perezida wa Amerika.
Perezida Kagame yavuze ku magambo ya Trump, manda ya gatatu n’uzamusimbura

Perezida Paul Kagame aherutse kugirana ikiganiro n’Ikinyamakuru cyo muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Time Magazine, cyagarutse ku ngingo zitandukanye zirimo iterambere ry’u Rwanda, Politiki n’ibindi.

Perezida Paul Kagame aherutse kugirana ikiganiro n’Ikinyamakuru cyo muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Time Magazine, cyagarutse ku ngingo zitandukanye zirimo iterambere ry’u Rwanda, Politiki n’ibindi.
Icyo kiganiro kizatambuka muri nimero itaha ya Time Magazine ariko icyo kinyamakuru cyabaye gisohoye incamake mu byo cyaganiriye na Perezida Kagame.

Time Magazine yaganiriye na Perezida Kagame mu kwezi gushize ubwo yari yitabiriye umuhango wo gutanga impamyabumenyi z’icyiciro cya gatatu cya Kaminuza ku banyeshuri bo muri Columbia University, barimo umukobwa we Ange Kagame.
Hari igice cy’Isi cyigize abagenzuzi
Perezida Kagame yabajijwe ku buryo abona impamvu umugabane wa Afurika u Rwanda rurimo ukunze gufatwa nk’uhoramo ibibazo, udatera imbere ukagira n’abayobozi babi.
Yasubije ko ikibazo gikomeye atari Afurika nk’umugabane ahubwo ari abantu bamwe bigize abagenzuzi b’isi, bumva ko nta cyiza cyakorerwa ahandi hatari iwabo.
Yagize ati “Hari igice cy’Isi gihora gishaka kugaragara nk’ahakorerwa ibintu byiza gusa, hakaba n’ikindi gice kiberamo ibibi gusa.
Icyo gice cya mbere cyumva ko ari cyo gishinzwe kugenzura ikindi.
Bumva ko bafite inshingano zo gukomeza kugenzura.
Mu yandi magambo, twe bo mu gice kibi, uko wagerageza gukora neza kose ntushobora kuva muri icyo gice ngo wenda ujye mu gice cy’abakora ibyiza.
Aho niho yahise asabwa gukomoza no ku magambo Perezida wa Leta Zunze Ubumwe, Donald Trump, wigeze gushinjwa kuvuga, ko ibihugu bya Afurika ari umwanda.
Perezida Kagame asanga igikenewe atari ukujya guhangana n’abafata nabi Afurika ahubwo ko ingufu zikwiriye gushyirwa mu kurwanya ibituma uwo mugabane usuzugurwa.
Ati “Uburyo bwiza ntabwo ari ukurwanya uwo muntu ubona ibihugu byacu mu buryo bubi, ahubwo icyiza ni ukurwanya ruswa, ubukene, n’ibindi bintu bibi byose abantu bashingiraho baducira imanza zitari zo.
Dukwiriye kwibanda ku bintu bidushyira ku rundi rwego aho ntawibeshya ku cyo duharanira n’abo turi bo.
Manda ya gatatu: ‘Njye nashakaga kugenda’
Mu mwaka wa 2015, Itegeko Nshinga rya Repubulika y’u Rwanda ryo mu 2003 ryaravuguruwe, ingingo zimwe ziravugururwa zirimo n’iyemerera Perezida Kagame kwiyamamariza manda ya gatatu.
Ni igikorwa cyakozwe nyuma y’ubusabe bw’abaturage basaga miliyoni eshatu n’igice bari bandikiye Inteko Ishinga Amategeko bifuza ko ingingo ikumira Perezida kongera kwiyamamaza yavugururwa.
Itegeko Nshinga ryaravuguruwe, mu 2017 haba amatora ya Perezida, Paul Kagame w’Umuryango FPR Inkotanyi ayatsinda ku majwi 98%.
Perezida Kagame yabwiye Time Magazine ko we atifuzaga manda ya gatatu, ko yabikoze nyuma yo kubisabwa na benshi.
Ati “ Njye nashakaga kugenda.
Nanavuze impamvu ariko abantu bamwe barahagurutse bati ‘Perezida waduhaye andi amahirwe, ukaduha undi mwanya?
Ntabwo dushaka ko ba bantu batwikoreje imitwaro babona inzira yo kugaruka ku buyobozi bw’igihugu cyacu ngo bongere bangize ibintu.
’ Haje ibitekerezo byinshi, nagombaga kubyumva nkanabyubahiriza.
Yabajijwe niba ishyaka FPR Inkotanyi ryaba riri gushaka uzamusimbura igihe manda ye izaba irangiye, Perezida Kagame avuga ko ibyo byaba atari byo.
Kagame yagize ati “Ibyo byaba ari nk’ubwami cyangwa ibimeze nkabyo.
‘Sinagiye ku buyobozi nkoze amanyanga’
Perezida Kagame yabajijwe ku bikunze gutangazwa n’imiryango mpuzamahanga iharanira uburenganzira bwa muntu, ivuga ko mu Rwanda nta bwisanzure buhari, ko abatavuga rumwe na Leta batotetezwa n’ibindi.
Iki kinyamakuru cyitsaga cyane ku kuba bamwe mu batavuga rumwe na Leta barangiwe kwiyamamaza mu matora ya Perezida aherutse.
Perezida Kagame yavuze ko rimwe na rimwe abayobozi n’abaturage bo muri Afurika bafatwa uko batari.
Ati “Ntabwo nagiye ku buyobozi habayeho amanyanga, nta manyanga nakoze mu rugendo rwo kubohora igihugu cyanjye.

Kayibanda yayoboye u Rwanda rukibona ubwigenge tariki 1 Nyakanga 1962 kugeza tariki ya 5 Nyakanga 1973 ubwo yahirikwaga ku butegetsi n’abasirikare bayobowe na Gen.
Habyarimana Juvenal wari Minisitiri w’Ingabo.
Ubwo Kayibanda yahirikwaga, Sebatware yari Minisitiri w’Umutekano mu gihugu na nyuma yaho yabaye Perefe w’Umujyi wa Kigali.

Mu gitondo cyo ku wa 5 Nyakanga, abahiritse Kayibanda bagiye kuri Radiyo Rwanda babwira abaturage ko bamuhiritse kuko “abanzi b’amahoro badurumbanyije umutekano wa rubanda, bakabiba amacakubiri mu gihugu.
Kayibanda yahiritswe hashize iminsi mu gihugu hari imvururu, abakozi b’abatutsi mu nzego zitandukanye birukanwa, abanyeshuri b’abatutsi mu mashuri bicwa, bakubitwa cyangwa bakirukanwa.
Twagiramungu avuga ko guhirika Kayibanda bitari ngombwa kuko nta n’igishya byazanye, ahubwo ngo abari bashinzwe guhosha ibyo bibazo nibo babyitarukije babimugerekaho.
Kuba mu gihugu hari umutekano muke, Twagiramungu avuga ko byari inshingano za Sebatware wari Minisitiri w’Umutekano mu gihugu na Habyarimana wari ushinzwe ingabo.

Yemeza ko Sebatware na Habyarimana bagize uruhare runini mu guhirika Kayibanda, akanabishingira ku kuba nyuma ya Coup d’état Sebatware yarahawe umwanya muri Leta nshya kandi abandi bakoranye na Kayibanda barafunzwe.
Ati “Byari bihagije kugira ngo wowe [Sebatware] na Habyarimana mwumvikane izo mvururu muzihoshe muhe na Perezida raporo.
Siko byagenze, byakomeje kuba mwigaramiye abana bakicana mureba, imvururu zikaba mu mashuri mureba, munazogeza.
Kayibanda yasuzuguriwe imbere y’imbaga i Nyamirambo, habura umukiza urubwa
Kuwa 1 Nyakanga 1973, u Rwanda rwizihizaga imyaka 11 rumaze rubonye ubwigenge.
Ubwo Perezida Kayibanda yari amaze akanya gato afashe ijambo, indangururamajwi ye yaracomowe, ijwi ntiryongera kumvikana.
Kayibanda wasaga n’uwamaze kumenya ibiri kumutegurirwa, ngo yaravuze ati “Abashaka gukora coup d’état ngaho nimuyikore".
Sebatware avuga ko indangururamajwi imaze gucika, abatekinisiye barimo n’umuzungu bahise bajya kureba ibibaye, basanga ni ‘fusible’ yari igize ikibazo, barayisimbuza umuriro urongera uragaruka.
Hashize akandi kanya gato, hari umusore waje wiruka ashaka kujya aho Kayibanda yavugiraga ijambo, abantu bamufata ataramugeraho.
Sebatware agira ati “Nagiye kubona mbona agahungu karaje, ariko katarahagera hahagurutse abantu bagera kuri 200, baragafata ntabwo kigeze kagera kuri Kayibanda ngo kamwambure indangururamajwi.
Ako gahungu kakoraga mu biro by’abinjira n’abasohoka, serivisi yo muri Minisiteri yanjye ku kibuga cy’indege.

Uwo musore waturukaga mu Ruhengeri, Sebatware avuga ko yari amaze iminsi asabye ko bamufunga kuko yari yaranyereje amafaranga ya Leta yakirwaga n’urwego rushinzwe abinjira n’abasohoka ku kibuga cy’indege ariko ntibyakorwa.
Sebatware nka Minisitiri wari ushinzwe umutekano, ngo yongeye gusaba ko uwo musore atabwa muri yombi kuko yashatse kuvogera umutekano wa Perezida ariko abasirikare barabyanga.
Ati “Bagiye kumufata abasirikare barabyanga.
Iyo dosiye nyiheruka icyo gihe, ni uko byagenze.
Twagiramungu, umukwe wa Kayibanda yavuze ko biteye isoni, kuba Perezida asuzugurwa mu ruhame, Minisitiri w’umutekano n’uw’ingabo bakicecekera nk’aho nta cyabaye.
Yemeza ko Sebatware na Habyarimana bari mu kagambane ko guhirika Kayibanda nyamara aribo ibibazo igihugu cyari gifite byarebaga.
Ati “Tekereza Perezida arafata indangururamajwi, mukohereza umuntu ujya kuyimwambura , Perezida akumirwa ntihagire n’umwe uvuga ati umuntu wambuye micro Perezida agomba gufatwa agafungwa.
Mu gihe Kayibanda yashakaga kuva ku butegetsi, umugambi wo kumuhirika wanogerezwaga muri Zaïre
Mu Ukwakira 1995, Twagiramungu wari umaze iminsi yeguye nka Minisitiri w’Intebe mu Rwanda avuga ko yagiye muri Zaïre, akabonana na Perezida Mobutu Sese Seko.
Mu minsi itanu yamaze muri icyo gihugu, ngo yasobanukiwe itegurwa ry’umugambi wo guhirika sebukwe ku butegetsi.
Ati “Mu Ukwakira 1995 nagiye i Kinshasa njya n’i Gbadolite.
Nahamaze iminsi itanu nganira na Mobutu.
I Kinshasa nabonye n’ishuri abantu bajyaga baza kwigiramo ukuntu bazakora Coup d’état.
Avuga ko Sebatware ari umwe mu bari mu gatsiko kahiritse Kayibanda kuko ngo hari n’abantu yingingiye kujya muri ako gatsiko kagombaga kuvana Perezida ku butegetsi.
Umunsi Kayibanda yahiritsweho, niwo munsi hagombaga kuba kongere rusange y’ishyaka rye MDR Parmehutu, aho byari biteganyijwe ko gutora uzarihagararira mu matora ya Perezida yari kuba muri Nzeri.
Byari bimaze iminsi bihwihwiswa ko Kayibanda ashaka kuguma ku butegetsi dore ko yari yamaze guhindura Itegeko Nshinga, akavanamo ingingo zimubuza kwiyamamaza inshuro ashaka.
Nyuma yo gusuzugurirwa i Nyamirambo, Twagiramungu avuga ko Kayibanda yahise yivanamo ibyo kuguma ku butegetsi ku buryo yari yateguye kubwira kongere y’ishyaka ko agiye kwegura.
Ati “Ntabwo Perezida Kayibanda yigeze ashaka kuguma ku buperezida bumaze kumutezaho amahane kuva kuri iyo tariki.
Ntimwanatumye na kongere iba ngo yegure.
N’amazina y’abantu bagombaga kumusimbura yari ayafite agomba kuyatanga muri kongere.
“Tariki 5 nibwo kongere yanyu y’ishyaka yagombaga guterana, wenda mwari kurangiza izo mvururu na Perezida Kayibanda mukamuvanaho bibaye ngombwa.
Twagiramungu asanga Sebatware na Habyarimana aribo nyirabayazana ba coup d’état yakorewe Kayibanda, kuko iyo babishaka ntiyari kuba.
Yakomeje agira ati “Perezida ni wowe washoboraga kumurengera, iyo ubwira Habyarimana uti nta Coup d’état mbona ikenewe, ntabyo yari gukora.
Iyo mushaka ko itaba ntiyari kuba ariko mwarabyifuje yarabaye kandi yatugejeje ku marorerwa.
Sebatware ahakana kugira uruhare mu ihirikwa rya Kayibanda, akavuga ko umugambi wo kumuvana ku butegetsi ntawo yamenye.
Yemeza ko imvururu zibasiye abatutsi mu mashuri no mu kazi ka Leta yagiye aziganiraho n’abo bireba ndetse ngo hari nubwo yatumije inama y’abaperefe igamije kuzihosha ngo zitagera mu baturage.
Kayibanda amaze guhirikwa ku butegetsi yatawe muri yombi, ajya gufungirwa i Rwerere mu Ruhengeri, acunzwe n’abasirikare 15.
Nta burenganzira yari afite bwo gusurwa cyangwa gukora icyo ashatse.
Yaje gupfa tariki 15 Ukuboza mu 1976 azize indwara itaramenyekana.
Bivugwa ko ashobora kuba yararozwe cyangwa agahotorwa.

Uko Sheikh Harerimana yahatanye na Perezida Kagame, gutenguhwa na Local Defense n’ibindi

Sheikh Abdul Karim Harerimana ni umugabo w’imyaka 64, akaba inararibonye muri Politiki y’u Rwanda dore ko ayizi neza kuva mu myaka ya 1973 ubwo yari asoje ayisumbuye, kugeza mu 1989 aruvamo no mu 1994 arugarukamo ari kumwe na FPR Inkotanyi yahagaritse Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.

Sheikh Abdul Karim Harerimana ni umugabo w’imyaka 64, akaba inararibonye muri Politiki y’u Rwanda dore ko ayizi neza kuva mu myaka ya 1973 ubwo yari asoje ayisumbuye, kugeza mu 1989 aruvamo no mu 1994 arugarukamo ari kumwe na FPR Inkotanyi yahagaritse Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Ni inzobere mu buvanganzo bw’ururimi rw’Icyarabu dore ko abifitemo impamyabumenyi y’icyiciro cya gatatu cya Kaminuza yakuye muri Arabie Saoudite.

Ubwo yari asoje amasomo muri Arabie Saoudite, yagarutse mu Rwanda mu 1983, agirwa Imam wa Kigali ndetse n’Umuyobozi w’ishuri Institut Islamique Al Hidaayat, ikigo gitanga ubumenyi butegura abazaba abavugabutumwa b’idini ya Islam.
Mu 1989 yagiye muri Uganda nk’umwarimu muri Islamic University ari naho yinjiriye mu muryango FPR Inkotanyi akibereye umunyamuryango magingo aya.

Nyuma y’urugamba rwo kubohora igihugu, Sheikh Abdul Karim Harerimana yabaye Perefe wa Cyangugu, aba Minisitiri w’abakozi ba Leta, aba Minisitiri w’umutekano n’umujyanama wa Perezida, umudepite uhagarariye u Rwanda mu Nteko Ishinga Amategeko y’Umuryango wa Afurika y’Iburasirazuba (EALA) n’ibindi.

Yagiranye ikiganiro kirambuye na IGIHE, asobanura byinshi mu bibazo u Rwanda rwagiye runyuramo nyuma ya Jenoside, avuga ku bunararibonye bwe muri politiki nk’uburyo yiyamamaje ahanganye na Perezida Kagame ku buyobozi bw’Umuryango FPR Inkotanyi, uko yeguye muri EALA, ahazaza ha EAC n’ibindi.
‘Local Defense Forces bibonye ukundi’
Abakuru barabyibuka; Abagabo b’imyenda y’umutuku werurutse, mu bice by’icyaro hari ababitaga uruyumba kubera imyenda n’ingofero bambaraga zasaga n’ibishyimbo byitwa gutyo.
Abo ni bamwe mu bari bagize urwego rushinzwe umutekano mu baturage ‘Local Defense Forces, LDF) rwagiyeho gato nyuma ya Jenoside, rugaseswa rukongera gusubizwaho mu myaka ya 1997/1998.
Urwo rwego rusubiraho Sheikh Harerimana yari Minisitiri w’Umutekano mu gihugu.
Rwari rugamije gufasha abaturage kwicungira umutekano, rugahabwa imyitozo y’amezi agera kuri atatu, rukoherezwa iwabo mu giturage gucunga umutekano.
Mu mabwiriza, itsinda ry’abagize LDF hari ubwo ryahabwaga imbunda zo gucunga umutekano ku mugoroba, bwacya zigasubizwa kuri sitasiyo ya Polisi ibegereye.
Sheikh Harerimana yavuze ko urwo rwego rwabatengushye, kuko intego zarwo zahindanyijwe n’imyitwarire mibi ya bamwe, bagiraga uruhare mu guhungabanya umutekano w’abo bashinzwe kurinda.

Mu myaka ya 2000 hari nk’aho abo basore bashinjwa kuba barishe barashe abagore batatu b’abacuruzi muri Byumba, muri iyo Perefegitura ahitwa Kivuye nanone mu kabari harasirwa abantu batanu bikozwe n’abagize Local Defense Forces n’ibindi.
Harerimana yagize ati “Abaturage nibo bicaraga bakavuga bati uriya mwana n’uriya nibo dushaka ko bajya muri Local Defense y’aha iwacu.

Tuza kugira ibyago imyumvire ntiyaba myiza , abo basore n’abahungu bagombaga no gutanga raporo kuri Polisi ibegereye, hari ubwo bahabwaga n’intwaro nimugoroba zo kurinda agace batuyemo mu gitondo zigasubira kuri polisi, hari aho bitwaye nabi, bakumva ko babaye igitangaza.
Abagize Local Defense bamwe bishoboye mu byaha nk’ubujura, gufata abagore n’abakobwa ku ngufu n’ibindi.
Bamwe mu bafatwaga barirukanwaga cyangwa bagahanwa ariko isura yabo iza gukomeza guhindana ku buryo bari basigaye bafatwa ukundi n’abaturage bashinzwe kurinda.
Sheikh Harerimana ati “ Uzi ko umuturage yanamubwiraga ngo kuki witwara uko, ati se ni wowe wampaye uyu mwenda?
Bibonye ukundi kutari ko, bitari muri gahunda za Leta.
Nicyo gituma akenshi bagendaga bakurwamo, bagahindurwa, bigeze basanga ahari muri sisiteme ibashyiraho hashobora kuba harimo ibibazo, haza gufatwa icyemezo ko basimbuzwa.
Mu byo akeka ko byateraga abo basore kwitwara nabi, Sheikh Harerimana avugamo kuba batarahembwaga kuko bakoraga nk’abakorerabushake.
Local Defense Forces yasimbuwe na DASSO mu 2013, hajyamo abasore n’inkumi bize kandi batojwe neza ndetse banagenerwa umushara ku kwezi.
Nubwo DASSO nayo atari shyashya mu baturage, Sheikh Harerimana abona ko akazi kabo gakorwa neza n’ukoze amakosa akayakora ku giti cye kandi akabibazwa.
Yahatanye na Perezida Kagame ku kuyobora FPR Inkotanyi
Mu 2013, mu matora y’abayobozi b’Umuryango FPR Inkotanyi , Sheikh Abdul Karim Harerimana yiyamamaje ahatanye na Perezida Paul Kagame ku buyobozi bukuru bw’uwo muryango.
Mu majwi yabaruwe, Sheikh yagize amajwi 0.
5 %, atsindwa na Perezida Kagame wagize amajwi 99.
Hari abavuze ko yiyamamaje yikinira kugira ngo Perezida Kagame atiyamamaza wenyine, ariko Sheikh arabihakana.
Uyu musaza uganira kandi agashyenga yagize ati “Ko nabishakaga da! Ntabwo kwari ukwerekana ko hari demokarasi gusa , oya narabishakaga.
Nashakaga kuyobora umuryango ariko ngira amahirwe make ndatsindwa kandi ntsindwa nabi cyane.
Yongeyeho ati “Burya iyo utsinzwe ukanabyemera ntako bisa, n’aho narabyemeye.
Bamaze gutangaza amajwi, umanza narabonye nk’arindwi cyangwa umunani ku bihumbi, kandi naje no kumenya nyuma ko n’ijwi rye yari yarimpaye.
Mu 2015, Sheikh Harerimana yeguye ku mwanya wo guhagararira u Rwanda mu Nteko ya EALA, ku mpamvu yise ize bwite.
Yabwiye IGIHE ko nta kindi cyari cyibyihishe inyuma uretse kuba inshingano yari yarahawe n’umuryango FPR Inkotanyi zari zirangiye.
Ati “Njye ndi umunyamuryango wa FPR Inkotanyi uyemera, aho ndi hose mba ndi mu butumwa bwa FPR Inkotanyi.
Aho mba nagiye nk’aho muri EALA nari ndi intumwa ya FPR Inkotanyi.
Ubutumwa rero nari ndimo bwari burangiye ndagaruka, ubu ndi mu bundi butumwa na none kandi ndi kubukora neza n’ibyishimo byinshi.

Nk’umuntu wabaye igihe kinini mu nteko ya EALA y’Umuryango wa Afurika y’Iburasirazuba, yabajijwe no ku hazaza h’uyu muryango wugarijwe n’ibibazo kuri ubu byo kurebana ay’ingwe hagati y’ibihugu bimwe biwugize, no kugenda gahoro kw’imishinga ihuriweho igamije kuwuteza imbere.

Sheikh Harerimana asanga ahanini ikidindiza uyu muryango ari ubwigenge bwa buri gihugu ku myanzuro imwe n’imwe ifite inyungu rusange, ku buryo hagomba kubaho ubwumvikane busesuye buri gihugu kikabanza kubyumva aho gutora ngo byose bigendere ku byo benshi bemeje.
Nubwo harimo ibyo bibazo n’iby’amikoro adahagije, Sheikh Harerimana yizera ko ibihugu bigize EAC bizagera ku ntego byihaye.

Ati “Aho twari tugeze hari hakwiriye kongeramo imbaraga kugira ngo ibintu byihute tuzagere kuri ya ntego imwe yo kugira igihugu kimwe […] Icyakora EAC nkurikije uko yatangiye, aho igeze n’ubushake buhari iracyariho kandi izahoraho na ziriya ntego izazigeraho.
Uyu mugabo w’abana batanu yagiriye inama urubyiruko rw’u Rwanda, gukomereza ku byiza igihugu cyagezeho birinda kwirara.
Ati “Ntabwo byaturutse mu iraha ryinshi cyane, ntabwo byaturutse mu mudendezo, wasasiwe amaraso y’abanyarwanda, hari abawitangiye.
Ntitubifate nk’ibintu byoroshye.
Kuri ubu Sheikh Harerimana ni umwe mu bagize Urwego Ngishwanama rw’Inararibonye, akaba na Komiseri mu muryango FPR Inkotanyi.
Inkuru bifitanye isano: Abacengezi, ubujura mu basirikare.

Nishimiye ko yorohewe akanakomeza inshingano ze.
Yakomeje agira ati “Mu muco w’abanyafurika, inshuti dusurana mu bihe byiza no mu bibi.
Perezida Kagame yavuze ko Gabon, by’umwihariko Perezida Bongo yagiye agira uruhare runini mu gushyigikira intego zigamije guteza imbere Afurika.

Mu kwezi gutaha nibwo byitezwe ko muri Afurika hazatangizwa ishyirwa mu bikorwa ry’amasezerano ashyiraho isoko rusange rya Afurika.

Ibihugu 22 bisabwa kuyemeza burundu ngo ashyirwe mu bikorwa byarabonetse ndetse biteganyijwe ko mu kwezi gutaha azatangizwa ku mugaragaro.
Agaruka kuri ayo masezerano, Perezida Kagame yabwiye abanyamakuru ko ibihugu byose bya Afurika bizi akamaro kayo ku buryo n’ibitarayasinya bizabikora.

Ati “N’ibihugu bitarayemeza burundu si uko bitabona inyungu cyangwa ngo bibone ko ari ngombwa ahubwo biracyafite ingorane mu bijyanye n’amategeko n’ibindi bya tekiniki bagomba kubanza gukemura mbere yo kuyashyira mu bikorwa.
Yagarutse kandi ku muti watuma amakimbirane ahora agaragara hirya no hino muri Afurika acika, avuga ko bisaba ubufatanye bw’ibihugu bigize uwo mugabane.
