Zinedine Zidane yasabye Real Madrid gufata imikino isigaye ya shampiyona nk’Igikombe cy’Isi

Umutoza wa Real Madrid, Zinedine Zidane, ashaka ko Real Madrid ifata imikino 11 isigaye muri shampiyona y’icyiciro cya mbere muri Espagne ‘La Liga’ nk’Igikombe cy’Isi kugira ngo ibashe kwigobotora FC Barcelone, yegukane igikombe cya kabiri cya shampiyona mu myaka umunani.

Umutoza wa Real Madrid, Zinedine Zidane, ashaka ko Real Madrid ifata imikino 11 isigaye muri shampiyona y’icyiciro cya mbere muri Espagne ‘La Liga’ nk’Igikombe cy’Isi kugira ngo ibashe kwigobotora FC Barcelone, yegukane igikombe cya kabiri cya shampiyona mu myaka umunani.
Real Madrid irarushwa amanota atanu na FC Barcelone yaraye itsinze Real Mallorca ibitego 4-0 ubwo hafungurwaga La Liga nyuma y’amezi atatu ihagaritswe kubera icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Ikipe y’umutoza Zinedine Zidane ifitanye umukino na Eibar kuri iki Cyumweru, aho ikinira ku kibuga gishya cy’imyitozo cya Stade Alfredo di Stefano.

Biteganyijwe ko La Liga izasozwa tariki ya 19 Nyakanga, bivuze ko imikino yose isigaye izaba iba buri munsi mu gihe amakipe azajya akina byibuze umukino mu minsi itatu mu gihe cy’ibyumweru bitanu n’igice.
Abajijwe niba abibona nk’Igikombe cy’Isi gitangiye, Zidane yagize ati “Nishimiye iryo gereranya.
Niko mbibona.
Abakinnyi banjye bazi icyo gukina imikino ya nyuma y’Igikombe cy’Isi cyangwa Igikombe cy’Uburayi bivuze.
“Icy’ingenzi ni ukwitegura kandi ndatekereza ko twiteguye neza, neza cyane.
Umukino wacu wa mbere uratangira ejo [uyu munsi] kandi tuzatanga buri kimwe.
Mfite icyizere ko ibyo twakoze hamwe n’abakinnyi aribyo tugomba kugaragaza mu kibuga.

Imikino ya La Liga iri gukinirwa mu muhezo kubera icyorezo cya Coronavirus nubwo umuyobozi w’iyi shampiyona, Javier Tebas, yavuze ko stade zemerewe kwakira abantu bari hagati ya 10 na 15% mbere y’uko uyu mwaka w’imikino urangira.
Zidane yakomeje agira ati “Ntabwo nkunda gukina nta bafana, icyo ni igitekerezo cyanjye.
Ariko ngomba kugerageza kubimenyera.
Ni uko ibihe turimo bimeze.
Hari guverinoma n’abaturage bakora akazi kabo, natwe tugomba gukora akacu.
Real Madrid irakinira kuri Stade Alfredo di Stefano mu gihe Santiago Bernabeu igomba kuvugururwa muri iyi mpeshyi.
Abafana bakirwa n’iyi stade ni 6000, bivuze ko abakwemererwa kureba uyu mukino baba ari bake cyane mu gihe byaba byemewe.
Ati “Abakinnyi banjye baba bashaka gukinira imbere y’abafana babashyigikiye, ariko ubu siko bimeze.
Ariko ababishinzwe nibavuga ko bishoboka, tuzareba.
Nahoze ndi umukinnyi, nakwifuza gukinira ahari abafana.
Gusa urwo si urwitwazo, tuzakina neza.
Eden Hazard yashyizwe mu bakinnyi Real Madrid yifashisha ihura na Eibar kuri uyu mugoroba nyuma y’uko yari yaravunitse ubwo shampiyona yasubikwagwa.
Marco Asensio na we yamaze gukira mu gihe Zidane yemeje ko Luka Jović na Lucas Vazquez badahari.
Bushali agiye gushyira hanze album nshya yakomoye ku nkuru ya Nebukadinezali wo muri Bibiliya

Umuraperi Hagenimana Jean Paul mu muziki uzwi nka Bushali The Trigger, agiye gushyira hanze album ye nshya yise ‘!b!he B!7’ ishushanya ubuzima bwo ku Isi y’iki gihe n’ubuzima Nebukadinezali uvugwa muri Bibiliya wahuye n’ibigeragezo birindwi bitewe no kwiremereza ku Mana.

Umuraperi Hagenimana Jean Paul mu muziki uzwi nka Bushali The Trigger, agiye gushyira hanze album ye nshya yise ‘!b!he B!7’ ishushanya ubuzima bwo ku Isi y’iki gihe n’ubuzima Nebukadinezali uvugwa muri Bibiliya wahuye n’ibigeragezo birindwi bitewe no kwiremereza ku Mana.
Iyi album ya Bushali izagaragaraho abandi bahanzi batandukanye bo mu Rwanda ndetse n’abo hanze nka Magnom uri no mu bayikozeho ndetse n’itsinda rya Daara J Family ryo muri Sénégal.
Izajya hanze ku wa 26 Kamena 2020, ariko indirimbo ziyigiye zizajya zisohoka imwe ku yindi mbere y’icyo gihe.
‘!b!he B!7’ yakozweho n’aba-Producers batandukanye nka Kenny Pro beats, The Major wo muri Symphony Band, $cott, Pacento, Holy Beat Murda, Faada Freddy ( wo muri Sénégal), Magnom wo muri Ghana na Dr.
Nganji usanzwe atunganya ibihangano byo muri Green Ferry Music.
Iriho indirimbo 15.
Bushali yabwiye IGIHE ko yatekereje gukora iyi album agendeye ku buzima yanyuzemo mu minsi ishize ariko atekereza n’ubundi buzima bwa buri munsi abantu banyuramo.
Ati “Mvuga ku buzima bwa buri munsi kandi tuzi twese ibyo naciyemo yaba ibyiza cyangwa ibibi.
Aho iyi album itandukaniye n’izindi urebye harimo gukura nk’umuhanzi udatekereza u Rwanda gusa, ahubwo wakora umuziki ku rwego mpuzamahanga.
“Izina ryayo narikuye mu nkuru yo muri Bibiliya ivuga ku mwami witwaga Nebukadinezali wahuye n’ibigeragezo birindwi bitewe no kwiremereza ku Mana.
Ugomba gutuza ukikorera ibyawe ukubaha n’iby’abandi, ni by’Isi byose.
Urebye n’ibintu maze iminsi nyuramo, mba nibwira kandi nkanabwira undi wese kwishakamo igisubizo agakomeza ubuzima.
Iyi album ije ikurikira iyo yashyize hanze mu 2019 yitwa ‘Ku Gasima’ igaragaza ubuzima buri wese ashobora kubamo butari bwiza mbere y’uko agira amafaranga.
Iyi album y’uyu musore iriho indirimbo 12 zirimo iyitwa ‘Kinyatrap’, ‘Sindi Mubi’, ‘Zunguzayi’, ‘Ipafu’, ‘Kinyarock’, ‘Mamayiwe’, ‘Kugasima’, ‘Inganjyi’, ‘Ayura’, ‘Bitinze’, ‘Impanda’ na ‘Niyibizi’.
‘Ku gasima’ ni album ye ya kabiri yaje nyuma y’iya mbere yagiye hanze muri Gashyantare mu 2018 yise ‘Nyiramubande’.
Bushali yatangiye umuziki mu mpera za 2013.
Uyu musore ni umuhanga mu gushushanya ndetse mu mabyiruka ye yatangazaga benshi, uretse ibyo yanabaye umuririmbyi mu korali muri ADEPR ariko aza kubivamo akomereza umuziki muri Hip Hop.
Ku ikubitiro, Bushali indirimbo ya mbere kuri iyi album ni iyitwa ‘Bwoba’.
Beyoncé agiye gushimirwa by’ikirenga muri BET Awards

Abategura BET Awards kuri uyu wa Kane tariki 25 Kamena 2020, batangaje ko umuhanzikazi Beyoncé washinze umuryango yise BeyGOOD ufasha abantu batandukanye ukanasabira ubutabera abarenganyijwe, azashimirwa mu buryo bwihariye mu itangwa ry’ibi bihembo, kuri uyu wa Mbere tariki 28 Kamena.

Abategura BET Awards kuri uyu wa Kane tariki 25 Kamena 2020, batangaje ko umuhanzikazi Beyoncé washinze umuryango yise BeyGOOD ufasha abantu batandukanye ukanasabira ubutabera abarenganyijwe, azashimirwa mu buryo bwihariye mu itangwa ry’ibi bihembo, kuri uyu wa Mbere tariki 28 Kamena.

Hazaba umwanya wo kwibuka Kobe Bryant wamamaye muri Basketball uherutse gupfira mu mpanuka y’indege, bizakorwa na Lil Wayne mu gihe Little Richard wamamaye mu muziki wa Rock azunamirwa mu gikorwa kizayoborwa na Wayne Brady.
Gushimira by’umwihariko ibyamamare bikora ibikorwa byo gufasha, byatangijwe muri BET Awards mu 2002, mu rwego rwo guha icyubahiro ibyamamare bitanga umwanya wabyo n’amafaranga ku bababaye.
Kugeza ubu abamaze guhabwa ibi bihembo barimo Muhammad Ali, Earvin "Magic" Johnson, Danny Glover, Denzel Washington n’abandi.
Gutanga ibi bihembo uyu mwaka bizayoborwa n’umunyarwenya Amanda Seales.
Mu gihe abahanzi nka Alicia Keys, Roddy Ricch, Chloe X Halle, DaBaby, Black Thought, Jay Rock n’abandi bazaririmba.
Ni ibirori bigiye kuba ku nshuro ya 20 bizaba bimaze bitangwa ndetse hazaba hizihizwa isabukuru y’imyaka 40 Black Entertainment Television ibitegura imaze itangiye gukora.

Mu bari guhatanira ibi bihembo batangajwe ku wa 15 Kamena 2020, Drake niwe uri imbere mu kujya mu byiciro byinshi kuko arimo inshuro esheshatu mu gihe akurikirwa na Megan Thee Stallion na Roddy Ricch bose barimo inshuro eshanu.
Beyoncé, Nicki Minaj, Brown, Lizzo na DaBaby bari guhatana mu byiciro bine buri wese.

Mu bihembo by’abanyamahanga harimo abahanzi bo muri Afurika aho mu cyiciro cy’umuhanzi mwiza utari uwo muri Amerika, ‘Best International Act’ harimo Burna Boy wo muri Nigeria, Innoss’B wo muri RDC, Sho Madjozi wo muri Afurika y’Epfo, Dave na Stormzy bo mu Bwongereza ndetse na Ninho na S.
Pri Noir bo mu Bufaransa.

Mu cyiciro cy’abahanzi bashya b’abanyamahanga [Viewer’s Choice: Best New International Act] harimo Rema wo muri Nigeria; uyu indirimbo ye yitwa ‘Iron Man’ yagaragaye ku rutonde rw’izo Barack Obama wayoboye Amerika yakunze mu 2019.
Muri iki cyiciro hariho kandi Sha Sha wo muri Zimbabwe, Celeste na Young T & Bugsey bo mu Bwongereza, Hatik na Stacy bo mu Bufaransa.

Bitandukanye n’indi myaka ishize ibi bihembo bimaze bitangwa, uyu mwaka hariho umwihariko w’uko hatazakorwa igitaramo gishobora kwitabirwa n’abantu ahubwo byose bizakurikiranwa hifashishijwe BET tv, BET Her na CBS ndetse n’imbuga nkoranyambaga kubera icyorezo cya COVID-19.
Israel Mbonyi agiye gutaramana n’abakunzi be mu gitaramo kizaca kuri Youtube
Umuhanzi uzwi cyane mu ndirimbo zo kuramya no guhimbaza Imana uri mu bagezweho muri iki gihe, Israel Mbonyi agiye gukora igitaramo kizatambuka kuri Youtube.
Umuhanzi uzwi cyane mu ndirimbo zo kuramya no guhimbaza Imana uri mu bagezweho muri iki gihe, Israel Mbonyi agiye gukora igitaramo kizatambuka kuri Youtube.
Iki gitaramo kizaba tariki 20 Kamena 2020 guhera saa kumi n’ebyiri z’umugoroba kikazatambuka kuri shene ya Youtube yitwa MK1 TV muri iyi minsi isigaye ikunda gutambutsa ibitaramo by’abahanzi.
Israel Mbonyi agiye kugikora nyuma yuko mu ntangiriro za Gashyantare 2020 yataramiye bikomeye abanyeshuri bo muri Kaminuza y’u Rwanda i Huye.

Iki gitaramo kigiye kubera kuri Internet kiri muri gahunda abashoramari batandukanye bihaye zo gususurutsa abanyarwanda muri ibi bihe Covid-19 yakamejeje ku Isi yose igahagarika ibitaramo byinshi ndetse mu bihugu bitandukanye.

Israel Mbonyi agiye gukora iki gitaramo nyuma y’ibyabanje by’abahanzi banyuranye nka; Tom Close, The Ben, Tuff Gangz, Igor Mabano n’abandi banyuze kuri iyi shene ya Youtube kimwe n’abandi benshi bagiye bakora ibitaramo ku yandi mashene ya Youtube.
Uyu muhanzi muri ibi bihe azwi cyane mu ndirimbo nka; Ibihe, Number one, Hari impamvu, Hari ubuzima, n’izindi nyinshi zatumye uyu muhanzi ari mu bakunzwe cyane mu Rwanda.
Iki gitaramo gitangajwe mu gihe mu minsi iri imbere hitezwe ibindi bizanamara igihe bya Iwacu Muzika Festival bitegurwa na EAP.
Babaho mu munyenga w’urukundo bakanafatanya umurimo w’Imana: Couple z’abaramyi ziririmbana zimaze kwamamara
Kuva mu mwaka ushize, amatsinda atandukanye mu muziki wo kuramya Imana yatangiye kunguka imbaraga ziganjemo iz’ama-Couple, yashyize hanze ibihangano byakunzwe na benshi.
Kuva mu mwaka ushize, amatsinda atandukanye mu muziki wo kuramya Imana yatangiye kunguka imbaraga ziganjemo iz’ama-Couple, yashyize hanze ibihangano byakunzwe na benshi.
N’ubwo hari abari basanzwe baririmbana abenshi babikoraga gake nabwo nko mu nsengero ariko ntibabishyiremo imbaraga ngo babe batangira gushyira hanze ibihangano.
Byaje guhinduka, ku buryo uyu munsi hari benshi bari gukorana nk’itsinda mu muziki ariko na none babana nk’umugabo n’umugore.
IGIHE yakusanyije Couple zitandukanye zimaze kwamamara mu muziki wo kuramya Imana ukwiye gutega amatwi uburyohe bw’ibihangano bwazo.
James & Daniella
James Rugarama na Daniella Mukiza ni imwe muri Couple zimaze gushinga imizi mu muziki wo kuramya Imana.
Yamamaye mu ndirimbo zirimo ‘Mpa Amavuta’, ‘Nkoresha’ n’izindi.
Baherutse no kumurika album yabo ya mbere.
Iyi couple ifitanye abana babiri, ni imwe mu yakoze umuziki ukabasha kugera ku kigero nk’icyo uyu munsi bariho.
Bavuga ko kuba indirimbo zabo zamamaye cyane mu buryo bwihuse ari ubushake bw’Imana ndetse n’amasengesho yabo adasiba.
Daniella avuga ko urukundo rwabo rwatangiye gututumba mu 2008 na 2009, mu 2012 bajya kwiga muri Uganda, umugabo yiga iby’ububanyi n’amahanga mu gihe umugore icyo gihe yigaga ibaruramari.
Mu 2015 nibwo barushinze.
James avuga ko ajya guhitamo Daniella ikintu yamukundiye ari uko yari umukobwa w’umutima kandi ukunda Imana cyane.
Ati “Twari inshuti cyane ntabwo navuga ko namukundiye iki ariko yari umukobwa ukunda Imana, kandi burya hari n’ukuntu uhuza n’umuntu.
Natwe twarahuye biba mahwi.
Byahereye cyane ko yakundaga Imana ari umuririmbyi mwiza ugasanga duhuza ibintu byose.
Daniella we yemeza ko umugabo ari umuntu w’inyangamugayo mu buryo bukomeye ku buryo ari ikintu ashimira Imana, ikindi akaba ari umuntu uvuga biri ngombwa.
Yemeza ko kumusaba ko bakundana bitamugoye cyane ko akenshi babaga bari kumwe cyane ndetse babitsanya amabanga.
Ubu bafite abana babiri umuhungu n’umukobwa.
Kuba ari couple ikora umurimo w’Imana wo kuririmba, bavuga ko ari ikintu kibafasha kuko kuba bafite icyerekezo kimwe ari ikintu gihambaye ama-couple yose yakabaye yitaho cyane.
Daniella we avuga ko umuryango ukorera Imana hamwe ntaho uba uhuriye na wundi usanga buri umwe aba muri ibi undi mu bindi.
Papi Clever & Dorcas
Iyi Couple nayo imaze kwamamara cyane mu muziki wo kuramya Imana wiganjemo uw’indirimbo zo mu gitabo.
Bazwi mu cyo bise ‘Morning Worship’ aho baririmba ibihangano bitandukanye byo mu gitabo bigafasha benshi.
Papi Clever yasezeranye imbere y’Imana na Ingabire ku = wa Gatandatu tariki ya 7 Ukuboza 2019 muri Dove Hotel ku Gisozi.
Ubukwe bw’aba bombi bwabaye nyuma y’icyumweru Papi Clever asabye akanakwa Ingabire mu birori byabereye mu Karere ka Musanze ku wa 30 Ugushyingo 2019.
Kuri uwo munsi banasezeranye byemewe n’amategeko y’u Rwanda mu muhango wabereye mu Murenge wa Muhoza.
Isezerano ryo kubana byemewe n’Itorero rya ADEPR babarizwamo ryaheshejwe umugisha na Pasiteri Ndayizeye Isaïe, ubarizwa muri Ntora English Church Service aho Papi Clever asengera.
Manzi & Eunice
Manzi Nelson n’umugore we Irakiza Eunice basanzwe ari abaririmbyi, batangiye kuririmbana nk’umugabo n’umugore (Manzi & Eunice) ndetse kuri ubu bamaze kuririmbana indirimbo eshatu.
Manzi & Eunice bambikanye impeta mu 2017.
Ubu bafitanye umwana umwe bise Iriza Tona Manzi.
Bombi ni abaririmbyi bakomeye banabarizwa mu makorali afite izina rikomeye mu Rwanda.

Manzi Nelson aririmba muri Ambassadors of Christ choir ndetse ari no mu bayobozi bayo naho umugore we Irakiza Eunice ni umwe mu baririmbyi b’imena muri Epee du Salut choir yavukiye i Gitwe gusa kuri ubu ibarizwa kuri Kigali SDA Bilingual church.
Manzi & Eunice bavuga ko kuririmbana ari babiri babitewe n’uko babikunda ndetse bakaba babisanzwemo nk’abantu babiri b’abaririmbyi babana.
Ben na Chance
Aba bazwi cyane mu ndirimbo zirimo ‘Amarira ya Yohana’, ‘Yesu Arakora’ n’izindi.
Uyu muryango usanzwe uri nkingi za mwamba za Alarm Ministries, bamaze imyaka icyenda bakundana mu gihe bamaze itandatu babana nk’umugabo n’umugore.
Bigeze kubwira Kiss FM ko bafashe umwanzuro wo kuririmbana nyuma yo kubona andi ma-couple abikora bikaba byiza cyane.
Bati “Tumaze kubona abaramyi benshi bubakanye ingo kandi bafasha benshi barimo James na Daniella, Kavutse Olivier na Amanda, Fabrice na Maya Nzeyimana, Ben na Chance n’abandi batandukanye.
Icyo gihe Chance yavuze ko icyatumye yegurira umutima we Ben ari uko yakunze imico ye myiza ndetse akamubonamo impano y’Imana.
Ati “ Icya mbere naramukunze, kandi nkunda imico ye, nkunda uko ateye, mubonamo impano y’Imana, mubonamo ubukirisitu biranyorohera mu buzima kubana na we.
Chance abajijwe icyamugoye ubwo yatangiraga kubana na Ben, yavuze ko ari uburyo umugabo we yamuhaga umwanya muto kurusha gitari, ibintu byaje no gutuma batangira kuririmbana.
Kugeza ubu Ben na Chance bamaze gushyira hanze indirimbo enye mu gihe bamaze batangiye gukorera hamwe umuziki, bakaba bavuga bazakomeza gushyira hanze n’izindi.
Maya na Fabrice
Fabrice Nzeyimana n’umugore we Maya Nzeyimana nabo ni bamwe mu bazwi cyane muri iki gihe nka couple ifite ibihangano bihembura benshi byo kuramya no guhimbaza Imana.
Aba bazwi cyane mu ndirimbo nka ‘Muremyi w’Isi’.
Ni abakirisitu kuri CLA (Christian Life Assembly) i Nyarutarama ndetse Fabrice ni n’umucuranzi ukomeye muri iri torero.

Bakunze gutegura umugoroba wo kuramya ubanziriza inama y’iminsi itatu yiswe ‘Over Flow Africa Conference’ itegurwa n’itsinda rikorera mu bihugu birimo Kenya, Uganda, u Burundi n’u Rwanda Heavenly Melodies Africa (aha habarizwamo Fabrice na Maya) igamije guhuriza hamwe abaramyi batandukanye mu kurushaho kwimakaza ubwami bwo guhimbaza butajegajega.
Amanda Fung na Kavutse Olivier babarizwa muri Beauty for Ashes na Prayer House
Kavutse na Amanda Fung barushinze ku ya 9 Nyakanga 2016.
Ubukwe bw’umuririmbyi Kavutse Olivier na Amanda Fung babarizwa mu Itorero New Life Bible Church, bwabereye ku nkengero z’Ikiyaga cya Kivu mu Mujyi wa Rubavu mu 2016 bwitabiriwe n’abarenga igihumbi.
Kavutse Olivier na Amanda Fung beruye urukundo rwabo mu 2014, muri Gicurasi 2016 basezeranye imbere y’amategeko muri Canada, ku wa 9 Nyakanga 2016 bambikana impeta mu rusengero mu Rwanda.

Bafitanye abana babiri, barimo imfura yabo y’umuhungu bibarutse mu 2018 bahaye izina rya Jireh Reign Shi-Rong Kavutse mu mpera za Mata uyu mwaka baherutse kwibaruka umukobwa bise Jadah Justice Asante Mei-En Kavutse.

Beauty For Ashes, aba bombi babarizwamo yamenyekanye cyane mu ndirimbo ‘Surprise’, ‘Turashima’, ‘Yesu ni we Super Star’, ‘Yesu ni sawa’, ‘Hari ayandi mashimwe’, ‘Ni wowe gusa’ n’izindi ziri mu njyana ya Rock n’umudiho wa Kinyafurika.
Baherutse gutangiza iri tsinda ry’abaramyi n’abanyamasengesho ryitwa ‘Payer House’ ririmo na Kwizera Peace Ndaruhutse wabaye igisonga cya mbere cya Miss Rwanda 2016 n’abandi.
Umunyamahirwe uzahiga abandi mu kubyina indirimbo nshya ya Nsengiyumva François yashyiriweho ibihembo
The Boss Papa ya Alain Muku ireberera inyungu z’umuhanzi Nsengiyumva François yateguye irushanwa ku muntu uzahiga abandi mu kubyina indirimbo y’uyu muhanzi nshya yise ‘Isubireho’.
The Boss Papa ya Alain Muku ireberera inyungu z’umuhanzi Nsengiyumva François yateguye irushanwa ku muntu uzahiga abandi mu kubyina indirimbo y’uyu muhanzi nshya yise ‘Isubireho’.

Ni mu irushanwa ryiswe #IsubirehoChallenge rizabera ku mbuga nkoranyambaga aho abakunzi b’uyu mugabo basabwe kwifata amashusho bakayishyira ku rukuta rwabo bakabimenyesha (tag) instagram ya Nsengiyumva.
Amandine Nzasangamariya ukurikirana abahanzi babarizwa muri The Boss Papa yabwiye IGIHE ko bateguye iri rushanwa mu rwego rwo gufasha abakunzi b’uyu muhanzi mu kuba bakwikenura.
Kuri Instagram abandi basabwe kwifata video babyina nidirimbo Isubireho ya Nsengiyumva François, bagakora tag @nsengiyumva_francois_online na @amandine_250 una hashtag ya #isubirehochallenge.
Ibi byatangiye ku wa 16 Kamena 2020 birangire ku wa 16 Nyakanga 2020.
Video izagira likes na comments byinshi, izahembwa US$ 150.
Mu gihe abo kuri Facebook basabwe gufata link y’indirimbo Isubireho kuri YouTube bakabisangiza inshuti zabo.
Batanu ba mbere bazahembwa Us $30 buri wese.
Isubireho ni indirimbo yagiye hanze kuri uyu wa Gatatu tariki 10 Kamena 2020, irimo ubutumwa bukebura abakobwa cyangwa se abahungu bishora mu ngeso mbi cyane cyane iz’ubusambanyi.
Ishushanya umukobwa uba warananiye iwabo akajya ararana n’abasore mu ma hoteli, kugeza aho bamufashe ku ngufu bakamukoresha imibonano mpuzabitsina barenze umwe.
Mu gitero cyayo cya mbere, Nsengiyumva araririmba ati “Mukamana ubwo aragiye saa munani na nijoro ntatinya ashaka amafaranga.
Kukinyonga ni ijana, kudingisa ni bitanu Mukamana urananiranye ngaho isubireho.
Iyi ndirimbo yayihimbye ashaka gukebura abakobwa bakora umwuga w’uburaya.
Iyi ndirimbo ni iya karindwi mu zo uyu muhanzi amaze gushyira hanze.
Ije ikurikira iyo yamenyekanyemo cyane yitwa ‘Mariya Jeannne’ yanatumye bamwita Igisupusupu, ‘Rwagitima’ n’izindi.
Bitandukanye n’izindi ndirimbo yagiye akora, Nsengiyumva muri iyi ndirimbo nshya agaragara yambaye imikufi itandukanye yanahinduye umweru imisatsi ye.
Nsengiyumva w’imyaka 41 y’amavuko yize gucuranga umuduri mu 1999 ubwo yari afite imyaka 20 mu gihe cy’amezi atanu.
Yize amashuri abanza gusa, ubu afite abana babiri.

Steve Bing wamamaye mu ruganda rwa sinema i Hollywood muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika yapfuye yiyahuye.
Iby’uko uyu mugabo wari ufite imyaka 55 yiyahuye byemejwe n’Ubuyobozi bwa Los Angeles bushinzwe gukurikirana abantu basanzwe bapfuye hagakorwa isuzumwa ku cyateye urupfu rwe.
Bwavuze ko yari yari afite ihungabana ryinshi’ ari naryo ryatumye ahitamo kwiyambura ubuzima.
Uyu mugabo wari usanzwe afitanye umwana w’umuhungu n’umukinnyi wa Filime Elizabeth Hurley, yasanzwe yapfuye ku wa Mbere w’iki Cyumweru.

Muri Hollywood Bing yari azwi cyane kubera filime yagize uruhare mu iyandikwa ryayo mu 2003 ya Kangaroo Jack, kuba yarateye inkunga mu buryo bw’amafaranga filime ya The Polar Express yagiye hanze mu 2004 n’ibindi bikorwa byinshi byatumye aba umwe mu nkingi za mwamba muri Hollywood.
Steve Bing ni we wakoze ‘Shine a Light’, yayobowe na Martin Scorsese ivuga ku itsinda rya Rolling Stones ryamamaye cyane mu Bwongereza.
Hurley babyaranye yanditse kuri Instagram agaragaza ko atewe agahinda n’urupfu rwa Steve Bing.
Yagize ati “Mbabajwe birenze n’uko uwahoze ari umukunzi wanjye Steve Bing atakiri kumwe natwe.
Ni iherezo riteye ubwoba.
Ku myaka 18 Steve Bing yarazwe umutungo wa Miliyoni $600 na sekuru Leo Bing.

Azajya yibukirwa ku kuntu yashyigiye bikomeye Bill Clinton wigeze kuba Perezida wa Amerika, agatanga nibura miliyoni $10 mu muryango we ndetse akanishyura urugendo yigeze kugirira muri Koreya ya Ruguru mu 2009 agiye mu biganiro byo gufunguza abanyamakuru babiri b’Abanyamerika bari bahafungiwe.
Stephen Leo Bing [Steve Bing] yavutse ku wa 31 Werurwe 1965.
Yakundanye n’abagore babiri; Elizabeth Hurley na Lisa Bonder.
Asize abana babiri Damian Hurley na Kira Bonder.

Impeshyi yageze, benshi mu banyamujyi bakunze kurimba batangiye kubika imyambaro bari bamaze iminsi bambara ijyanye n’igihe cy’ubukonje kimwe n’imvura, ari nako batekereza ku myambaro bashobora kwifashisha muri iki gihe cy’ubushyuhe.
Mu nkuru zacu zitandukanye ndetse zizajya zibageraho kenshi tuzajya twifashisha abahanga mu kwambika abantu badufashe mu kurangira abanyarwanda uburyo bakwambara bakaberwa kandi bijyanye n’igihe.
Kuri iyi nshuro twifashishije umuhanga mu kwambika abantu, Ingabire Sylvie, ufite iduka ryambika abakobwa n’abagore ryitwa Diva Shop riherereye mu mujyi wa Kigali mu nyubako ya CHIC.
Ingabire yatweretse imyambaro y’abakobwa n’abagore bifuza kurimba muri ibi bihe by’impeshyi ayishyize mu byiciro bitatu;

Iyi filime izajya isohoka mu buryo bw’uruhererekane kuri Televiziyo y’u Rwanda nk’uko na Seburikoko na City Maid biyicaho.
Yanditswe na Roger Niyoyita ikaba iri gutunganywa na Misago Wilson ariwe wagiye atunganya izindi zamamaye mu Rwanda nka Inshuti (Friends), Seburikoko na Citymaid.
Mu kiganiro na IGIHE, Misago yavuze ko iyi filime ivuga ku buzima bw’abanyeshuri cyane cyane abiga muri kaminuza z’i Kigali.

Yagize ati "Muri make izaba ishingiye ku gitekerezo cy’umusore warangije amashuri yisumbuye akabura akazi, ava mu cyaro agiye gushakisha akazi i Kigali, nyuma yo kwizezwa kwakirwa n’inshuti ye yaje kumutenguha.
Ageze i Kigali yaramubeshye aramubura.
Muri ubwo buzima bukomeye, Muhire yabonye akazi k’izamu kugeza ubwo afashe icyemezo cyo gusubira ku ishuri aza gukabya inzozi ze zo gukora application".
Ngo ni filimi izaba igamije kwigisha ariko nanone hakagaragaramo abakinnyi bashya bafite impano.

Uwineza Clarisse, umunyamakuru uzwi kuri Radiyo Rwanda uherutse kwemeza ko yamaze kwinjira muri sinema, azagaragara muri iyi filime y’uruhererekane “Indoto" izatangira guca kuri televiziyo Rwanda mu minsi mike, akaba ari umwe mu bazwi bazayikinamo.

Umuhanzi w’indirimbo zo kuramya no guhimbaza Imana, akaba umwe mu bafite indirimbo zikundwa n’abatari bake Adrien Misigaro yasohoye inshya yise “Nyibutsa" yakoranye na Miss Dusa, uvukana na Gentil Misigaro.

Umuhanzi w’indirimbo zo kuramya no guhimbaza Imana, akaba umwe mu bafite indirimbo zikundwa n’abatari bake Adrien Misigaro yasohoye inshya yise “Nyibutsa" yakoranye na Miss Dusa, uvukana na Gentil Misigaro.
Benshi bacyumva amazina y’aba bagabo batekerezaga ko bavukana.
Ibi bihabanye n’ukuri gusa bafitanye isano ya hafi kuko aba bombi ari ababyara.
Kuba ari ababyara bivuze ko na mushiki wa Gentil Misigaro ari mubyara wa Adrien Misigaro wasohoye indirimbo nshya yise “Nyibutsa" yakoranye na Miss Dusa akaba mubyara we.

Miss Dusa usanzwe atuye muri Canada ni we muvandimwe wa Gentil Misigaro winjiye mu muziki cyane ko mu minsi ishize yabwiye IGIHE ko abavandimwe be bose bafite urukundo rw’umuziki ndetse bakaba n’abahanga.
Mu ndirimbo za mbere Miss Dusa yumvikanyemo harimo “Nyibutsa" yakoranye na Adrien Misigaro.
Niyo yamutangije urugendo rw’umuziki yinjiyemo afatanyije na mubyara we.
Adrien Misigaro avuga ko ari indirimbo yanditse mu gihe cyatambutse, asaba Imana ngo ijye imwibutsa mu gihe yaba yibagiwe kuyisenga.

Muri iyi ndirimbo bagira bati "Nyigisha kubyuka hakiri kare, mu gitondo izuba ritararasa, nzafatanye n’inyoni mu rukerera kuvuga gukomera kwawe, ibiguruka n’inyamaswa z’ishyamba birahimbaza ndetse nabyo ukabyumva.
Ni kuki se umuntu waremye yakwibagirwa umuremyi wa byose?

Iyi ndirimbo yakozwe na Knoxx beat ukorera muri Monster Record ndetse na Gentil Misigaro, producer ukomeye ariko umaze kumenyekana nk’umuhanzi uri mu bafite izina mu muziki wo kuramya no guhimbaza Imana.

Adrien Misigaro ni umwe mu bahanzi bakomeye mu muziki wo kuramya no guhimbaza Imana bakorera umuziki wabo muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, yamenyekanye cyane mu ndirimbo nka "Ntacyo nzaba" yakoranye na Meddy n’izindi.

Covid-19 yambereye imbogamizi ariko ntizampagarika - Miss Nishimwe Naomie

Amezi arenga ane arashize Nyampinga w’u Rwanda Nishimwe Naomie yambitswe ikamba, ariko nyuma yo gutorwa ibikorwa yari yiyemeje byakomwe mu nkokora n’icyorezo cya Covid-19 cyibasiye Isi, nubwo avuga ko yatangiye kwiga uburyo bwiza bwo kubishyira mu ngiro.

Amezi arenga ane arashize Nyampinga w’u Rwanda Nishimwe Naomie yambitswe ikamba, ariko nyuma yo gutorwa ibikorwa yari yiyemeje byakomwe mu nkokora n’icyorezo cya Covid-19 cyibasiye Isi, nubwo avuga ko yatangiye kwiga uburyo bwiza bwo kubishyira mu ngiro.
Uyu mukobwa kuva atangiye kwiyamamaza kugeza yegukanye ikamba rya Miss Rwanda, umushinga we wari ugufasha abantu barwaye agahinda gakabije, bizwi nka ’depression’.
Yavuze ko ari indwara iri mu banyarwanda ariko badakunze kumenya, ku buryo azagerageza kuyirwanya binyuze mu kugaragaza ko ihari n’uburyo abantu bayirinda.
Nyuma y’uko yambitswe ikamba muri Gashyantare 2020, nyuma y’iminsi mike icyorezo cya Covid-19 cyahise kigera mu Rwanda gikoma mu nkokora umushinga yiyemeje.

Mu kiganiro na IGIHE, Miss Nishimwe yagize ati "Nibyo icyorezo cya Covid-19 cyarambangamiye gusa natangiye gutekereza uko nakomeza umushinga wanjye, ndashaka guhura n’abantu barwayeho depression tukagirana ibiganiro bizatambutswa ku mbuga nkoranyambaga zanjye, mu rwego rwo kubisangiza abantu.

Uyu mukobwa yongeyeho ko ubu ari mu myiteguro ya nyuma yo gutangira ibi biganiro kuko abo bazabigirana benshi yamaze kubabona, ndetse nyuma yo kumva umushinga we hari benshi bahuye na ’dépression’ bakomeje kumwandikira.

Yakomeje ati “Abo tuzaganira ndabafite kuko nyuma y’uko bamenye umushinga wanjye hari abatangiye kunyandikira n’ubu baracyanyandikira, ndashaka gutangira ibiganiro nabo mu minsi iri imbere bakatuganiriza ku rugendo rwabo kuva barwaye kugeza bakize.
Ntekereza ko ubuhamya bwa bamwe buzafasha abandi"
Miss Nishimwe avuga ko mu minsi mike iri imbere azaba atangiye umushinga we ndetse icyo gihe azanaboneraho gutangaza imbuga nkoranyambaga abantu bazaba babonaho ibi biganiro, harimo na Youtube.
Miss Nishimwe Naomie yambitswe ikamba rya Miss Rwanda muri Gashyantare 2020 asimbuye Nimwiza Meghan wambitswe ikamba rya Miss Rwanda 2019.
Umuhanzi wo muri Uganda agiye kujyana Museveni mu nkiko
Umuhanzi wo muri Uganda Big Eye yavuze ko agiye kujyana mu nkiko Perezida Museveni n’ishyaka NRM riri ku butegetsi kubera ideni rya miliyoni 270 z’Amashilingi ya Uganda bamurimo.
Umuhanzi wo muri Uganda Big Eye yavuze ko agiye kujyana mu nkiko Perezida Museveni n’ishyaka NRM riri ku butegetsi kubera ideni rya miliyoni 270 z’Amashilingi ya Uganda bamurimo.

Ikinyamakuru Sqoop cyandika imyidagaduro muri iki gihugu cyatangaje ko Big Eye avuga ko afite umugambi wo kurega Perezida wa Uganda kubera uburyo yanze kumwishyura nyuma yo kumufasha ubwo yiyamamarizaga kuba Perezida wa Uganda mu 2011.

Uyu muhanzi ubusanzwe witwa Ibrahim Mayanja, yavuze ko ibaruwa igaragaza ko agiye kurega, yandikiwe Perezida cyane cyane ko ari we muyobozi w’ishyaka riri ku butegetsi rya National Resistance Movement (NRM) ryari ryamuhaye akazi.
Yagize ati “Ndasaba Perezida Yoweri Kaguta Museveni, umuyobozi wa NRM.
Nakoreye Perezida mu 2011 ubwo yahataniraga uyu mwanya.
Nari umwe mu bantu bamwamamarije nkajya ndirimba ahantu hatandukanye yagiye kwiyamamariza ariko sinigeze nishyurwa.

Uyu muhanzi uzwi mu ndirimbo yitwa ‘Mango Juice’ avuga ko ishyaka rya NRM na Museveni bamurimo miliyoni 270 z’amashilingi kandi ko afite ibimenyetso byose byerekana ko yatanze serivisi ariko atigeze ahembwa.
Yavuze ko ahaye Museveni n’ishyaka rye iminsi 14, yaba atishyuwe akagana inkiko ngo arenganurwe.

Ibi bije nyuma y’aho ku wa kabiri, Kapiteni w’Ikipe y’Igihugu y’Umupira w’Amaguru ya Uganda, Denis Onyango, na we yavuze ko we na bagenzi be bifuza gusobanurirwa ibijyanye n’inkunga y’amafaranga agera kuri miliyoni $1 bemerewe na Perezida Yoweri Museveni nyuma y’uko bitabiriye Igikombe cya Afurika cya 2019 cyabereye mu Misiri.

Ngarukiye Daniel umenyerewe mu muziki gakondo akirigita inanga, yashyize hanze indirimbo nshya yise ‘Umwali w’ i Rwanda’, irimo ubutumwa bugaragaza umwihariko w’Abanyarwandakazi.
Ngarukiye Daniel umenyerewe mu muziki gakondo akirigita inanga, yashyize hanze indirimbo nshya yise ‘Umwali w’ i Rwanda’, irimo ubutumwa bugaragaza umwihariko w’Abanyarwandakazi.
Mu gitero cya mbere cy’iyi ndirimbo aragira ati “Ikizakubwira Umwali w’i Rwanda arangwa n’umutuzo kandi no mu buhanga arahanga ntahangarwa.
Iyo aserukiye u Rwanda iyo mu mahanga abahiga ubuhanga kuko no mu buranga abahiga bose, kuko ari uwo kwa Gihanga Ngoma 100.
Yabwiye IGIHE ko yatekereje gukora iyi ndirimbo agendeye ku myitwarire y’Abanyarwandakazi ituma bahesha ishema igihugu cyabo.
Avuga ko yari amaze kubona uburyo abakobwa b’ahandi bitwara mu buryo buteye inkeke, ashaka kwerekana uko Abanyarwandakazi bitwararika bidasanzwe.
Ati “Akanyoni katagurutse ntikamenya iyo bweze, nagize amahirwe yo kugera imahanga mbona abantu baho uko babayeho, nsanga imico yabo ifite itandukaniro ryinshi n’iyacu.
Narebye ukuntu abakobwa baho baba bameze mbona batandukanye n’ab’iwacu cyane.
Ni uko rero bimpa igitekerezo cyo kuririmba ‘Umwali w i Rwanda’ mvuga umwihariko we haba mu buhanga, uburanga n’ubwitonzi.

Avuga ko nk’aho aba mu Bufaransa abana b’abakobwa ku myaka 14, 15, 16 usanga banywa itabi batitaye ko ribicira ubuzima ndetse n’aho abantu bateraniye ntibatinya kurinywa kimwe no mu muhanda bagenda, ndetse no mu myambarire “hari igihe bambara ukibaza niba bambaye bikakuyobera.
Ni ibintu bitandukanye no ku Banyarwandakazi kuko hari benshi bagikomeye ku muco, aho umukobwa arangwa n’ubuhanga n’ubwitonzi.
Ngarukiye Daniel ni umwe mu bahanzi bake bafite ubuhanga buhanitse mu gucuranga inanga.
Iyi mpano ayikomora kuri sekuru Semivumbi Simake wari intore y’intyoza mu guhamiriza kwa Rudahigwa i Nyanza mu Rukari.
Iyi ndirimbo ye nshya mu buryo bw’amajwi yakozwe na Didiertouch mu gihe amashusho yatunganyijwe na Karpetpixelz.
Shira amatsiko kuri Ange Hillz, Umunyarwanda washushanyije mu minota itatu George Floyd ku kiriyo

Itangazamakuru ryo ku Isi yose ryacitse ururondogoro kubera umunyabugeni w’umwirabura wabashije gushushanya ifoto ya George Floyd mu gihe cy’iminota itatu, icyo gihe byari mu muhango wo kumusezera mu cyubahiro.

Itangazamakuru ryo ku Isi yose ryacitse ururondogoro kubera umunyabugeni w’umwirabura wabashije gushushanya ifoto ya George Floyd mu gihe cy’iminota itatu, icyo gihe byari mu muhango wo kumusezera mu cyubahiro.

Ange Hillz umusore bitari bizwi ko ari umunyarwanda, ni we wesheje ako gahigo imbere y’ibitangazamakuru bikomeye nka; CNN, ABC n’ibindi byahise bimusamira hejuru kubera impano ye aba abaye icyamamare atyo.
Nyuma y’amasaha make abashije kwesa aka gahigo byamenyekanye ko Ange Hillz ari umunyarwanda wiyongereye ku bandi bagiye bakora amateka ku Isi.
Mu kiganiro kirambuye yagiranye na IGIHE mu Kinyarwanda cyiza, Ange Hillz, yavuze ko amaze imyaka irenga 20 ataba mu Rwanda, agaruka birambuye ku rugendo rwe mu bugeni.
Ange Hillz yavukiye mu Rwanda aza kuhava afite imyaka 16 yerekeza muri Kenya, mu 1998.
Nyuma yo kuba muri iki gihugu gituranyi imyaka itari mike yahise ajya muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika aho yigiye ibijyanye n’Ubugeni.
Ati “Nagiye muri Amerika kwiga ibijyanye n’ubugeni, narabikundaga cyane.
Niho nabyize kugeza mu 2004, nahise mbona akazi nkamaramo imyaka itanu.
Mu 2010 nibwo natangiye kwikorera ninjira mu byo gushushanya gutyo.
Kugeza ubu Ange Hillz afite ikigo cye gishushanya yise “Visual paint" aho akunze gushushanya mu birori bitandukanye ndetse agakorana n’abantu bafite amazina azwi cyane.

Bamwe mu bakiriya be bazwi harimo; Jada Pinkette Smith (umugore wa William’s Smith), Spike Lee (uzwi cyane muri filime zo muri Amerika nk’umuyobozi wa nyinshi zakunzwe, James Harden (Umukinnyi wa Basketball ukomeye muri NBA), Anthony Davis umukinnyi wamenyekanye cyane muri Los Angeles Lakers, Chris Tucker umukinnyi wa filime ukomeye muri Amerika, Erykah Badu umuhanzi w’icyamamare mu muziki wa Amerika, Dwyane Wade uzwi cyane muri NBA, Louis Farrakhan umunyapolitike ukomeye muri Amerika.
Ange Hillz avuga ko kugera kuri ibi byose abikesha umujyanama we umufasha cyane.

Ati "Mfite umujyanama [manager] umfasha cyane gukorana n’abantu b’ibyamamare, ni nawe wamfashije guhura n’umuryango wa George Floyd, nyuma yo gukora iriya foto benshi mu muryango we bansabye ko nayibakorera ubu mfite akazi ko kuyibakorera.
Yavukiye mu Rwanda anahafite umuryango nubwo atahaheruka
Ange Hillz avuga ko yavukiye mu Rwanda nubwo atibuka neza agace bari batuyemo, yavuze ko ’aho nibuka ni i Remera nahavuye cyera’.
Uyu abanziriza bucura mu bana barindwi iwabo babyaye, abavandimwe be kimwe n’ababyeyi be bose baba mu Rwanda.
Icyakora nubwo umuryango we utuye mu Rwanda, Ange Hillz we ahaheruka mu 1998, avuga ko akumbuye u Rwanda kuko akunda kurubona kuri Televiziyo akumva agize amatsiko.
Ati" Nshaka kubona ukuntu hasa bavuga ko ari ahantu hafite isuku, kuvugana n’abantu bavuga ikinyarwanda, gusura ingagi.
Amafoto mbona kuri televiziyo ubona ko mu Rwanda ari heza cyane.
Asoza ikiganiro twagiranye yasabye ababyeyi kureka abana bafite impano yo gushushanya bakabikora kuko nabyo bishobora kuba akazi katunga umwana.
Ati" Njye ndibuka kera nkiri umwana najyaga nshushanya ku ntebe nicaragaho no mu bitabo byanjye umwarimu akankubita ariko kenshi narabikomezaga.
Umuhango wo gushyingura George Floyd yawubonye gute nk’uwari uhibereye

Ange yagize ati “Wari umuhango uteye agahinda abantu bari bababaye barakaye, ni iby’agaciro bikaba n’amateka kuba ndi umunyarwanda wabashije gukora ibyo nakoze kuko televiziyo nyinshi mpuzamahanga zararebaga bizandikwa.

Ange Hillz avuga ko abirabura barakajwe n’urupfu rwa George Floyd ariko yemeza ko ari ibintu byari bisanzwe bibaho ntibihabwe agaciro cyangwa ntibivugwe cyane nkuko byagenze bityo bakaba bashaka ko igihe cyose hishwe umwirabura azira uko yavutse byajya bivugwa bigasakuza.

Hari abari banyobewe! ‘Igisupusupu’ yavuze ku mafoto y’umusatsi we urimo teinture anambaye amaherena

Nyuma yo gushyira hanze indirimbo nshya yise Isubireho, Nsengiyumva François uzwi nka Igisupusupu mu muziki yakomoje ku mafoto ye aherutse guca ibintu kubera uko yari yambaye n’uko yari yahinduye imisatsi ye.

Nyuma yo gushyira hanze indirimbo nshya yise Isubireho, Nsengiyumva François uzwi nka Igisupusupu mu muziki yakomoje ku mafoto ye aherutse guca ibintu kubera uko yari yambaye n’uko yari yahinduye imisatsi ye.
Muri Gicurasi 2020 nibwo ku mbuga nkoranyambaga hakwirakwiriye amafoto agaragaza Igisupusupu mu isura nshya.
Amugaragaza yashyize teinture mu mutwe, umusatsi wera ndetse afite imirimbo y’ubwiza irimo amaherena ku mubiri we.
Igisupusupu avuga ko yakunze ukuntu yasaga mu mafoto yasohotse icyo gihe ndetse n’inshuti ze zabyishimiye.
Mu kiganiro na IGIHE yagize ati "Buriya mfite abandeberera bavuze bati Gisupusupu wa 2019 agomba kuba atandukanye n’uw’uyu mwaka, ni uko byaje.
Nanjye narabibonye mbona bimeze neza.
Nubwo avuga ko yishimiye uko yagaragaraga, ngo umugore we yarabibonye aratangara ariko yishimira ko umugabo we yabaye icyamamare.
Yagize ati "Mu cyaro abenshi bari banyobewe ariko icyiza ni uko babyishimiye babonaga nabaye neza kuruta mbere.
“Njye ndi umu jeune, ntabwo ndasaza.
Umusaza ntabasha guceka umuziki, nta mujeune usaza rwose njye ndiwe.
Ntibakabare imyaka rwose bajye bareba ibikorwa.
Igisupusupu uhamya ko yakomwe mu nkokora n’icyorezo cya COVID-19 yavuze ko igihe cyateraga yigumiye mu rugo aho atuye ndetse Boss Papa kompanyi inamufasha mu muziki, ikomeza kumwitaho.

Nsengiyumva François aheruka gushyira hanze indirimbo nshya yise ‘Isubireho’, yagiye hanze ku wa 10 Kamena 2020; irimo ubutumwa bukebura abakobwa cyangwa se abahungu bishora mu ngeso mbi cyane cyane iz’ubusambanyi.
Ishushanya umukobwa uba warananiye iwabo akajya ararana n’abasore mu mahoteli, kugeza aho bamufashe ku ngufu bakamukoresha imibonano mpuzabitsina barenze umwe.
Iyi ndirimbo ni iya karindwi mu zo uyu muhanzi amaze gushyira hanze.
Ije ikurikira iyo yamenyekanyemo cyane yitwa ‘Mariya Jeannne’ yanatumye bamwita Igisupusupu, ‘Rwagitima’ n’izindi.
Bitandukanye n’izindi ndirimbo yagiye akora, Nsengiyumva muri iyi ndirimbo nshya agaragara yambaye imikufi itandukanye yanahinduye imisatsi ye umweru.
Nsengiyumva w’imyaka 41 y’amavuko yize gucuranga umuduri mu 1999 ubwo yari afite imyaka 20, mu gihe cy’amezi atanu.
Uyu mugabo ufite abana babiri yize amashuri abanza gusa.
Icyihariye atandukaniyeho n’abahanzi bamwe bakomeye mu Rwanda ni uko indirimbo ze zikundwa n’abanyamujyi, zagera mu cyaro ho zigakurirwa na benshi ingofero.
Ubu ‘Umuduri’ wafatwaga nk’igicurangisho gikoreshwa n’abacurangira gusomywa intama ku rwagwa, usigaye wumvwa na benshi kubera uyu mugabo.

Michael Jackson wafatwaga nk’Umwami w’Injyana ya Pop ku Isi yitabye Imana afite imyaka 50.
Uyu muhanzi yasize urwibutso rukomeye mu mfuruka z’Isi yose bitewe n’urukundo yagwije imbere ya benshi rushingiye ku ijwi rye ryiza n’imbyino ze zirimo ubuhanga.

Umunsi yitaba Imana Isi yacitse ururondogoro ku bwo kubura uyu mugabo wari umaze imyaka isaga 30 yarayigaruriye, kugeza ubwo ishakiro ry’amakuru rya Google ryahagaze bitewe n’abantu benshi cyane barikoreshaga, bashaka kumenya amakuru y’impano.
Michael Jackson yapfuye ubwo yiteguraga ibitaramo yagombaga gukorera mu Bwongereza.
Muri icyo gihe yari afite ikibazo cyo kubura ibitsotsi, ku buryo umuganga we Dr Murray yabanzaga kumuha imiti kugira ngo agoheke.

Mbere y’amasaha make kugira ngo apfe, yari yabuze ibitotsi burundu, asaba uyu muganga wahembwaga ibihumbi $150 ku kwezi, kumuha umuti witwa Propofol ubundi uhabwa abantu bagiye kubagwa kugira ngo basinzire.
Isuzuma ryakorewe umurambo wa Michael Jackson ryagaragaje ko iyo miti ari yo yamuhitanye ndetse umuganga we akatirwa igifungo cy’imyaka ine.
Indirimbo zirenga ijana Michael Jackson yakoze zarakunzwe kandi n’ubu ziracyakunzwe, ibintu bimwambika ikamba ry’Umwami wa Pop.
Benshi bibuka Michael Jackson nk’umuhanzi n’umubyinnyi w’umuhanga n’umuhate we mu guharanira Isi nziza abinyujije mu ndirimbo ze zakunzwe nka "Heal the World", "Will you be there" n’izindi.
Umunsi wa nyuma wa Michael Jackson ku Isi…
Mu ijoro ryo ku wa 25 Kamena 2009, Michael Jackson yararembye bikomeye yihutanwa mu bitaro.
Ikinyamakuru TMZ cyariho kizamura kwizerwa kwacyo mu kwandika amakuru yihuse y’imyidagaduro nicyo cya mbere cyanditse ko uyu muhanzi ari muri koma.
Bitewe n’izina rikomeye yari amaze kugira, benshi ntibizeye ko Michael Jackson ari mu bihe bitamworoheye kandi ashobora kuva ku Isi y’abazima.

Umunyamakuru w’imyidagaduro wa BBC, Ian Youngs, wakurikiraniraga hafi iby’uyu muhanzi w’icyamamare yatangaje ko hari hashize igihe bivugwa ko uyu muhanzi arwaye kanseri y’uruhu, nubwo nyuma uruhande rwe rwabihakanye.
Muri iryo joro abanyamakuru benshi ku Isi bahise batangira gukurikirana cyane iby’ubuzima bwa Jackson.
Ibiro bya BBC i Los Angeles byahamagaye abavugizi, inshuti n’abakorana na Jackson ariko nta n’umwe wagize icyo yemeza kuko bamwe bakuragaho telefoni zabo.
Iby’ubuzima bwe byari bimaze iminsi bizwi ko atameze neza, ariko iby’iryo joro nta makuru afatika Isi yabashije kubona.
Nyuma gato, TMZ yahise yandika ko Michael Jackson yapfuye.
Hari hashize ibyumweru bike avuye mu bitaramo i Londres ndetse ku wa 25 Kamena mu masaha y’igicuku yari yakoze imyiteguro i Los Angeles y’igitaramo yiteguraga.
Urupfu rwa Jackson ni inkuru yatunguranye gusa muganga we nyuma yemeje ko yari amaze imyaka myinshi adashobora gusinzira kereka ahawe imiti imusinziriza.
Dr Conrad Murray, umuganga we bwite wahembwaga $150,000 ku kwezi, yari amutegereje mu rugo atashye.
Mu cyumba cye habaga harimo amacupa y’ibinini, uducupa tw’imiti banywa cyangwa bitera, inshinge n’ibindi.
Dr Murray yabwiye polisi ko yari amaze iminsi aha Jackson umuti witwa Propofol - umuti uterwa abagiye kubagwa ku bitaro - mu majoro 60 kugeza tariki 22 Kamena 2009 kugira ngo abashe gusinzira.
Mu masaha ya mu gitondo kare tariki 25 Kamena, Dr Murray yahaye Jackson indi miti kugira ngo asinzire, ariko ngo ntiyakoze kuko Jackson yari afite igishyika cy’ibitaramo yateguraga.
Byageze saa Yine n’iminota 40 z’igitondo Jackson atarasinzira.
Dr Murray yabwiye Polisi ko Jackson yamwinginze ngo amuhe ’amata’ kugira ngo asinzire - aha ngo yasobanuraga Propofol- kuko bifite ibara rijya gusa.
Dr Murray avuga ko yari afite ibikoresho byose bituma abasha gukurikirana umutima, umwuka mu maraso n’ibindi kuri Jackson ndetse ko yamugumye iruhande nyuma gato akajya kwiyuhagira.
Nyuma y’akanya amuvuye iruhande yagiye koga ariko agarutse ngo yasanze Jackson adahumeka.
Gusa iby’amasaha yavuze bishidikanywaho hagendewe ku majwi ye yafashwe kuri telefoni aho yavugaga ko ibyo byabayeho mbere gato ya saa sita z’amanywa.
Uyu muganga avuga ko yakurikijeho kugerageza gusubiza umwuka uyu muhanzi ndetse ngo ntiyari no gusaba ubutabazi kuko nawe aribyo yageragezaga.
Icyo yakoze ni uko yahamagaye umwe mu bashinzwe umutekano wa Jackson.
Dr Murray avugwaho ko yabanje gusaba ushinzwe umutekano kuvana mu cyumba ibikoresho by’imiti byose.
Abana ba Jackson, Prince na Paris bari mu rugo ibi byose biba, ariko bahiye ubwoba.
Ubwo abatabazi bageraga mu rugo bavuga ko batabashije kumenya Jackson kuko yagaragaraga nk’umuntu wazonzwe, unanutse cyane.
Arebye uko yari ameze, Umutabazi Richard Senneff yavuze ko yabonaga ari nk’umurwayi w’indembe igeze mu minsi ya nyuma.
Bahise bamujyana ku bitaro bya UCLA medical center aho bakomereje ibikorwa byo kumugarurira umwuka.
Hashize isaha imwe n’iminota 13 bemeje ko byarangiye.
Muri icyo gihe abafana be n’abanyamakuru bari bamaze kugera ku bitaro.
Saa Munani n’iminota 44 z’amanywa TMZ niyo yatangaje inkuru bwa mbere ko Jackson yapfuye, hari saa sita na 44 z’ijoro mu Rwanda.
Abenshi ku Isi bari bagikeneye kumenya niba koko Michael Jackson byarangiye, abantu basuye internet mu buryo budasanzwe.
Google yageze aho itabasha gutanga amakuru (results) ku bayibajije Michael Jackson kuko uburyo ikoresha bwibeshye ko kuyibaza kenshi iri jambo ari igitero bwagabweho.
Twitter, Los Angeles Times, TMZ, Wikipedia na Messenger zose zagize ibibazo bya tikinike kubera abazisuye benshi uwo mugoroba.
Hashize imyaka ibiri, Dr Conrad Murray yahamijwe icyaha cy’ubwicanyi butagambiriwe afungwa igihe kituzuye neza imyaka ibiri muri ine yakatiwe.
Iby’urupfu rwa Jackson n’iby’ibyaha yashinjwaga byo gufata abana bato ku ngufu byavuzweho byinshi mu myaka 10 ishize, muzika ye nayo izaguma mu mitima ya benshi.

Mu gihe ibitaramo byahagaritswe mu rwego rwo kwirinda ikwirakwira rya COVID-19, abanyamuziki nabo bayobotse inzira yo gutaramana n’abakunzi babo bifashishije ikoranabuhanga.
Mu gihe ibitaramo byahagaritswe mu rwego rwo kwirinda ikwirakwira rya COVID-19, abanyamuziki nabo bayobotse inzira yo gutaramana n’abakunzi babo bifashishije ikoranabuhanga.

Mu gihe mu Rwanda hamaze iminsi umurindi w’ibitaramo by’abahanzi batandukanye, Itorero Inganzo Ngari ryamaze gutegura ibitaramo bya buri wa Gatanu w’icyumweru mu rwego rwo gususurutsa abakunzi b’umuziki gakondo.
Ibi bitaramo bizajya bitambuka ku rukuta rwa Youtube rw’iri torero bizatangira kuri uyu wa Gatanu tariki 26 Kamena 2020.

Ibi bitaramo by’Itorero Inganzo Ngari byatekerejweho nyuma yuko ibyo risanzwe rikorera kuri Hôtel des Mille Collines buri wa Gatanu w’icyumweru byakomwe mu nkokora n’ingamba zo kwirinda no gukumira COVID-19.
Nahimana Serge ubarizwa mu Itorero Inganzo Ngari yabwiye IGIHE ko ibi bitaramo babiteguye kugira ngo bashimishe abakunzi b’imbyino gakondo bari batakibona aho bataramira bakanyurwa.

Yagize ati “Twari dusanzwe dutaramira abakunzi bacu muri Hôtel des Mille Collines buri wa Gatanu w’icyumweru, twanze gukomeza kwicisha irungu abakunzi b’umudiho gakondo niyo mpamvu twahisemo kubategurira ibi bitaramo.

Iki gitaramo kizaba cyiganjemo indirimbo zigaragaza uturango tw’umuco w’u Rwanda mu mbyino zizwi mu duce tunyuranye tw’urukiga [izo mu murera no gice cya Byumba], mu Buganza, mu Mutara w’Indorwa, mu Buhoma, mu Bufundu, mu Gisaka, mu Buganza n’ahandi.
Uretse imbyino muri ibi bitaramo, Inganzo Ngari zizashyiramo igice cy’ibisakuzo, kwivuga, kuvuza ikondera no guca imigani.

Ibihembo bya MNI bigiye gutangwa ku ndirimbo zikunzwe ku nshuro ya kabiri
Kuri uyu wa 26 Kamena 2020 nibwo hitezwe umuhango wo gushyikiriza ibihembo by’ababashije gutsinda mu cyiciro cya kabiri cy’irushanwa rya MNI bigiye gutangirwa kuri Televiziyo Rwanda.
Kuri uyu wa 26 Kamena 2020 nibwo hitezwe umuhango wo gushyikiriza ibihembo by’ababashije gutsinda mu cyiciro cya kabiri cy’irushanwa rya MNI bigiye gutangirwa kuri Televiziyo Rwanda.

Ibi bihembo byatangiye bitangwa n’urubyiruko rwihurije hamwe, kuri ubu byatangiye kubona abaterankunga aho ku isonga RALC, yamaze kwinjiramo mu rwego rwo gushyigikira ubuhanzi nka kimwe mu biranga umuco.
Ibi bihembo bigiye gutangwa bwa kabiri bizashyikirizwa abahanzi babitsindiye mu minsi ishize, ibirori byo kubahemba bigakomwa mu nkokora n’icyorezo cya Covid-19.
Nyuma y’ibiganiro binyuranye, ubuyobozi bw’iri rushanwa bwemeje ko ibi bihembo bizashyikirizwa abahanzi binyuze kuri Televiziyo Rwanda ku wa 26 Kamena 2020.

MNI yatangaje ko ibihembo bitangirwa kuri RTV kuri uyu wa Gatanu saa tanu z’amanywa aho kuba ku wa Gatandatu nk’uko byari byatangajwe mbere kubera gahunda zo Kwibohora ziteganijwe ku matariki yari yatangajwe mbere.
Igihembwe cya kabiri cyo gutora indirimbo eshatu cyatangiye tariki ya 1 Gashyantare 2020 kugeza tariki 30 Mata 2020.

Ni umuhango uzatangirwamo ibihembo bya Muzika (Music Awards) ndetse bigaherekezwa n’ishimwe ry’amafaranga ku ndirimbo eshatu zaje imbere ku rutonde mu gihe cy’amezi atatu, aho indirimbo ya mbere izahabwa 2,000,000 Frw, iya kabiri igahabwa 700,000 Frw, iya gatatu igahabwa 300,000 Frw.
Indirimbo ya Tonzi niyo yabashije kuza ku mwanya wa mbere, yegukana igihembo.
Usibye miliyoni agiye guhabwa nk’igihembo cy’indirimbo yatowe cyane, yanashyikirijwe 60% by’amafaranga abakunzi be bakoresheje bamutora.

Usibye Tonzi wabaye uwa mbere, Mutimawurugo Claire yegukanye 700 000 Frw na 60% by’amafaranga bamutoresheje kubera indirimbo ye "Umunyenga w’intsinzi" mu gihe Bryan Lead we yabashije kuba uwa gatatu yegukana 300 000 Frw na 60% by’amafaranga bamutoresheje ku ndirimbo ye "Open my eyes".
Ni ubwa kabiri igikorwa cyo gutora umuhanzi watsinze iri rushanwa kibaye.
Ubwa mbere cyabaye muri Mutarama 2020, ubwo igihembo cyegukanwaga n’itsinda ‘Umuti Mu nganzo’.
Umuhanzi Ganza yabaye uwa kabiri ahembwa ibihumbi 700 Frw naho umuhanzi Sam Muvunyi aba uwa Gatatu ahembwa ibihumbi 300 Frw.

Umuhanzi ubwe ni we ufata iya mbere kugira ngo indirimbo ye igaragare kuri uru rubuga ashyiraho umubare w’indirimbo yifuza zose.
Ubuyobozi bw’uru rubuga ni bwo bwemeza ko indirimbo ijya ku rutonde rw’izihatanira igihembo nyuma yo kureba niba yujuje ibisabwa birimo no kuba uwayitanze ari nawe nyirayo.

Uyu mugabo yakunzwe bikomeye mu bihangano bitandukanye kuva mu myaka yo 1980 ubwo yerekezaga umutima we wose mu buzima bw’umuziki wiganje mu njyana nka Zouk, Soukous na Afropop.
Yabaye umuririmbyi w’igihangange, ikigeretse kuri ibyo nyinshi mu ndirimbo ze yarazayindikiraga.

Umuziki we wamennye inkike za Afurika utambagira Isi yose utitaye ku kuba ari Umunyafurika, cyane ko ibihangano bye byakunzwe n’ab’ingeri zose kubera uburyohe bwazo, maze byakubitana n’iminsi yo guceza rikabara uwariraye!
Uyu mugabo wari warataziriwe akazina ka ‘Noli’ yavukiye mu Majyepfo y’Iburengerazuba bwa Gabon.
Yamamaye cyane mu ndirimbo yitwa ‘Bane’ yagiye hanze ubwo yasaga nk’aho ari kwishakisha mu muziki.

Ku wa 7 Kamena 2010, inkuru y’incamugongo yasakaye ku Isi yose ivuga ko Oliver yitabye Imana azize uburwayi bw’impyiko.
Yapfiriye mu bitaro bya Omar Bongo i Libreville mui Gabon, nyuma y’imyaka ibiri yari amaze afite ubu burwayi.
Uko yatangiye umuziki…
Burya koko ngo inyana ni iya mweru! N’Goma ajya kumenyekana byaturutse kuri se wari usanzwe ari umucuranzi ndetse akaba n’umwarimu wa Harmonium.
Yatangiye kwiga amasomo ajyanye na muzika ubwo yari afite imyaka umunani y’amavuko, atangira kuririmbira imbere y’imbaga i Libreville aho yari yagiye kwiga.
Mu mashuri yisumbuye ubwo yatangiraga kwiga amasomo ye ajyanye n’ibaruramari, yinjiye muri band yo ku ishuri aho yigiye gucuranga gitari.
Uyu muhanzi ntabwo yakundaga guha umwanya we ishuri ahubwo yamaraga igihe kinini yitoza ibijyanye n’umuziki ndetse na sinema mu cyimbo cyo gukora imikoro ku ishuri.
Urukundo rwe muri filime rwatumye mu 1988 ajya mu Bufaransa aho yaherewe amahugurwa ajyanye no gufata amashusho.
Yahuriyeyo n’umu-producer w’Umunya-Cap Vert witwa Manu Lima, amwumvisha ibihangano bye aba ariwe uba imbarutso ituma akora indirimbo ye ya yakunzwe cyane yise ‘Bane’.
Iyi ndirimbo yitiriwe album ya mbere y’uyu muhanzi yarakunzwe mu buryo bukomeye ndetse n’amaradiyo yo muri Afurika yari akunzwe muri icyo gihe atangira kuzicuranga.
Mu 1995 Oliver N’Goma yashyize hanze album ya kabiri yise ‘Adia’, yongera kuyikoranaho na Manu Lima.
Nyuma y’imyaka itanu yashyize hanze indi album nshya yise ‘Seva’, yakoze izindi zirimo ‘Saga’ yo mu 2006, ‘Afrolove / Kizomba / Special’ yagiye hanze mu 2014 ndetse na ‘Afro-Zouk Vol.

Uyu mugabo witabye Imana ku myaka 51; yaherekejwe n’inshuti ze, abafana, abakundana bikomeye ibihangano bye, abahanzi n’abandi benshi.
Yashyinguwe ku wa 15 Kamena 2010 nyuma y’iyo mihango yose, ahitwa Alibadeng.
Isanduku ye yaraboneranaga, igaragaza umurambo w’uyu muhanzi mu ngofero n’ikositimu (costume).
Oliver N’Goma yaherekejwe n’ubuhamya bw’abantu batandukanye burimo ubwa Florence Mbani wari umuyobozi kuri Televiziyo ya RTG2; uyu mugabo yakozeho igihe kinini.
Ati “Yashyigikiye urukundo, yatwaye urumuri rwa Gabon hanze y’imipaka y’igihugu ndetse anakorera Imana.

Tuyisenge Intore yahishuye ibyishimo yagize umunsi aramutsa Perezida n’uko yari yibwe indirimbo "Tora Kagame"
Intore Tuyisenge, ni umuhanzi umaze kuba ubukombe mu Rwanda azwi cyane nk’umuhanzi ukora indirimbo zigisha Abanyarwanda gahunda za Leta.
Intore Tuyisenge, ni umuhanzi umaze kuba ubukombe mu Rwanda azwi cyane nk’umuhanzi ukora indirimbo zigisha Abanyarwanda gahunda za Leta.

Uyu mugabo ayobora ihuriro ry’abahanzi ba muzika mu Rwanda, iyo muganiriye ku rugendo rwe mu muziki usanga yarahereye kuri zero ariko umuhate n’urukundo rw’ibyo yakoraga rugatuma yihuta mu iterambere.
Tuyisenge wakuranye impano y’ubuhanzi, yabwinjiyemo neza ubwo yari arangije icyiciro cya mbere cy’amashuri yisumbuye iki gihe yari asanzwe aririmba indirimbo z’amarushanwa.
Mu 2006 nibwo Intore Tuyisenge yitabiriye amarushanwa y’umuziki, aba uwa mbere mu karere ka Kirehe no mu ntara y’Iburasirazuba, aba uwa gatatu ku rwego rw’igihugu.
Nyuma gato y’aya marushanwa, Tuyisenge yagize amahirwe yo kwitabira Itorero ry’Igihugu nk’umwe mu bahagarariye abanyeshuri.
Bitewe n’inyigisho yaryigiyemo yavuyeyo yiyemeje gutangira gukora ibihangano bikangurira abanyarwanda gahunda za Leta.
Mu 2007 nibwo Tuyisenge yakoze indirimbo ye ya mbere yise “Intore izirusha intambwe", 2008 akora Intore z’abahizi’.
Ajya gukora indirimbo ye ya mbere, Tuyisenge yavuze ko yari afite ikimasa mu cyaro agatekereza kukigurisha.
Ati “Icyo gihe muzehe yambereye ibamba yanga ko nkigurisha ahubwo yemera kumpa 40 000 Frw yo gukora indirimbo.
Tuyisenge yahuye n’umunyamakuru yahaye indirimbo ye ya mbere yanga kuyicuranga amusobanurira ko batajya bacuranga indirimbo za Politiki.
Ati “Kuva icyo gihe natangiye gukora umuziki numva ko ntazongera kujyana ibihangano byanjye ku maradiyo kuko nari maze kumva ko batacuranga ibyanjye.
Mu matora y’abadepite, Tuyisenge yakoze indirimbo yise Tora RPF, “Nayifashishije mu kwamamaza umuryango mu bice bitandukanye by’u Rwanda.
Iki gihe uyu muhanzi wari umaze gusa n’utangiye kumenyekana cyane, mu 2010 yaje guhindura ya ndirimbo noneho ayigira Tora Kagame, aha hakaba hari mu matora ya Perezida wa Repubulika.

Tuyisenge ati “Icyo gihe narayivuguruye nzana ibitekerezo bishya mu ndirimbo, nshyiramo umurongo yari amaze guha igihugu n’ibindi bitandukanye iba nziza cyane kandi benshi bambera abagabo bo kubihamya.
Akomeza agira ati "Ubwo najyaga gukora indirimbo Tora RPF, Hon.
Saidate yampaye ibihumbi 150 nkoreshaho make bituma nsigarana make nakomeje kwifashisha.
Tuyisenge avuga ko indirimbo ye “Tora Kagame" hari umuhanzi (yirinze gutangaza izina rye) washatse kuyimwiba.
Ati "Naje kumenya ko hari umuhanzi wari uri gushaka uko yayiba yaranatangiye kuyikora, ndashimira Hon.
Mukazibera Agnes, namubwiye ko bagiye kunyiba igihangano angira inama zo kujya kuyandikisha muri RDB.
Umwe washakaga kuyiba yaje kumenya ko nayandikishije biraduteranya rwose ariko sinaba nkibwe.
Iyi ndirimbo Tora Kagame yahinduye ubuzima bwa Tuyisenge kuko yamenyekanye cyane ndetse inakundwa na benshi mu banyarwanda bashyigikiye Perezida Kagame.
Ubwo yayiririmbaga Perezida Kagame yaramushimiye.
Tuyisenge yagize ati" Umunsi yankoze mu ntoki yarambwiye ngo ‘Warakoze kandi komereza aho’.
Iki gihe Tuyisenge atashye benshi mu baturanyi ntibigeze bamworohera kuko bashakaga kumukora mu ntoki ngo bumve ikiganza cyasuhuje Perezida wa Repubulika.
Usibye abaturanyi be, Intore Tuyisenge nawe ngo ageze mu rugo ntabwo yigeze anakaraba intoki, “Uretse nanjye n’abaturanyi bazaga kunsuhuza bambwira ko batari bukarabe, ubwo nanjye byibaze nyine.
Iyi ndirimbo yamufunguriye imiryango myinshi, urugero ni uko ari umwe mu bitabiriye ibirori bya Rwanda Day yabereye muri Amerika mu 2010.
Kugeza ubu usibye kuba Intore Tuyisenge ari umuhanzi ukomeye cyane mu ndirimbo zigisha abanyarwanda gahunda za Leta, ni n’umuyobozi w’ihuriro ry’abahanzi ba muzika umwanya amazeho igihe kinini.

Urugendo rwa Uwimana Aliane ukorana n’inzu y’imideli iri mu zikomeye mu Bufaransa
Uwimana Aliane yakuze atiyumvamo ibijyanye no kumurika imideli! Yabisunikiwemo n’inshuti ze, arabikunda none abimazemo imyaka irindwi ndetse biramutunze aho abarizwa mu Mujyi wa Paris mu Bufaransa.
Uwimana Aliane yakuze atiyumvamo ibijyanye no kumurika imideli! Yabisunikiwemo n’inshuti ze, arabikunda none abimazemo imyaka irindwi ndetse biramutunze aho abarizwa mu Mujyi wa Paris mu Bufaransa.
Uyu munyamideli yageze mu Bufaransa mu 2008, icyo gihe yari asanze umuntu wo mu muryango we wari waramuboneye ishuri muri icyo gihugu.
Muri icyo gihe, Uwimana nta gitekerezo yari afite cyo kwinjira mu bijyanye no kumurika imideli.
Inshuti ze zahoraga zimubwira ko akwiye kugerageza amahirwe akareba.
Mu kiganiro na IGIHE, Uwimana yavuze uko yatangiye guharura inzira yo kwinjira mu kumurika imideli.
Yagize ati “Numvaga [kumurika imideli] atari bwo buzima bwanjye.
Mu 2012 ubwo nari ngiye gufata gari ya moshi nahuye n’umuntu ambaza niba nkora ibintu byo kwerekana imideli, ndamuhakanira.
Yambwiye ko ngomba kubigerageza.
Mbifashijwemo n’inshuti zanjye, nibwo nabyinjiyemo.
Ni icyemezo yafashe yabanje kugisha imitima inama cyane ko yibazaga umusaruro azabikuramo.
Yakomeje ati “Nibazaga icyo bizangezaho, inama inshuti zanjye zampaga nazo zigakomeza kubinkangurira.
Naravuze nti ko kugerageza ntacyo binsaba uwagerageza.
Mu 2013, nibwo Uwimana yabonye inzu y’imideli bakorana nyuma yo kwitabira ibikorwa byo guhitamo abanyamideli (casting) byafashe igihe kirekire.
Yagize ati “Ntibihita bitangira, bifata igihe.
Hagategurwa casting, ugahura n’abakiliya, ugakora amafoto menshi atishyura kugira ngo utunganye igitabo cyawe kuko aricyo wifashisha wereka abakiliya uko uhagarara, uko wifata, uko uvuga n’ibindi.
Hagati y’umwaka wa 2013 na 2016, Uwimana yabonaga akazi katari kenshi ndetse rimwe na rimwe ntikamwishyure neza ku buryo yakubakiraho imibereho.
Ati “Hari imbogamizi yari ukutamenya uko ubuzima bw’ejo buzaba bumeze.
Ese nzashobora kubaho nte?
Ibindi byo birasanzwe, ni ukugerageza kwitwara neza no kubaha abo dukorana.
Uwimana yaje kwinjira mu mikoranire na Mademoiselle agency, inzu y’imideli ikorera mu Mujyi wa Paris aho yashinzwe mu 1994.
Mademoiselle agency ya Sylvie Grincourt na Pascal Grincourt, iri mu zubashywe mu Burayi ikorana n’izindi nzu zirimo Armani, Lancôme, Lanvin, l’Oreal, ELLE n’izindi.
Uwimana yavuze ko iyo mikoranire yahinduye ubuzima bwe, ubu yishimira kuba umunyamideli.
Ati “Natangiye mu 2013 bigoye kubona akazi ugereranyije n’uyu munsi.
Uyu munsi biragenda neza, kuko ibijyanye no kumurika imideli nibyo bimbeshejeho 100%.
Nta kandi kazi nkora.
Uwimana akorana n’Umuryango M Foundation washinzwe na Mademoiselle Agency, uhindura ubuzima bw’abana n’abagore batagira kivurira binyuze mu kubongerera ubushobozi no gufasha abato kwiga.
Mu mwaka ushize, we na M Foundation bari mu Rwanda aho bagiranye ubufatanye n’Umuryango Uharanira Uburenganzira bw’Umugore n’ubw’Umwana ‘‘HAGURUKA’’.
Icyo gikorwa cyari kigamije gushyigikira gahunda ya Haguruka yo gufasha abakobwa babyariye iwabo guharanira uburenganzira bwabo no kongera kwisanga muri sosiyete.
Mu mishinga ye, Uwimana ateganya gukora ibikorwa biteza imbere ibijyanye n’imideli ndetse yatangiye no gutekereza ku buryo bwo kubigeza mu Rwanda.
Isomo rikomeye yakuye mu kumurika imideli mu myaka irindwi abimazemo ni uko umuntu adakwiye guhindura umwimerere we.
Ihuriro rya ba Nyampinga b’u Rwanda ryahaye abamugariye ku rugamba ibikoresho byo kwirinda COVID-19

Nyampinga Foundation, ihuriro ry’abakobwa begukanye amakamba ya Miss Rwanda mu bihe bitandukanye, kuri uyu wa Gatatu tariki 24 Kamena 2020 basuye Umudugudu wa Nyarugunga utuwe n’imiryango y’abamugariye ku rugamba rwo kubohora igihugu.

Nyampinga Foundation, ihuriro ry’abakobwa begukanye amakamba ya Miss Rwanda mu bihe bitandukanye, kuri uyu wa Gatatu tariki 24 Kamena 2020 basuye Umudugudu wa Nyarugunga utuwe n’imiryango y’abamugariye ku rugamba rwo kubohora igihugu.
Muri uru rugendo, aba bakobwa begukanye amakamba ya Miss Rwanda bari bahagarariwe na Miss Jolly Mutesi ndetse na Nishimwe Naomie ufite iri kamba muri uyu mwaka wa 2020.
Urugendo rwabo rwari rugamije gushyikiriza imiryango y’abamugariye ku rugamba ibikoresho byo kwirinda Covid-19 bigizwe ahanini n’udupfukamunwa 1000.
Aba bakobwa bakigera muri uyu mudugudu bakiriwe n’ubuyobozi bwawo ndetse n’ubw’Umurenge wa Nyarugunga kimwe n’ubuyobozi bw’abasezerewe mu ngabo mu mujyi wa Kigali.
Mu ijambo ry’ikaze babwiwe n’umuyobozi w’umurenge wa Nyarugunga Uwamahoro Geneviève, yashimiye ba Nyampinga kuba babagendereye abashimira ubushake bagize bwo gufasha abamugariye ku rugamba.

Yabijeje ko ubufasha batanze buzafasha imiryango y’abamugariye ku rugamba cyane ko udupfukamunwa bahawe tuzafasha abagorwaga no kutubona ndetse n’usanzwe agafite akaba abonye ako guhinduranya mu gihe yaba yakameshe.
Yasabye abaturage bo muri uyu mudugudu gukomeza gukurikiza amabwiriza yo kwirinda ikwirakwira rya Covid-19 cyane ko ari icyorezo gihangayikishije igihugu cyane n’Isi muri rusange.

John Bagabo komiseri muri komisiyo yo gusubiza mu buzima busanzwe abari abasirikare mu mujyi wa Kigali, yashimye bikomeye igikorwa cy’aba bakobwa ndetse asaba aba bamugariye ku rugamba n’imiryango yabo kumva impanuro z’aba bakobwa cyane ko nubwo ari bato ariko hari byinshi babigisha.

Yashimiye aba bakobwa kuba batekereje ku bamugariye ku rugamba rwo kubohora igihugu, asaba abagiye guhabwa ibikoresho byo kwirinda Covid-19 kugerageza kubikoresha neza cyane ko nk’abafite ubumuga ari bamwe mu bafite imbaraga nke z’umubiri bityo igihe iki cyorezo cyaba kibagezeho kikaba cyabibasira.

Yagize ati" Nibyiza ko bazanye udupfukamunwa two kudufasha kwirinda Covid-19 kandi bakaba banaje kudukangurira kumenya kudukoresha neza no gukomeza kwirinda, natwe rero tugomba gufatanya n’abandi kwirinda iki cyorezo kuko ni urugamba rukomeye.

Jolly Mutesi wabaye Nyampinga w’u Rwanda ari nawe uhagarariye Nyampinga Foundation mu Rwanda, yibukije abamugariye ku rugamba bari muri uyu muhango ko nk’abana babo bahora babatekereza kandi babazirikana.

Ati "Nimwe mwafashe imbunda mujya ku rugamba muduha igihugu cyiza nk’iki, ntacyo dufite twabaha ngo tubashimire gusa turabazirikana, turashimira cyane buri umwe muri mwe ndetse tukazirikana byimazeyo abatakarije ubuzima ku rugamba bari bagenzi banyu.
“Mukwiye ishimwe ry’icyubahiro, turabakunda cyane kandi dufite ishimwe ku bwanyu.
Muri ababyeyi bacu mukaba n’ababyeyi b’Igihugu ntabwo tuzabatenguha ikivi cyanyu tuzacyusa.

Nyampinga Foundation ni ihuriro ry’abakobwa begukanye amakamba ya Miss Rwanda mu bihe bitandukanye icyakora yatangiranye abanyamuryango batandatu barimo; Bahati Grace, Kayibanda Aurore, Kundwa Doriane, Akiwacu Colombe, Jolly Mutesi ndetse na Nishimwe Naomie ndetse na Muganwa Larry, umugabo watangiranye na bo.

Miss Iradukunda Elsa, Iradukunda Liliane na Nimwiza Meghan ntabwo bahise binjira muri Nyampinga Foundation, Miss Jolly Mutesi akaba yongeye gushimangira ko ari uko igihe batangizaga uyu mushinga aba bakobwa bari bafite ibindi bikorwa wenda byabazitiye ariko ahamya ko nibabohoka bazaba bakinguriwe imiryango.

Ishimwe rya Vd Frank ku bamugobotse bakamufasha kwivuza stroke yari imuhitanye

Mugisha Frank [VD Frank] wakoze umuziki igihe kinini akaba n’umunyamakuru wari umaze igihe yarafashwe n’uburwayi bwa stroke bwatumye agira ikibazo cyo kugagara umubiri wose ’paralysé yatangiye koroherwa.

Mugisha Frank [VD Frank] wakoze umuziki igihe kinini akaba n’umunyamakuru wari umaze igihe yarafashwe n’uburwayi bwa stroke bwatumye agira ikibazo cyo kugagara umubiri wose ’paralysé yatangiye koroherwa.
VD Frank umaze kongera gutora agatege yasigaranye ishimwe ku Banyarwanda bamugobotse bakamufasha kwivuza.
Ku wa 10 Gicurasi 2020, VD Frank avuga ko yabyutse agasanga yarembye ndetse umunwa wahengamye ndetse n’igice kimwe cy’umutwe we kidakora.

Ubu burwayi bwamuzonze bwamufashe mu gihe hari hashize icyumweru kimwe gusa abantu bemerewe kongera kujya mu mirimo nyuma yuko hari haciyeho igihe Abanyarwanda muri rusange bari muri gahunda ya #Gumamurugo bisobanuye ko iyi ndwara yamufatiranye mu bukene nkuko nawe abyivugira.
Ibi byatumye ahita yihutira kujya kwivuza maze abwirwa ko yarwaye stroke, ubwoba bwahise bumutaha kuko yari imaze iminsi mike ihitanye muramu we “DJ Miller".
Yagize ati "Nahise mbaza abaganga nti ’ese igikurikiyeho ni iki, ngiye gupfa?
’ Kuko nari nzi ko urwaye iyi ndwara adapfa gukira, ariko abaganga bambwiye ko kuva narivuje neza kandi kare nzakira kandi neza.
VD Frank avuga ko nyuma y’inkuru yasohotse ku IGIHE ivuga ko arwaye abantu banyuranye biganjemo Abanyarwanda baba muri Diaspora bamufashije bamuha amafaranga yo kwivuza.

Ykomeje agira ati “Ndashimira buri Munyarwanda wese wamfashije, indwara yamfashe nkennye nta n’ifaranga na rimwe mfite, nta bwishingizi mfite nagizwe n’abantu basomye inkuru bamenye ko ndwaye baramfasha ndivuza none ndabona ndi gukira.

Avuga ko igihe cyose yivuje yafashwaga n’abakunzi be bari bamenye ko arwaye, ati "Byibuza kwa Kanimba kuhivuriza nahatanze ibihumbi 700 Frw, ibaze iyo bataza kumfasha wenda ubu mba ngenda ngifite ikibazo cya (Paralyse).
VD Frank avuga ko Stroke yarwaye yari yayitewe n’ibintu bitatu birimo kutaruhuka, gutekereza no gukora cyane.
Ati "Mfite imishinga inyuranye irimo gukora uruganda rwenga inzoga, rero nari ndi gutekereza uko nawushyira mu ngiro nkumva birangoye cyane sinari nkiryama nararaga ntekereza rwose.
Uyu mugabo avuga ko nyuma yo gusobanurirwa neza icyamuteye kurwara yafashe icyemezo cyo kuruhuka bihagije ndetse no kugabanya gutekereza cyane kuko yasobanukiwe ko gushakisha ibintu bitaruta ubuzima.

Inzobere mu by’ubuzima zivuga ko ‘Stroke’ ari indwara ituma udutsi dukwirakwiza amaraso mu bwonko duturika bitewe n’umubyimba watwo utabasha kwakira ingano y’amaraso acamo, bigatuma yivanga n’ubwonko cyangwa tukaziba bitewe no kuvura kwayo, bigatuma adatemberamo uko bikwiye, maze igice atageramo kikangirika.
Ikiganiro na VD Frank wamaze koroherwa
RALC yinjiye mu baterankunga ba MNI igiye gutanga ibihembo by’igihembwe cya kabiri 2020

Inteko Nyarwanda y’Ururimi n’Umuco (RALC), yamaze kwinjira mu baterankunga ba Muzika Nyarwanda Ipande (MNI), ubu bukaba ari uburyo bwo guteza imbere muzika nyarwanda binyuze mu guhemba indirimbo yatowe cyane mu ziba zihatana.

Inteko Nyarwanda y’Ururimi n’Umuco (RALC), yamaze kwinjira mu baterankunga ba Muzika Nyarwanda Ipande (MNI), ubu bukaba ari uburyo bwo guteza imbere muzika nyarwanda binyuze mu guhemba indirimbo yatowe cyane mu ziba zihatana.

Ibi bihembo byatangiye bitangwa n’urubyiruko rwihurije hamwe, kuri ubu byatangiye kubona abaterankunga aho ku isonga RALC, yamaze kwinjiramo mu rwego rwo gushyigikira ubuhanzi nka kimwe mu biranga umuco.
Ibi bihembo bigiye gutangwa bwa kabiri bizashyikirizwa abahanzi babitsindiye mu minsi ishize, icyakora ibirori byo kubahemba bigakomwa mu nkokora n’icyorezo cya Covid-19.
Nyuma y’ibiganiro binyuranye, ubuyobozi bw’iri rushanwa bwemeje ko ibi bihembo bizashyikirizwa abahanzi binyuze kuri Televiziyo Rwanda ku wa 27 Kamena 2020.
Igihembwe cya kabiri cyo gutora indirimbo eshatu cyatangiye tariki ya 1 Gashyantare 2020 kugeza tariki 30 Mata 2020.

Ni umuhango uzatangirwamo ibihembo bya Muzika (Music Awards) ndetse bigaherekezwa n’ishimwe ry’amafaranga ku ndirimbo eshatu zaje imbere ku rutonde mu gihe cy’amezi atatu, aho indirimbo ya mbere izahabwa 2,000,000 Frw, iya kabiri igahabwa 700,000 Frw, iya gatatu igahabwa 300,000 Frw.
Indirimbo ya Tonzi niyo yabashije kuza ku mwanya wa mbere, yegukana igihembo.
Usibye miliyoni agiye guhabwa nk’igihembo cy’indirimbo yatowe cyane, yanashyikirijwe 60% by’amafaranga abakunzi be bakoresheje bamutora.

Usibye Tonzi wabaye uwa mbere, Mutimawurugo Claire yegukanye 700 000 Frw na 60% by’amafaranga bamutoresheje kubera indirimbo ye "Umunyenga w’intsinzi" mu gihe Bryan Lead we yabashije kuba uwa gatatu yegukana 300 000 Frw na 60% by’amafaranga bamutoresheje ku ndirimbo ye "Open my eyes".
Ni ubwa kabiri igikorwa cyo gutora umuhanzi watsinze iri rushanwa kibaye.
Ubwa mbere cyabaye muri Mutarama 2020, ubwo igihembo cyegukanwaga n’itsinda ‘Umuti Mu nganzo’.
Umuhanzi Ganza yabaye uwa kabiri ahembwa ibihumbi 700 Frw naho umuhanzi Sam Muvunyi aba uwa Gatatu ahembwa ibihumbi 300 Frw.

Iwacu Muzika Festival igiye kugaruka mu isura nshya
Iserukiramuco rya Iwacu Muzika rigiye kuba ku nshuro ya kabiri, ryateguwe mu buryo bwihariye kuko rizabera kuri internet bitewe n’ingamba zafashwe mu guhangana n’icyorezo cya COVID-19.
Iserukiramuco rya Iwacu Muzika rigiye kuba ku nshuro ya kabiri, ryateguwe mu buryo bwihariye kuko rizabera kuri internet bitewe n’ingamba zafashwe mu guhangana n’icyorezo cya COVID-19.
Iserukiramuco rya Iwacu Muzika ryateguwe mu gufasha abahanzi bo mu Rwanda kwegerana n’abakunzi babo.
Ryatangijwe mu mwaka ushize aho ryanyuze mu ntara zitandukanye z’igihugu risorezwa mu Mujyi wa Kigali.
Ku nshuro ya kabiri Iwacu Muzika Festival igiye kongera kuba, ariko izaba mu buryo butandukanye n’ubwa mbere.
Kuri ubu izajya ica kuri Televiziyo Rwanda no ku mbuga nkoranyambaga z’iri serukiramuco mu rwego rwo gususurutsa abantu batakibona uko bitabira ibitaramo by’abahanzi kubera COVID-19.

Mu rwego rwo kwirinda ko Abanyarwanda bakwicwa n’irungu muri ibi bihe ibitaramo bitemewe ndetse no gufasha abahanzi gukora ibitaramo biteguye neza bagasabana n’abakunzi babo, ubuyobozi bwa East African Promoters (EAP) bwongeye gutegura Iwacu Muzika Festival igiye kuba ku nshuro ya kabiri.

Amakuru ava imbere muri EAP ahamya ko iyi kompanyi isanzwe itegura iri serukiramuco yanze kuryama kuko ibitaramo byahagaritswe ihitamo gushaka inzira zo gukora ibitaramo byiza kandi bigezweho bizajya bica kuri internet no kuri televiziyo abantu bakabikurikirana hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga.
IGIHE ifite amakuru yizewe yuko ibi bitaramo bigiye gutangira kuba mu minsi ya vuba ndetse bikazajya biba biteguwe neza mu rwego rwo gukomeza gutuma umuziki w’u Rwanda uguma ku rwego rushimishije.

Nubwo nta muntu uwo ariwe wese wo muri EAP wifuje kuduha amakuru kuri ibi bitaramo, ahari ni uko ari ibitaramo bizajya bica kuri Televiziyo y’u Rwanda (RTV) ndetse no ku mbuga nkoranyambaga za Iwacu muzika Festival mu rwego rwo gufasha abantu bazaba batari hafi ya televiziyo.
Ni ibitaramo byatumiwemo abahanzi batandukanye kandi bagezweho nubwo amazina yabo ataratangazwa.
Ibi bitaramo bizamara amezi arenga atatu biba buri wa Gatandatu w’icyumweru.
Buri muhanzi azajya ahabwa umunsi we ataramire abakunzi be n’ab’umuziki Nyarwanda muri rusange.
Iwacu Muzika Festival ni ubwa kabiri igiye kuba, cyane ko mu mwaka wa 2019 yazengurutse mu ntara zose z’igihugu abahanzi batandukanye bashimisha abakunzi babo.

Iserukiramuco rya Iwacu Muzika Festival ryatangirijwe i Musanze ku wa 22 Kamena 2019 kuri Stade Ubworoherane risorezwa i Kigali mu gitaramo cy’imbaturamugabo cyatumiwemo umuhanzi ufite izina ryamamaye mu muziki wa Afurika y’Iburasirazuba, Naseeb Abdul Juma [Diamond Platnumz] wataramiye ibihumbi by’abari muri Parking ya Stade Amahoro i Remera.
Humura Deborah yaririmbye inkuru mpamo y’uko yakunze umusore ntabimubwire kubera isoni
Mubyara wa Mani Martin witwa Humura Deborah yashyize hanze indirimbo ivuga ku nkuru mpamo y’ibyamubayeho, agakunda umusore ariko akananirwa kubimubwira.
Mubyara wa Mani Martin witwa Humura Deborah yashyize hanze indirimbo ivuga ku nkuru mpamo y’ibyamubayeho, agakunda umusore ariko akananirwa kubimubwira.
Indirimbo y’uyu mukobwa yitwa ‘Amasoni’ yayishyize hanze ku mugoroba wo kuri uyu wa Gatatu tariki 24 Kamena 2020.
Yabwiye IGIHE ati “Iyi ndirimbo ni inkuru mpamo y’ibyambayeho.
Nakunze umusore mu 2018 nanirwa kubimubwira, birangira tubaye inshuti bisanzwe.
Nyuma nanjye naje kumenya ko yankundaga ariko kubera ko nari naramwikuyemo dukomeza kubana bisanzwe.
Yagiriye inama abakobwa bagenzi be kutajya bagira isoni zo kubwira abahungu ko babakunda, cyane ko hari igihe ushobora kubivuga ugasanga worosoye uwabyukaga.
Yavuze ko afite imishinga myinshi ari gukoraho muri studio ku buryo nyuma y’iyi ndirimbo abantu bagiye kubona ibihangano bye byinshi.
Uyu mukobwa yyavukiye mu Mujyi wa Kigali ku Kimisagara.
Ni umuririmbyi akaba umwanditsi ndetse agacuranga na Guitar Acoustic.
Ni umwana wa gatandatu mu muryango w’abana umunani.
Amashuri yisumbuye yayize muri Apace.
Yavutse ku babyeyi bakunda muzika, baririmba banacuranga muri korali mu rusengero bituma akunda umuziki mu buryo bukomeye ndetse yifuza kuwukora nk’umwuga.
Aherutse gushyira hanze indirimbo yise ‘Kibe’ avuga ko ariyo ya mbere muri uyu mwaka wa 2020 ariko afite n’indi yari yarakoze mbere yise ‘Umunyenga’.
Humura ni mubyara wa Mani Martin, ni we umufasha mu buzima bwa muzika mu nzu ifasha abahanzi uyu musore afite yitwa Mani Martin Empire [MM Empire].
Mu mashusho y’iyi ndirimbo ye nshya yifashishijemo Bill Ruzima naho mu majwi ayiherekeza agenda yunganirwa na Mani Martin.
Niragire Marie France ukina filime yabaye umugore wa mbere washinze televiziyo mu Rwanda

Mu myaka 26 ishize Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi ihagaritswe itangazamakuru ry’u Rwanda ni rimwe mu bice bimaze kwiyubaka bigaragara, radiyo zumvikana mu gihugu hose zariyongereye ubu zirarenga kuri 35; televiziyo zikora zavuye kuri imwe ubu Abanyarwanda barahitamo iyo bashatse mu zirenga 10 zigaragara kuva Nyagatare kugera Rusizi.

Mu myaka 26 ishize Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi ihagaritswe itangazamakuru ry’u Rwanda ni rimwe mu bice bimaze kwiyubaka bigaragara, radiyo zumvikana mu gihugu hose zariyongereye ubu zirarenga kuri 35; televiziyo zikora zavuye kuri imwe ubu Abanyarwanda barahitamo iyo bashatse mu zirenga 10 zigaragara kuva Nyagatare kugera Rusizi.
Iterambere ry’itangazamakuru kandi ntiryasize irikorerwa kuri internet kuko naryo ryateye intambwe ifatika mu kumenyesha abaturarwanda amakuru agezweho.
Umuvuduko w’iterambere rya Televiziyo mu Rwanda ntusanzwe, kuko mbere ya 2013 hari imwe rukumbi, Televiziyo y’u Rwanda yashinzwe mu 1991.
Mu myaka irenga gato itatu, hamaze gutangira izindi zirenga 10 z’abikorera ku giti cyabo zose zifite urunyurane rw’amakuru n’ibiganiro zigeza ku Banyarwanda.

Umubyeyi wa televiziyo mu Rwanda ntaracura kuko aherutse kwibaruka Genesis TV, yatangijwe ku mugaragaro ku itariki ya 11 Kamena 2020 nubwo yari imaze iminsi inyuzaho imiziki itandukanye, ikaba igaragara kuri Canal+.
Genesis TV yamaze gufungura imiryango ibaye iya mbere itangijwe n’umugore mu Rwanda by’umwihariko akaba n’umukinnyi wa filime, Niragire Marie France.
Niragire yavuze ko yatekereje gushinga televiziyo ubwo yari amaze gutunganya filime ye ya mbere akabura aho azajya ayinyuza, yatekereje atyo gushinga televiziyo.
Yagize ati "Igitekerezo cyaje mu 2018 ubwo nari maze gutunganya filime yanjye ‘Little angels’ mbura ahantu yazajya ica hano mu gihugu, ni uko igitekerezo cya Genesis Tv cyaje.
Kuba umugore wa mbere ushinze televiziyo mu Rwanda avuga ko abikesha impanuro z’ubuyobozi bw’igihugu budahwema gushishikariza abagore kwitinyuka bakihangira imirimo.
Yakomeje avuga ko “Uretse kuba mbikunda, urabona ko Leta idukangurira kwitinyuka nk’abagore kuko dushoboye kandi twabikora, rero naritinyutse cyane.
Niragire watangiye gukina filime mu 2008 kugeza ubu amaze kugaragara mu zirenga zirindwi, yakuze yumva afite inzozi zo kuba umunyamakuru no gukora mu ndege.
Kuri ubu uyu mubyeyi nubwo yagize televiziyo ye bwite, ntibizamubuza gukina filime kuko ari impano ye kandi amaze igihe akoraho.
Mu nama yatanze yabwiye abagore by’umwihariko bakitinya kugaragaza ibibarimo kuko aribwo buryo bwiza bwo gutanga umusanzu mu kubaka ubukungu bw’igihugu.
Yagize ati "Nibatinyuke bakore burya ntabwo wahomba utashoye, nibakore nibiba bibi bigiremo bakore ibyiza ariko bakore ibyo bakunda kuko nibyo bizatuma bagera ku nzozi zabo.
Genesis TV yamaze gufungura imiryango izibanda cyane mu myidagaduro, ubukerarugendo n’ikoranabuhanga.
Iyi televiziyo nshya yatangiranye n’abanyamakuru bashya mu mwuga barimo Umutesi Denise wabaye Igisonga cya Kabiri cya Nyampinga w’u Rwanda mu 2020.
Ikiganiro na Niragire Marie France umugore wa mbere washinze Televiziyo mu Rwanda
Gakwaya wamenyekanye nka Nkaka muri filime yatangiye gucururiza kuri internet izo yakinnyemo zigakundwa
Uruganda rwa Filime mu Rwanda rutangiye kwaguka, abakina filime ndetse bakanazitunganya bayobotse isoko ryo kuzicururiza kuri Internet nyuma y’igihe havugwa iyiganwa ryazo no kubura isoko.
Uruganda rwa Filime mu Rwanda rutangiye kwaguka, abakina filime ndetse bakanazitunganya bayobotse isoko ryo kuzicururiza kuri Internet nyuma y’igihe havugwa iyiganwa ryazo no kubura isoko.
Umwe mu bamaze igihe muri sinema nyarwanda, Gakwaya Célestin, yatangiye gusangiza Abanyarwanda zimwe muri filime yakinnye mu myaka ishize zikamenyekana ariko benshi batazi aho bazikura.
Gakwaya yamenyekanye muri filimi zirimo “Serwakira" .
Hari hashize igihe kinini atumvikana muri sinema nyarwanda.
Yabwiye IGIHE ko kuri ubu ahugiye mu gukora filime nshya ariko yanahisemo kumara ipfa abakunze zimwe muri filime yakinnyemo ariko benshi batazi aho bazikura.
Uyu mugabo yavuze ko yabitekerejeho nyuma yo kubona ko isoko rya filime risa n’iryahinduye imikorere aho uburyo bwakoreshwaga mu myaka ishize ubu bwataye agaciro.
Ati “Urumva mbere wasangaga dukora filime tukazicuruza kuri CD, benshi batabaga baraziguze byarabagoraga kuba bazibona.
Nyuma yo kwitegereza uko isoko ryo muri iyi minsi rihagaze, natekereje uburyo bushya bwo gusangiza abakunzi ba filime nyarwanda ibihangano byanjye.
Izi filimi zizajya zishyirwa kuri Youtube kuri shene yitwa Ingobe Films.
Ku ikubitiro iyagiyeho ni iyitwa Teta yasohotse mu 2018.

Iyi filime igaragaramo abakinnyi b’ibyamamare nka Nsanzamahoro Dennis wamenyekanye nka Rwasa uherutse kwitaba Imana, Munezero Aline uzwi nka Bijoux muri filime yo gusetsa yitwa Bamenya, Benimana Ramadhan [Bamenya] ukina yitwa Bamenya muri iyi filimi y’urwenya, Niragire Marie France, Gakwaya Célestin n’abandi.
Usibye iyi filime, Gakwaya avuga ko afite izindi nyinshi agiye gutangira gusangiza abakunzi ba filime nyarwanda harimo n’inshya yitegura gutangira gufatira amashusho.
