Umuramyi Kagame Charles yasohoye indirimbo ikebura abasubizwa bagahita badamarara
Umuhanzi Kagame Charles ukorera umurimo w’ivugabutumwa rinyuze mu ndirimbo mu Itorero rya LifeHouse muri Australia yashyize hanze indirimbo nshya yise “Ntuzibagirwe".
Umuhanzi Kagame Charles ukorera umurimo w’ivugabutumwa rinyuze mu ndirimbo mu Itorero rya LifeHouse muri Australia yashyize hanze indirimbo nshya yise “Ntuzibagirwe".
Indirimbo nshya Kagame Charles yasohoye ni iya gatatu ye ashyize hanze mu mezi arindwi amaze yinjiye mu muziki uhimbaza Imana,.
“Ntuzibagirwe" igizwe n’iminota itanu n’amasegonda ane, yatunganyijwe mu buryo bw’amajwi na Producer Boris.
Ubutumwa buyirimo buvuga ku muntu wasubijwe ariko agasabwa ko nagera muri ayo masezerano atagomba kwibagirwa Imana yabikoze.
Kagame Charles yavuze ko yinjiye mu muziki ngo akorere Imana yivuye inyuma kandi n’umutima ukunze.
Yagize ati “Nahisemo gukora umuziki uhimbaza Imana kuko ari umuhigo nahigiye Imana nkiri muto ko nzayiririmbira, ngasakaza ubutumwa bwo kugira neza kwayo.
Ni ibintu nkora nta nyungu runaka mbishakamo ahubwo bigamije kugarurira abantu benshi kuri Kirisitu.
Kagame Charles ni umuramyi winjiye mu muziki yiyongera ku bandi basanzwe bawukorera hanze y’u Rwanda.
Uyu muhanzi ufatira icyitegererezo ku muramyi Israel Mbonyi, mu mishinga ye ya bugufi arateganya gutunganya amashusho y’indirimbo ze kugira ngo zikomeze kugera kuri benshi.
Kuva atangiye kuririmba, Kagame Charles amaze gusohora indirimbo eshatu zirimo “Ahindura ibihe" yatangiriyeho, “Tubagarure" na “Ntuzibagirwe" ari nayo nshya.
Pasiteri Antoine Rutayisire agiye kujya mu kiruhuko cy’izabukuru

Umuyobozi wa Paruwasi ya Remera mu Itorero Angilikani, Rev Past Dr Antoine Rutayisire wamenyekanye mu nyigisho zitandukanye z’iyobokamana, yatangaje ko mu myaka itatu azajya mu kiruhuko cy’izabukuru nk’uko biteganywa mu mahame itororo Angilikani rigenderaho.

Umuyobozi wa Paruwasi ya Remera mu Itorero Angilikani, Rev Past Dr Antoine Rutayisire wamenyekanye mu nyigisho zitandukanye z’iyobokamana, yatangaje ko mu myaka itatu azajya mu kiruhuko cy’izabukuru nk’uko biteganywa mu mahame itororo Angilikani rigenderaho.
Itorero Angilikani riteganya ko Pasiteri cyangwa Musenyeri wujuje imyaka 65 ku munsi yizihirijeho isabukuru y’imyaka 65 ahita ajya mu kiruhuko cy’izabukuru.
Hashize iminsi ku mbuga nkoranyamabaga hacicikana amakuru y’uko Rev.
Antoine Rutayisire agiye kujya mu kirihuko cy’izabukuru ariko ugasanga abantu batabivugaho rumwe benshi bavuga ko agikenewe mu murimo w’Imana.
Mu kiganiro yagiranye na IGIHE, Rutayisire yavuze ko ayo makuru ari ukuri kandi ko agenda abyibutsa abantu iyo avuga ubutumwa mu materaniro atandukanye.
Ati “Ibyo ni ukuri nta kinyoma kirimo kubera ko twebwe buriya mu Itorero Angilikani iyo wujuje imyaka 65 ujya mu kiruhuko cy’izabukuru.
Nta muntu wabimpimbiye ni njye wabivuze.
Nkunze no kubivuga muri iyi minsi.
Kugeza ubu Rev.
Antoine Rutayisire afite imyaka 62.
Yavuze ko ku itariki 29 Gicurasi 2023 azaba asoje imirimo ahabwa n’itorero, gusa avuga ko atazahagarika ivugabutumwa.
Ati “Ku itariki 29 z’ukwezi kwa Gatanu nzabyuka ntakiri umukozi wa Diyoseze.
Ntabwo nzaba nahagaritse ubutumwa ariko nzaba nahagaritse kuyobora Paruwasi n’indi mirimo yose.
Uyu mugabo wize imiyoborere avuga ko iyo umuntu asigaje imyaka itanu ngo ajye mu kiruhuko cy’iza bukuru aba agomba gutegura ubuzima bwe buri imbere kandi ngo we yarabirangije.
Yavuze ko iyo ari kwigisha ijambo ry’Imana bimunezeza ariko ko hari n’undi munezero yumva ategereje kandi ngo ntibizamubuza gutanga umusanzu mu itorero atari mu buyobozi.
Ati "Mfite undi munezero numva ntegereje imbere Imana nintiza ubuzima burenga imyaka 65.
Namaze gukora gahunda y’akazi k’ubuzima bwanjye, uko nzasaza ntabwo nzasaza nsaziye mu biro, ntabwo mbyifuza.
Akomoza ku byo azibandaho mu kiruhuko cy’izabukuru, yavuze ko azakomeza kwandika ibitabo akarushaho no kwishimana n’umuryango we cyane abuzukuru be.

Ati “Maze kugira abuzukuru, byanezeza nicaye hamwe nkajya njyana abuzukuru ku ishuri ba nyina na ba se bagiye mu kazi nkajya kubabafatira bakaza nkabagaburira nkicarana nabo nkasekana nabo nkagira igihe cyo kunezerwa.
Antoine Rutayisire yatangiye ivugabutumwa 1983 akimara gukizwa.
Mu 1990 yaretse akazi ko kuba mwalimu igihe cye agiharira kwigisha ijambo ry’Imana.
Icyo gihe yahise ajya kuyobora Umuryango w’ivugabutumwa rishingiye kuri Bibiliya w’abanyeshuri ba Kaminuza, akaba ariwe wabaye Umunyamabanga mukuru wawo wa mbere kugeza mu 1994.

Coronavirus: Mgr Rukamba yatanze icyifuzo cy’uko hajya hakoreshwa ikiyiko mu guhazwa, abajya mu misa bakandikwa

Umushumba wa Diyosezi ya Butare, Musenyeri Philippe Rukamba, yandikiye abapadiri n’abakirisitu ayoboye abagaragariza ingingo zimwe zakurikizwa mu gihe amakoraniro mu Kiliziya yaba asubukuwe nyuma y’iminsi mike hakomorewe gusezerana ariko harimo abantu batarenze 30.

Umushumba wa Diyosezi ya Butare, Musenyeri Philippe Rukamba, yandikiye abapadiri n’abakirisitu ayoboye abagaragariza ingingo zimwe zakurikizwa mu gihe amakoraniro mu Kiliziya yaba asubukuwe nyuma y’iminsi mike hakomorewe gusezerana ariko harimo abantu batarenze 30.

Inama y’Abaminisitiri idasanzwe yateranye ku wa Kabiri tariki 16 Kamena 2020, yahaye icyizere insengero cyo kongera gufungura mu minsi 15 iri imbere, nyuma y’amezi atatu zidasengerwamo kubera ingamba zo kwirinda ikwirakwira ry’icyorezo cya Coronavirus.

Umwanzuro w’inama y’abaminisitiri uvuga ko “Insengero zizakomeza gufunga, abanyamadini barashishikarizwa gukomeza gushyiraho ingamba zo gukumira no kwirinda Covid-19, mu rwego rwo kwitegura kuba insengero zafungurwa mu minsi 15 iri imbere hashingiwe ku bizava mu isesengura ry’ubuzima".

Magingo aya, Abasenyeri n’abayobozi b’amadini batangiye kwitegura uko bashyira mu bikorwa ingamba zo kurwanya Coronavirus, kugira ngo nibaramuka bakomorewe bazabe bariteguye ku buryo amasengesho azakorwa hanirindwa ikwirakwira ry’iki cyorezo,
Mu ibaruwa Musenyeri Rukamba yandikiye abapadiri ayoboye n’abakirisitu, yabamenyesheje ingingo 20 zazakurikizwa mu gihe leta yaba ikomoreye insengero nk’uko iheruka ku bitangaza.
IGIHE yamenye amakuru y’uko muri iki gihe hari kuba ibiganiro n’abakirisitu ku buryo basobanukirwa neza aya mabwiriza, ndetse hagatoranywa n’abazafasha abandi mu kuyumva no kuyakurikiza.

Muri izo ngingo, harimo ko ahasengerwa hagomba kuba hafite ibikoresho byose byifashishwa mu kwirinda ikwirakwira rya COVID-19; ndetse ko mu kwirinda ubucucike mu nsengero, abapadiri bagomba gutanga aho bazasengera muri paruwasi yabo, ubuso bwaho n’umubare w’abantu bashobora gusengeramo bakurikije ingano yaho.
Yakomeje ababwira ko abagiye gusenga bagomba kuzajya bambara agapfukamunwa igihe cyose kandi bagashyira intera ya metero ebyiri hagati y’umuntu n’undi.
Ati “Ibyo bizasaba kwerekana imyanya abantu bicaramo.
Misa zizongerwa ku buryo abifuza kuzazijyamo bose bazabibonera uburyo ndetse misa zimwe zo mu mibyizi zikaba zasimbuza izo ku cyumweru.
Ikindi ni uko mu kiliziya hagomba gushyirwa umuti wo gukaraba wica udukoko cyangwa se za kandagira ukarabe ku buryo abantu babona uko bakaraba intoki binjiye ndetse banasohotse mu kiliziya.
Yakomeje agira ati “Kubera ko guhazwa mu biganza bitemewe, uhaza azakoresha ikiyiko kandi yambare agapfukamunwa.
Mu gihe cyo gutura, yavuze ko mu kiliziya hazaba hari ibiseke bine kugira ngo abantu badahura kandi bature vuba.
Ati “Niho bazashyira amaturo y’amafaranga.
Amaturo y’imyaka bazajya bayashyira ahantu bagende badakoze ku maturo basanze aho, nyuma Padiri ajye kuyaha umugisha, awuha n’abatuye.
Muri aya mabwiriza harimo kandi ko umubare w’abaririmba (Chorale) uzagabanuka.

Imwe mu ngingo yakunze kwibazwaho cyane mu gihe Kiliziya n’insengero bizaba bikomorewe, ni ijyanye n’uburyo bwo kugabanya umubare w’abantu bajya gusenga; Musenyeri Rukamba yanditse ko hazabaho kugena misa hakurikijwe imiryango remezo.
Ati “Umuyobozi w’Umuryango remezo azakora urutonde rw’abantu baje mu misa bo mu gace ke, agaragaza aho batuye na nimero zabo za telefoni.
Ikindi ni uko ku bana, abemerewe kuzajya bajya mu misa ari abarengeje imyaka 12 kandi nabo bakajyayo baherekejwe n’ababyeyi.
Yakomeje avuga ko nta misa izajya irenza amasaha abiri, ndetse ko mbere y’uko indi itangira, hazajya habaho umwanya wo gusukura Kiliziya w’isaha imwe.
Ku bapadiri n’abasomyi, bo ngo ntibazajya bambara udupfukamunwa ndetse ntibemerewe guhererekanya ibitabo n’indangururamajwi.

Abayoboke b’amadini bari bamaze amezi atatu batagera mu nsengero, bavuga ko bizeye ko isesengura ry’inzego z’ubuzima nta kabuza rizabemerera gusubira mu nzu z’Imana kuko ingamba abanyamadini bafashe zisobanutse.

Kayitare Jean Claude wo muri Paruwasi Gatolika ya Rutonde muri Arkidiyosezi ya Kigali, yavuze ko nubwo misa zakomeje binyuze kuri radiyo na televiziyo, yishimiye kuba insengero zigiye kongera gufungura.
Ati “Hari abantu usanga gusengera mu rugo bibagora kubera ibibarangaza.
Kuba insengero zishobora kongera gufungurwa turabyishimiye cyane kandi turabishimira Imana".
Kuva muri Werurwe iki cyorezo cyagaragara mu Rwanda, abanduye ni 787 mu gihe abamaze gukira ari 370 naho abakirwaye ni 415 mu gihe babiri aribo bitabye Imana.
Hamaze gufatwa ibipimo 113 544.
Umuvugabutumwa wo muri ADEPR yinjiranye mu muziki indirimbo iri mu njyana ya Hip Hop

Tuyishimire Diogène uri mu bavugabutumwa bakunzwe mu Itorero rya ADEPR kubera amagambo y’ubuhanga akoresha mu nyigisho ze, yinjiye mu muziki uhimbaza Imana, ashyira hanze indirimbo ya mbere yise “Byanteye ubwoba".

Tuyishimire Diogène uri mu bavugabutumwa bakunzwe mu Itorero rya ADEPR kubera amagambo y’ubuhanga akoresha mu nyigisho ze, yinjiye mu muziki uhimbaza Imana, ashyira hanze indirimbo ya mbere yise “Byanteye ubwoba".
Izina rya Tuyishimire Diogène rirazwi cyane ariko rikunzwe by’umwihariko muri ADEPR.
Yamamaye cyane mu nyigisho avugamo uko Yesu afite imbaraga zidasanzwe, akamusanisha n’ibintu byose.
Agira ati “Nta kintu adasa nacyo.
Mu bana yabaye umwana w’Imana, mu bagabo aba umugabo w’abapfakazi, mu bapapa aba se w’imfubyi, mu biti aba umuzabibu w’ukuri mwe [abakirisitu] muri amashami…’’
Uyu muvugabutumwa yakuranye inzozi zo kuzaba umuhanzi ariko wibanda ku butumwa bufitiye akamaro sosiyete Nyarwanda.
Tuyishimire yakuze yiyumvamo cyane Hip hop ndetse indirimbo ye ya mbere yise ‘‘Byanteye ubwoba’’ icuranze muri iyo njyana.
Aganira na IGIHE Tuyishimire yavuze ko gusohora indirimbo ari inzozi ze zabaye impamo.
Ati ‘‘Nakuze nifuza kuba umuhanzi, igihe nyacyo cy’Imana nasanze ari iki ngo nsohore indirimbo yanjye ya mbere.
Mu ndirimbo ye avuga ko nubwo Isi irushya abantu ariko Imana izahindura byose bishya, akongera ati “Mu buzima nubwo tubabazwa ariko Imana izaduha guhozwa.
Yakomeje ati “Nashatse kugaragaza ko nubwo mu Isi umuntu ashobora kunyura mu buzima bukomeye ariko hari Imana ibuyobora; ubuzima bukomeye bugahinduka ubworoshye binyuze mu kwizera Imana.
“Byanteye ubwoba" ifite iminota itatu n’amasegonda 36 yakozwe mu buryo bw’amajwi na Producer Trackslayer.
Tuyishimire yayiririmbye afatanyije na Dushimiyimana Emmanuel uzwi nka Manud na we ubarizwa muri ADEPR.
Yiyongereye ku bandi bahanzi bake bo mu itorero rya ADEPR baririmba mu njyana ya Hip hop.
Yashimangiye ko gukora umuziki muri Hip hop bidakwiye gufatwa nabi mu gihe atanga ubutumwa butomoye.
Yagize ati ‘‘Ubusanzwe nta njyana iva ku Mana, zose nizo abantu bihangiye, ziva mu bwenge bwabo.
Numva rero injyana atari ikibazo ahubwo ikibazo cyaba ubutumwa burimo.
Tuyishimire Diogène afite imyaka 27, ni umugabo wubatse, ufite umugore n’umwana umwe.
Asengera mu Itorero rya ADEPR muri Paruwasi ya Jabana.

The Bright Five Singers yashyize hanze indirimbo yo gufasha abantu kwizihiza umunsi mukuru wa Pantekote

Itsinda ry’abaririmbyi rizwi nka The Bright 5 Singers, ribarizwa muri Kiliziya Gatolika muri Paroisse Cathédrale Saint Michel mu Mujyi wa Kigali, ryakoze inganzo rishyira hanze indirimbo ifasha abantu kwizihiza umunsi mukuru wa Pantekote.

Itsinda ry’abaririmbyi rizwi nka The Bright 5 Singers, ribarizwa muri Kiliziya Gatolika muri Paroisse Cathédrale Saint Michel mu Mujyi wa Kigali, ryakoze inganzo rishyira hanze indirimbo ifasha abantu kwizihiza umunsi mukuru wa Pantekote.
Kuri uyu wa 31 Gicurasi 2020 muri Kiliziya Gatolika n’andi madini yemera Yezu barazirikana igihe Yezu Kristu yasubiraga mu Ijuru maze akaboherereza Roho Mutagatifu.

Mu kuzirikana uyu munsi no gufasha abakirisitu kuwizihiza, abaririmbyi ba The Bright 5 Singers bahimbye indirimbo yitwa ‘Roho, ngwino utumurikire’ ijyanye n’uwo munsi kugira ngo bafashe abakristu bose kuzirikana ibanga ryawo.
Iraguha Alain Marius uhagarariye The Bright 5 Singers yabwiye IGIHE ko iyi ndirimbo bashyize hanze irimo ubutumwa busaba roho w’Imana kumurikira abantu.
Ati “Irimo ubutumwa busaba Roho w’Imana kumurikira abantu kugira ngo babashe gukorera Imana badategwa, kuko muri iyi minsi benshi bacitse intege.

Itsinda rya The Bright Five Singers ryatangiye gukora ubutumwa mu 2015 ku itariki 15 Ukwakira ariko abarigize bose bari basanzwe ari abaririmbyi dore ko benshi muri bo bize muri Seminari zitandukanye.
Barangije amashuri yisumbuye, bane muri bo bahuriye mu yahoze ari Kaminuza Nkuru y’u Rwanda i Huye (NUR) muri korali yitwa Le Bon Berger.

Ubwo habaga amahugurwa yari yateguwe na Choeur International et Ensemble Instrumental de Kigali agenewe abaririmbyi mu 2011 igatumira umugabo w’umuhanga muri muzika wo muri Cameroun witwa Jean Jacques Gregoire Belobo, niwe wabateye iyo nyota yo kurushaho gukunda umuziki, ariko anabasigira ubumenyi ari nabwo bifashishije mu kuzamura imiririmbire yabo.
Nyuma y’aho basoreje amashuri nibwo bihuje bakora iri tsinda.
Bakunda gukora ibitaramo bitandukanye biteguriye cyangwa se batumiwemo.
Iri tsinda ryanashyize hanze Album ya mbere yitwa ‘Musabe Muzahabwa’.
Yagiye hanze kuwa 15, Ukwakira 2017.
Bafite izindi zirimo iyitwa "Uhoraho", "Sangwa Mariya", "Dusingize Imana" n’izindi.
Indirimbo nshya yakozwe mu buryo bw’amajwi na Emmy Pro usanzwe akora indirimbo iz’abaririmbyi bo muri kiliziya Gatolika naho amashusho atunganywa na Gaga.
I Kibeho ku butaka butagatifu hagiye kubakwa Bazilika
Kiliziya Gatolika ku bufatanye n’Akarere ka Nyaruguru igiye gutangira imirimo yo kubaka Bazilika mu gace kabereyemo amabonekerwa ka Kibeho.

Nyuma y’aho Igishushanyo mbonera cyerekana imiterere y’iyi Basilika kigiriye hanze, kuwa 9 Mutarama Ubuyobozi bw’Akarere ka Nyaruguru n’ubwa Kiliziya Gatolika bwahuye n’abazayubaka kugira ngo harebwe uburyo imirimo yo kuyubaka izashyirwa mu bikorwa.
Umuyobozi w’Akarere ka Nyaruguru Habitegeko François yavuze ko imirimo y’ibanze yo kubaka iyi Bazilika igeze kure ndetse ko mu 2021 izaba yuzuye.
Yagize ati “Izuzura mu Ugushyingo 2021.
Imirimo y’ibanze irimo iy’inyigo no gushyiraho ikigega kigamije gukusanya inkunga yararangiye".
Iyi Bazilika izaba yubatse ku butaka butagatifu bw’i Kibeho busanzwe bugendererwa n’Abakirisitu batari bake kubera amabonekerwa yahabereye mu myaka ya 1980.
Kuri ubu inzego zose bireba zarangije gusuzuma ibikenewe, bikaba biteganyijwe ko imirimo yo kubaka iyi Bazilika izatwara amafaranga y’u Rwanda agera kuri miliyari 70.
Binyuze kuri Twitter, ubuyobozi bw’Akarere ka Nyaruguru bwasabye abikorera gushora imari muri Nyaruguru, cyane cyane mu bijyanye n’ibikorwa remezo by’ubukerarugendo n’amahoteli.

Ubuyobozi bw’Akarere ka Nyaruguru buvuga ko kandi iyi Bazilika izaba ifite ibindi bikorwa remezo birimo inzu z’amacumbi zishobora basanzwe bagenderera aka karere buri mwaka mu ngendo z’iyobokamana, by’umwihariko abaza ku munsi wizihizwaho kujya mu ijuru kwa Bikira Mariya.
Tariki 28 Ugushyingo 1981, ni bwo Bikira Mariya yabonekeye umukobwa wa mbere witwa Mumureke Alphonsine wigaga mu Rwunge rw’Amashuri rwa Mère du Verbe i Kibeho.
Nyuma y’umwaka umwe, yongeye kubonekera uwitwa Mukamazimpaka Anathalie, nyuma yongera kubonekera Mukangango Marie Claire na bo bigaga kuri iryo shuri.
Bose yabahaga ubutumwa bagomba kugeza ku batuye Isi.
Kanuma Jean Damascène yashyize hanze indirimbo nshya yise ‘Nkurya Munsi’
Umuhanzi Kanuma Jean Damascène uri mu bahanzi bafite igikundiro mu muziki wo kuramya no guhimbaza, yashyize hanze indirimbo nshya yise ‘Nkurya Munsi’.
Umuhanzi Kanuma Jean Damascène uri mu bahanzi bafite igikundiro mu muziki wo kuramya no guhimbaza, yashyize hanze indirimbo nshya yise ‘Nkurya Munsi’.
Indirimbo nshya ya Kanuma Jean Damascène yayise ‘Nkurya Munsi’ yubakiye ku butumwa buganisha kuri Pantekote, Umunsi abarokore bizera ko ariwo Umwuka Wera yamanukiyeho Intumwa.
Mu gitero cya mbere agira ati “Urya munsi wa Pantekote, bose bari hamwe mu mwanya umwe, bahuje imitima n’uko umuriro ubatungura umeze nk’umuyaga uhuha cyane wuzura inzu bari bicayemo.
Mu nyikirizo y’iyi ndirimbo Kanuma asaba Imana ko yongera kohereza Umwuka Wera kuko wafasha mu kongera ububyutse mu itorero ryayo.
Kanuma Jean Damascène yabwiye IGIHE ko iyi ndirimbo ye nshya yayihimbye agamije gukumbuza abantu igihe Umwuka w’Uwiteka yamanukiraga intumwa.
Ati “Ni ndirimbo itwibutsa igihe Umwuka Wera yamanukiraga itorero rya mbere arizo Ntumwa za Yesu.
Igitekerezo cyo kuyikora cyanjemo umunsi nabonaga itorero riri guca mu miraba.
Kanuma yavutse yisanga mu muryango w’abaramyi.
Yanditse indirimbo ya mbere mu 2005 ayishyira hanze mu 2012.
Afite album ebyiri amaze gukora zo mu buryo bw’amajwi.
Umuhanzi Kanuma Jean Damascène yamenyekanye mu ndirimbo yise ‘Araje’, ‘Simba Wa Yuda’ n’izindi nyinshi.
Izina rye rirazwi cyane kuko asanzwe ari Umuyobozi w’Indirimbo muri Asaph Music International, ibarizwa mu Itorero Zion Temple Celebration Center iyoborwa na Apôtre Dr Paul Gitwaza.
Umunya-Canada uririmba indirimbo zihimbaza Imana yatunguranye avuga ko atayizera
Jonathan Steingard, inkingi ya mwamba mu itsinda rya riririmba indirimbo zihimbaza Imana mu Njyana ya Rock rizwi Hawk Nelson, yavuze ko atacyizerera mu Mana.
Jonathan Steingard, inkingi ya mwamba mu itsinda rya riririmba indirimbo zihimbaza Imana mu Njyana ya Rock rizwi Hawk Nelson, yavuze ko atacyizerera mu Mana.
Mu butumwa burebure uyu muririmbyi yasangije abamukurikira kuri Instagram yagaragaje atari umwe mu bizera Imana.
Ati “Maze igihe kinini nterwa ubwoba no kubasangiza ibi ariko ubu ndiyumvamo ko ari cyo gihe cyiza kuri njye kuba navugisha ukuri.
Ndizera ko iri atari iherezo ry’ikiganiro ahubwo ari intangiriro.

Yakomeje avuga ko kuba yarakuriye mu muryango usenga, akaba umwana w’umupasiteri agacuranga ndetse akaba n’umuririmbyi muri band ya gikirisitu akanitwa umukirisitu mu bintu byinshi yagiye anyuramo mu buzima bwe yaje gusanga ‘ubu atacyizerera mu Mana’.
Arongera ati “Amagambo aheruka make mu nteruro yari akomeye kuyandika, nashakaga no koroshya iyi nyandiko nkabyandika bitandukanye n’uko nabikoze ariko ntabwo byari kuba ukuri nk’uko bimeze gutya.
Uyu muhanzi ntabwo yigeze avuga niba ateganya kureka kuririmba indirimbo zihimbaza Imana.
Steingard yari amaze igihe kinini atekereza uburyo azabyandikamo.
Ngo yatangiye ashidikanya we ubwe aza kubiganiriza inshuti ze za hafi.
Yaje gutungurwa no gusanga hari abandi bakuriye mu nsengero nkawe batinya kubivuga kubera ko babura buri kimwe.
Abo basanzwe babana muri band bamushyigikiye bavuga ko intego yabo ari ugufasha abantu no kubatera imbaraga mu byo bakora mu kuri kuko Imana iri kumwe nabo kandi iri mu ruhande rwabo.
Hawk Nelson, itsinda Jonathan Steingard abarizwamo rigizwe n’abasore batanu [Daniel Biro, Jonathan Steingard, Micah Kuiper na David Niacaris].
Ni rimwe mu matsinda akomeye aramya Imana mu buryo bw’injyana ya rock na pop punk.
Ryashingiye mu Mujyi wa Peterborough, Ontario.
Rimaze gukora album umunani.
I’ve been terrified to post this for a while - but it feels like it’s time for me to be honest.
I hope this is not the end of the conversation, but the beginning.
I hope this is encouraging to people who might feel the same but are as afraid to speak as I am.
I want to be open.
I want to be transparent with you all - and also open to having my heart changed in the future.
I am not looking for a debate at all - just a chance to share my story in the hopes some good can come from it.
I love you all.

Tuyishimire Diogène.

Mu byigisho bye, icyamamaye ni icyo aba avugamo ukuntu Yesu nta kintu adasa nacyo kuko ‘Mu bana yabaye umwana w’Imana, mu bagabo akaba umugabo w’abapfakazi, mu bapapa aba se w’imfubyi, mu biti akavuga ati ninjye muzabibu w’ukuri mwe muri amashami…’
Umurebye mu maso ntiwamukekera ko yakwigisha mu buryo bukomeye ariko we ahamya ko ari imirimo yakoze kugira ngo agarure benshi mu nzira y’agakiza.
Uyu mugabo w’imyaka 27, ni umuvugabutumwa mu itorero rya ADEPR.
Yatangiye no gukora umuziki aho yamaze kwinjira mu njyana ya Hip hop.

Akurondoreye iby’urugendo rw’ubuzima ab’imitima yoroshye amarira arashoka bitewe n’uko yakubititse akiri muto ntabashe kwiga amashuri yisumbuye kubera ubuzima bugoye n’ubushobozi buke, ariko ubu ashima Imana aho igejeje ikora!
Mu buhamya bwe ntajya yibagirwa kugaragaza uko yari umusinzi unakora inzoga z’inkorano ndetse n’uburyo nyina umubyara yamusamye mu gihe yigiraga kuba umubikira.
Yakuriye kwa nyina wabo kuko nyina yamutaye akajya kwishakira undi mugabo.
Mu kiganiro cyihariye na IGIHE yavuye imuzi iby’ubuzima bwe.
Ati “Ubundi mama wanjye yigiraga kuba umubikira, yaje guhura n’umusore amutera inda rero birangira havutse njye.
Icyakora ntabwo yandeze kuko we yahise ashaka undi mugabo kandi ntabwo twari kubana.
Ibi byatumye nkura nderwa na mama wacu muto ku mubyeyi wanjye.
Ahamya ko yakuriye mu muryango w’abantu bakora inzoga z’inkorano, byatumye ku myaka icyenda gusa atangira kunywa inzoga.
Akurira mu buzima bwo gucuruza no gukora izo nzoga.
Arangije amashuri abanza ntabwo yabonye uko akomeza ayisumbuye kuko nta bushobozi bwari buhari, ati" Nyine ishuri narivuyemo mpita ninjira mu byo gukora inzoga kuko nibyo mu rugo bakoraga.
Ubu buzima yabubayemo ariko akunda umuziki, biza kumuviramo gushaka gukora indirimbo za mbere nubwo bitamuhiriye.
Ati “Numvaga naba umukinnyi wa APR FC cyangwa nkaba umuhanzi wa Hip Hop nari umufana ukomeye wa Riderman.
Yavuye iwabo ababeshye ko agiye gukora umuziki, naho agiye gucuruza inzoga z’inkorano mu Karere ka Musanze aza guhomba bikomeye.
Ubwo yari amaze guhomba mu by’inzoga z’inkorano yacuruzaga, Ev.
Tuyishimire yisanze asigaranye amafaranga make cyane nyamara yaramaze gutoroka kwa nyina wabo.
Inzoga zari zahombye abona ubuzima bwanze afata icyemezo cyo kwiyahura ndetse aranabigerageza Imana ikinga akaboko.

Ati “Narahombye bikomeye numva ubuzima burarangiye, nahisemo kwiyahura icyo gihe ngura inzoga nyinshi ngo niyahure nasinze, naguze ikinini cy’imbeba nsinda ntiyahuye birangira ndyamye, ariko nkajya numva ko ndi bwiyahure mu gitondo.
Bukeye hari ikiganiro cyacaga kuri Radio Flash Fm cyakorwaga na Pasiteri Ntambara.
Icyo gihe yavuze ijambo ryatumye mpindura umugambi wo kwiyahura.
Tuyishimire avuga Pasiteri Ntambara yigishije avuga ko hari umwana ugiye kwiyahura kandi naramuka abiretse azaba umuntu ukomeye w’umugabo.
Umugambi we uhita upfuba binyuze kuri uyu mukozi w’Imana.
Ati “Igitekerezo cyo kwiyahura cyahise kimvamo gutyo nyuma njya kureba mama wanjye wabaga mu Bugesera.
Ageze mu Bugesera yasanze umubyeyi we azi ko umwana we yabuze, icyakora kuko ubuzima butari bwiza ntabwo yahatinze ahubwo yagiye gushakisha uko yabaho.
Iki gihe yakoze muri restaurant, aha ni naho yatangiye gukora ibikorwa byo kwigisha ijambo ry’Imana ahereye ku hantu basengeraga.
Akora muri iyi restaurant yo mu Bugesera nibwo Ev.
Tuyishimire yatangiye kujya ajya gusengana n’abantu bari baturanye akarara aho basengeraga.
Abo basenganaga bakundaga uko yigisha anasoma ijambo ry’Imana umugabo umwe basenganaga aza kumusaba ko yazajya kubwiriza muri ADEPR i Huye.
Kuva icyo gihe yahise atangira kuba umuvugabutumwa wo mu itorero rya ADEPR atangira gutumirwa cyane mu materaniro anyuranye.
Mu 2016 umugabo basenganaga yamusabye ko yamurera akava aho basengeraga bakajya babana nk’umwana na Se.
Nyuma uyu mugabo yaje kwiyemeza kumwubakira inzu birangira mu 2018 akoze ubukwe aza kurushinga n’umwe mu bakirisitu bo mu itorero rya ADEPR.
Yerekeje amaso ku muziki
Kuva mu bwana bwe yakundaga umuziki by’umwihariko injyana ya Hip Hop, ibi byatumye uyu mugabo kuri ubu yumva yawukora ndetse indirimbo ya mbere ye ikaba igomba kujya hanze mu minsi ya vuba.
Ati “Nubwo nakora iyi yonyine ngahita ndekera aho, inzozi zanjye zaba zibaye impamo kuko mpfuye ntaririmbye nagendana agahinda kuko nabikunze kuva cyera.
Avuga ko yari kuba yarabikoze cyera ariko agira ubwoba bw’ukuntu abo basengana bazabifata ahitamo kubigendamo gake.
Iyi ndirimbo ye yitegura gusohora yitwa “Mfite ubwoba" yakozwe na Trackslayer, izaba ikubiyemo ubutumwa bw’ubuzima busanzwe ariko nanone buganisha ku Mana.

Icyerekezo cya Onomo, hoteli imaze umwaka ku isoko ry’u Rwanda- Ikiganiro na Nizey Emile uyiyobora
Muri Gicurasi 2018 u Rwanda rwungutse hotel y’inyenyeri eshatu (Onomo Hotel), iherereye mu Mujyi wa Kigali rwagati mu Kagari ka Rugenge, mu Murenge wa Nyarugenge ahazwi nko kuri Sopetrade.
Muri Gicurasi 2018 u Rwanda rwungutse hotel y’inyenyeri eshatu (Onomo Hotel), iherereye mu Mujyi wa Kigali rwagati mu Kagari ka Rugenge, mu Murenge wa Nyarugenge ahazwi nko kuri Sopetrade.
Onomo Hotel yubakishijwe imirimbo ijyanye na gakondo y’u Rwanda mu mitako y’imigongo, ibiseke n’ibishushanyo by’ubugeni bikoreshejwe amase avanze n’ibyondo biri mu mabara abereye guhangwa ijisho.
Iyi hotel igenzurwa na ONOMO Hotels imaze kubaka izina muri Afurika, ishami ryayo rya Kigali riri muri 16 ifite kuri uyu mugabane.
Onomo hotel ifite ibyumba 109 birimo 10 byigiye hejuru, iby’inama byakira abantu hagati ya 200-250, aho abantu bogera, parking n’ibindi.
Mu gihe imaze ku isoko ry’u Rwanda, yakira ibikorwa bitandukanye n’inama zibera mu Mujyi wa Kigali nk’uburyo bwo gutanga umusanzu wayo mu iterambere rishingiye ku bukerarugendo.
Kuva muri Nyakanga 2019, Onomo hotel yabonye umuyobozi mushya, Nizey Emile, ufite ubunararibonye mu by’amahoteli akesha ubumenyi yavanye mu Bwongereza no muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika.
Nizey w’imyaka 37 yavukiye mu Rwanda ariko aba cyane mu bihugu by’i Burayi no muri Amerika.
Ibijyanye n’amahoteli yabitangiye mu 2003 ari mu Bwongereza.
Mu buhamya bwe yatangiye akora akazi gaciriritse muri hoteli.

Mu 2008 yaje kwimukira muri Amerika ahakomereza ibijyanye n’amahoteli, ubu afite Impamyabushobozi y’Icyiciro cya Gatatu cya Kaminuza mu by’amahoteli yavanye muri Kaminuza ya Florida mu Mujyi wa Miami, yanahakuye iy’Icyiciro cya Kabiri cya Kaminuza mu bijyanye n’Imari.
Nizey yagiranye ikiganiro na IGIHE cyibanze ku cyerekezo cya Onomo Hotel n’imishinga ifite mu isoko ry’amahoteli mu Rwanda.
IGIHE: Onomo Hotel ihagaze ite ku isoko rya serivisi zo kwakira abantu mu Rwanda?

Nizey: Mu mahoteli tungana urebye n’igihe tumaze ku isoko, ubona ko tugeze ku rwego rwiza kandi turimo guhatana mu byo dutanga, mu myaka ibiri cyangwa itatu iri imbere tuzaba tugeze ku rwego rukomeye.
IGIHE: Ni iki Onomo Hotel yihariye kiyitandukanya n’andi mahoteli?
Nizey: Turi hoteli yibanda mu gukorana n’abanyabugeni n’abahanzi b’imbere mu gihugu.
Ibi ni ibintu twashyizemo imbaraga, nureba muri hoteli uzasangamo ibintu by’ubugeni kandi byakorewe mu Rwanda, abanyamideli na bo ni abantu tugomba gukorana na bo.
Gahunda dufite ni uguteza imbere ibintu bikorerwa mu Rwanda ariko cyane cyane dushyira imbaraga ku banyabugeni.
Ikindi navuga ni uko turi hoteli y’Abanyafurika, turi mpuzamahanga ariko muri twe dufite Afurika imbere, ni hoteli ifite icyicaro muri Maroc ariko ikorera n’ahandi muri Afurika.
Izina Onomo ubwaryo rifite inkomoko muri Mali, andi mahoteli hano ubona ko ari ayo muri Amerika n’i Burayi ariko twe twazanye iryo tandukaniro.
IGIHE: Murateganya kuzajya mukorana n’abahanzi mu buhe buryo?
Nizey: Tuzajya tugira imurikabikorwa ry’abahanzi, noneho ONOMO ibe aho abahanzi bose bumva ko bagomba gukorana nayo.
Iyi ni gahunda nshya mfite nk’umuyobozi, tugomba kwegera abahanzi yaba amastudio, abakora iby’ubugeni bose bakerekana ibihangano byabo hano.
Turashaka ko Onomo Hotel iba igicumbi cy’ubuhanzi Nyarwanda, turanashaka kuzahashyiraho ahantu bacururiza ibintu byabo kuko twabonye ko abanyamahanga benshi baba babishaka.
IGIHE: Nk’umuyobozi mushya ni uruhe ruhare uzatanga mu guteza imbere serivisi za hoteli ?

Nizey: Mfite ubumenyi buhagije mu by’amahoteli, iyo urebye iby’amahoteli mu Rwanda ubona ko byibanzwemo cyane n’abanyamahanga, gusa ni ibintu byumvikana kuko ni bishya mu gihugu kandi urebye ingufu u Rwanda rwashyize mu cyerekezo cyo kwakira abantu, hagombaga amahoteli mpuzamahanga kandi koko akeneye ubwo bumenyi.
Nta Munyarwanda wakoze mu mahoteli mpuzamahanga igihe kirekire, njye rero nagize ayo amahirwe yo kuba narakoranye n’amahoteli nka Radisson, Hilton, Marriott n’andi.
IGIHE: Muri Kamena 2020, u Rwanda ruzakira Inama ihuza Abakuru b’ibihugu na za Guverinonma bigize Umuryango w’Ibihugu bikoresha Icyongereza (CHOGM).
Onomo Hotel yiteguye ite kwakira abayobozi?

Nizey: Nk’andi mahoteli yose hari ibirimo gukorwa kugira ngo twitegure, hari inama tuzagirana n’abafatanyabikorwa kandi twamaze kubona ubutumwa buva muri RDB na Rwanda Convention Bureau butubwira iyo gahunda.
Hari ibyo turimo guhindura bijyanye n’iyo nama ariko bigomba kuba ari ibintu bizamara igihe kirekire.
IGIHE: Onomo Hotel ihagaze he mu bijyanye no guteza imbere ibikorerwa mu Rwanda?
Nizey: Twe dukoresha iby’iwacu kandi dufite n’akarusho kuko dufite akarima k’igikoni, Made in Rwanda itangirira iwacu.
Ibyo dukoresha byinshi tubikura mu Rwanda, yego hari ibikiva hanze wenda tutaragira ubushobozi bwo gukorera mu Rwanda ariko ibyinshi dukoresha ibiva hano mu Rwanda.
IGIHE: Mubona Abanyarwanda bitabira kujya mu mahoteli?
Nizey: Icyo ni ikibazo kikidukomereye kuko Abanyarwanda benshi bumva ko aya mahoteli ari ibintu by’ibitangaza, ariko biterwa n’umuco wacu wo kudakunda gusura ibintu nyaburanga byo mu Rwanda.
Iyo hajemo amahoteli byo usanga ari ibindi, nzi abantu babona nka Marriott Hotel ariko ntibajyeyo kandi babishoboye.

Simvuze ngo ibiciro byose abantu babishobora ariko reka dufate ikintu twese ducuruza mu Rwanda (Fanta), igiciro cyayo muri Onomo Hotel ni 1000 Frw; ibyo bituma abantu badakwiye kumva ko ari ahantu hatabagenewe.
Ibyo nk’abanyamahoteli nitwe tugomba kubihindura.
IGIHE: Ni ikihe cyerekezo cya Onomo Hotel?
Nizey: Dufite abakozi kandi bafite ubumenyi buhagije, abo dufite bakoze mu mahoteli akomeye barimo n’abafite ubumenyi burengeje imyaka itandatu mu kazi k’amahoteli.

Intego yacu ni ugukomeza gutanga serivisi nziza ariko byaba na ngombwa tugafungura irindi shami rya Onomo Hotel mu Rwanda, icyo gihe bizagaragaza ko yateye imbere, turashaka ko aha haba ahantu Abanyarwanda biyumvamo.

Intare zo muri Pariki y’Igihugu y’Akagera zikubye kane ziba 37

Ikigo African Parks gicunga Pariki y’Igihugu y’Akagera, cyatangaje ko Intare ziheruka kwimurirwa muri iyi pariki zikomeye kwiyongera, ku buryo mu myaka itanu ishize, izi nyamaswa zimaze kwikuba inshuro enye.

Ikigo African Parks gicunga Pariki y’Igihugu y’Akagera, cyatangaje ko Intare ziheruka kwimurirwa muri iyi pariki zikomeye kwiyongera, ku buryo mu myaka itanu ishize, izi nyamaswa zimaze kwikuba inshuro enye.

Mu 2015 nibwo nyuma y’imyaka igera kuri 15 intare zaracitse mu Rwanda, Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’Iterambere, RDB gifatanyije na ‘African Parks’ bagejeje mu Rwanda intare zirindwi zirimo iz’ingore eshanu muri gahunda yo kugarura izi nyamaswa muri Pariki y’Igihugu y’Akagera.
Mu mwaka wa mbere izi ntare zari zimaze kwikuba kabiri ubwo havukaga ibyana 11.
Mu mwaka wa 2017 haje kongerwamo intare ebyiri z’ingabo zivuye muri Afurika y’Epfo, zirushaho kwiyongera.

Ibyo byagiye bigendana no kuvugurura amategeko akumira abashimuta inyamaswa, hashyirwaho itsinda rishinzwe kubashakisha ryifashishije imbwa zatojwe, hanashyirwaho uruzitiro rwa kilometero 120 rurimo amashanyarazi akomoka ku zuba rutandukanya Pariki n’ubutaka bwagenwe nk’ubuhumekero bwayo, hagamijwe kugabanya uguhura kw’abantu n’inyamaswa.
Ikigo African Parks gifatanya n’Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’Iterambere, RDB, mu gucunga Pariki y’Igihugu y’Akagera guhera mu 2010, cyatangaje ko umubare w’izi ntare ukomeje kwiyongera.
Mu butumwa cyanyujije kuri Twitter cyagize iti “Twishimiye kubasangiza ko Intare zo muri @AkageraPark zikubye inshuro enye kuva zahagarurwa mu myaka itanu ishize.
Mu mwaka ushize ziyongereyeho ibyana bine, bituma umubare wazo ugera kuri 37.
Ubu iyi pariki ni imwe mu zikomeye muri Afurika kuko ifite inyamazwa eshanu zifatwa nk’izikaze kurusha izindi kuri uyu mugabane, ari zo Inkura, Intare, Imbogo, Inzovu n’Ingwe.

Gukomeza kwiyongera kw’inyamaswa byakomeje kugendana n’abasura iyi pariki, byatumye mu 2018 yinjiza amafaranga agera kuri miliyoni $2, ari nabwo bwa mbere yari ageze kuri icyo gipimo mu mateka y’iyi pariki.
Muri uyu mwaka ariko umubare w’abasura Pariki zo mu Rwanda uzagabanuka cyane kubera icyorezo cya Coronavirus cyahagaritse ingendo mpuzamahanga, ndetse n’izo mu gihugu zikorwa mu buryo bwitondewe.
RDB kuri uyu wa Gatanu yatangaje ko kuva ubukerarugendo bwongeye gufungurwa mu cyumweru gishize, ifite abantu 69 bamaze gusaba mbere y’igihe (booking) gusura Pariki y’Ibirunga.
Muri Nyungwe ni bane, naho abamaze gusaba gusura Pariki y’Akagera ni 215.

Uburyo bushya ushobora gusura ingagi zo mu birunga wibereye mu rugo

Abakerarugendo n’abandi babishaka ubu bashobora gusura ingagi zo muri Pariki y’Ibirunga bari mu rugo, ni nyuma y’uko ibikorwa by’ubukerarugendo mu gihugu kimwe n’ahandi byabaye bihagaritswe by’agateganyo mu kwirinda ikwirakwira ry’icyorezo cya Coronavirus.

Abakerarugendo n’abandi babishaka ubu bashobora gusura ingagi zo muri Pariki y’Ibirunga bari mu rugo, ni nyuma y’uko ibikorwa by’ubukerarugendo mu gihugu kimwe n’ahandi byabaye bihagaritswe by’agateganyo mu kwirinda ikwirakwira ry’icyorezo cya Coronavirus.

Muri iki cyumweru Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’Iterambere (RDB), ku bufatanye na The Ellen Fund, Dian Fossey Gorilla Fund na Habitat XR, batangaje ko bazanye uburyo abantu bashobora gusura ingagi zo mu birunga bifashishije uburyo bw’ikoranabuhanga buzwi nka ‘Virtual Reality (VR)’.
Ubu buryo bwatangijwe kuwa 22 Mata 2020, ubwo hizihizwaga umunsi wahariwe kurengera Isi n’ibiyiriho, butuma abantu basura ingagi zo muri Pariki y’Ibirunga, bibereye mu rugo.

Umunyamerikakazi akaba n’Umunyarwenya Ellen DeGeneres, uri no kubaka ikigo kizajya urimo kubaka ikigo kizajya gifasha mu bikorwa byo kubungabunga Ingagi muri Pariki y’Igihugu y’Ibirunga mu Rwanda, yavuze ko ubu buryo bwo gusura ingagi ‘budasanzwe kuko ari nk’aho uba uri kumwe n’ingagi’.
Iyi filimi y’iminota itandatu n’amasegonda atatu ikwereka imbonankubone ingagi zo mu birunga mu buryo butangaje ziri aho zisanzwe ziba mu birunga kandi ziri mu buzima busanzwe bwa buri munsi.
Bugufasha kuryoherwa n’ubwiza bwo gusura ingagi zo mu birunga mu Rwanda ukamera neza neza nk’uri kumwe na zo kuko amajwi yazo n’ay’inyoni z’aho ziri byose uba ubyumva nk’uri kumwe nazo.
Iyi filimi kuyireba ni ubuntu, ushobora kuyireba ku mbuga nka Oculus, Within, Samsung VR, Littlstar na VeeR.

Umuyobozi ushinzwe ubukerarugendo na Pariki z’igihugu muri RDB, Belise Kariza, avuga ko urwego rw’ubukerarugendo ku Isi rwashegeshwe bikomeye na Coronavirus, yatumye ibihugu bihagarika by’agateganyo gusura ingagi.

Avuga ko bibabaje kuba badashobora kwakira abashyitsi baje kureba no kwishimira ibyiza bitatse u Rwanda ariko ari mu nyungu za buri wese kuguma mu rugo mu gihe bakomeje gukorana n’abafatanyabikorwa mu gukora no gusangiza abantu ibyiza nk’ibiri muri iyi filimi yo gusura ingagi uri mu rugo.
Iyi filimi ushobora kuyireba no kuyimanura ku buntu (download) unyuze hano
Abarenga 280 bamaze gusaba gusura pariki z’igihugu kuva ubukerarugendo bwasubukurwa

Abantu 69 bamaze gusaba gusura Pariki y’Igihugu y’Ibirunga muri 280 basabye gusura ibice nyaburanga bitandukanye, nyuma y’uko ku wa 16 Kamena inama y’abaminitiri yemeje isubukurwa ry’ubukerarugendo bwo mu gihugu na mpuzamahanga ku bashyitsi baje mu ndege zihariye.

Abantu 69 bamaze gusaba gusura Pariki y’Igihugu y’Ibirunga muri 280 basabye gusura ibice nyaburanga bitandukanye, nyuma y’uko ku wa 16 Kamena inama y’abaminitiri yemeje isubukurwa ry’ubukerarugendo bwo mu gihugu na mpuzamahanga ku bashyitsi baje mu ndege zihariye.

Umuyobozi ushinzwe ubukerarugendo mu kigo cy’igihugu cy’iterambere (RDB), Belise Kaliza, yabwiye itangazamakuru kuri uyu wa Gatanu ko hari abantu barimo n’abanyarwanda n’abandi baturage bo mu bihugu byo mu Muryango wa Afurika y’Iburasirazuba baba mu Rwanda bagaragaje ko bashaka gusura Pariki y’Ibirunga n’izindi.
Yagize ati “Kuva twakongera gufungura ubukerarugendo mu cyumweru gishize, dufite abantu 69 bamaze gusaba mbere y’igihe (booking) gusura Pariki y’Ibirunga.
Muri Nyungwe ni bane, naho abamaze gusaba gusura Pariki y’Akagera ni 215, aho ejo hashize gusa bari 16".

U Rwanda ruherutse kugabanya ibiciro byo gusura ingagi, aho byagabanyijwe ku kigero cya 86% bigera ku $ 200 ku Banyarwanda na 67% ku banyamahanga batuye mu Rwanda biba $500, ku bandi hagumaho $1500 yasabwaga buri wese ukeneye kureba ingagi.
Ubusanzwe umuntu wese washakaga gusura ingagi yishyuraga amadolari ya Amerika 1500.
Ni ibiciro byashyizweho mu 2018 bivuye ku madolari 750.
Kaliza avuga ko iyi ari intambwe nziza mu korohereza abanyarwanda gusura ibyiza nyaburanga bitatse igihugu cyabo, abasaba kubyaza umusaruro aya mahirwe.
Ati “Urebye uko bihagaze, bimeze neza kandi twishimiye kuba twarashyizeho poromosiyo, turasaba abanyarwanda kubyaza umusaruro aya mahirwe".
Raporo y’Ishami ry’Ubukerarugendo mu Rugaga rw’Abikorera, PSF, yagaragazaga ko muri Werurwe bwagize igihombo cya miliyari 34.
9 Frw, bivuye ku nama zasubitswe n’ibindi bikorwa by’ubukerarugendo byahagaritswe.
Ibi bihombo byaje bisanga urwego rw’ubukerarugendo mu Rwanda rufite inguzanyo za miliyari 87.

Kaliza avuga ko mu kuzahura uru rwego rw’ubukerarugendo “Icya mbere cyakozwe ari uko hagiyeho ikigega gifasha uru rwego, kongera gufungura ubukerarugendo hibandwa ku bw’imbere mu gihugu, gushyiraho poromosiyo kandi n’abakererugendo bo mu mahanga bagafungurirwa amarembo".

Umuyobozi w’ishami ry’abakora ibijyanye n’ubukerarugendo mu rugaga rw’abikorera, Frank Gisha Mugisha, yavuze ko biteguye kwakira abakerarugendo n’inama kandi hashyizweho ingamba zigendanye n’amabwiriza y’inzego z’ubuzima yo kwirinda icyorezo cya Coronavirus.

Yakomeje avuga kandi ko muri iki gihe cyo kuzahura urwego rw’ubukungu by’umwihariko ubukerarugendo, abanyamahoteli, abatwara ba mukerarugendo biyemeje kugabanya ibiciro kuko ari ingenzi kandi hari aho byatangiye gukorwa.

Ikigo Mantis Rwanda gifite Epic Hotel & Suites, Akagera Game Lodge na Kivu Marina Bay Hotel, kivuga ko kugeza mu mpera za Nyakanga 2020, nk’umuntu ashobora kwishyura ijoro rimwe muri hotel, irya kabiri akagabanyirizwa kuri 50%, cyangwa yakwishyura amajoro abiri akongezwa irya gatatu kuri hotel zacyo zose.
Muri ubwo buryo kandi ikigo gitanga serivisi z’indege nko ku bashaka gutembera u Rwanda cyangwa mu zindi gahunda, Akagera Aviation, cyo cyashyizeho igabanya rya 30%.

Nko kuva ku wa 1 Nyakanga kugeza ku wa 30 Nzeri 2020, abashaka gukora urugendo rw’amasaha abiri muri kajugujugu R44 y’imyanya itatu, igiciro cyavuye ku $1600 kiba $1120 naho muri A119 y’imyanya itandatu cyavuye ku $4000 kiba $2800.
Ku rugendo rw’iminota 30, igiciro cyavuye ku $500 ku ndege y’imyanya itatu kigera ku $350, naho ku y’imyanya itandatu kiva ku $1000 kigera ku $700.

Nk’urugendo rwo kuva i Kigali ukajya kureba inyamaswa muri Pariki y’Igihugu y’Akagera ugenda na kajugujugu y’imyanya itatu, igiciro cyavuye ku $1440 kigera ku $1008, mu y’imyanya itandatu kiva ku $3000 kigera ku $2100.

RDB yatangaje ko umubare w’abashyitsi basuye u Rwanda wagabanutseho 54% muri Werurwe kuko nibwo Guma mu rugo yatangiye ndetse n’ibibuba by’indege birafungwa bigeze mu kwa Kane n’ukwa 5 bagabanukaho 100%.
RDB yabeshyuje amakuru y’uko ibikorwa by’ubukerarugendo bigiye gusubukurwa

Ikigo cy’Igihugu gishinzwe Iterambere, RDB, cyabeshyuje amakuru y’uko ibikorwa by’ubukerarugendo bigiye gusubukurwa, kivuga ko ibiri gukorwa ari kureba ingamba zazakurikizwa mu gihe kiri imbere ubwo gusubukura ubukerarugendo byaba byemejwe.

Ikigo cy’Igihugu gishinzwe Iterambere, RDB, cyabeshyuje amakuru y’uko ibikorwa by’ubukerarugendo bigiye gusubukurwa, kivuga ko ibiri gukorwa ari kureba ingamba zazakurikizwa mu gihe kiri imbere ubwo gusubukura ubukerarugendo byaba byemejwe.

Mu butumwa RDB yashyize ku rukuta rwayo rwa Twitter, yanditse ko amakuru ari gucaracara ajyanye n’uko ibikorwa by’ubukerarugendo bigiye gufungurwa nyuma yo gufungwa kubera Coronavirus, ahabanye n’ukuri.
Iti “RDB iri kugisha inama Minisiteri y’Ubuzima, urwego rw’ubukerarugendo, n’abandi bafatanyabikorwa ku bitekerezo bijyanye no kuzafungura ibikorwa mu gihe kiri imbere.
Gahunda izemezwa izatangazwa binyuze mu nzira zemewe ndetse izanamenyekanishwa binyuzwe mu itangazamakuru.

Ubukerarugendo ni rumwe mu nzego zifatiye runini u Rwanda kuko mu 2019 mu musaruro mbumbe wose w’igihugu, bwari bufitemo 10% mu gihe na mbere yaho umusaruro w’ibyo igihugu cyinjiza biturutse mu bukerarugendo wagiye wiyongera ku kigero cya 11% na 9% kuva mu 2008 kugera mu 2019.
Kimwe n’ahandi ku Isi, ubukerugendo bw’u Rwanda bwagizweho ingaruka zikomeye n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus.

By’umwihariko ibikorwa bikomeye byari byitezweho kwinjiriza igihugu amafaranga menshi nk’inama ya Commonwealth byarasubitswe, ndetse na ba mukerarugendo basuraga igihugu baragabanuka ku kigero cyo hejuru.

Muri Werurwe ubwo Coronavirus yagaragaraga mu Rwanda, habarurwaga ko abasura u Rwanda bagabanutseho 54% ndetse ibikorwa birenga 45% by’inama byari kuzakirwa mu gihugu byari byarasubitswe ndetse icyo gihe habarwaga igihombo gitewe na Coronavirus cya miliyoni 42 z’amadolari.
Mu mwaka ushize, ubukerarugendo bwinjiriye igihugu amafaranga menshi kuva mu 2011, kuko yageze kuri miliyoni 498 z’amadolari.
Ubukerarugendo bwafunguwe no ku banyamahanga, amahoteli yemererwa kwakira inama

Inama y’abaminisitiri yateranye kuri uyu wa Kabiri tariki 16 Kamena yakomoreye bimwe mu bikorwa byari bimaze iminsi byarahagaritswe kubera ingamba zo kwirinda icyorezo cya coronavirus, birimo ibikorwa by’ubukerarugendo n’amahoteli.

Inama y’abaminisitiri yateranye kuri uyu wa Kabiri tariki 16 Kamena yakomoreye bimwe mu bikorwa byari bimaze iminsi byarahagaritswe kubera ingamba zo kwirinda icyorezo cya coronavirus, birimo ibikorwa by’ubukerarugendo n’amahoteli.
Iyi nama y’Abaminisitiri yayobowe na Perezida Kagame muri Village Urugwiro, kuri uyu wa Kabiri.
Mu byemezo byafashwe, harimo gukomorera ubukerarugendo bwo mu gihugu n’ubukerarugendo mpuzamahanga ku bashyitsi baje mu ndege zihariye, baba abantu baje ku giti cyabo cyangwa amatsinda.
Mu ishyirwa mu bikorwa ry’uyu mwanzuro, Urwego rushinzwe iterambere mu Rwanda (RDB) ruzatanga amabwiriza arambuye y’uko bizakorwa.
Undi mwanzuro ni uw’uko hoteli zizakomeza gukora kandi zemerewe kwakira inama hubahirizwa amabwiriza yo kwirinda COVID-19.
Hoteli zashishikarijwe kandi kugira uruhare mu bukerarugendo bw’imbere mu gihugu.
Iyo myanzuro yakiriwe neza mu bakora mu rwego rw’amahoteli n’ubukerarugendo bafite ibikorwa byari bimaze igihe bifunze guhera muri Werurwe uyu mwaka.
Umuyobozi ushinzwe ubucuruzi n’imenyekanishabikorwa muri Hilltop Hotel, Innocent Tuyishime yabwiye IGIHE ko bishimiye kongera gukomorerwa.
Yagize ati “Ntabwo byoroshye mu gihe tumaze igihe tudakora ariko uyu mwanzuro twawakiranye ibyishimo bikomeye, tukaba twumva tugiye gushyiramo imbaraga mu kurushaho kwita ku bakiliya n’ibyo bakeneye.
Urwego rw’ubukerarugendo rugira uruhare runini ku iterambere ry’igihugu, natwe tugiye kurushaho gushyiramo imbaraga.
Raporo y’Ishami ry’Ubukerarugendo mu Rugaga rw’Abikorera, PSF, yagaragaje ko muri Werurwe ubukerarugendo bwagize igihombo cya miliyari 34.
9 Frw, bivuye ku nama zasubitswe n’ibindi bikorwa by’ubukerarugendo byahagaritswe, kubera ingamba zafashwe mu gukumira ikwirakwira rya Coronavirus.

Ni igihombo Tuyishime avuga ko cyabashegeshe ariko bakishimira ko ingamba zafashwe na Leta mu kwirinda zatumye ubwandu bwa coronavirus butiyongera cyane mu gihugu, ku buryo bizeye ko nibasubukura ibintu bizagenda bijya mu buryo gahoro gahoro.

Ati “Yego urwego rw’amahoteli n’ubukerarugendo rwarashegeshwe ariko turaza kugira aho dutangirira kuko abakiliya bacu baraho, natwe abakozi abakoresha turaho turi bazima nta wapfuye, nta wagize ikibazo.
Ibyo biraduha icyizere na Leta idufasha buri munsi, igihombo nubwo cyaba cyarabaye tuzafatanya ku buryo mu gihe kiri imbere bizajya bigenda bijya mu buryo.

Umuyobozi wa sosiyete Wilson Tours itembereza ba mukerarugendo, Habimana Wilson yavuze ko kuba ubukerarugendo bwasubukuwe ari inyungu ku bantu benshi kuko urwo rwego rwari rutunze ingeri zitandukanye.
Ati “ Buriya ubukerarugendo bugaburira abantu benshi.
Bugera ku bantu bakora mu ndege, abakata amatike, abayobora ba mukerarugendo, abatembereza ba mukerarugendo, bamwe bakora ibihangano, abahinzi, aborozi.
“Ba bandi batwaraga bantu barongera bakore ku gafaranga.
Buriya na wa muntu ufite ihene mu cyaro byamugezeho, na wa wundi wataze agatoki k’imineke, kuko niba nta bantu abona bahagera, bya bintu bye byaribwa na nde?
Abantu bagiye gusubira mu buzima, bwongere kugenda neza.

Ubukerarugendo ni rumwe mu nzego zifatiye runini u Rwanda kuko mu 2019 mu musaruro mbumbe wose w’igihugu, bwari bufitemo 10% mu gihe na mbere yaho umusaruro w’ibyo igihugu cyinjiza biturutse mu bukerarugendo wagiye wiyongera ku kigero cya 11% na 9% kuva mu 2008 kugera mu 2019.
Ibyo wamenya kuri Siporo ya Kayaking, imwe mu zikunzwe na ba mukerarugendo basura i Kivu

Siporo ya Kayaking, ni imwe muri nyinshi zishobora gukorerwa mu mazi, ariko imaze igihe gito igeze mu Rwanda nyuma y’igitekerezo cy’Umwongereza wasuye ibice by’i Kivu akabona ko byaba byiza kuhatangiza uyu mukino.

Siporo ya Kayaking, ni imwe muri nyinshi zishobora gukorerwa mu mazi, ariko imaze igihe gito igeze mu Rwanda nyuma y’igitekerezo cy’Umwongereza wasuye ibice by’i Kivu akabona ko byaba byiza kuhatangiza uyu mukino.
Ubusanzwe mu mazi bimenyerewe ko hakorerwa siporo yo koga, hakaba kandi ahantu abantu bashobora gutembera bareba ibyiza by’ikiyaga cyangwa inyanja bakoresheje ubwato.
Abaturiye ahari amazi, usanga bazi neza umukino wo koga, ariko bikagarukira aho.
Mu 2015 nibwo mu kiyaga cya Kivu hatangijwe umukino wa Kayaking ukinwa n’abagamije kwishimisha ariko na none ukaba ufasha umuntu mu kurambura ingingo zinyuranye.
Iyi siporo ikorwa hifashishijwe ubwato buto bwabugenewe, umuntu akicaramo arambije amaguru, afite ingashya ifite aho ukoresha ugashya iburyo n’ibumoso ku buryo udahindura mu kandi kaboko.

Ntabwo ari umukino bisaba ko umuntu aba asanzwe azi koga cyangwa se amenyereye uko ukinwa, ahubwo buri gihe iyo ugiye mu mazi, uba ufite umuntu uri kukwerekera ku buryo uguyemo cyangwa ukagira ikindi kibazo ashobora kugukurura.
Uwikunda Gratien ni umwe mu bafasha ba mukerarugendo muri iyi siporo.
Ni umurimo yatangiye mu 2015 ubwo iyi siporo yageraga mu Rwanda.

Yabwiye IGIHE ko “uwaje abizanye yaje aturutse mu Bwongereza, ageze inaha asanga byaba ari byiza ko byakongerwa mu bishimisha ba mukerarugendo mu gihugu kugira ngo umuntu agire n’ibindi bikorwa yakwishimira.
Umubare munini w’abitabira uyu mukino ni abanyamahanga cyane abaturutse mu Burayi na Amerika kuko muri ibyo bihugu wateye imbere aho usanga hari n’abantu ku giti cyabo batunze ubu bwato.
Abantu ba mbere bahuguriwe uyu mukino muri Gicurasi 2015, nyuma y’amezi ane iyi siporo itangira gucuruzwa ku basuye inkengero za Kivu n’ahandi hari amazi.
Ku isaha umunyamahanga yishyura amadolari ya Amerika 25 mu gihe umunyarwanda we agabanyirizwa igiciro ho 40%.
Umuntu wese uri gukina iyi siporo, asabwa kwambara umwenda utuma atarohama mu gihe ari mu mazi.
Ni siporo ituma umuntu ananura ingingo zitandukanye z’igice cyo hejuru nk’amaboko, ndetse ifasha umuntu kuba atagira umubyibuho ukabije ku gice cy’inda.

Ubwato bukoreshwa buba bwarabigenewe ndetse buratandukanye cyane ku biciro, kuko hari nk’ubugura amadolari 1500 utabariyemo imisoro n’ubundi bushobora kugeza kuri miliyoni esheshatu z’amafaranga y’u Rwanda.

Uruhare rw’abaturage ku isonga mu byatumye Gishwati - Mukura izuka igahinduka Pariki y’Igihugu

Muri Gashyantare 2016 nibwo ishyamba kimeza rya Gishwati -Mukura riherereye mu ruhererekane rw’Imisozi y’isunzu rya Congo-Nil, ryemejwe nka Pariki y’Igihugu ya kane, yitezweho gutanga umusanzu mu kwinjiza amadevize binyuze mu bukerarugendo n’izindi nyungu zituruka ku kubungabunga ibidukikije.

Muri Gashyantare 2016 nibwo ishyamba kimeza rya Gishwati -Mukura riherereye mu ruhererekane rw’Imisozi y’isunzu rya Congo-Nil, ryemejwe nka Pariki y’Igihugu ya kane, yitezweho gutanga umusanzu mu kwinjiza amadevize binyuze mu bukerarugendo n’izindi nyungu zituruka ku kubungabunga ibidukikije.
Abaturage bari ku ruhembe ku izuka rya Gishwati
Abaturiye pariki bafashijwe kwiteza imbera binyuze mu mishinga ibyara inyungu
Imizi Ecotourism Development Ltd igiye gutangira kubaka inzu z’ubukerarugendo
Umushinga LAFREC ukorera muri REMA uri kubaka ibikorwa remezo bizifashishwa pariki itangiye kwakira ba mukerarugendo
Urugendo rwo kongera ibyiza bya Gishwati-Mukura rurakomeje

Iyo pariki iherereye mu Turere twa Rutsiro na Ngororero mu Ntara y’i Burengerazuba bw’igihugu, ingana na hegitari 3 558, harimo icyanya cya Gishwati gifite ubuso bungana na Hegitari 1 570, n’icya Mukura kingana na Hegitari 1 988.

Ni pariki yabashije kubaho kubera uruhare rwa leta n’abaturage, kuko nyuma ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi iyi pariki yari yakendereye, ituzwamo abaturage ndetse ibindi bikorwa byabo birushaho kuyangiza.
Kayihura Jean uturiye Pariki y’Igihugu ya Gishwati-Mukura, avuga ko bakimara gutuzwa muri Gishwati bayihinzemo ibishyimbo ku gice kinini ndetse bayiragiramo amatungo, utaretse n’igice kinini cyatuwe.
Ingaruka zibikomokaho ntizatinze kuko habanje kuva izuba ridasanzwe, nyuma hagwa imvura idasanzwe.

Ati “Nyuma yo gutema ishyamba habaye ikibazo, ikirere kirahinduka hano haba izuba rikomeye, haza ingomero ebyiri twari dufite rumwe rwa Nkore rutangira gusenyuka, tubona ingaruka ziteye ubwoba zibonetse kubw’ishyamba ryari ryangiritse.
Niho twatangiye gufata ingamba zo kujya inama tuti iri shyamba nirisenyuka, n’ubuzima twibwiraga ko tuzabamo ntibuzashoboka, hafatwa icyemezo dufatanyije n’izindi nzego, zo guhagarika kurituramo.
Ruzindana Alexis warindaga iyi pariki, yavuze ko babitangira mu 2009 yari yugarijwe n’ibikorwa byatumaga inyamaswa ndetse n’ibimera biyigize bihutazwa bikomeye kubera ibikorwa bya muntu.

Ati “Abantu bakimara kuhatuzwa, ishyamba bahise batangira kuritema, nk’impundu zarimo zatangiye guhura n’ikibazo ugasanga zigiye konera abaturage bari kuzirukaho, ikindi ni ukuriragira cyangwa n’ubucukuzi by’amabuye y’agaciro, ugasanga n’ibiti umushinga wa mbere wateye batangiye kubicukura.
Abaturage ku ruhembe rwo kubungabunga Gishwati
Mu gutunganywa iri shyamba, habanje umushinga Gishwati Area Conservation Program (GACP) wateraga ibiti muri iri shyamba hagamijwe ko ryongera kugira isura, ribungwabunga kuva mu 2008-2011.
Umaze guhagarara nibwo hibajijwe niba intambwe yatewe itazasubira inyuma, abaturage bagerageza kwishyira hamwe ngo barebe icyo bakora.
Baje kwishyira hamwe bashinga Forest of Hope Association (FHA) muri Mutarama 2012, ngo yubakire ku bikorwa byari bimaze kugerwaho n’umushinga wa mbere kandi bakabikora nta gihembo bategereje.

Nyuma hiyongereyeho ibikorwa by’Umushinga LAFREC ( Landscape approach to forest restoration and conservation) w’Ikigo cy’Igihugu cyo kubungabunga ibidukikije, REMA, wafashije mu gukomeza gusubiranya no gusana ibice by’ishyamba byangiritse, kubaka ibikorwa by’ibanze bya pariki ndetse no gufasha abaturiye pariki kwiteza imbere binyuze mishinga ibyara inyungu.

Binyuze muri muri uyu mushinga, amashaymba ya Gishwati na Mukura n’ibice biyakikije byakomeje gusubiranywa, cyane ahitwa Kinyenkanda ku gice cy’ishyamba rya Gishwati, ahatewe ibiti gakondo kuri hegitari 439.
Ibi biti byatewe hamaze kwimurwa abaturage bahatujwe, ariko leta iza kubona ko ari ngombwa ko bimurwa mu rwego rwo gukomeza kongera ubuso bw’ishyamba no kurinda iyangirika ryaryo.

Naho ku gice cy’ishyamba rya Mukura, Umushinga LAFREC wafashije gusubiranya ibice byacukurwagamo amabuye y’agaciro mu buryo butemewe n’amategeko, aho byatezaga isuri ndetse n’iyangirika ry’ibidukikije mu buryo bukabije.
Kuri ubu hakomeje gushyirwaho ibikorwa remezo by’ibanze by’ubukerarugendo bizifashishwa igihe pariki izaba yatangiye gukora.

Muri byo harimo inzu pariki izakoreramo, aho ba mukerarugendo bahererwa amakuru igihe basuye pariki (visitor centers), inzu z’abacunga pariki (ranger posts) ndetse n’aho ba mukerarugendo baruhukira igihe bari mu nzira basura pariki.

Umushinga LAFREC wa REMA kandi wafashije ababaturage kwiteza imbere binyuze mu mishanga ibyara inyungu ifite agaciro ka miliyari ebyiri na miliyoni 600 z’amafaranga y’u Rwanda, ndetse bubakirwa aho bazajya bamukirikira bakanagurishiriza ibyavuye mu musaruro wabo.

Hubatswe kandi ibikorwa byo kwirinda ibiza aho kuri ubu hamaze kubakwa ibiraro bine by’abanyamaguru ku migezi ya Sebeya na Satinsyi, aho kenshi abaturage batabashaga kwambuka bitewe n’amazi yateraga kuzura kwi’iyo migezi mu gihe cy’imvura nyinshi.
Hateganyijwe kandi ko hazubakwa ibindi biraro bitatu mu turere twa Rutsiro na Ngororero.
Hakozwe kandi inyigo n’ubushakashatsi bugaragaza urusobe rw’ibinyabuzima biri muri iyi pariki ndetse n’inyandko igaragaza uko ubukerarugendo buzakomeza gutezwa imbere.

Nyiratuza Madeleine wakoranye n’umushinga wa mbere ndetse akaza gushinga FHA, avuga ko mu bikorwa byo kubungabunga Gishwati, abaturage babigizemo uruhare rukomeye kandi bagaragaza umuhate udasanzwe kubera ko bari bazi akamaro kayo ku buzima barimo.

Ati “Mbere twari tuzi ko tuhasanga hegitari 800 gusa ariko abaturage batwereka ahantu hose bakoreshaga leta yari yarageneye gusubira mu mbago z’ishyamba, riza kwiyongeraho ubundi buso bwa hegitari 700.
Bashinga Forest of Hope Association ngo bumvaga bagiye kubungabunga ishyamba amezi make kubera ko bari abakorerabushake, kandi bumvaga atari ibintu bakora igihe kirekire.
Nyamara haje kuboneka inkunga ku buryo uyu muryango waje gukomera ndetse ugira abakozi bahoraho.
Hashyizweho itsinda ry’abantu batatu bavuye muri buri Kagali gakora kuri Gishwati, kakanagira komite y’abantu batandatu bagomba gushyigikira abarinda ishyamba, bakaba n’abahuza babo na leta.
Kabenga Edson wari umukorerabushake muri Pariki ya Gishwati, avuga ko bitangira bari abantu 18 baturiye ishyamba rya Gishwati.

Agaruka ku kazi kabo yagize ati “Tugenda tuzunguruka ku ishyamba tureba ahantu hashobora kuba hangiritse, aho tubonye tugahamagara abarinda ishyamba tukahabereka, twaba dufashe umuntu ari kuryangiza tukamwigisha, twamara kumwigisha tugahamagara abarinda ishyamba, tukamwandikisha, tukamurekura.
“Byaba bibaye nk’inshuro ya kabiri twongeye kumufata asubiye mu ishyamba, tugahamagara abarinda ishyamba, nabo bagahamagara abantu bo mu nzego z’ibanze kugira ngo bamuhane.
Ni umurimo abaturage bakora bawishimiye, kuko umusaruro waryo ubageraho binyuze mu bikorwa bijyana n’iyi pariki.
Mu bice biyikikije hubatswe ibikorwa nk’amakaragiro n’uruganda rw’ubuki rwa Gishwati, bijyana n’imihanda yunganira abaturage mu bikorwa binyuranye.
Pariki y’Igihugu ya Gishwati-Mukura igiye gutangira gusurwa

Umuyobozi wa Pariki y’Igihugu ya Gishwati-Mukura, Abel Musana, avuga ko kuba RDB igiye gutangira imicungire ya pariki mu buryo buhoraho aho gukorwa n’abaturage nk’uko bisanzwe, ari inyungu ikomeye ku gihugu ndetse n’abayituriye.
Imirimo yo kuhubaka ibiro bya RDB igeze kure.
Yagize ati “Iyi pariki iri ahantu twavuga ko hari ibikorwa remezo, umuhanda (wa kaburimbo) ubasha gutuma abantu bayigeramo, igihe ubukerarugendo buzaba butangiye bizoroha.

Ariko by’ubwihariko, muri iyi pariki ni naho dusanga amasoko y’imigezi nka Sebeya, hari amoko y’inyoni ataboneka ahandi, ikanagira umwihariko wo kuba ari nshya ku buryo abantu bazaba bishimiye kureba ahantu abantu bakoze ibishoboka byose ngo bagarure ishyamba ryari rigiye kuzimira ndetse barigire pariki.
Kugeza ubu urugendo rurimo gukorwa ni urwo kongera inyamaswa zirimo ndetse n’ibimera, ku buryo abantu bazishimira gusura iyi pariki ya Gishwati-Mukura.

Nyuma y’urwo rugendo rwose, Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’Iterambere kigiye gutangira gucunga Pariki y’Igihugu y’Igihugu ya Gishwati, ndetse giheruka gusinyana amasezerano na y’imyaka 25 n’ikigo Imizi Ecotourism Development Ltd, yo gutunganya no gucunga Pariki y’igihugu ya Gishwati-Mukura, ku buryo ihinduka igice gikorerwamo ubukerarugendo mu gihugu.
Ikigo Imizi gishamikiye kuri Wilderness Safari imaze kubaka izina mu bijyanye n’ubukerarugendo bugezweho kuri uyu mugabane.

Ayo masezerano azatuma ikigo Imizi gitunganya ndetse gicunge Pariki y’igihugu ya Gishwati Mukura ku buryo ba mukerarugendo bazoroherwa no gusura inguge n’ibisamuntu bihaboneka, RDB isigarane inshingano zo kubungabunga urusobe rw’ibinyabuzima n’ibikorwa byo kurengera ibidukikije.

Musana yakomeje ati “Hari ibyatangiye gukorwa kugira ngo gihe gito kiri imbere iyi pariki y’igihugu ya Gishwati Mukura izatangire kwakira ba mukerarugendo, muri ibyo navuga amasezerano RDB yagiranye na Wilderness Safari, mu minsi iri imbere bakazaza kubaka ‘eco-lodge’ iri ku rwego rwo hejuru hano iruhande rwa pariki, ariko mu mizo ya mbere hazabanza kubakwa aho ba mukerarugendo barara mu buryo bwo gukambika, iyo hoteli ya eco-lodge ikazaza mu cyiciro cya nyuma.
N’ubutaka bwo kubakaho bwarabonetse.
“Bikaba ari bimwe bizabanza kugira ngo ubukerarugendo nyirizina bwo gusura pariki, gusura za nyamaswa zirimo, gusura bya biti birimo, bitangire.
Ibyo bikaba ari bimwe mu bikorwa abatiriye pariki bazagenda babonamo inyungu kuo iyo mirimo yose izajya ikorwa akenshi, ari bo babigiramo uruhare.
Uretse ibikenera ubushobozi buhambaye, hari imirimo ya buri munsi kandi izajya ikenera abaturage bakikije iyi pariki.

Mu rugendo rwo kwishimira intambwe u Rwanda rumaze gutera mu kwita kubidukikije, Madeleine Nyiratuza watangije Forest of Hope Association ubu ukora muri UNDP Rwanda, ni umwe mu bise ingagi Izina ku wa Gatanu.
Yise ingagi izina ‘Isanzure’.
Intare zimaze kwikuba gatatu muri Pariki y’Igihugu y’Akagera kuva mu 2015

Pariki y’Igihugu y’Akagera yatangaje ko kuva Intare zongerwa muri iyi Pariki mu 2015, umubare wazo umaze kwikuba gatatu ndetse n’abasura iyi pariki bakomeje kwiyongera, ari nako umusaruro wayo mu bijyanye n’amafaranga na wo urushaho kuzamuka.

Pariki y’Igihugu y’Akagera yatangaje ko kuva Intare zongerwa muri iyi Pariki mu 2015, umubare wazo umaze kwikuba gatatu ndetse n’abasura iyi pariki bakomeje kwiyongera, ari nako umusaruro wayo mu bijyanye n’amafaranga na wo urushaho kuzamuka.
Imibare mishya y’ikigo African Parks gicunga iyi pariki, igaragaza ko mu mwaka ushize yasuwe n’abantu basaga 44,000, aho abasaga kimwe cya kabiri muri bo ari Abanyarwanda.
Ibyo byanatumye yinjiza amafaranga agera kuri miliyoni $2, ari nabwo bwa mbere ageze kuri icyo gipimo mu mateka y’iyi pariki.
Inyungu y’iyi pariki imaze kwiyongera hejuru ya 900 kuko yavuye ku $200,000 mu 2010, ku buryo iyi pariki igeze ku rwego nibura yihaza mu ngengo y’imari ku gipimo cya 75%.

African Parks ikomeza iti “Nyuma y’imyaka y’imyiteguro, binyuze mu miyoborere myiza n’uburyo bwo kubahiriza amategeko, umwaka wa 2017 wasize amateka y’igarurwa ry’inkura 18 z’umukara nyuma y’imyaka 10 zihacitse, bigizwemo uruhare na Howard G.
Buffett Foundation.
“Izindi Ntare ebyiri z’ingabo zongerewe muri Pariki y’Akagera mu 2017 kugira ngo zigire uruhare mu kororoka kwazo, ku buryo zimaze kwikuba gatatu kuva zagarurwamo mu 2015.
Mu gihe ubu gushimuta inyamaswa byakumiriwe, inyamaswa z’ingenzi muri pariki zikomeje kororoka.
Pariki y’Igihugu y’Akagera ni yo ikuze kuruta izindi mu Rwanda, kuko yashinzwe ahagana mu 1934.

Gusa mu myaka 25 ishize yendaga kuzimira kubera ibibazo birimo na Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, ariko aho amahoro yongeye gusagambira mu gihugu, hashyizwe imbaraga mu gusana iyi pariki, ihabwa ubwinyagamburiro bwa pariki n’inyamaswa zari zarashizemo zongera gushyirwamo.
Mu 2010 nibwo ikigo African Parks kizobereye mu gucunga pariki zitandukanye cyeguriwe imicungire ya Pariki y’igihugu y’Akagera, ku bufatanye n’Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’Iterambere, RDB.
Mu 2015 nibwo iyi pariki yongeye gusubizwamo Intare, nyuma y’uko zaje guhigwa ndetse zikicwa ahagana mu 1990, ndetse mu mwaka wa mbere izi ntare zari zimaze kwikuba kabiri ubwo havukaga ibyana 11.
Mu mwaka wa 2017 haje kongerwamo intare ebyiri z’ingabo zivuye muri Afurika y’Epfo, zirushaho kwiyongera.

Ibyo byagiye bigendana no kuvugurura amategeko akumira abashimuta inyamaswa, hashyirwaho itsinda rishinzwe kubashakisha ryifashishije imbwa zatojwe, hanashyirwaho uruzitiro rwa kilometero 120 rurimo amashanyarazi akomoka ku zuba rutandukanya Pariki n’ubutaka bwagenwe nk’ubuhumekero bwayo.
Hagamijwe kugabanya uguhura kw’abantu n’inyamaswa.
Mu gushishikariza Abanyarwanda kurushaho gukunda ubukerarugendo, abanyeshuri bagera ku 1800 nibura basura iyi pariki buri mwaka hamwe n’abarimu babo.
Ubu iyi pariki ni imwe mu zikomeye muri Afurika kuko ifite inyamazwa eshanu zifatwa nk’izikaze kurusha izindi kuri uyu mugabane, ari zo Inkura, Intare, Imbogo, Inzovu n’Ingwe.
Abana 25 b’Ingagi bagiye kwitwa amazina mu muhango wateguwe ku nshuro ya 15
Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’Iterambere, RDB, kiri mu myiteguro y’umunsi ngarukamwaka wo Kwita Izina, aho muri uyu mwaka abana 25 b’ingagi ari bo bazahabwa amazina, mu muhango ugiye kuba ku nshuro ya 15.

Kwita Izina ni umuhango witabirwa n’abashyitsi baba abo ku rwego rw’igihugu na mpuzamahanga, aho ingagi ziba zavutse buri mwaka zihabwa izina, mu mugenzo umaze kumenyerwa kandi ufite uruhare mu kumurikira amahanga ibyiza u Rwanda rufite mu bukerarugendo.
Iki gikorwa kiri mu rwego rwo kubungabunga ibidukikije, giteganyijwe ku wa 6 Nzeri mu Kinigi mu Karere ka Musanze.

Ibarura ryakozwe mu 2016 ryerekanye ko umubare w’ingagi ukomeje kwiyongera mu gice cy’ibirunga, aho habarurwaga ingagi 604 ziba mu miryango 41, bingana n’izamuka rya 26% kuko zavuye kuri 480 zabarurwaga mu mwaka wa 2010.
Iki ni ikimenyetso cy’intambwe ikomeye yatewe mu kubungabunga ingagi, ku buryo ziheruka kuvanwa mu mubare w’inyamaswa zugarijwe n’ibyago byo gukendera.
Imbaraga u Rwanda rukoresha mu kubungabunga urusobe rw’ibinyabuzima zikomeje no gutanga umusaruro kubera ko n’inyungu ituruka mu bukerarugendo igenda izamuka, hamwe n’abasura ingagi by’umwihariko.
Mu 2017 Pariki y’Igihugu y’Ibirunga yasuwe n’abantu 35 567, ibyara inyungu ya miliyoni $16.
Guverinoma yashyizeho uburyo bwo gusangiza abaturage baturiye pariki ku nyungu ituruka mu bukerarugendo, aho kuva mu 2005 bahabwaga 5% k’umusaruro wabwo, mu 2017 aza kongerwa agera ku 10%.
Byatumye haterwa inkunga imishinga 730 y’abaturage ibarirwa agaciro kari muri miliyoni $6.

Ni ibikorwa bimaze guhanga imirimo igera ku 1,500.

Amafoto yakwirakwijwe kuri internet agaragaza intare zo muri iyo pariki ziryamye mu mutuzo, mu mihanda ya kaburimbo inyuramo imodoka zitwaye ba mukerarugendo basura iyo pariki.
Ubuyobozi bwa pariki ya Kruger buherutse gushyira hanze amafoto y’izo ntare ziryamye mu mihanda , buvuga ko ubusanzwe zitajyaga zihagera kubera ko hanyuraga ba mukerarugendo benshi.
Guhera tariki 25 Werurwe uyu mwaka, ibikorwa byo gusura pariki muri Afurika y’Epfo byarahagaritswe, bituma abakerarugendo bakundaga kuza muri iyo pariki babihagarika.
Umuvugizi w’iyo pariki, Isaac Phaahla yabwiye CNN ati “Ubusanzwe kuzibona ziryamye mu muhanda ku manywa ntibyakundaga kubaho kuko hahoraga urujya n’uruza bigatuma zihungira mu bihuru.
Icyakora, Isaac Phaahla yavuze ko kuba abakerarugendo batakiza kureba inyamaswa, nta byinshi byahinduye ku myitwarire yazo kuko nubundi aho zari zisanzwe ziba ari ho zikiba.
Perezida wa Afurika y’Epfo Cyril Ramaphosa yatangaje ko kuguma mu rugo hirindwa coronavirus bizakomeza kugeza mu mpera za Mata uyu mwaka.
RDC: Abarinzi 12 ba Pariki y’Igihugu ya Virunga bishwe n’abantu bitwaje intwaro
Umuvugizi wa Pariki y’Igihugu ya Virunga muri Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo, yemeje ko abarinzi 12 ba pariki bishwe mu gitero cyagabwe n’abantu bitwaje intwaro.
Umuvugizi wa Pariki y’Igihugu ya Virunga muri Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo, yemeje ko abarinzi 12 ba pariki bishwe mu gitero cyagabwe n’abantu bitwaje intwaro.

Nk’uko AFP yabitangaje, iki nicyo gitero gihitanye abantu benshi muri iyi pariki, ndetse umuvugizi wayo yatangaje ko hari abandi bantu batandatu bakomeretse, kimwe n’abasivili bane banyuraga muri iyo pariki.
Umwe mu bakozi b’inzego z’umutekano ariko yavuze ko abapfuye ari abantu 13 barinda pariki n’abasivili batanu.
Pariki y’Igihugu ya Virunga ikora ku Rwanda na Uganda, ibarizwamo ingagi ariko ntabwo ku ruhande rwa Congo isurwa uko bikwiye kubera ibibazo by’umutekano.
Uruhande rusurwa nta nkomyi ni ku Rwanda, uretse ko ibikorwa by’ubukerarugendo byahagaze kubera icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Iyi pariki nabwo yaherukaga guhagarika ibikorwa byo kuyisura hagati ya Gicurasi na 2018 kugeza mu ntangiro z’umwaka ushize.
Ni umwanzuro wafashwe nyuma y’uko ba mukerarugendo babiri b’Abongereza bari bashimutiwemo.
Baje kurekurwa ariko umurinzi wa pariki yicirwa mu kubashimuta.
U Rwanda rwashyizwe ku mwanya wa kabiri muri Afurika mu bihugu byakiriye inama nyinshi mu 2019

Ishyirahamwe Mpuzamahanga rishinzwe gutegura Inama zikomeye (ICCA) ryashyize u Rwanda n’Umujyi wa Kigali by’umwihariko, ku mwanya wa kabiri mu bihugu byakiriye inama mpuzamahanga nyinshi muri Afurika mu 2019.

Ishyirahamwe Mpuzamahanga rishinzwe gutegura Inama zikomeye (ICCA) ryashyize u Rwanda n’Umujyi wa Kigali by’umwihariko, ku mwanya wa kabiri mu bihugu byakiriye inama mpuzamahanga nyinshi muri Afurika mu 2019.

Raporo ya ICCA y’umwaka ushize yerekana ko u Rwanda rwari ku mwanya wa kabiri n’ubundi inyuma y’Umujyi wa Cape Town muri Afurika y’Epfo, ku rutonde rwasohotse ku wa 13 Gicurasi 2019, rugaragaza uko imijyi yishimiwe mu kwakira inama mpuzamahanga mu 2018.
Icyo gihe u Rwanda rwari rwazamutseho umwanya umwe kuko mu 2017 rwari ku wa gatatu inyuma y’imijyi ya Cape Town muri Afurika y’Epfo [yongeye kwisubiza uwo mwanya] na Marrakesh muri Maroc.
Raporo yerekana uko ibihugu byakiriye inama mpuzamahanga mu 2019 yasohotse kuri uyu wa 12 Gicurasi 2020 yerekana ko u Rwanda rwisubije umwanya wa Kabiri.

Umuyobozi w’Ikigo gishinzwe kumenyekanisha Ubukerarugendo bushingiye ku Nama (RCB), Nelly Mukazayire, yavuze ko ari amakuru meza yerekana ko urwego rw’ubukerarugendo bushingiye ku nama rukomeje gutera imbere.
Ati “Aya ni amakuru meza na gihamya ko ingamba z’ubukerarugendo bushingiye ku nama ziri kugira agaciro.
Tuzakomeza gushaka uko twakora neza dufatanyije n’abanyamuryango bacu, n’abafatanyabikorwa bacu kugira ngo tuzakomeze kuza mu myanya myiza mu myaka iri imbere.
Uru rutonde rukorwa hashingiwe ku nama mpuzamahanga zizwi igihugu cyakiriye by’umwihariko iziba mu gihe runaka [inshuro imwe cyangwa ebyiri mu mwaka].
Izi nama zigomba kuba zibera mu bihugu nka bitatu bitandukanye, zikitabirwa n’abantu basaga 50.
ICCA kugeza ubu ifite abanyamuryango bagera kuri 50 muri Afurika, igihugu cya Afurika y’Epfo nicyo kiri ku mwanya wa mbere mu kwakira neza inama mpuzamahanga.
Ubukerarugendo bushingiye ku nama mu Rwanda bwinjiza angana na 20% by’amafaranga yose igihugu gikura mu bukerarugendo angana na miliyoni $56.
Muri Kigali hari ibyumba ibihumbi 10 n’ahantu heza hafite ubuso bwa metero kare ibihumbi 50 hakira inama.
U Rwanda rwari rwihaye intego yo kwinjiza miliyoni $88, mu bukerarugendo bwa 2019.
Cyakora ku byari biteganyijwe mu 2020 kugeza ubu hamaze kubaho igihombo cya 10% bitewe n’inama zagombaga kuba hagati ya Werurwe na Mata zasubitswe kubera COVID-19.
Mu nama zikomeye u Rwanda rwiteguraga kwakira zigakomwa mu nkokora n’icyorezo cya COVID -19 harimo inama y’abakuru b’ibihugu na za guverinoma z’ibihugu bikoresha Icyongereza CHOGM yigijwe inyuma.
Mu bituma u Rwanda ruza imbere mu bihugu byakira neza inama mpuzamahanga harimo kuba ari igihugu gitekanye, kirangwa n’isuku, kikaba cyaranoroheje uburyo bwo gutanga visa n’ibindi.
Imibare ya ICCA yerekana ko habaye inama 13 254 mu 2019 ari nazo nyinshi yabaruye kuva itangiye gutangaza urwo rutonde.
Umwana w’ingagi yitwa Icyamamare yatangiye gushakirwa izina binyuze kuri National Geographic

Mu gihe hitegurwa umuhango wo Kwita Izina, Shene ya Televiziyo y’Abanyamerika “National Geographic" yatangije itora rigamije guhitamo izina ry’umwana w’ingagi yitwa Icyamamare binyuze ku mbuga nkoranyambaga zayo.

Mu gihe hitegurwa umuhango wo Kwita Izina, Shene ya Televiziyo y’Abanyamerika “National Geographic" yatangije itora rigamije guhitamo izina ry’umwana w’ingagi yitwa Icyamamare binyuze ku mbuga nkoranyambaga zayo.
Mu Rwanda bimaze kumenyerwa ko buri mwaka, abana b’ingagi zo mu Birunga bahabwa amazina mu birori bizwi nko “Kwita Izina" bibera mu Kinigi mu Karere ka Musanze.
Umuhango wo “Kwita Izina" abana b’ingagi 25 ku nshuro yawo ya 15, uteganyijwe ku wa 6 Nzeri 2019.

Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’Iterambere (RDB) kuri iyi nshuro kibinyujije muri gahunda ya Visit Rwanda cyasabye abakurikira imbuga nkoranyambaga za National Geographic ubufasha bwo guhitamo izina ry’umwana umwe mu bazahabwa izina uyu mwaka.
Abakoresha imbuga nkoranyambaga bashobora guhitamo izina ryabanyuze muri abiri yashyizwe ku nkuta za Facebook na Twitter za National Geographic.

National Geographic ikurikirwa n’abantu miliyoni 23 n’ibihumbi 200 kuri Twitter yasabye abakunzi bayo guhitamo izina rimwe muri abiri arimo “Intego" na “Imyato" yatoranyijwe n’abayobora ba mukerarugendo basura ingagi, abazivura n’abandi bazikurikirana buri munsi.

National Geographic yanditse kuri Twitter yayo ko izina “Intego" rijyanye n’ubuzima bw’uwo mwana w’ingagi mu cyerekezo cy’u Rwanda cyo kubungabunga ibinyabuzima bigiye gukendera; “Imyato" ni izina riha icyubahiro abafashije u Rwanda mu iterambere rya gahunda zo kurinda urusobe rw’ibinyabuzima.
Uyu mwana w’ingagi uri gushakirwa izina avuka ku yitwa Icyamamare yo mu muryango wa Kwitonda ugizwe n’ingagi 34.
Yavutse ku wa 1 Nyakanga 2018.

Abahitamo izina rizitwa uyu mwana bahawe amasaha 72 yo gutora; irizagira amajwi menshi rizatangazwa na Gafotozi w’inyamaswa zo mu gasozi wa National Geographic, Ronan Donovan, ku munsi nyirizina wo Kwita Izina.

Mu bandi bamenyekanye bazita amazina abana b’ingagi barimo Tony Alexander Adams wabaye kapiteni wa Arsenal FC; Umuholandi, Louis Van Gaal watoje Bayern Munich, Ajax Amsterdam, FC Barcelona, Ikipe y’Igihugu y’u Buholandi na Manchester United; umuhanzi ukomoka muri Amerika Ne-Yo; Meddy n’umubyinnyi w’icyamamare Sherrie Silver.
Kuva umuhango wo Kwita Izina watangizwa mu 2005, abana b’ingagi 281 bamaze guhabwa amazina.
National Geographic ni Televiziyo ibarizwa muri Amerika; izwi mu biganiro by’urusobe rw’ibinyabuzima, ibidukikije, siyansi, umuco n’amateka.
Isanzwe ikorana na Arsenal mu kumenyekanisha ubukerarugendo bw’u Rwanda.

Ubufatanye bw’impande zombi buzageza mu 2021, buzibanda ku gukora inkuru zivuga ku byiza nyaburanga bigize ubukerarugendo bw’u Rwanda, aho zizajya zerekanwa kuri iyi televiziyo n’imbuga nkoranyambaga zayo.

U Rwanda rumaze kungukira miliyari 36 Frw mu bufatanye na Arsenal

Ikigo cy’Igihugu gishinzwe Iterambere (RDB) cyatangaje ko ubufatanye bw’u Rwanda n’ikipe y’umupira w’amaguru ya Arsenal bumaze kugira inyungu ibarirwa muri miliyoni 36 z’amapawundi, ni ukuvuga asaga miliyari 36 Frw.

Ikigo cy’Igihugu gishinzwe Iterambere (RDB) cyatangaje ko ubufatanye bw’u Rwanda n’ikipe y’umupira w’amaguru ya Arsenal bumaze kugira inyungu ibarirwa muri miliyoni 36 z’amapawundi, ni ukuvuga asaga miliyari 36 Frw.
Byatangajwe kuri uyu wa Kabiri mu kiganiro n’abanyamakuru mu gihe hitegurwa umunsi wo Kwita Izina abana b’ingagi 25.

Umwaka ushize binyuze mu kigo gishinzwe guteza imbere ubukerarugendo bushingiye ku nama, Rwanda Convention Bureau, u Rwanda rwinjiye mu bufatanye bw’imyaka itatu n’ikipe ya Arsenal FC, ikazajya yambara imyenda yanditseho ‘Visit Rwanda’ ndetse ikarumenyekanisha mu bundi buryo butandukanye.
Ku cyumweru tariki 12 Kanama 2018, nibwo ubufatanye bw’u Rwanda n’ikipe ya Arsenal FC bwatangiye ku mukino iyi kipe yakinagamo na Manchester City.
RDB ntiyatangaje amafaranga yishyuye iyo kipe iri mu zikunzwe ku Isi, gusa ivuga ko ari ayari ateganyirijwe kumenyekanisha u Rwanda no kureshya abashoramari na ba mukerarugendo.

Umuyobozi Mukuru mu Kigo cy’Igihugu cy’Iterambere RDB, ushinzwe ubukerarugendo, Belise Kaliza yabwiye abanyamakuru ko ubufatanye bw’u Rwanda na Arsenal bumaze kubyara umusaruro nyuma y’umwaka umwe butangiye.
Yavuze ko bifashishije imibare yakusanyijwe n’ibigo mpuzamahanga, inyungu u Rwanda rumaze kuvana muri ubwo bufatanye ibarirwa muri miliyari 36 Frw.

Ati “Mbere yo gusinya ayo masezerano 71 % by’amamiliyoni y’abafana ba Arsenal ntibabonaga u Rwanda nk’ahantu ho gusura ariko mu mpera z’umwaka wa mbere w’ubufatanye , kimwe cya kabiri cyabo babona u Rwanda nk’ahantu ho gusura.
Kaliza yavuze ko mu mwaka wa 2018 ba bakerarugendo bavuye mu Bwongereza baza mu Rwanda biyongereyeho 5 % .
Yakomeje avuga ko uburyo bwamamaza ubukerarugendo bw’u Rwanda bwakozwe na Arsenal, bwageze ku bantu miliyoni 4.
3 , akaba asanga ari umusaruro ufatika.
Ati “Bivuze ko ishusho yacu iri kubonwa n’abantu basaga miliyoni enye ku Isi.
N’iyo wakoresha kwamamaza kuri Televiziyo ntiwabasha kubona abantu nk’aba.
Ni igihamya ko bifite akamaro.

Inyungu kandi y’ubwo bufatanye RDB igaragaza ko ibonekera mu mubare w’abatangiye gukurikira ibikorwa byo gusura u Rwanda (Visit Rwanda) aho ku mbuga nkoranyambaga nka Youtube ababikurikira biyongereye ku kigero cya cya 100 % , kuri Instagram biyongeye ku kigero cya 507 %, kuri Twitter biyongera ku kigero cya 72 % naho kuri Facebook biyongeyere ku kigero cya 44 %.

Naivasha Oakes ushinzwe ubufatanye bw’u Rwanda n’ikipe ya Arsenal, yavuze ko iyo mibare y’agaciro k’inyungu u Rwanda rumaze kuvana muri ubwo bufatanye, hifashishijwe uburyo butandukanye bwabazwe n’ibigo bizobereye.

Ati “Aha mbere harebwaga agaciro ko kwamamaza kuri za Televiziyo, ibiganiro n’ibijyanye no kwamamaza u Rwanda bitangazwa buri gihe iyo Arsenal iri gukina , ako gaciro kabarwa n’ibigo mpuzamahanga mu kubarura iby’itangazamakuru , bakanareba uburyo uko kwamamaza u Rwanda birebwa , bakareba bati ese uko kwamamaza iyo u Rwanda ruba rubyishyura rwari kwishyura angahe.

Umuyobozi w’Ishyirahamwe ry’Abatwara n’abatembereza ba mukerarugendo mu Rwanda (RTTA) Mutoni Bonita, yavuze ko bishimishije kubona ubufatanye nk’ubwo bumaze gutuma u Rwanda rumenyekana hirya no hino ku Isi.

Yavuze ko nk’abakurikiranira hafi iby’ubukerarugendo, ba mukerarugendo bavuye mu Bwongereza bagiye bagabanyuka mu bindi bihugu mu minsi ishize kubera ibibazo by’icyo gihugu cyivanye mu Muryango w’Ubumwe bw’Uburayi (Brexit) na Ebola ivugwa mu karere u Rwanda ruherereyemo.
Mutoni yavuze ko kuba mu Rwanda bariyongereye bigaragaza agaciro k’ubufatanye na Arsenal.
Ati “Dukwiriye gushimira RDB ku bw’imbaraga mu kongera abakerarugendo b’abongereza mu Rwanda.
Ahanini haba mu Karere n’ahandi umubare wabo wagiye hasi kubera nka Brexit na Ebola ariko siko byagenze mu Rwanda.
Umwaka ushize wa 2018, mu Rwanda haje abakerarugendo bangana na miliyoni 1.

Radisson Blu yabaye iya mbere mu Rwanda yahawe igihembo cya hoteli itekanye
Radisson Blu Hotel and Convention Centre, imwe muri hotel zikomeye mu Rwanda, yabaye iya mbere mu Rwanda n’iya gatatu muri Afurika yahawe igihembo cya hoteli ituje kandi ifite umutekano.
Radisson Blu Hotel and Convention Centre, imwe muri hotel zikomeye mu Rwanda, yabaye iya mbere mu Rwanda n’iya gatatu muri Afurika yahawe igihembo cya hoteli ituje kandi ifite umutekano.

Ku wa 5 Kanama 2019 ni bwo byatangajwe ko Radisson Blu Hotel and Convention Centre yegukanye iki gihembo gitangwa n’Ikigo Mpuzamahanga gihemba hoteli zifite ituze n’umutekano cyitwa Safehotels Alliance AB.
Iki gihembo gihabwa hoteli zateye intambwe ishimishije mu gushyira mu bikorwa politiki n’ingamba zo kubungabunga ituze n’umutekano kandi zikubahiriza amabwiriza y’ubuziranenge.

Iki kigo gitanga iki gihembo cyemewe kandi gikorana n’Ishyirahamwe ry’ibigo bya ba mukerarugendo birimo Ihuriro Mpuzamahanga rishinzwe ibyo gutegura inama zikomeye (ICCA) n’Ibiro by’Umuryango w’Abibumbye bishinzwe gukumira Ibiza (UNISDR).
Umuyobozi wa Radisson Blu Hotel and Convention Centre, Denis J.
Dernault, yavuze ko bishimiye kuba hoteli yakiriye icyo gihembo gikomeye.
Yakomeje agira ati “Ituze n’umutekano by’abakiliya bacu ni ikintu duha agaciro gakomeye kandi tuzirikana ko ingamba nk’izo zishyirwa mu bikorwa.
Abakozi bacu bazakomeza gutozwa kubahiriza amabwiriza mu nama zidasanzwe, dukomeze kubigira iby’ibanze.

Yasobanuye ko Radisson Blu Hotel and Convention Centre izi neza ko icy’ibanze abagenzi bishimira aho batemberera ari ituze n’umutekano bahasanga, bityo kuba yabiherewe igihembo bizatuma abayigana barushaho kuyigirira icyizere.
Radisson Blu Hotel yahawe igihembo cya hoteli itekanye kandi yiyubashye nyuma y’igenzura yakorewe ku ngingo zisaga 220 zishingirwaho kugira ngo hoteli runaka ishyirwe mu zitekanye.

Harebwa ibyiciro bitandatu bitandukanye birimo umutekano w’inyubako, imiterere ya hoteli n’uburyo ihugura abakozi, ibikoresho bikumira inkongi, ibikoresho byifashishwa mu gucunga umutekano n’uburyo ikemura ibibazo ihuye nabyo.

Radisson Blu Hotel and Convention Centre, yagiye ihabwa ibindi bihembo birimo icyo yegukanye mu cyiciro cya hoteli zifite igishushanyo cyiza n’izikomeje gutera imbere muri Afurika, icya Hotel ibereye gukorerwamo Inama (Best Conference); Ubukerarugendo (Best Mice Hotel) n’Ishoramari mu Rwanda n’ibindi.
Radisson Blu Hotel and Convention Centre iherereye ku Kimihurura mu Mujyi wa Kigali.
Ifite ibyumba 291, birimo n’icyagenewe abo ku rwego rwo hejuru (Royal Suite) kiri ku buso bwa metero kare 700.
Igice cyayo gishushe nk’Inzu y’Umwami igaragara i Nyanza, cyakira abantu 2600.
Iyi nyubako yafunguye imiryango mu 2016, ifite ubushobozi bwo kwakira inama y’abantu 5000 icyarimwe n’umwanya uhagije ushobora kuberamo ibikorwa by’ubucuruzi, imyidagaduro n’ibindi birori.
